title: Free Calm Sleep: Improve your Sleep for Free
description:
Trouble Sleeping?
The calm sleep is the world‚Äôs only free sleep app for relaxing sleep sounds and ambiences that will improve your sleep or make your short naps more effective. Sleep sounds in our app are recommended & verified by top sleep experts. Try these guided meditation through relaxing music that reduces anxiety. Perfect life-changing app for beginners who can take up 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 30 minutes, 60 minutes sessions to achieve mindfulness.

Our main goal is to make you feel relaxed while you go asleep or prepare for short naps. Having such short naps at work or taking proper sleep can help you focus, breathe, stay calm, and create more head space, the conditions for a better night‚Äôs sleep by practicing meditation and mindfulness. The perfect guide to health and happiness, this app offers work and productivity meditation, movement and sport meditation, student guided meditation.

The Calm Sleep app is perfect sleep app for those who want to achieve good sleep, quick & powerful nap, & also helps user to wake up smoothly. The calm sleep app teaches you to sleep well, wake up smoothly, & have strong quick nap to have better head space & focus on daily life things. Sleep well through sleepcasts, wind downs, sleep music, etc. Checkout the mini meditation courses for themed meditation.

The Calm sleep app users do not need to have any past experience in meditation, our app will teach all the basics to achieve meditated & powerful sleep. The calm sleep app will helps in:

Powerful naps & sleep
Better & Easy Sleep
Relieving Insomnia
Improve Mood & Focus
Helping with anxiety & stress
The calm sleep app have sleeping sessions available from 5 minutes to 8 hours, so you can choose perfect length as per your need. The Smooth Alarm feature also helps you to  wake up from sleep smoothly. You can choose from following sleep sounds:

The calm sleep app can also be used for relaxing, calming your mind or improving concentration. You can check our wide range of sounds and include the filters as per your requirement. The app offers additional ways to meditate and stay calm apart from Sadhguru and Isha, be it yoga, mediation or spirituality, this will help you gain supreme peace. Rated highly by people from United States, Canada, Germany, France, Japan, Brazil, Switzerland, India, Australia, Singapore, etc., this is a must try app.

comments: Have been using this app for a few weeks now- EXCELLENT sounds for sleep- BUT- as I set the alarm to shut off it wakes me back up. Now the app keeps appearing on my screen in the middle of the day- annoying. So, it was good for a little while but I will keep searching and will have to uninstall to get some sleep. Thanks anyway, you tried.

Have been using it for a while now. It's staggering how much the app has improved within little time. The sound quality and the UI is amazing and most importantly everything works perfectly for free. Truly amazing work by the devs.

I love it really didn't thank would work so many enjoyable things to choose from take your mind to good memories and helps you to really relax so very thankful I found it, still using it , used many of the different things it offers and still not disappointed works for me even on some nights that am having a lot of trouble sleeping from pain or restlessness I turn it on pick out what I want to hear and off to a restful sleep I go I really enjoy it a lot have recommended it to family and friends

I really love this app and I've been using it to sleep and relax recently! I would love for it to have timers for less minutes like 5, 10, 15 as the current shortest is 30 mins and for it to have an alarm for when the time is over so that it can be used for short naps.

Update: took a while, but Finally sleeping more than a few minutes here and there. The 45 minute sleep meditation helps big time. Having Fibromyalgia makes sleep near impossible. Even when taking a sleeping pill, it doesn't help all the time. Despite the fact that I still don't get much sleep, my body is resting more than before using this app. If I can shut down completely and get a solid 60 minutes of sleep, I'll be raising it up to a full 5 stars (posting this at 1AM EDT).

title: Sleep as Android üí§ Sleep cycle smart alarm
description:
Smart alarm clock with sleep cycle tracking. Wakes you gently in optimal moment for pleasant mornings.

Features:
- Sleep cycle tracking with smart wake up uses your phone's or wearable sensors (2 weeks trial, full version after a one-time / life-time purchase)
- Sonar: revolutionary contact-less ultrasonic sleep tracking (no need for phone in bed)
- Wearable tracking - supports Pebble, Wear OS, Garmin Connect IQ, Mi Band, Tizen based Samsung wearables
- Health services: Google Fit, S Health integration
- Smart bulb control with Philips HUE, IKEA Tr√•dfri, or others over IFTTT
- Sleep Score: your sleep quality is made up of duration, deficit, deep sleep %, snoring, efficiency, irregularity 
- Gentle nature sound alarms (birds, sea, storm...) and playlists
- Nature sound lullabies (whales, storm, sea, chants..) with binaural tones for fast fall asleep
- Spotify and Play Music integration or online radio alarms or lullabies
- Never oversleep again with CAPTCHA wake up verification (Math, Sheep counting, Phone shaking, Bathroom QR code or NFC tag)
- Sleep talk recording, snoring detection and anti-snoring
- Jet lag prevention
- Sleep respiration tracking (Oximetry, Sonar or Sleep Phaser)
More features waiting for you to explore!

Watch our latest smartwatch integration progress and battery consumption chart here
https://docs.sleep.urbandroid.org/devices/wearables.html

Permissions explained
https://docs.sleep.urbandroid.org/general/permissions.html

Quick start
https://docs.sleep.urbandroid.org/faqs/quick_start.html

Documentation
https://docs.sleep.urbandroid.org/

FAQ
https://docs.sleep.urbandroid.org/faqs/

This app uses the Device Administrator permission. 
The reason is effective CAPTCHA (a feature to make sure you wake up in the morning) so you cannot avoid alarms by uninstalling the app during an alarm.

Thanks for using our apps!

comments: Great app! Tracks sleep, works with a TON of other services, and much more. Things this app does that I have yet to see another app do all in one include: 1. Spotify integration 2. Wearable integration 3. Capachas, which are there to make sure people like me that are deep sleepers are actually up 4. Sounds to help you fall asleep 5. Smart light integration One last thing: The upgrade is also worth the money.

It isn't as reliable as I'd like, it interferes with you listening to other audio as you fall asleep, and in general it doesn't do a great job of analyzing anything strange about your sleep. It doesn't seem to auto detect sleep properly based on other activity, and it doesn't always detect it when you wake up. It's sort of a big app that a lot of people use that just doesn't seem that great in the end.

Update 2020-10-30: reinstalled Sleep as Android and now working. If anyone else having same issue, backup settings then uninstall / install. Worked for me. Update 2020-10-29: latest update breaks the registered version again. Please fix Update 2020-09-16: New update for unlock resolved my issue I was having as trial mode instead of paid premium. Things are back to normal. Thank you for the great support! Btw, best alarm clock program. Update 2020-08-23: unlock for premium stopped working.

Junk app. Shows a portion of your sleep graph but no way to see it all . Try to expand it and all you will accomplish is highlighting the portion you're already seeing. When you try to listen to the sounds that it ostensibly recorded during your sleep, all your hear is various recordings of what sounds like alien gun fire. I have no idea why anybody would give this junk app a high rating. If you want a good app try sleep cycle.

One of the best-written apps EVER! Functionality is amazing! But!.. 1. Weirdly, I couldn't find alarm duration, and I need multiple alarms to wake up, not just one hour-long alarm, brain just ignores it. 2. When the swipe menu is open, the Back button closes the program, not the menu, weird too.

comments: I've used this for a few weeks. I made a custom sound that reminds me of sleeping outside on our back lawn growing up... the flow of a large irrigation ditch and crickets. With the timer feature, it is almost perfect. If I could add an occasional frog, that would be perfect. The frog on the app is too repetitive. OCCASIONAL is missing. If the city, not the country is your thing, this app has that, too. Using free version.

This app is very straightforward and easy to get started. The sounds are pleasant/relaxing and are accompaniedwith nice visuals. There are lots of options and it is fun to mix and customize different sounds. The visual design is gorgeous and beautiful with the use of cool nightly colors. (Gradients can be hard to pull off but you guys made everything so beautiful and easy to read bravo!!!) I am excited to use this more in my daily life to help me relax and get away from the rustle and bustle.

In using this app for 5 minutes after installing it "I was hooked!" The amount of control you have over what weird variations that make us individuales are all found here. I was able to completely customize what, "I need to sleep.", here and be very specific in my wants and needs. I highly recomend it if you're used to falling asleep with the TV on like I do. I usually wake up as soon as the TV shuts off. I like the timer on this app as I somtimes need to have something running while I sleep.

By far the best app for sleeping, you can customize everything to suit what helps you sleep. There are so many options to chose and you can individually turn volume up or down. I downloaded a few apps like this and i didnt even bother checking them out, i just uninstalled all of them and kept this one. Thanks for the great app, the rain is the only sound that helps me sleep and the added customized features help even more. Ive only used it for 2 minutes and i love it!

Wonderful, especially being able to make custom sound mixes. Even my dogs and cats sleep better with the sounds playing! Some sounds in mixes seem to delay going on and sometimes don't go on at all. This may be sue to available bandwidth or something else (?) Like that it plays even while net surfing! Excellent, very useful, healthy app much needed in these stressful times. THANK YOU!

title: Sleep Cycle: Sleep analysis & Smart alarm clock
description:
Relax, sleep better and wake up feeling rested with Sleep Cycle, the smart alarm clock. Track sleep from bedtime to morning, and get detailed analysis with the app that makes waking up in the morning just that bit easier. 

Track sleep using your phone and start your day feeling energized with our intelligent alarm clock and sleep tracker. Its unique design only wakes you up while you‚Äôre in your light sleep phase. Plus, you‚Äôll get detailed reports as Sleep Cycle monitors your sleep patterns, from bedtime until you're waking up. Track sleep and use the data to help you sleep better today! 

‚è∞ Waking up made easy - 5 reasons you‚Äôll love Sleep Cycle:

1. Sleep better with a gentle wake up call - Sleep Cycle‚Äôs alarm clock wakes you up while you‚Äôre in light sleep and is a natural way to start your day.
2. Relax at bedtime and track sleep easily - Learn about your sleep patterns with detailed analysis. 
3. A sleep tracker with a difference - There‚Äôs no phone under your pillow, you can track sleep by placing your device on the nightstand or close by on the floor. 
4. Your health comes first - Your sleep data and reports will help you feel great inside and out. 
5. Sleep better - Relax and let Sleep Cycle analyse your light sleep, deep sleep and overall health.

Relax with a good night‚Äôs sleep that will do wonders for your health. 

Download Sleep Cycle today - waking up in the morning has never been easier! 

Free features

‚àö Sleep analysis with Sleep Cycle patented sound technology, or accelerometer
‚àö Detailed sleep statistics and daily sleep graphs
‚àö Carefully selected alarm melodies
‚àö Snooze by shaking or double tapping the phone lightly
‚àö Customizable wake-up window. From instant (regular alarm clock), up to 90 minutes

Premium features

‚àö Longterm sleep tracker trends
‚àö Compare your sleep data to world sleep statistics ‚Ä¢ Snore trends - view historical snore trends data
‚àö Sleep aid - helps you fall asleep easier
‚àö Sleep notes - see how events such as drinking coffee, stress, working out, or eating late affect your sleep quality
‚àö Wake up mood - see how Sleep Cycle affects your wake up mood
‚àö Online backup - lets you secure your sleep data online
‚àö Export sleep data to Excel for detailed analysis


REQUIREMENTS
Ability to charge your phone by the bed.
Ability to place your phone near the bed, such as on a nightstand table or on the floor.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I love the sleep tracker feature on this! I upgraded just to accurately record my sleep and it has improved over time. One feature I wish it could do in the tracker is combine different sleep sessions in same day. For example, I like to take a 30min nap during lunch break. Sometimes at night, I am woken up to take dog out, or use the facilities. When I stop and restart it, it only records the most recent session.

Doesn't always record analysis. Some mornings you turn the alarm off (the alarm that is part of this app) and it simply does nothing instead of displaying your sleep record. It seems random as to when it works. In particular when you turn the alarm off and it goes to snooze (another glitch) it fails to record.

I benefited from this app a few years ago and need to do this again. Why did it switch from accelerometer to microphone? How will it know if I've stopped breathing or just changed sides? The accelerometer was way cool.

The microphone tracking is a great idea and seems well implemented, but there are two issues that baffle me that are easily fixed: 1) I often wake up early and want to know if I've gotten enough sleep. Show me. Why make me remember what time I went to bed and calculate? 2) It knows when I'm awake or asleep based on the microphone data so why doesn't it subtract out the time I was not sleeping? "In bed" time should be a second, less-important metric. Time actually asleep is more important.

It works. Its got a well designed UX. It really helps people with disorders such as ADHD where following a regular routine is important, but regular alarms are too discordant. I like the fact that the upgrade screen is at the beginning. The design is Honest. So all in all, well done.

title: Sleep Monitor: Sleep Cycle Track, Analysis, Music
description:
Cannot sleep well? Insomnia?
How did you sleep last night? 
 
Find your sleep secrets with Sleep Monitor! Sleep Monitor helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Monitor also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Monitor provides relaxing and soothing sleep music to help you sleep better.  
 
Install Sleep Monitor to:
‚úç - New Feature: Write Sleep Notes
Take brief notes for your sleep. Write down anything you want so you will never forget about them.

üéô- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!
 
üí§- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.
 
üì≤- Track Your Sleep Phases
Sleepers will have 4 or 5 sleep cycles during the night. Usually sleepers will pass four sleep stages in one sleep cycle: Non-REM 1(between waking and sleep), Non-REM 2(light sleep), Non-REM 3(deep sleep), and REM (Rapid Eye Movement, when most dreaming happens) sleep. These stages progress cyclically from 1 through REM then begin again with stage 1. A complete sleep cycle takes an average of 90 to 110 minutes, with each stage lasting between 5 to 25 minutes.
 
Sleep Monitor uses both microphone and accelerator sensors to measure body movements and environmental noise changes and then recognize your sleep stages.
 
üìà- Get Your Sleep Sore
Sleep Monitor will generate useful information for you after tracking, like sleep score, sleep cycle graphic, sleep statistics, sleep noise audios. Get your daily, weekly or monthly sleep insights and use those data to help you sleep better. Sleep Monitor is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like smartband or smartwatch.
 
‚è∞ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.
 
üéµ- Listen Relaxing & Soothing Music
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.
 
üë©‚Äç‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüíã‚Äçüë©Sleep Monitor Target Group
- People who are suffering insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.
- People who want to do self-diagnosis whether there are signs of poor sleep quality.
- People who care about sleep quality
 
üì≤App Working Requirements
‚àö Place your Android phone near your pillow or bed
‚àö Sleep alone to eliminate interference
‚àö Make sure battery is enough
 
üè≥Ô∏è‚ÄçüåàLanguage Support
English, German, French, Japanese, Chinese, Italian, Korean, Hungarian, Portuguese, Spanish, Dutch, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Vietnamese, Arabic, Indonesian, Persian, Bulgarian, Czech, Catalan, Ukrainian, Breton, Danish, Slovak
 
üìù About Sleep Records Saving
Sleep Monitor free version users can save the latest 7 sleep records in the phone; Sleep Monitor pro version users can save up to 30 latest sleep records in the app side and backup all history records on the server side for later checking.

üîê Upgrade to Sleep Monitor Pro to Enjoy ALL Advanced Features
‚àö Download sleep noise audio files
‚àö Unlock all sleep music
‚àö Save 30 and backup all sleep records
‚àö Unlock sleep notes
‚àö No ads
 
‚ù§Ô∏èFAQ
http://sleep.emobistudio.com/faq/index.html

We are working to add more useful features and support more languages in coming updates.
 
Make sure your bedroom is quiet, dark, cool. Feel relaxed before sleep.  
Hope you sleep like a baby!

summary: Find deep insights of your sleep: Sleep Cycle, Sleep Score, Sleep Graph & Music
recentChanges: Halloween offer and other improvements
comments: Full of weird notifications and ads, im sure they sell your data... The sleep score is useless, based almsot solely om what you put as how you feel when you woke up. I put i feel great after sleeping five hours with no (detected) REM and it gave me a 9.5! An hour after i said i felt great i crashed lol. Also, it cant detect awake vs. light sleep, at least not on my phone.

I personally LOVE this app!!! I've only used it for 2 nights and decided to buy the full version. Not only does it show when you are in a deep or light sleep, but it records the sounds around you. It picked up my fan, the rain outside, vehicles going down the road and me snoring! I always take my phone with me if I wake up to go to bthrm or get a drink so it picked up on the fact I woke up. Definitely would recommend!

It records your tossing and turning and will show in a colourful bar graph when you were in light and deep sleep, awake and also rem. It then gives you a percentage of how much of your sleep were in each category. It records the time you go to sleep (with an amount of time between switching on the 'start sleeping' and when you actually fall asleep). The basic (no payment option) saves only the last 7 sleeps of information - if you want it to save more you can pay (but I'm just using it free)

I actually like it very much. So much that I bought the full version for a year. But since I got my new smartphone I can't save the audios anymore which was the main part for me to pay for it... The problem is got fixed in less than two weeks, the support is kind, fast and understanding

This app is great. Noise factor is high, because of furnace running. It's by my bedroom. Otherwise it is really quiet here in the evening. It doesn't keep me awake. I use the sounds on my phone to help me fall asleep.

recentChanges: Hello Sleepers! Wash away your worries with the help of our new water sounds. Studies have shown that nature sounds, especially water sounds, are effective at lowering stress levels. In honour of World Mental Health Day, we wanted to bring you the calming power of water. Enjoy our 10 new water sounds and sleep well.
comments: Deeper sleep than with any other sounds. We've used a box fan in our room for years to help us sleep. I downloaded this app and used it on a vacation when we didn't have room to pack the huge box fan. Using a combination of white, brown, and other noises, including the Dreams frequency, we slept deeper than we could remember ever having slept before. Now we use this all the time and consistently wake up feeling nicely rested. The paid version is so worth it because of the dream frequency.

I used to use this back when it was just a webpage, and it's helped so much with my anxiety and night terrors. This kind of app is deeply helpful for people like me. I love it, it's incredible, but I'm SO disappointed at the fact that premium is a SUBSCRIPTION and the outrageous price for it. If there was an option to purchase a certain package, like specific sounds, I'd have rated this the 5 stars it should have. I don't need new content every week. Unfortunately, it gets a 3.

Wonderful! I used this a long while ago and decided to come back to it. I've been using the isochronic sounds for a while and they've actually helped! But i hear a LOT of static when i use them. I'm not sure if its an app problem or maybe phones arent meant to run such a low tone but its gotten a bit worse. Other than that the sounds are all perfect and just what i need with the free version.

It's a lifesaver. You don't need cell service or wifi to use it, so no matter where you are you can have a waterfall, a campfire, and some peaceful music (or whatever noises you want) for free. It uses very little battery as well and will play in the background if you're using other apps. There are some noises you have to upgrade for, but for the most part, it's free, loud, and doesn't have audible looping. Thank goodness for this app.

I really like the 'eternity' sound but every time I turn it on, there's this static noise that pops up. Its very distracting. I thought it might be my phone but I turned on the same music on YouTube and Spotify and there was no static, so it's definitely the app. I would like to continue using it on the app because it plays on and on but I don't want the static noise.

title: Sleep stories for calm sleep & meditation by Wysa
description:
Sleep by Wysa is your go-to sleep app when you want to sleep well. If you want to get deep sleep but can‚Äôt, because of a negative thought or worries troubling your mind, sleep mindfulness by Wysa is here to give you some headspace & provide any sleep aid that you need to sleep better. Sleep stories including bedtime stories help you breathe, calm down and free you from stress and meditations help you with sleep relaxation. Relieve stress, have a restful sleep, relax and calm with all the tools that are provided by this sleep relaxation app.

Listen to a different sleep story every day to fall asleep. Sleepytime tales are the best things that could happen when sleep is miles away from your eyes and you are not sleepiest. Relive the comforting nostalgia of bedtime stories with sleep stories for grown ups as they help you drift into sleep. 

Studies show that writing a diary at bedtime can help you clear some headspace, think positively and that can be a real sleep booster which can help you sleep better and fall asleep quickly. Practicing gratitude before going to sleep can provide you a good night‚Äôs sleep and a morning with positive energy and a hopeful frame of mind.

Put your restless sleep to an end with free sleep melodies and sleep sounds. Sleep melody works wonders when you want your sleep restore your body‚Äôs energy. Wysa‚Äôs Sleep as Android app which includes sleep white noise is one of the best sleep meditation and sleepings apps free. If you are looking for the best sleep apps and sleepings apps, then you have found the right one for deep sleep.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

‚ú® Featured for World Mental Health Day - in 2018 and 2019

üòé Has helped more than 1 million people

üìù Use CBT-i for insomnia and journaling to sleep well

Sometimes we get tangled inside our heads, and negative thoughts don‚Äôt let us sleep at bedtime even when we are feeling sleepiest. Wysa can help you rethink those thoughts with CBT tools for insomnia and adhd. Wysa already has helped more than a million people successfully break the cycle of negative thinking by helping them reframe those thoughts. A touch of positivity before going to sleep can have a impact for deep sleep.

Mindfulness starts with breathing. Breathing exercises are one of the most underrated techniques to be calm, which you will get in this mindfulness sleep app free.

Deep sleep sounds good when sleep deprivation kicks in. Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for insomnia (CBT-I) is a proven technique that can do wonders for insomnia and adhd. Don‚Äôt believe us? Try it yourself. For extra support, you can avail of guidance from psychologists - Wysa Sleep. Coaches who can help you deal with different issues related to sleep using CBT-I. Sessions with sleep coaches will be aimed at moving towards healthier bedtime sleep habits and finding strategies that will work for you.

- Have a look at how Wysa can help you improve your sleep quality when you are sleepiest

- Bedtime stories to fall asleep: Enjoy calm sleep with sleep stories by Wysa

- Relax, focus and sleep peacefully with the help of mindful sleep meditation free

- Wysa‚Äôs calm sleep booster app helps to get better sleep and head space

- Practice CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) to sign off the day on a high note

- 30+ coaching tools which help in dealing with Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Worry, Loss, or Conflict

- Wysa is the calm app you need for meditation and sleep. It helps you to stop, breathe & think, making it an effective sleep booster

- Manage anxious thoughts and anxiety: deep breathing, techniques for observing thoughts, visualization, and tension relief

- Dealing with worry: observe mindfulness & practice breathing techniques. Use Wysa to meditate and stay calm

- Manage conflict at work, school or in relationships that are not letting you sleep: special mindfulness and visualizations like empty chair exercise, gratitude meditation, exercises to build skills in having difficult conversations

Give it a go!

comments: This app is amazing. It help me improve my sleeping schedule and my insomnia is getting better. The stories and guided meditations work like magic. The moment I turn it on, my body resets itself. It help me go into a deep slumber which I cant remember when last I had one. I really recommend this app. It is awesome.

This is the very best app. I have found for sleep. I never reach the end of the "Sleep Stories" which is the whole point - wonderful! I have only just started using this app. and am very interested in exploring your other options. You seem to offer an Holistic approach for well being. Thank you.

I gave this app 5 starts because it provides all the necessities, sleep stories, sleep music, excersises and more. There is also a sleep stories of the day which allows you to listen to stories that are only for plus so if you can't get plus you can still listen to a variety of stories without paying the price! Highly recommend.

I love it. I found the perfect family home to raise my kids in though it has one major factor I thought I could never get used to... it's right next to the train line where at night quite frequently a loud horn sounds to prevent someone being hit if they are crossing the tracks. Without this app I dont think I could have gotten to sleep at all so it is my life saver and I completely love it. Thank you for being the solution to my worries. Sleep is vital and we all deserve the best.

After we got into our tailored to me sessions, I found I felt a little better and lighter each time. My one little drawback was that I could not get a question answered for me regarding how I will be receiving daily reminders. I had hopes it could be an alarm but I still don't know how I will receive my 6:45 am reminder. Any thoughts there I would appreciate an email with the answer! I think this can be a great tool in a wide array of personal areas. I also appreciate the anonymity.

recentChanges:
Thanks for updating to the latest version of Sleep Sounds!

We have exciting news! Sleep Sounds is introducing Better Bedtime, a premium monthly membership that gives you unlimited access to a combination of ad-free listening, expanded listening options, and an alarm clock integrated into your favorite sleep companion. Sign up today and get early access to the best of Better Bedtime!

Questions, issues or feedback? Drop us a line at hello.relaxio+sleep.sounds@gmail.com and we‚Äôd be happy to help.
comments: Been using for years! Love that it's an app not a machine. I have separate personalized sounds for night and day, so I can play it wherever AND whenever I'm sleeping, cause it's right on my phone. And best part is, because I use it consistently for bed, as soon as it starts playing, my brain says.. Ok! Bedtime! And when I shut it off, my brain switches to waking mode! Love, love, love it!

Amazing experience with this app, as there are so many sounds and you can add more to the existing presets or you can make your own custom sound. Then you can set a time and it turns off the sound when the timer is up. There are also many sounds like: rain, rain on the window, the desert, a vintage train and white, brown and pink noise. Then you can add crickets and fire crackling and more. I have had many sleepful nights and I enjoy the app so much thanks.

This app has been great for helping me sleep better. When it's not in use I find myself waking up in the middle of the night and being unable to get back to sleep, but that never seems to be the case when using this app. I don't have a ton of apps on my phone, preferring to use it for the basics, but this is one I use every day. Unfortunately it's started pestering me with ads, even though I have a play pass subscription.

it works. its easy to accidentally turn off though. lots of adjustable settings. The biggest problem is the ads that can appear when u select another sound. Its not fun having a loud ad blasting through the house waking everyone in middle of night.

I have mild Sleep Apnea and I didn't do well with The CPAP. Since I started Sleep Sounds I don't take so long to fall asleep. I'm sure many other people find getting to sleep difficult as we tend to think about daily stresses and negative thoughts. When I listen to my favorite sounds I fall asleep within 5-10 minutes. Love this app. My teenage son and my elderly mother say "It works!" I highly recommend it. Sweet Dreams!

title: Headspace: Meditation & Sleep
description:
Stress less. Sleep soundly. Get happy. Learn the life-changing skills of meditation and mindfulness in a few minutes a day with Headspace. Choose from hundreds of guided meditations on everything from stress management and anxiety management to sleep, personal growth, and mind-body health. 

Simply download this guided meditation, mindfulness, and sleep app for free ‚Äî then sit back, breathe, calm your thoughts, relax, and be kind to your mind. Meditate anywhere, anytime ‚Äî and start living a more calm, healthier, happier life.

About Headspace
Headspace is your guide to mindfulness for your everyday life. Learn meditation and mindfulness skills from world-class experts like Headspace co-founder Andy Puddicombe, and develop tools to help you focus, breathe, stay calm, and create balance in your life ‚Äî whether you need stress relief or help to get restful sleep.

What this meditation and sleep app does
The Headspace app teaches you how to meditate and live mindfully, with guided sessions on stress management, happiness, resilience, physical health, and more. Even if you‚Äôve never meditated before, the free Basics course teaches you the essentials.

In the Sleep by Headspace experience, you‚Äôll find sleep meditations, relaxing sleep music, and sleepcasts to guide you to a place of calm and rest. If you have trouble falling asleep or problems with your sleep cycle, Sleep by Headspace can put your mind to bed.

Courses:
Learn techniques to help deal with stress and anxiety, relax your mind, and more. 
‚óã Stress & anxiety meditation: Managing Anxiety, Letting Go of Stress
‚óã Falling asleep & waking up meditation: Sleep, Restlessness
‚óã Work & productivity meditation: Finding Focus, Prioritization, Productivity, Creativity
‚óã Movement & sports meditation: Motivation, Focus, Training, Competition, Recovery
‚óã Physical health mindfulness training: Mindful Eating, Pain Management, Pregnancy, Coping With Cancer
‚óã Student guided meditation: Dealing With Distractions, Leaving Home

 Focus:
From meditations for working from home to concentration-boosting music, the new Focus tab is your one-stop shop for changing the way you get things done. Tune in to the moment with Headspace‚Äôs Chief Music Officer, John Legend, and new music from groundbreaking artists, like Madlib. Or choose from 12 different Focus music stations, including Lo-Fi Times and Corner Booth Jazz.

Move Mode:
Release stress and tension through movement with Move Mode ‚Äî mood-boosting, at-home workouts led by Olympian trainers Kim Glass and Leon Taylor. Includes:
‚óã Quick workouts ‚Äì guided exercise videos for stress release, motivation, winding down, and more
‚óã 28-day courses ‚Äì build a mindful fitness routine with a trainer-led course
‚óã Audio-guided cardio ‚Äì mindful listening for your next run or walk

The Wake Up:
Start your morning happy with The Wake Up ‚Äî a daily video series designed to brighten your day. Includes inspiring stories, mindful advice from experts, and animations to make you smile.

Sleep by Headspace:

descriptionHTML:
Stress less. Sleep soundly. Get happy. Learn the life-changing skills of meditation and mindfulness in a few minutes a day with Headspace. Choose from hundreds of guided meditations on everything from stress management and anxiety management to sleep, personal growth, and mind-body health.

Simply download this guided meditation, mindfulness, and sleep app for free ‚Äî then sit back, breathe, calm your thoughts, relax, and be kind to your mind. Meditate anywhere, anytime ‚Äî and start living a more calm, healthier, happier life.

About Headspace
Headspace is your guide to mindfulness for your everyday life. Learn meditation and mindfulness skills from world-class experts like Headspace co-founder Andy Puddicombe, and develop tools to help you focus, breathe, stay calm, and create balance in your life ‚Äî whether you need stress relief or help to get restful sleep.

What this meditation and sleep app does
The Headspace app teaches you how to meditate and live mindfully, with guided sessions on stress management, happiness, resilience, physical health, and more. Even if you‚Äôve never meditated before, the free Basics course teaches you the essentials.

In the Sleep by Headspace experience, you‚Äôll find sleep meditations, relaxing sleep music, and sleepcasts to guide you to a place of calm and rest. If you have trouble falling asleep or problems with your sleep cycle, Sleep by Headspace can put your mind to bed.

Courses:
Learn techniques to help deal with stress and anxiety, relax your mind, and more.
‚óã Stress & anxiety meditation: Managing Anxiety, Letting Go of Stress
‚óã Falling asleep & waking up meditation: Sleep, Restlessness
‚óã Work & productivity meditation: Finding Focus, Prioritization, Productivity, Creativity
‚óã Movement & sports meditation: Motivation, Focus, Training, Competition, Recovery
‚óã Physical health mindfulness training: Mindful Eating, Pain Management, Pregnancy, Coping With Cancer
‚óã Student guided meditation: Dealing With Distractions, Leaving Home

Focus:
From meditations for working from home to concentration-boosting music, the new Focus tab is your one-stop shop for changing the way you get things done. Tune in to the moment with Headspace‚Äôs Chief Music Officer, John Legend, and new music from groundbreaking artists, like Madlib. Or choose from 12 different Focus music stations, including Lo-Fi Times and Corner Booth Jazz.

Move Mode:
Release stress and tension through movement with Move Mode ‚Äî mood-boosting, at-home workouts led by Olympian trainers Kim Glass and Leon Taylor. Includes:
‚óã Quick workouts ‚Äì guided exercise videos for stress release, motivation, winding down, and more
‚óã 28-day courses ‚Äì build a mindful fitness routine with a trainer-led course
‚óã Audio-guided cardio ‚Äì mindful listening for your next run or walk

The Wake Up:
Start your morning happy with The Wake Up ‚Äî a daily video series designed to brighten your day. Includes inspiring stories, mindful advice from experts, and animations to make you smile.

Sleep by Headspace:
Create the ideal conditions for a calm, restful sleep.

‚óã Full access to Sleep by Headspace and Move Mode ‚Äî bring mindfulness to every part of your life
summary: Meditation made simple for sleep, stress, and happiness.
developer: Headspace for Meditation, Mindfulness and Sleep
recentChanges:
A steady meditation practice can calm the mind. But sometimes a bug appears in the app and it distracts us. We removed that bug from this latest version, and we already feel more at ease.

If you run into any trouble, let us know at help@headspace.com
comments: Its unfortunate that they dont advertise the Student discount. $9.99/year is astoundingly generous of them. Thanks! But I dont think anyone knows about this deal. I only learned about this when I accidentally stumbled across a YouTube comment from a year ago. Awesome app, great stuff for sleep. It do be crashing though. Just recently, so idk if it's just me or everyone else got the same problem?

This app was brilliant when I first started using it every day - especially during lockdown - but now that Headspace Plus is a thing, it's way too expensive to access to the soundscapes & meditations that I was using before. The selection available now, without Headspace Plus, is shockingly little especially considering I am already paying for the app! I liked a nice mix of things to help me sleep but now I can only listen to the same three things on rotation which isn't great. Not happy at all.

My 5-year old and I saw a commercial for this app which featured a cute animated video of a "robot" slowly shutting down its systems in advance of falling asleep. I thought this would be a great app for my kid to watch while doing bedtime, so I signed up for a (pretty pricey) subscription. Immediately was disappointed by the fact that no such cutesy videos are ACTUALLY part of the app (most of it appears to consist of streaming audio). Feels a bit like false advertising...

I only use this app for the Sleepcasts, they're very peaceful to listen to and I usually fall asleep after the first 15 minutes or so. A few months ago they offered 3 to listen to for free, but now they only offer 1, and all of the others are behind a pretty high pay wall - its incredibly frustrating, especially during this time and all the stressful things everyone is going through in their lives

Just updated the app for the first time in around a year. The new organization of meditation options is awful. Examples: you have a lot of activity-specific meditations, but the only way to access them is to remember what they're called and search. Also, i don't want to have to scroll forever, past lots of meditations that I'll never be choosing (e.g., kids), just to see what's available. Alphabetical organization of every option is tedious and difficult to get through.

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* ‚ÄúI‚Äôm generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‚ÄòConcentrate on your body‚Äô‚Äù - New York Times

* ‚ÄúIn the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses‚Äù - Mashable

* ‚ÄúEliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal‚Äù - Tech Republic

* ‚ÄúFound myself similarly refreshed afterwards‚Äù - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

recentChanges: Thanks for using Calm! This update contains multiple bug fixes and performance improvements. As always, you can expect an original Daily Calm every day, new music and Sleep Stories every week, and new Meditation programs every month.
comments: I have used this app for over 4 years! I had the free version for a year and a half and loved it but wanted a little more. I use the paid version now. It doesn't cost anymore than any streaming service, actually cheaper than my Netflix and even Hulu. I'd give up both for this app if I had to. Helps with my sleep , my kid's sleep and our mental growth. I highly recommend using this!

Stopped before I even started. This app expects you not only to have to sign in and create an account straight away, but the "free" trial also requires you to sign up with an active credit card before you even get to experience anything. I personally hate this way of working and tend to turn away from all apps that insist on this model. Installed and deleted within ten minutes.

11th month update: Now I am trying to delete my subscription it is sooooo difficult. Unbelievable. I would never recommend this app. They have hidden the subscription change, created many bugs like your browser does not support... I am trying to unsubscribe using the app itself, but surprisingly it is not working because of java or smtng. Why you would need java to unsubscribe. You are trying to rob the users. Making it difficult so that they will give up, and you will continue making money

I tried the 7 days free trial and i found the meditation offered quite poor. Mostly too short and way too much talking, and not even in a soft spoken tone. I couldn't play any of its music in the background. Maybe my fault, but ok, since a lot of the music on offer is pop commercial singer stuff. I also didn't like the 'well done, set a reminder' type of approach. A meditation app should provide escape from the manic, 'like' addictive type of world, not mimic it. Disappointed

This app changed my life. It really helped me became a calmer person and have clarity. My mind is much more peaceful and have significantly less troubling and negative thoughts, even when I do have them sometimes, I'm able to distinguish them as just thoughts and not my reality. This is a really helpful app and I'm so thankful to the creators and all those who worked hard to get it working as good as it is.

recentChanges: Stability fixes
comments: I often hear the sound skip, like it suddenly stops and starts, repeatedly every night at random intervals. I've also woken up in the night to realize it stopped working altogether. I've tried restarting the app, closing all apps and reopening it, and restarting my phone, but it still happens. It's extremely frustrating, and I don't think I can justify the purchase until it's fixed.

To put it bluntly: this app rocks! Honestly! I've tried multiple apps such as this, but none of them had a feature where you could add music to ambient noises, not music of the type this app has. Due to personal reasons, I suffer from relentless insomnia, but this was literally my "Ultimate Sleep solution"! Every megabyte sacrificed for this app was worth it!

I love this app. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because I have recently started having problems wit the app. It stops about 2 hours after I start it. I have purchased the premium package when I first got it, and it played all night. Now it doesn't. I love hearing music all night, it helps me sleep, so when it stops I wake up.

Love this app and it's been a huge aid to sleep. I used to toss and turn for an hour or more, but now I almost always fall asleep well before the 45min timer turns off my favoured sound. There's a great variety of sounds too, lots more than other apps I've tried and much more realistic. I only use a few, and the one that works best for me is Gentle Rain so I tend to stick with that one. I paid for the full selection and was happy to (its just a small one-off fee) to get the variable timer.

ABSOLUTLY 5+ STARS This is by far the best app I have ever used. The sounds are very authentic. You can download many sounds at the same time and save to your favorites. I enjoy so much, that I purchased the premium.Good deal.You won't regret it. I'm sleeping the best I ever have. Thanks to the Ultimate Sleep App. I have tried many others and none of them even come close.üíØ‚ù§

title: Sleep Well Hypnosis - For Insomnia & Deep Sleep
description:
Can‚Äôt sleep? Suffering from insomnia? Want to find out how to fall asleep fast? If you‚Äôre having difficulty sleeping and you‚Äôve tried other sleep aid methods, like listening to sleep sounds, white noise apps, or other sleep apps to no avail, sleep meditation may be able to help. This sleep hypnosis audio session from a certified hypnotherapist is designed to help your mind and body relax so you can fall into a deep, restorative sleep. You can also enjoy the background sleeping sounds such as nature sounds and calming meditation music that accompany the voice audio. This app can help you fall asleep fast and feel more rested, even if you are fighting jet lag, insomnia, or another sleep disorder.*

‚óé A single audio session of 25 minutes a day that is effective* in just 1‚Äì3 weeks
‚óé Hypnosis audio carefully read by the soothing voice of a certified hypnotherapist
‚óé Peaceful background music and nature sounds to help you relax
‚óé Sleep Booster with binaural beats to induce your brainwave frequency into an optimal state for deep, restorative sleep
‚óé Separate volume controls for Voice, Background, and Sleep Booster
‚óé Awaken at End feature can be disabled at bedtime for a relaxing, restful sleep
‚óé Repeat sessions or loop while you sleep
‚óé Continue listening to background sounds after the session ends

THE BEST HYPNOSIS APP TO SLEEP BETTER AVAILABLE

Sleep Well Hypnosis is free to try and effective* with the default settings. A one-time in-app purchase is required only if you wish to change the default settings. (Each of our free hypnosis apps includes its own in-app purchase; in-app purchases cannot be shared among separate apps.)

comments: Extortion. The female voice is amazingly pleasant...the first few seconds. But to shut her up so you can sleep right away requires a fee. Not a value-added way of increasing app registrations. Is akin to extortion. Her monotone droning instructions are painful to endure when trying to sleep. She has a nice voice. But the instructions are annoying to listen through again and again. And again. 'Fall asleep fast' as claimed? Nope. Could not fall asleep with this app even once. :/

Ive been struggling with insomnia and aniexty for a few months which literally caused me to fear going to sleep. Downloaded this app a few weeks ago and its helped me so much! I listen to it ever night and I feel so relaxed. I used to listen to the whole recording but now I'm fast asleep before the recording finishes! Would highly recommended to those suffering with aniexty and/or struggling to fall asleep!!

my go to fall asleep app.... i loved it so much so i purchased the full version and i do love it,, would be cool if it recorded noise when you fall asleep becuz im a night terror gal i have them bad.. itd be nice to hear whats going on in my surroundings when that happens to me.. also sleep apnea.. itd b nice to hear how many times i gasp for breath.. but i have an app for that too lol this is greatttt for putting me into a deeeeeep comfy sleep i dont even remember falling into big thanks

Amazing! Totally fixed my sleepless nights! I would give 5 stars but I always have to uninstall and reinstall app because its starts cracking during hypnosis and eventually shuts down...super annoying!

great sleep app I've been using it for over a year now and is definitely a favorite. Reasonable price for extra features. Easy to adjust meditation preferences. I love the progressive muscle relaxation technique & gratitude practice. And often I am asleep within minutes of starting the app now. The night's I don't sleep easily, it calms me down and helps me relax at least.

title: Sleep
description:
Having trouble sleeping? It‚Äôs time to say goodbye to sleepless nights and stop missing out on sweet dreams! Sleep will be your favorite lullaby and will help you fall asleep thanks to soothing stories, meditations, white noise, tons of sounds from different environments and much more. 

You are not the only one to face issues at night. It is not uncommon to find it hard to fall asleep or to wake up various times during the night: Sleep feels you and we're here to help! Learn how to manage stress and anxiety so they don‚Äôt ruin your doze anymore, and bring peacefulness into your life. This app provides you with many features that answer to your own needs, from the fight against insomnia to making the morning wake up easier, from improving sleep quality to the management of tinnitus.

*FEATURES*
- Bedtime stories: listen to narrated bedtime stories designed to lull you to sleep that will help you turn off your mind. Let these peaceful, soft narrations calm your nerves. We found out the best narrators for you: choose among 10 soothing voices the ones you prefer.
- Sleep sounds: discover a broad library of carefully selected sounds, choose your favorite mix or create your own combination. Fireplace, cat purring, hairdryer, gong, thunder, airplane, urban rain: more than 80 sounds are waiting for you.
- Sleep scenes: let the day‚Äôs stress slowly disappear with calming, relaxing, and beautifully animated scenes and sleep sounds designed to help you unwind.

Go on a dreamy adventure into ‚ÄúThe Valley of a Hundred Waterfalls‚Äù or lose yourself in the ‚ÄúCity of many canals". Establish a relaxing bedtime schedule to get your mind and body ready for slumber with Sleep!

--------

recentChanges:
Hello Sleepers!
While the quality of your sleep keeps improving, we also work to make the app better every day. This version comes with small bug fixes and improvements!
comments: A great looking app with good UX. Not the most accessable price point for me, and others by the look of other reviews. Maybe other pricing plans would be good in the future. My main issue is the short length of the audio clips. It is jarring to hear the cut as they loop again. Listening to the street scene with the rain is great, but the same car sound every 10 second ruins it for me. So much potential, I hope they improve these few things. Then they can have my money.
Great app. No other app has ever made visuals with calming music. This is an innovative app design. Great job, I would like to collaborate on smth with the team as well as a fellow artist.
Amazing but theres one problem... and that is: on sounds you can only listen to 8 sounds can u plz make it infinite

I have the Free version only and wish I could afford the full version. This sleep app has become my source for the most effective sounds to put me in a calming mood for rest and falling asleep. I am a terrible sleeper who has fought Insomnia all my life so I've tried them all. My personal choice of sound is the Canoes tied down in water. It deserves a 5 Star rating from me. Thanks guys!!

Already I can tell 2 things, upon entree this is in no way free. It is however a top tier sleep aid. HOWEVER, they do need to work on their price. They have captivating voice actors and delightful artwork as well as very nice options. But 2.99 every 2 weeks is a tad steep, I would shoot for giving the options of a monthly and or early subscriptions as well for those who are of ill funds. Especially since those who suffer the most from the lack of sleep are those without funds already.

title: Relax & Sleep Well: Hypnosis and Meditation
description:
Glenn Harrold is a very experienced therapist and the recordings are high quality, professional studio productions that initiate deep, healing transformations in users.

There is no sign up required, just instant access to four free hypnotherapy and meditation recordings and a choice of over 110 in-app purchase options covering insomnia, stress, anxiety, mindfulness, sleep, weight-loss, confidence, self-esteem, the solfeggio frequencies, binaural beats, spiritual healing, phobias, addictions and much more. 

All recordings are high quality professional studio productions. Glenn records each meditation through a Neumann U87 microphone and the very best analog to digital converters.  

The app includes a playlist feature, a manage storage feature to control the size of the app and an easy to navigate interface with detailed descriptions for each title. 
All enquiries and support issues are replied to within 24 hours.

Relax & Sleep Well is now helping well over 3 million people to sleep well every night!
Download Now to find out why this app has been number 1 in over 50 countries!

Relax & Sleep Well Free by Glenn Harrold was placed 1st in Healthline‚Äôs list of the Best Insomnia Apps of 2019! "Healthline‚Äôs editors carefully selected each winner based on quality, usability and contribution to the community." 

The free tracks include Relax & Sleep Well, which is a full 29-minute hypnotherapy session that will take you on a relaxing journey into the deepest levels of self-hypnosis. The subtle soundscapes supporting Glenn‚Äôs calming voice will help you connect with a profound feeling of relaxation and mindfulness. It will also help you to alleviate stress and anxiety, overcome insomnia and encourage healthy sleep patterns. 

The next free track is a 30-minute lite version of the stunning 639 Hz Solfeggio Sonic Meditation, which is based upon the ancient Solfeggio musical scale. When you experience this powerful healing meditation it will give you an idea of what the full range of Solfeggio Meditation titles sound like. Overcome insomnia stress and sleep well with this dreamy, relaxing meditation recording.

The latest free track is a lite version of the Mindfulness Meditation for Releasing Anxiety. This meditation will put you in a very present state and help you to feel mindful.

This app also includes Glenn's free guide to self-hypnosis eBook, which shows you how to use self-hypnosis to help you in many areas of your life. 

Glenn is one of the world's most successful hypnotherapists. His recordings have sold millions and he is a published author of 7 self-help health books. 

On each hypnosis recording you will hear special background sound effects, which have been recorded in specific keys and frequencies to help guide you into a deep state of mental and physical relaxation. At the deepest point in the session you are given a number of post-hypnotic affirmations and direct suggestions to help you with the healing process relating to the title of the recording.

You will also hear a number of background affirmations, which echo and pan from left to right across the stereo range. This deeply relaxing and powerful method of delivering multiple suggestions simultaneously to the unconscious mind can facilitate positive changes very quickly.

All of Glenn's Hypnosis and Meditation Recordings Feature:

‚Ä¢ The very latest hypnosis, mindfulness, healing and meditation methods combined with state-of-the-art recording technology.
‚Ä¢ Glenn's highly acclaimed hypnotic vocal techniques guiding you into a deeply relaxed state.
‚Ä¢ Background sound effects recorded in specific musical keys and frequencies to compliment the hypnotic suggestions and deepen the relaxation effect.
‚Ä¢ Stereo-echoed affirmations, which pan from ear-to-ear across the stereo range - a deeply relaxing and unique effect.

Glenn has 20 years of hypnotherapy experience and has worked with many celebrity clients.

comments: Best app of its kind. I initially got the app for binaural beats and have slowly built up my inventory. I've been using Glenn's meditations for about 2 yrs now and love every one. I've notice improvement in any area I use these for with nightly, consistent use. Highly recommend for inner balance and higher quality of mind and life.

Thats fantastic, it would be nice to have more of a selection of like binaural tracks and meditation music you can play after a hypnosis track. And I wish the tracks were a little cheaper because I won't run my bill up hundreds to download the entire content but I am very interested in hearing them..

I use this app all the time it works I do have a request though. It would be much better.. When you select to repeat your selection over and over;. please fix it so it doesn't start with disclaimer for driving while listening or descrobing what you expect.. I'm usally relaxed or asleep at that point and it startles me when it starts over. If repeat is selected I suggest forwarding it to a soothing point of the session. 5 stars if done. Thanks either way love your work.

I made a Playlist of important tracks followed by the relaxation and sleep track with a sleep ending. I am a worrier and have never been good at falling asleep. However, I have noticed a huge improvement in my sleep habits. I will be sharing this app with my team of doctors because one had asked me who I use. I'm really pleased with the app! The price isn't bad, either. I bought a few hypnosis CDs, too. These tracks are more effective and cheaper than the CDs.

This app gives a wonderful feeling with all its musical effects and suggestions.. My heart rate was reduced considerably at the end of session which means am getting really relaxed. I heard some of them were not able to listen to the complete audio as they fell asleep within 10 mins. Keep doing good job.

comments: A good price for a lot of functions. I mainly use this to create white noise or soundscapes to help me focus when doing paperwork. I like being able to mix sounds so I can add beta waves to static and arepeatative melody. It really helps my ADHD. It is also helpful in soothing my tenitis when I'm trying to focus or get to sleep.

I would describe my exprience to be excellent. I wouldn't change a thing about the applocation and I have no idea why it isn't much more popular. The one thing that I've noticed is that there are many applocations exactly like this and I think that this is far and away the most inuitive, engaging, and easy to use. In fact, I knew exactly what to do and what I was doing onthe first try. I wish every app didn't need a tutorial.

I got this app and a sleep mask with bluetooth headphones. They work wonderfully together and I sleep much better at night. There are a lot of sounds to choose from, through I did purchase all of the extras sounds.

Lots of sounds Good sound system Performance is excellent Plenty of animal sounds No (noisy)(long)(irritating)ads Everything is pretty good.... But I encountered one little problem though.... ... I live in zambia (central africa) I have a VISA üí≥... OF WHICH I USE TO PURCHASE GOOD'S AND SERVICES....on All my devices... BUT IT FAILED TO PURCHASE YOUR PREMIUM SLEEP SOUNDS.... I DON'T KNOW WHY.... Of which I would like to know what is the problem..... üîÑ‚úÖ

I absolutely loved it, at first. It had the option to save three awesome sound combinations and even save them to use later. Now, however they took all that away. To play more than one sound at a time I have to buy. Classic bait and switch. Do not get if you want to use it long term!

title: Sleepa: Relaxing sounds, Sleep
description:
Are you looking for relaxing sounds and ambiences that will improve your sleep or relaxation? Search no more! 

Sleepa brings great collection of HD sounds that can be mixed into the perfect relaxing ambiences. You can choose from different types of rain, nature sounds, city sounds, white noise or instruments. Save your favorite sound mixes so they are always by hand with you.

You can schedule the timer that will automatically stop the application. Sleepa does not require internet connection so you can use it anywhere without worrying about the data.

You can choose from 32 carefully selected sounds divided into the four groups:
- Rain sounds (i.e. rain on the window, ocean waves, thunders)
- Nature sounds (i.e. forest, creek, waterfall)
- City sounds (i.e. subway, train, fan, plane)
- Meditation sounds (white noise, piano, oriental flute)

The app can be used not only for the relaxation or sleep but also for meditation, work or concentration. It contains three most popular types of the white noise:
- White noise
- Pink noise
- Brown noise

If you have any idea for improvements or you miss particular sound let us know at hello.relaxio+sleepa@gmail.com.

Enjoy the app and happy sleeping! ;)

recentChanges:
Thanks for updating to the latest version of Sleepa, here‚Äôs what‚Äôs new:

* Discover a brand new Sleepa experience, including an all new app design, colors, characters and animations. Don‚Äôt worry, all of your favorite features are still included!

comments: This was quite a good app. Unfortunately, after joining the beta program, I saw that the new version about to be released will no longer include a sleep timer unless you pay a monthly fee. (Imagine, being charged to _stop using_ an app!) Maybe some people won't mind leaving this playing all night as a condition of using it‚Äîbut for the rest of us, it just seems like a heavyhanded, shortsighted cash grab. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Too bad.

Decent app, I like how you can mix sounds like different types of rain / wind etc to get one that works for you to help you sleep. Have this on pretty much every night during the winter months (when my partner doesn't let me have the fan on!)

I've used this app for years and have generally been pretty happy with it. It's challenging finding a decent white noise app where the sounds seamlessly loop. The recent update has unfortunately caused me to uninstall because there is no way to disable push notifications from within the app. While the option to disable the new version exists, it doesn't make it any less disappointing.

I want to be honest, this app is great. The piano is my favorite melody and blends in with the house rsin and the keyboard. I was curious on what it does in the first place, but when I tried sleeping with it, it made me sleep in 5 minutes! It's very amazing. Don't listen to haters who dislike this. Good work on the app anyways! ^^

Used it daily for months, by far the best brown noise app for the whole night. Clear and simple, volume independent from system's is great (especially listening to a podcast to fall asleep). Free version is fine, ads only pop up a couple of times a week when starting, never during the night. The loop is absolutely perfect. Just disable auto-updates to avoid interruption. PS: as of early Sept 2020, the "New experience" interface is AWFUL and unnecessary but can be disabled.

comments: We are LOVING this app! There are so many different settings to choose from, that everyone would find their preferences! Super relaxing and it really helps us fall asleep faster. I played a rain sound on the roof with a little bit of thunder the other night, and my husband asked the next morning, if I heard it rained last night üòÑ. Thank you for this amazing app!!!ü§©

Perfection. I work remote a lot and have to sleep in strange places. Even after long and physically demanding days, I still have a difficult time falling asleep. I looked for this app after 40 minutes of tossing and turning through my allotted 4 hours to sleep. On my first try, I set a timer for 20 minutes and I don't think I last past the first five. I used this app for every night per week and it's still the sure fire away for me to get into deep, solid, restorative sleep. Get this app.

Well I LOVED this app... For the first night. I went to use this the next evening, put my volume up, and there was no sound. I made sure it was playing and even put my volume up to full and nothing was happening, and it isn't my device, it must be the app, because it works fine in every other app or game I have. Idk y it did this, please could you tell me if there is a way to fix this??? Do recommend if it actually works for you.

2nd night of perfect sleep, thanks to this app! The combinations of sounds was exactly what I needed! Also, I use this app in my earphones walking to and from work and it alleviates my anxiety issues! So far I can't recommend it enough!

Waited to write this until I had tried premium for a week and gained access to premium across multiple devices, only paying once. The sounds are lovely, lots of options and the price is literally unbeatable. title: Sleep Booster - Sleep Better
description:
Sleep Booster is a perfect sleep solution for those who would like to fall asleep easily and wake up energized with the help of special breathing technique, meditation sessions, calming sounds  and refreshing alarm melodies. 

Sleep Booster is based on the only extremely effective üöÄdrug-free üôÖ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è option for overcoming sleeping problems. Unlike sleeping pills, it helps to eliminate the underlying causes of sleeping problems and develop better sleep habits‚ú®. 

‚≠êÔ∏è HOW SLEEP BOOSTER WORKS

‚≠êÔ∏è Falling asleep:
Deep calm breathing leads to the predominance of the processes of inhibition in the central nervous system. It allows to regulate pressure and heartbeat, focus attention on breathing, thereby distracting from unwanted thoughts. Deep and controlled breathing is evolutionarily associated with a feeling of rest and relaxation. In addition, soothing sounds provide an opportunity to relax and get a positive emotion, effectively reducing the likelihood of excitation before sleep. 

‚≠êÔ∏è Sleep retention:
Breathing technique results in more reliable replacement of wakefulness rhythms (alpha and beta waves) with low-amplitude sleep waves (theta and delta waves), thus making sleep much more durable. Meditation sessions promote deep relaxation, bring the body to a deep and lasting sleep. Bedtime meditation qualitatively improves the most fragile REM phase, which allows you to complete a full sleep cycle and feel yourself full of energy in the morning.

‚≠êÔ∏è Awakening:
After a good deep sleep your body is restored and is ready to function in full. Smart alarm analyzes your sleeping schedule and wakes you up gently from the lightest phase in your sleep cycle. Pleasant alarm melodies allow you to wake up gently, gradually and with no stress. It is very important to live the first minutes of your day with positive emotions and thoughts.  

‚≠êÔ∏è WHY DO YOU NEED SLEEP BOOSTER?

Ask yourself the following questions: 
‚ùì Do you face difficulty getting to sleep or staying asleep?
‚ùì Do you feel tired in the morning right after you wake up? 
‚ùì Do you have difficulty concentrating during the day?
‚ùì Are you struggling to stay organized? 
‚ùì Do you feel so tired that all you can think about is sleep?
If you answered yes to any of these questions, then you can definitely benefit from using Sleep Booster app for sleep and well-being improvement. Download Sleep Booster and enjoy your perfect sleeping experience.

‚≠êÔ∏è WHY SLEEP BOOSTER?

üåù We help you fall asleep easily. 
üåö We care about your sleep during the night. 
üåûWe wake you up smoothly with no stress. 

FEATURING
‚ö°Ô∏è30+ sleep boosting sounds that let you fall asleep easily without waking up at night 
‚ö°Ô∏è30+ relaxing meditations for a better night‚Äôs sleep
‚ö°Ô∏èSmart Alarm clock that finds the best time of light sleep phase to wake you up well rested and energized
‚ö°Ô∏è10+ specially designed refreshing alarm melodies that wake you up gently
‚ö°Ô∏èspecial breathing technique to unwind your mind before sleep 
‚ö°Ô∏èsleep quality assessment used for all-inclusive individual sleeping solutions
‚ö°Ô∏èadjusting sleeping schedule

Download Sleep Booster and start treating yourself with pleasant nights üåö and energetic mornings üí™üî•

comments: Well, i installed it and it worked before i even got to the cost screen. I passed out when it got to the heart rate measuring part. I fell asleep while holding my finger over the camera lens for 10 straight minutes and woke up with it in my hand. Gimmick! How can a camera lens pick up your pulse? It cant really.

The app is great to fall asleep, but the "highlights" of snoring/noises throughout the night is literally recorded in 30 min increments all night - and nothing really gets recorded - even at the "peaks". The alarm, you'd think, would be a gradual increase in volume... nope. It will scare you out of bed. I haven't been able to turn it off so I set it for an afternoon time. It would be nice to be able to adjust the narrator's volume without losing the background music/audio.

The features in this app ( the limited free ones) have helped me fall asleep much easier by clearing my mind. Waking now is so refreshing and im not confused or sluggish. Can't wait to to pay for all features and enjoy a better sleep.
Disaster! It waits to record your sleeping and then fakes that there was something in the middle of the night but you have to pay for it to listen..DO NOT RECOMEND

This app has never worked for me. I contacted the developer for a refund and it's been 2 weeks and 2 emails and no response. I had to contact Google to make a report for developer's nonresponsiveness. Google play also did not refund me so I had to dispute with my bank. What horrible service. DO NOT RECOMMEND. FinalUpdate : Developer refused to refund even after I showed evidence of this app NEVER working. My bank saw it as fraud and I got my money back. This company is terrible. Don't download.

title: Sleep Lab: Sleep Cycle Tracker, Relax Sleep Music
description:
üåõHow did you sleep last night? Not sleep well or sleep like a top?
Can't sleep well? Suffering from insomnia?

Find your sleep secrets with Sleep Lab! Sleep Lab helps you track and record sleep cycle details. Sleep Lab also has a smart alarm clock to remind you to sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Lab provides relaxing and soothing sleep music to help you sleep better.

Sleep Lab focus on recording sleep cycle details to help you understanding your sleep status. Sleep Lab has a smart alarm clock to remind you sleep early at night and wake you up gently in the morning. In addition, Sleep Lab offers relax sounds like white noise to help you sleep better.

‚≠êWhy Sleep Lab?
Sleep Lab is committed to being your sleep assistant, helping you monitor your sleep, generating your own sleep report and giving you the most detailed and thoughtful sleep advice. There is also a smart alarm clock reminder and soothing sleep music. Set your own unique ringtone directly in the sleep interface and with various calming music, you can go into meditation, stop snoring, and drift off to sleep. It is known that sleep accounts for one third of a person‚Äôs life, so you need get high quality sleep.

Install Sleep Lab to:
üéô- Record Snoring or Dream Talking
Sleep Monitor will record snoring and grinding sounds made during your sleep, listen to them and find more about your sleep the next morning! For fun!

üí§- Mark Your Sleep Habits
If you drink, eat, exercise, have any pathological condition or depressed emotions before sleep, see how these slumber habits can impact your sleep.

üîç- Sleep Analysis to know your sleep quality
More and more people suffer from insomnia now. Record your sleep information based on your sleep behavior all night. Generate a chart that can get your sleep situation quickly. And Sleep Lab will provide sleep tips to help you develop good sleep habits. It allows you to learn about your sleep without any other device. Listen to them and find more about your sleep the next morning! Let you get into the habit of keeping good hours.

üìà- Sleep Track to track your sleep
It is the best sleep track android application. Only use your phone to track all your behavior when you are asleep and show your sleep data. It is the most convenient way to know your sleep quality every day. Understand your sleep pattern efficiency, find out more tips on getting good sleep and become an increasingly healthy person. Sleep Lab is especially helpful for those who want a way to check how their sleep is, and do not want to invest in an accessory like smartband or smartwatch.

‚è∞ - Set Smart Alarm Clock
Set an alarm for your morning wake up or nap or set a reminder for bedtime.

üéµ- Listen Relaxing & Soothing Music
Suffering from insomnia? Listen to high quality relaxing music to calm a racing mind before sleep. Fall asleep quickly with different kinds of sleep sounds.

üë©‚Äç‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüíã‚Äçüë©Sleep Lab Target Group
- People who are suffering insomnia, a sleep disorder that is characterized by difficulty falling and/or staying asleep.

‚àö Sleep alone to eliminate interference
