title: Pzizz - Sleep, Nap, Focus
description:
Featured in The New York Times, WIRED, Engadget, Gizmodo, Product Hunt, Lifehacker, Mashable, Newsweek, Sports Illustrated and more!


PRESS MENTIONS

‚Äú‚Ä¶Hibbert credits the app for helping cure his insomnia and diminish his postgame dependence on Ambien.‚Äù ‚Äì NBA Star Roy Hibbert speaking to Sports Illustrated

‚ÄúThat night, I nestled under my covers, downloaded the full version of Pzizz and turned it on‚Ä¶ I was out before 20 minutes had passed and haven't looked back since.‚Äù - Jenna Wortham, New York Times

‚ÄúPzizz helps you get to sleep faster and get more restful sleep with a combination of soothing sounds and voice cues aimed at helping you relax, destress, and get to sleep. In my experience, it works really well.‚Äù - Adam Pash, Lifehacker


HOW IT WORKS

Using the latest clinical research (see our website for in-depth details), the app's patented system plays you "dreamscapes"‚Äî a sleep-optimized mix of music, voiceover, and sound effects that change each night, to quickly quiet your mind, put you to sleep, keep you asleep, and then wake you up feeling refreshed.

If you want to sleep better at night or take incredible power naps during the day, this is the app for you! All you have to do is listen to Pzizz. Headphones/earbuds are recommended for optimal effectiveness, but your built-in phone speaker will work too.


SLEEP MODULE

Beat your insomnia with our 'sleep module' to fall asleep fast, stay asleep, and wakeup feeling refreshed. Personalize your sleep experience with customizable options including "3D Voice" and an energetic ‚ÄúWakeup;‚Äù three and a half minutes of music crafted to gently bring you back from slumber and start your day with energy.


NAP MODULE

Napping has been proven to enhance performance, alertness, and improve your mood. Customize your naps with our specially designed nap narrations and music. Get rid of that groggy feeling and improve your overall well-being.


FOCUS MODULE

The 'focus module' is music designed to help you get more work done.

Built around ‚Äòfocuscapes,‚Äô environments of sound that help you get in the zone and be productive, backed by the same thorough research we use to create our dreamscapes.

Each focuscape has a ‚Äòfocus‚Äô section which gets you into full concentration and a ‚Äòcooldown‚Äô section which brings you back out gently.


WHAT MAKES PZIZZ SO MUCH BETTER? 

*Simplicity* Sleep at the push of a button! Unlike other sleep solutions, you don‚Äôt have to change your behavior, keep a sleep diary, or limit your activities. Just listen to Pzizz, and enjoy incredible sleep. 

*No Side Effects* Our only side effect is sleep! Unlike medications or supplements, you‚Äôll never have to worry about adverse effects.

*Variety* Every time you listen to Pzizz it creates a unique session for you. This ensures your brain doesn‚Äôt get fatigued from hearing the same things over and over again, and helps maintain effectiveness over time.

*Highly customizable* Adjust sleep duration, volumes, 3D effect, and voice gender for a fully personalized listening experience.

*Clinically Validated* Pzizz is incredibly effective and clinically validated. Read more about the science behind Pzizz at blog.pzizz.com.


TRY IT NOW FOR FREE

Try Pzizz "Pro" free for seven days. After your trial ends you can choose to keep Pro or use the "Classic" version, which is completely free. There's a break down of what's free vs pro on the app's pricing page.
descriptionHTML:
Featured in The New York Times, WIRED, Engadget, Gizmodo, Product Hunt, Lifehacker, Mashable, Newsweek, Sports Illustrated and more!


PRESS MENTIONS

‚Äú‚Ä¶Hibbert credits the app for helping cure his insomnia and diminish his postgame dependence on Ambien.‚Äù ‚Äì NBA Star Roy Hibbert speaking to Sports Illustrated

‚ÄúThat night, I nestled under my covers, downloaded the full version of Pzizz and turned it on‚Ä¶ I was out before 20 minutes had passed and haven't looked back since.‚Äù - Jenna Wortham, New York Times

‚ÄúPzizz helps you get to sleep faster and get more restful sleep with a combination of soothing sounds and voice cues aimed at helping you relax, destress, and get to sleep. In my experience, it works really well.‚Äù - Adam Pash, Lifehacker


HOW IT WORKS

Using the latest clinical research (see our website for in-depth details), the app's patented system plays you "dreamscapes"‚Äî a sleep-optimized mix of music, voiceover, and sound effects that change each night, to quickly quiet your mind, put you to sleep, keep you asleep, and then wake you up feeling refreshed.

If you want to sleep better at night or take incredible power naps during the day, this is the app for you! All you have to do is listen to Pzizz. Headphones/earbuds are recommended for optimal effectiveness, but your built-in phone speaker will work too.


SLEEP MODULE

Beat your insomnia with our 'sleep module' to fall asleep fast, stay asleep, and wakeup feeling refreshed. Personalize your sleep experience with customizable options including "3D Voice" and an energetic ‚ÄúWakeup;‚Äù three and a half minutes of music crafted to gently bring you back from slumber and start your day with energy.


NAP MODULE

Napping has been proven to enhance performance, alertness, and improve your mood. Customize your naps with our specially designed nap narrations and music. Get rid of that groggy feeling and improve your overall well-being.


FOCUS MODULE

The 'focus module' is music designed to help you get more work done.

Built around ‚Äòfocuscapes,‚Äô environments of sound that help you get in the zone and be productive, backed by the same thorough research we use to create our dreamscapes.

Each focuscape has a ‚Äòfocus‚Äô section which gets you into full concentration and a ‚Äòcooldown‚Äô section which brings you back out gently.


WHAT MAKES PZIZZ SO MUCH BETTER?

*Simplicity* Sleep at the push of a button! Unlike other sleep solutions, you don‚Äôt have to change your behavior, keep a sleep diary, or limit your activities. Just listen to Pzizz, and enjoy incredible sleep.

*No Side Effects* Our only side effect is sleep! Unlike medications or supplements, you‚Äôll never have to worry about adverse effects.

*Variety* Every time you listen to Pzizz it creates a unique session for you. This ensures your brain doesn‚Äôt get fatigued from hearing the same things over and over again, and helps maintain effectiveness over time.

*Highly customizable* Adjust sleep duration, volumes, 3D effect, and voice gender for a fully personalized listening experience.

*Clinically Validated* Pzizz is incredibly effective and clinically validated. Read more about the science behind Pzizz at blog.pzizz.com.


TRY IT NOW FOR FREE

Try Pzizz "Pro" free for seven days. After your trial ends you can choose to keep Pro or use the "Classic" version, which is completely free. There's a break down of what's free vs pro on the app's pricing page.

recentChanges:
Pzizzers! We have an update for you:

comments: I really like the app! The sounds are nice and I like both the male and female voices, which is rare for me. Being able to set a wake-up timer is nice and isn't something I've seen in many other "sleep noise" apps. The app is visually a little rough around the edges, but the functionality is totally there. Also, cust. service is LOVELY. Prompt response and they were able to help me out with subscription stuff. I would totally recommend for the price; much cheaper per mo. than Headspace or Calm.

Good app. Great app... The study section is no doubt the best in the game. I could forget everything else but my studies by just listening (headphones or no headphones). The nap section leaves you feeling well rested and ready to continue with your day. The sleep section is great, but I guess I've been using this app for a long time. This used to put me to bed within minutes of getting to bed. I guess I got too used used to what plays and the narrations. It has a hefty price thoughüíî

Love this program! It's really help me sleep. It's has a lot of options, different dream scapes, male or female voices, so I don't get bored. It is simple to use for those late nights of unrest. I've learned a lot about relaxing, and I love waking up to the quotes. They are great.

When I set it to wake me up, I need to set at least one other alarm because that feature rarely works. Like... Sometimes it just doesn't work at all and I don't know how that could be possible. Sometimes it crashes in the middle of the night. It's frustrating because you pay 40 plus dollars for something and it doesn't work reliably. They are smart to get their money up front. Probably wouldn't recommend.

I love the app,i used the free version for about 1 year and it helped me tremendously, its great so i decided that i will purchase the full version for 1 year when i relocated to the UAE in February, (I purchased it around March or April) It worked perfectly until now 5 September I open it up to fall asleep again and now it brings up the screen to pay again for the full version.last night it still worked. This is not even 6 months and my year paid service already inactive. Pls cn support help??

title: Relax Rain - Rain sounds: sleep and meditation
description:
The largest collection of relaxing rain for Android. Over 50 rain sounds (free and HD) mixable with thunders and music in order to reach a state of complete relaxation.

Ideal for sleeping, power nap, meditation, concentration or if you have tinnitus problems (ringing in the ears).

You can adjust the volume of rain, thunder and music individually to find the ideal combination and so encourage a deep relaxation of the mind.

You can keep the app in the background in conjunction with other apps (for listening your favorite music, play games or browse the internet).

It is also possible to set a timer and turn off the screen. At the end of the set time, the sound fades gently and the app closes by itself, so you do not have to worry about close it if you fall asleep.

The rain sounds and relaxing music have beneficial effects on the body and soothing the mind because, by covering the external environment noise, promote relaxation and help in different occasions: for better sleep, to concentrate in work, study or reading, for meditation, etc.

Relax your mind, remove the stress and find your inner peace. Go into your oasis of calm.


*** Main features ***

- 45+ perfectly looped rain sounds (free and HD)
- 6 thunder and 6 music mixable with the rain sounds
- Individual volume adjustment for rain, thunders and music
- Ability to use the app along with other apps
- Timer for self-closing the app
- Audio pause on incoming call
- No streaming is required for playback (no data connection required)
- No audible loop thanks to redesigned audio engine


*** List of rain sounds ***
- Morning rain
- Rain on leaves
- Bungalow in the rainforest
- Tent in the rain
- Rainy day
- Strong thunderstorm
- Rain in the forest
- Inside the farmhouse
- Under the tree
- Rain on window
- Rain on the street
- Tropical storm
- Thunder and music
- Rain in the park
- Wind and rain
- Rain in the city
- Lodge in the rainforest
- Thunderstorm
- Thunderstorm in the countryside
- Rainy night with crickets
- Puddles in the country
- Hailstorm
- Distant storm
- Rain in the backyard
- Light rain at night
- Rain on the tin roof
- Light rain in the backyard
- Tent in the thunderstorm
- Rain on the car roof
- Under the umbrella
- Light rain on the windshield
- Inside the car
- Inside the motorhome
- Rain on the skylight
- Heavy rain on the windshield
- Rain in the gutter
- Dripping water
- Downpour in the rural area
- Wind chimes
- Rain in the jungle
- Light rain in the avenue
- Traffic on the wet road
- Drizzle in the woods
- Howling wind in the field
- Hurricane


*** Benefits for sleep ***

Have you trouble falling asleep? This app helps you to sleep well by blocking the external noises. Now you fall asleep faster and sleep better.
Say goodbye to your insomnia! Enhance Your Life!


*** Benefits for the mind ***

The sounds of nature relieve the stress of modern life.
The human mind reacts positively when it hears the sounds of nature because they arouse emotions that remind our primordial environment.
Hear the sounds of nature leads us away from the noise and daily stress to make us return to the calm of our origins.


*** Usage notes ***

For a better experience, I recommend you the use of headphones or earphones to listen the relaxing sounds.
You can use the app in background and with other apps.

comments: My wife uses it to lull her to sleep and stay asleep. She prefers Rain in the City; any other setting would slightly irritate her, or any other rain app for that matter. So thanks for have a product that suits my sweet, dear little wife's very particular needs!
Best sounds of any rain app I've found. Great variety, not everything is a torrential downpour (as if those are relaxing). Easy to use interface, great visuals. Recommended.

I have 3 sleep apps in which i use but this one gets used the most.. love the new thunder options specially the low rolling thunder.. just one rain sound missing which is fluctuating rain from heavy rain into a light shower, if you could do this would be awesome.. ^_^

Relaxing rain sounds with mix of thunder and music for complete relaxation. its ideal for a better sleep or concentration. a deep relaxation of the mind and it has beneficial effects on the body to promote relaxation.

It randomly goes quiet and then super loud and sometimes just turns off. This is so frustrating because I use it to sleep and I have had such terrible sleep since trying it out. I can't get a refund so I definitely wouldn't recommend buying!

title: Sleep Theory - Sleep Aid & Smart Alarm Clock
description:
Sleep Theory is a healthy app that can help you sleep faster and better. With the most professional sleep knowledge and sleep monitoring technology, we can become your own sleep assistant by monitoring your sleep, analyzing your sleep quality, developing healthy sleep habits, waking you up gently and smartly. Sleep Theory will make the greatest efforts to aid your sleep from bedtime to wake-up time scientifically.

 What Sleep Theory Does To Aid Your Sleep
Before Bedtime: 
Customize your sleep schedule ‚Üí Generate personal Sleep Examination Report ‚Üí Remind you to sleep on time.
Bedtime: 
Review checklist before bed ‚Üí Play professional sleep aid music / 4-7-8 Breathing Exercise ‚Üí Guide bedtime massage & yoga.
AsleepÔºö
Track your sleep cycles ‚Üí Analyze sleep quality;
Morning:
Smart alarm clock ‚Üí Record wake-up mood.

#For Those Who Suffering From ‚Ä¶#
-Long-term insomnia. If you have difficulty falling asleep on time, try our Sleep Restriction Therapy.
-Mood insomnia. Occasionally having trouble sleeping due to stress and anxiety from work or study.
-Pseudo-insomnia. Caused by staying up late, poor self-discipline, etc.;
-Having difficulties getting up. Whenever you go to bed, you just cannot get up in the morning and be late for work or school.
-All that want to fix their sleep schedule and sleep better.

#For The Following Situations #
-Students‚Äô insomnia syndrome after vacations.
-Insomnia and lack of energy for study caused by high pressure.
-Badly lack of sleep because of work overtime.
-Poor sleep due to a peaceless sleep environment such as noises and bad mattresses.
-Low mood like anxiety, stress and sadness keeping you from stable sleep.
-Suffering jet lag in business trips or travel abroad.
-Temporary insomnia and alternative psychological trauma caused by diseases and disasters.

#Core Functions#
1.	Develop a healthy sleep schedule
According to the 90-minute sleep cycle theory (An average sleep is a combination of 90-minute sleep cycles which include the doze stage, light sleep, deep sleep and rapid eye movement.), Sleep Theory generates your exclusive sleep schedule after analyzing your sleep time and wake-up time.
2.	Smart reminder for bedtime
Remind you to sleep on time. Avoid the difficulty of going to bed or forgetting the sleep time due to overwork, entertainment and other activities.
3.	Professional sleep-aid music and peaceful sounds
Natural sounds, white noises, soothing and relaxing piano music, magical brainwave music selected to bring calm and relax back to your mind.
4.	Checklist review before bed and self-test
A series of behaviors before bed may lead to poor sleep quality. Therefore, Sleep Theory carefully prepares a list of factors which affect sleep quality, so you can find out and avoid the causes of insomnia.
5Ôºé	4-7-8 Breathing Exercise: Calm & anxiety relief
The 4-7-8 Breathing Exercise is an utterly simple breathing training proposed by Andrew Weil, M.D., University of Arizona which calms you down quickly. You can do it anywhere and anytime.
6.	Simple Exercises That Help You Fall Asleep Quickly
Yoga movements that lengthen out your body, and hamstrings to relieve physical fatigue. Simple Massages that calm the mind, reduce stress and anxiety, improve mental health, and have a good mood.


#Distinguishing features#
1.	Relieve Insomnia Quickly: Remind to sleep at the best time, enrich sleep aid music& exercises;
2.	Checklist Before Bedtime: Avoiding the effects of bedtime behavior and indoor environment on falling asleep;
3.	Sleep Tracker: Analyze sleep state and quality throughout the night, manage sleep based on daily score. 
4.	Natural wake-up in the morning: automatically wakes you up while you're in your light sleep phase.


#Night Reading Tool#
-Free Bluelight Filter
Sleep Theory provides warmlight night screen in order to ensure eye care against light blue wavelength from screen light. 


Facebook: Sleep Theory
Email: support@noxsleeptheory.com

comments: Uses too much battery even while charging, and I have a fast charger and quite decent battery lifeü§î

I like this app. But I have a question. I started 21-day schedule and after it started, I wanted to change the time when I want to go to bed, but I didn't find the way I could do that. So I had to delete app and download again. Help me, please.

The app crashed while I was sleeping. It is understandable that issues can occur with apps but a sleeping tracker that fails to track my sleep and does not wake me up in the morning is a complete fail. This happened the second night I used it. Therefore I can't really give more than one stars as it's unreliable to use as an alarm. It's a shame really, I enjoyed the sleeping aid sounds very much!
The app is so far stable and sleep records seem reasonable. However, I don't like to see the unremovable notification telling "Sleep Theory is processing" in daytime when nothing is to process.
The app is good at first But after downloading and using for a while ,the app start to crash and tell you that the app have some issurs therefore it does not save the report of your sleep.

title: Sleep Time : Sleep Cycle Smart Alarm Clock Tracker
description:
Zzz. Sleep and slumber better. Wake up calm, refreshed, and well rested every night with Android. Best alarm clock and sleep diary to sleep well. Your sleep guru & sleep timer.
Sleep well and quiet. Wake up at the lightest sleep stage with your sleep cycle timer. Understand sleep score and analysis. Be your own sleep guru with the best sleep timer.

How It works:
1. Download Sleep Time. Set alarm clock. Put Android under pillow.
2. Sleep well and quiet. Sleep time detects movements during bed time or nap, whether you are snoring or dreaming. Choose soothing & peaceful alarm sound, lullaby & soundscape.
3. Sleep Time wakes you up gently at the lighest sleep stage so you are well rested.
4. Receive sleep score & analysis about duration, REM & sleep cycle. Write notes about dreams, lucid dreams, stories or sleep habit.

comments: Monitors my sleep patterns, I use it every night. It tells you light and deep sleep and how much rem you're getting, plus the alarm and it's free!

I liked this when I first downloaded it, and after about a week the alarm and wake up stopped working. No soft gentle wake up music picking your light sleep. you actually sleep through and dont get woken up. I thought it might have been an inbuilt thing that when you pay it comes back. Still having the same issue when I have paid at least $60-$70 for a decent amount of time. Is there some option I have to turn on ? Im now setting regular alarms in the background in order to be woken. üôÅ

The description fails to mention that you have to pay for most of the features they explain. That really should be in the description instead of letting people download it and then saying "by they way give us your money" the free version is very basic. I'm guessing they don't say you have to pay for a lot of the features so they can boost the number of downloads they get.

Worked for about a week and then the alarm stopped working. It literally doesn't wake you up. You have to set a different alarm. I've cleared data and reinstalled and it still doesn't work. Pretty terrible.
I really like this app, wakes me up gently and never seem groggy. Just needs an update, its been a while!

title: Moshi: Sleep and Mindfulness
description:
Join the millions of parents who use Moshi to quickly settle their families into a peaceful, restful sleep with over 75 hours of original audio stories, meditations, music, and sounds that you won‚Äôt find in any other app. Includes special guest Moshi Stories narrated by legends of stage and screen, including Goldie Hawn, Brian Blessed, and Patrick Stewart.

- 95% of parents surveyed agree that using the app makes bedtime less stressful¬π.
- Recommended by top sleep experts and physicians.
- Featured in "Hottest Health Trends 2020," NBC Today Show

Moshi helps families fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer, and wake up less. In a recent study¬≤, scientists at New York University discovered that when using Moshi, participants:

- Fell asleep 28 minutes earlier on average
- Slept for 22 minutes longer on average
- Woke up 50% less throughout the night on average

Make bedtime a dream:
- Remove anxiety and stress from the bedtime routine
- Reduce the time it takes to relax and fall asleep when it‚Äôs time for lights out
- Reclaim precious time in your evening

Moshi helps the entire family sleep soundly with over 200 pieces of completely original sleepy content created by the BAFTA award-winning Moshi team.

Why Moshi Stories work:
- Moshi Stories are gentle rhyming journeys with dreamy choruses
- Musical transitions are specifically designed to be mesmerising
- As each story progresses the gentle narration becomes increasingly sleepy and ambient sounds diminish
- Musical loops continue for several minutes once each story ends, before gently fading to avoid sudden silence
- Featuring ambient white noise, from vacuuming and distant lawnmowers to washing machines and lapping waves

Teach the entire family the basics of mindfulness with guided meditations designed to help the entire family relax, reduce anxiety, and manage negative thoughts.

Mindfulness topics to encourage positive emotions include:
- Kindness
- Gratitude
- Positive thinking
- Recalling joyful moments
- Staying calm
- Patience
- Making friends
- The power of imagination
- Reflection
- Self-appreciation

Features to support a stress-free bedtime:
- Original content released every week to ensure there is always something new to enjoy at bedtime
- Audio-only. No need for screens in the bedroom
- Learn deep breathing to help worries drift away
- Loop and replay functions ensure sleepy content plays throughout the night if needed
- Explore curated playlists to discover recommended content
- Create personalised playlists to listen to favourite stories over and over

Each originally-crafted Moshi Story, Sound, Meditation, and Music track helps to calm and relax, day or night.

Proud to have received Google Editors‚Äô Choice Award alongside apps such as Headspace.

Don't just take our word for it‚Ä¶

‚ÄúMoshi has changed our lives for the better! We had to sit with my daughter reading story after story until she fell asleep...now we put Moshi on and she goes to sleep on her own! It‚Äôs honestly amazing!‚Äù - Vicky, Google Play User, 25 May 2020

‚ÄúI LOVE THIS APP. You can't beat a sleepy time story told by THE Patrick Stewart! ‚ù§‚Äù - Niki, Google Play User, 8 Nov 2019

Moshi is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the content is free to use.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

The Moshi Premium annual subscription unlocks the full catalog of Stories, Meditations, Music, and Sounds available in the app for as long as you are subscribed.

*Poll of 600 users, Apr 2019
*Experiment conducted by researchers at NYU Grossman School of Medicine of 30 participants over 10 days, Aug 2020
descriptionHTML:
Join the millions of parents who use Moshi to quickly settle their families into a peaceful, restful sleep with over 75 hours of original audio stories, meditations, music, and sounds that you won‚Äôt find in any other app. Includes special guest Moshi Stories narrated by legends of stage and screen, including Goldie Hawn, Brian Blessed, and Patrick Stewart.

- 95% of parents surveyed agree that using the app makes bedtime less stressful¬π.
- Recommended by top sleep experts and physicians.
- Featured in "Hottest Health Trends 2020," NBC Today Show

Moshi helps families fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer, and wake up less. In a recent study¬≤, scientists at New York University discovered that when using Moshi, participants:

- Fell asleep 28 minutes earlier on average
- Slept for 22 minutes longer on average
- Woke up 50% less throughout the night on average

Make bedtime a dream:
- Remove anxiety and stress from the bedtime routine
- Reduce the time it takes to relax and fall asleep when it‚Äôs time for lights out
- Reclaim precious time in your evening

Moshi helps the entire family sleep soundly with over 200 pieces of completely original sleepy content created by the BAFTA award-winning Moshi team.

Why Moshi Stories work:
- Moshi Stories are gentle rhyming journeys with dreamy choruses
- Musical transitions are specifically designed to be mesmerising
- As each story progresses the gentle narration becomes increasingly sleepy and ambient sounds diminish
- Musical loops continue for several minutes once each story ends, before gently fading to avoid sudden silence
- Featuring ambient white noise, from vacuuming and distant lawnmowers to washing machines and lapping waves

Teach the entire family the basics of mindfulness with guided meditations designed to help the entire family relax, reduce anxiety, and manage negative thoughts.

Mindfulness topics to encourage positive emotions include:
- Kindness
- Gratitude
- Positive thinking
- Recalling joyful moments
- Staying calm
- Patience
- Making friends
- The power of imagination
- Reflection
- Self-appreciation

Features to support a stress-free bedtime:
- Original content released every week to ensure there is always something new to enjoy at bedtime
- Audio-only. No need for screens in the bedroom
- Learn deep breathing to help worries drift away
- Loop and replay functions ensure sleepy content plays throughout the night if needed
- Explore curated playlists to discover recommended content
- Create personalised playlists to listen to favourite stories over and over

Each originally-crafted Moshi Story, Sound, Meditation, and Music track helps to calm and relax, day or night.

Proud to have received Google Editors‚Äô Choice Award alongside apps such as Headspace.

Don't just take our word for it‚Ä¶

‚ÄúMoshi has changed our lives for the better! We had to sit with my daughter reading story after story until she fell asleep...now we put Moshi on and she goes to sleep on her own! It‚Äôs honestly amazing!‚Äù - Vicky, Google Play User, 25 May 2020

‚ÄúI LOVE THIS APP. You can't beat a sleepy time story told by THE Patrick Stewart! ‚ù§‚Äù - Niki, Google Play User, 8 Nov 2019

Moshi is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the content is free to use.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

The Moshi Premium annual subscription unlocks the full catalog of Stories, Meditations, Music, and Sounds available in the app for as long as you are subscribed.

*Poll of 600 users, Apr 2019
*Experiment conducted by researchers at NYU Grossman School of Medicine of 30 participants over 10 days, Aug 2020

recentChanges:
In this update, we've redesigned the settings menu to make it easier to manage your preferences.
We‚Äôve recently released 7 Days of Moshi Mindfulness, a series of bite-sized meditations designed to introduce families to the magic of mindfulness. As always, we release new content every week to help make life more magical and relaxing for you and your family.
comments: Have only listened to the free stories. They are interesting, fun to listen to and helps not only my granddaughter fall asleep (usually Sleepy Paws) but I have used them to fall asleep to as well. Love Phillipa's voice as it is so soothing to hear.

It works for the right age. My 4 year old is engaged in the story telling and falls asleep every time. The app is so successful, she is onto it and knows and refuses to watch sometimes. My 2.5 yo is too young to pay attention long term, but the stories do settle him down. My only complaint, really recommendation is for the app developers to offer a search option. The 2.5 yo only wants to watch the train one. And sometimes 4yo wants kitties. We are paying good money, please add thanks!
This is one of the best apps. I would always be ripping my hair out at bed time for my kids and now its so easy for them to get to pick there bed time song or even story.

Too costly, no monthly subscription. I love the concept, love the stories. The visuals are great, and the music that goes with each story is so soothing. However, $60/yr is too expensive for a lullaby/story app. On top of the high cost there is only a yearly subscription. The price needs to be lowered and the subscription needs more options. I feel like the cost is on the road if price gouging. The developers/ marketers know that parents are desperate for easy going sleep routines right now. üòî

I love this app, which is why after my weeks free I decided to buy the app! It works so well with all of my children ages 10, 7, 4 and 2 years. We take the little 2 to bed (they share a room) we put on twinkly lights and connect the tablet up to a Bluetooth speaker and the play Moshi, we have it playing a playlist all night for them. It's helped get them into going to sleep in their own beds rather than on the sofa whenever they pass out or in my bed. So I am extremely grateful for this app.

title: Relax and Sleep
description:
Already used by more than 5 million people around the globe to aid with their meditation, tinnitus, sleep, mindfulness, therapy, newborn baby, pregnancy, stress, concentration, work...

Choose from more than 50 ambient sounds, including white noise, thunder, rain, the ocean, lightning, water, birds, bugs, instruments, mechanical and nature noises.

Combine multiple sounds and tune their individual volume to create your own unique mix.

Set timers, store presets or combine both to create your own unique wake-up alarm.

Use all available sounds for FREE, no extra purchases needed, no ads.

Need more advanced features or need to store more than 4 timers and presets?
Unlock these features for the price of one coffee (or beer) and you will also get a lifetime access to future feature updates.

This App it is created by a single developer using his spare time creating this app to aid people.

Questions? Issues? Please read the Help / FAQ within the App first before contacting me.

summary: Choose and mix from over 50 relaxing sounds which incl. thunder and white noise.
recentChanges: improved the alarm-clock and fixed the timer-issues
comments: Quality has gone downhill. Used to work great. I've had it installed for years. All the sudden, I about to fall asleep and the app stops running. I'm then wide awake. Found a new app. Sorry to delete this one. It's been good, but the noise turning off may as well be a marching band.

Same complaint as everyone else. This app used to be great- used it for years. Now it's garbage! Turns off randomly, skips, makes jarring sounds rather than relaxing ones. I would suggest using a different app nowüëéüëéüëé

I've used this app for years. It was the best I could find. Recently, the app now hiccups (clicks) frequently when in use. This wakes me up. Deleted app and am looking for another. I wish they pushed a fix for this issue.

The variety of sounds is really good, and I like that you can mix and match to create your own, but the app crashes every single night. Usually multiple times a night. It also drains my battery really quickly.
Used to be great, now the sounds stutter etc. Very irritating and definitely no way to "relax and sleep". üòí

title: SleepTown
description:
üè†üí§Build regular and healthy sleep habits in the most simple and interesting way!üí§üè†
üéäAwarded Best Personal Growth Apps of 2019 in 15 regions (Canada, Australia, UK, Mexico, Brazil, Russia, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Turkey, India, Thailand, Indonesia and North Africa)

Developed by SeekrTech, the creator of Forest app which has more than 25 million users around the globe. 

Do you often stay up late scrolling on your phones? Hit the snooze button until you're late? If you have trouble putting your phone down at bedtime, or if you suffer from insomnia and want to attain a healthy, regular sleep schedule. SleepTown is your best solution. 
    
How it works: 3 steps to a healthy sleep schedule
    1) Set your own challenging bedtime and wake-up goal.
    2) Open the SleepTown app before your bedtime goal and start constructing a building.
    3) Wake up before your wake-up goal, shake your phone to clear your mind, and see which building you got. Every morning the building is a surprise that will motivate you to wake up!
    
SleepTown Can Help You:
    ‚Ä¢ Beat your phone addiction and get more sleep
    ‚Ä¢ Maintain regular sleep hours between 4-10 hours a day
    ‚Ä¢ Construct amazing buildings by achieving your bedtime and wake-up goals
    ‚Ä¢ Wake up to a reward every day - your new building!
    ‚Ä¢ View your "SleepTown" and all your sleep statistics in the town page
    ‚Ä¢ Night shift mode helps reduce blue light

Construct Your Own Town:
    ‚Ä¢ Over 70 types of unique buildings available
    ‚Ä¢ Spend your earned coins to unlock new buildings
    ‚Ä¢ Earn revenue after each successful construction
    ‚Ä¢ Earn extra revenue from consecutive successful days 
    ‚Ä¢ Design your own town with land, buildings, and decorations
    ‚Ä¢ Apply special themes on holidays to decorate your SleepTown
    
Customize Your Sleeping Schedule:
    ‚Ä¢ Set up to two days off in a week: failing on your "day-off" won't end your streak, so relax and take a break!
    ‚Ä¢ Reset bedtime & wake-up time goals anytime
    ‚Ä¢ Set up a bedtime reminder and alarm clock
    ‚Ä¢ Adjust the volume and sound of your alarm
    ‚Ä¢ Adjust "shake your phone" challenge to wake you up easily in the morning
    
UNLOCK PRO VERSION:
    ‚Ä¢ Get daily coin rewards
    ‚Ä¢ Choose which building you want to construct next
    ‚Ä¢ Get a reward ticket for succeeding on 7 consecutive days
    ‚Ä¢ Redeem reward tickets to significantly increase your chances of getting a rare building
    ‚Ä¢ Earn extra tickets from events
    ‚Ä¢ Unlock achievements and earn extra rewards
    ‚Ä¢ Create an account to back up your data (all your sleeping stats and lovely buildings!)

New Challege:
‚Ä¢ Invites friends and family to join the circle and set the same sleep goals, develop healthy sleep habits together!
‚Ä¢ Encourage memebers in the circle to reach the goals to contribute energy to consruct your own wonders of the world.
‚Ä¢ These elaborately designed wonders will make your town spectacular!
    
üèòGo to sleep on time, and start building your own "SleepTown" tonight! üèò
    
Notice:
SleepTown is an app available for both Android mobile and tablet devices. The Pro version can be restored on other Android devices. To download a non-Android version of SleepTown, a separate purchase is required. However, by logging into the same registered account, the account data can be synchronized across different platforms and devices..
    
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SleepTownApp
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/sleeptownapp
Follow us on Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/sleeptownapp/
Find out more on https://sleeptown.seekrtech.com!
Privacy Policy:https://sleeptown.seekrtech.com/privacy/

summary: Build Healthy Sleep Habits
developerAddress: 28F., No. 218, Sec. 2, Taiwan Blvd., West Dist., Taichung City 403, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Some bug fixes.
comments: i purchase the premium version thinking it would be good as the (forest app) but its far from good. theres not much to it than having bldgs. per completed sleep cycle. the alarm also don't go on if you turn off the wifi so the app forces you to keep the wifi on while charging your phone and while the app is running. it consumes alot of battery charge and electricity as well as wifi. it could've been better. i was also expecting some great alarm sounds and sleep sounds turns ou theres none. 0/10

This app has made me change my sleeping habits in some way. But, I don't recommend this as an alarm app. The alarm didn't wake me up, even though my alarm was on. It's a bug, maybe? As a result, my building was demolished. I'd just recommend using another alarm, wake up before your scheduled wake up time on SleepTown, and head to this app immediately after using it to prevent your building from being demolished.

This is a very interesting app which I have used a lot on another device. Building whilst you are asleep is quite amusing and after time it does help you develop the habit of going to bed when you should do. My one note of caution is that you should make sure that you are happy with all your phones privacy and security settings before doing something like this.

I'm editing my review because my buildings keep collapsing and there were times in the beginning it was my fault but now even if i wake up before my alarm it says oops return to the app. Then it says your building collapsed. The only thing that I can think of is the problem is the fact my phone is an android.

I love that this app can keep me off my phone after a certain time at night so that I can focus on going to bed. However, compared to its brother app Forest, SleepTown lacks in that light entertainment factor. In Forest, all the trees have names and funny little blurbs about them, but there's nothing about the buildings on SleepTown. They're all untitled and some are just a guess as to what their purpose is in this town. Sometimes my building is demolished before my wake up time for no reason.

title: Sleepzy: Sleep Cycle Tracker & Alarm Clock
description:
Healthy sleep = Healthy life!

Delve deep into your sleep and improve its quality with our fresh sleep monitor app Sleepzy!

Sleepzy, the smart alarm clock and sleep tracker, finds the optimal time to wake you, delivers nightly sleep statistics, and detects whether you snore. These tools and more help you sleep well, monitor your sleep behavior and create healthy habits towards wellness. This sleep pattern tracker and alarm clock analyzes your sleep cycle and notifies you if you have a sleep debt. Whether you‚Äôre a morning person or a night owl, this sleep app will help you sleep better and bring you quality rest just like your favorite pillow.

Sounds revolutionary, right?

Discover Sleepzy now - the next-level sleep cycle tracker and smart alarm clock which will help you:

- Wake up during the lightest sleep phase of your sleep to feel refreshed, rested and ready for the day
- Manage your sleep cycle and create healthy habits to stay on schedule
- Fall asleep to relaxing sounds and wake up to your favorite music
- Set your Sleep Goal and track Sleep Debt to stay motivated and sleep better
- Track Sleep Patterns to understand when you get your best quality sleep with the most captivating sleep tracker
- Bonus up your life with an advanced weekly Sleep Stats and Sleep Tracker
- Know your Sleep Quality and take the necessary steps to improve your sleep cycle
- Find out whether you snore or make any sounds while sleeping with the Snore Recorder
- Start your own Sleep Diary inside the app
- Get into the most bountiful and relaxed state before bed

Sleep Analysis:
This smart alarm clock delivers a thorough sleep analysis of the user's sleep, records your sleep cycle and makes recommendations on what you can do to sleep better. Simply place your device next to your bed and this sleep tracker will use the microphone to analyze your sleep cycle tendencies.

Sleep Diary:
Want to find out how your daily routine influences your sleep quality and eventually sleep better? Start your own journal with Sleepzy alarm clock to observe correlations between your sleep patterns and daily activities. Add notes with your activities during the day to see how they influenced your sleep. Whether it was a fancy dinner, a morning run or anything that may impact sleep cycles - put this note down in the 'Sleep notes‚Äô section and keep it directly on the app.

Snore Recorder:
Did you make any specific sounds overnight? Hard to guess! This sleep app has a perfect solution - sleep monitor. It measures and tracks if you snore while you slumber and identifies factors that may be impeding your sleep. Snore recorder also helps identify things you can do to sleep well.

Start monitoring what affects your sleep cycle to get enough hours of rest tonight!
It‚Äôs time to sleep better and wake up refreshed and energized! Try Sleepzy - the innovative sleep cycle tracker and sleep talk recorder!

Note: movement and noise from a partner or pets while sleeping may impact results.

Go Premium for added features:
- Track sounds that you make while sleeping
- 100% Ad-free

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.
You can choose from different subscription options.
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
California Privacy Notice:¬†https://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#h
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4

recentChanges:
Discover your sleep patterns with our brand new feature ‚ÄúSleep Notes‚Äú!

Thank you for your continued support and feedback.
We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us!
comments: Although I love the app and it's functions, it's missing a few things that would make it so much better. 1. I think it's should be linkable to music playing apps like Amazon music, Spotify, Pandora, and the like. Right now it's "music" option for an alarm is just saved audio files, which for me isn't music. 2. A small thing yes, but I think there's should be an option to turn off snooze. And 3. If it can't link to other apps for music, then it should at least have more options for alarms.

Disappointed with the app, why do all the apps need to charge you to hear the recordings. I didnt realise this until I used it the first time, woke up in the morning to find 3 recordings during my nights sleep. BUT to hear them I now need to pay. I'll give it a miss. So unless your happy to pay ¬£37 to hear yourself snore I wouldn't bother üòÇüòÇ

MAKE SURE YOU HAVE THE VOLUME DOWN!!! IT'S LOUDER THAN YOU EXPECT AND WILL JUMP OUTTA NOWHERE AT YA!!! I don't mean this in a bad way. Just if you're not expecting the alarm to go off, it will raise your heart rate a bit üòÅ
The free version is great & does give you enough information without needing to get the premium. Very useful & helpful. Recommended.
It's really good but it would be better if u didn't have to buy the sound tracking and other things inn general its good to track how u sleep.

title: Ambience - Nature sounds: sleep and meditation
description:
Ambience it's a mixer of relaxing sounds. You can mix many nature sounds and music in order to obtain your ideal relaxed ambience based on your mood. All sounds are high quality!

You can use this app for sleeping, power nap, meditation, concentration, reading or just relaxing.

Minimize anxiety, insomnia, and the symptoms of tinnitus by using this handy sound mixer to mask the annoying sounds around you.

Contains over 100 high quality relaxing sounds (all free) for any mood, divided in the following categories:

‚òÖ Rain sounds (Morning rain, Umbrella, Thunders, Light rain, Heavy rain, Distant thunder, Tent, Window, Roof)
‚òÖ Ocean sounds (Calm waves, Waves, Seagulls, Scuba diver, Dolphins, Sailboat, Whale, Foghorn, Harbor)
‚òÖ Water sounds (River, Creek, Waterfall, Brook, Water drops)
‚òÖ Night sounds (Crickets, Grasshoppers, Owls, Wolves, Loon, Frogs, Coyote, Coqui, Whippoorwill)
‚òÖ Countryside sounds (Blackbirds, Nightingale, Swallows, Turtledove, Eagle, Crows, Farm, Cowbells, Sheep, Horse, Ducks, Cicadas, Train horn, Carriage, Cow)
‚òÖ Wind and fire sounds (Light wind, Strong wind, Mountain wind, Under the door, Among the trees, Fireplace, Campfire, Oil stove)
‚òÖ Relaxing music (Piano, Guitar, Violin, Harp, Flute, Sax, Native american flute, Quiet time, Tranquility)
‚òÖ Traditional Asian sounds (Tibetan Bowls, Gong, Bells, Om, Flute, Didgeridoo, Chimes, Guzheng, Temple, Sitar, Taiko, Shamisen)
‚òÖ Zen Garden
‚òÖ City sounds (Musician, Coffee Shop, Fountain, Children, Traffic, Road work, Subway, Train station, Market)
‚òÖ Home sounds Fan, Air Conditioner, Hairdryer, Vacuum Cleaner, Cat purring, Shower, Washing Machine, Jacuzzi, Fridge, Vintage Clock, Gas Stove, Heater)
‚òÖ White noise, Pink noise, Brown noise
‚òÖ Binaural beats Headache, Insomnia, Relaxation, Anxiety, Meditation, Intuition, Creativity, Energy, Love

You can mix many relaxing sounds together and adjust the volume of each of them. When you find an ideal relaxing ambience, you can save your combination in order to playback it when you want.

Designed with an interactive and intuitive user-interface, this app allows you to create and mix your own ambiance. You can save as many sound combinations as you like and play them whenever you are studying, walking home, reading, and even when preparing to sleep (an in-app timer can be set to allow auto-stop whenever you fall asleep).

Are you lazy? Do not worry. There are already many preset combinations ready to use. Just open the menu, touch Ambiences and load an ambience.

The relaxing sounds can be played in the background while you browse your device and use other applications.


*** Main features ***

‚òÖ Mix up to 10 sounds simultaneously
‚òÖ Individual volume control
‚òÖ Saving of the combinations
‚òÖ Many preset combinations
‚òÖ Timer for the automatic closing


*** Benefits for sleep ***

Have you trouble falling asleep? These relaxing sounds calm your mind, relax your body and help you to sleep well. Now you fall asleep faster and sleep better.
Say goodbye to your insomnia! Good sleep is essential to a happy life.


*** Benefits for concentration ***

Have you trouble concentrating in the study, in the work or in reading? These background sounds promote your concentration by covering the annoying external noises.


*** Benefits for meditation ***

You can use these chill out sounds for your yoga sessions.
The sounds of nature relieve the stress of modern life. The human mind reacts positively when it hears the sounds of nature because they arouse emotions that remind our primordial environment. Hear the sounds of nature leads us away from the noise and daily stress to make us return to the calm of our origins.


*** Benefits for tinnitus (ringing in the ears) ***

Have you tinnitus? Do not worry. These relaxing sounds help you by covering the ring in your ears.

Ambience it's a mixer of relaxing sounds. You can mix many nature sounds and music in order to obtain your ideal relaxed ambience based on your mood. All sounds are high quality!

You can use this app for sleeping, power nap, meditation, concentration, reading or just relaxing.

Minimize anxiety, insomnia, and the symptoms of tinnitus by using this handy sound mixer to mask the annoying sounds around you.

Contains over 100 high quality relaxing sounds (all free) for any mood, divided in the following categories:

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: I use this app to fall asleep literally EVERY. SINGLE. NIGHT. Easy to use, the sounds are great, the UI is intuitive. On top of all that, I recently ran into an issue with it and emailed the developer -- they got back to me right away and had a fix ready in just a few hours! Great app; give it a try and you won't be disappointed! Now, back to sleep...

Nice app with a lot of excellent quality sounds. The price is reasonable and not subscription based--unlike many other, similar applications. I had a problem with a full page ad that popped up and did not have the usual X to close it--at least I didn't see it where it usually is. Since that really wasn't the developer's fault and he responded promptly to what happened, I decided to give the app another try and I ended up purchasing it. One thing I would like to see added is to have an option on some of the sounds to adjust how often they play. For example, it would be nice to hear the train sound but less frequently. Very few apps allow this unfortunately.

Before I started using this app I used a loud fan to focus on, this is so much more relaxing and soothing, I just love it, I'm so happy I decided to buy this app. I'm happy but calm lol you'll love it@

I downloaded the free version of this app years ago along with a bunch of others to try and find the best realistic rain sound. This one is bar far the best and most versatile, and I have since upgraded to the premium version which is even better. You can layer up to 10 different sounds and create such atmospheric and relaxing combinations. The premium version also transferred automatically to my new phone which is a bonus. I link it to my echo dot at night to help me sleep.
Great app, beautiful fresh interface, lots of nice features, best of all it really puts me to sleep when I need it!

title: Sleepy - Sleep Cycles
description:
To sleep well is to look and feel better.

Sleepy is a dream calculator. Use, as a principle, sleep cycles to do the calculations.

All calculations are made according to real evidence regarding human rest. So we guarantee you will sleep and wake up better.

Characteristics:

 - Clean and minimalist user interface.
 - Nice graphic content and good design.
 - Intuitive.
 - Easy to use. Just choose what time you want to wake up or what time you should
 wake up for the application to do the calculations and suggest the time to sleep and the time to get up.
 - Contains useful information about sleep cycles.

summary: Discover the benefits of getting up and sleeping at the exact moment.
recentChanges:
v2.1 - STABLE
- Issues Fixed with Android 6 and versions above
- Media Player issues fixed

v2.0 Major changes:
- New design
- Now you can record the average cycles you sleep
- A sound player is added that will help you sleep faster
- Much more is coming soon
comments: I have tried over 5 different apps and I was sceptic to try this one. But I finally found THE ONE. So easy to use and my sleep pattern improved from the first time I tried it. It is amazing to finally get more than 3 hours of sleep. I will never delete this app. It truly changed my life. Thank you so much Developers. Looove itü§© A few more melodies would be great though.

When I changed my phone (from IPhone to an android phone) I missed the built-in option to set up the alarm without making my counts what time should I wake up if I want to sleep 8 hours or 7 hours or whatever hours. It's nice that this app does it for me. Thank you.

Great app! Really easy to use and it helps you get the proper sleep (cycles) needed to feel refreshed each day! Bonus: it gives you your weekly sleep average, which reminds me that I'm not sleeping enough each night. Ha!

This Is My Best Daily Used App Eveer ! I have this app on all devices.. i use it everyday to know when my body is actually ready to wake up, using a genaric alarm time is so unparctical and harmful to ur health . I love this app so much, it literally makes me live longer!

It's helpful that you can choose from three options of how to set an alarm (go to sleep immediately, what time you will go to sleep and what time you want to wake up). Then going by how many sleep cycles you want to have, you choose from there. Also, there's info about REM sleep and what is involved in each sleep cycle (which I didn't know much about). Overall, it's a pretty neat app.

title: Let's Meditate: Meditate, Relax & Sleep
description:
Simple design. Easy to use.
A very straightforward approach to guided meditation; no clutter, no distraction. Just choose a track and hit play. It‚Äôs as simple as it can get.

Variety of content.
A curated list of guided meditation tracks catering to a wide variety of topics to suit your situation; including anxiety, body scan, healing, sleep and many more.

Short as well as long meditation tracks.
Take a quick break from your routine with meditation tracks as short as 5 minutes; or recharge yourself thoroughly with meditation tracks lasting over 40 minutes.

Selective downloading. With offline support.
Save your phone's storage space by downloading only the meditation tracks that you would listen to. Once downloaded, listen to them even when you are offline.

No ads. No sign ups.
Ads and sign-ups do the opposite of relaxing and calming the users; and that is not what we want you to experience. A clean interface to help us keep the experience soothing for you.

recentChanges:
+ New meditations added
+ Multiple meditations can now be downloaded in a queue
+ Two reminders can be set to remind you to meditate twice everyday
+ Added an option for monthly donations, for anyone willing to donate
+ For users in India: Enabled UPI based one-time donations, for anyone willing to donate
comments: I've only listened to three or four of these and I think the ones I listened to were great. Left me feeling super relaxed and more comfortable in my skin. Might come back later and change the rating if I need to. Update, I find the male voice super relaxing and really enjoy the sessions, i can easily listen to three a day. Update, I really appreciate that you can download your favourite ones when they are going to be removed to make space for new ones.

The app has all I looked for. Just guided meditations. No long introduction into meditation every time I open new one, no annoying ads, no asking for purchasing. I really like I can choose the length of the meditation. Shorter one if I'm busy, longer one if flexible with my time. Thank you. Ps: but I really like one particular meditation Surrender (I think it's its title) but it's unavailable now. I needed to uninstall and download the app again and that particular meditation is gone.

I love this app! I've tried other a lot of other meditation apps and they don't have the same grounding affect as this one does! When I first tried this app, I did the "Dream Meditation" and then the "Wash Away Your Pain." I think just doing those two, while fully immersed, stimulated a lot that I had repressed throughout my life and wasn't expressing, as I had a very bizzare,Vivid, Nightmare,ButIWasSleepingTheBestIEverHave! IThinkUsingThisAppWillHelpRenewMyselfAsAPersonToTrulyWorkThruMyTroubles

This app has helped me to envision my thoughts, awaken spiritual potential and most importantly taught me how to spend time with my self. I started as a complete beginner and the progress is definitely visible. I've also tried many other mediation apps but the voice coaches in let's meditate suit me the best. This app is is a definite go-to for anyone looking to start in the field of meditation or a veteran. Namaste ;)

Just what I was looking for, simple to use, great selections and works amazingly well! Never had any problems using the app and I just love it! Although there are more female voice then male voice which I hope in the future of this app to have more male voice just because of the soothing softer voice they have then a female voice. But overall a really great app, please give it a try!

title: Deep Meditate: Calm Meditation & Sleep App
description:
Life can be stressful, but meditation isn't. Join us for truly eye-opening meditation sessions, fit for beginners, and seasoned meditators alike.

We believe that the modern mind is overstimulated. The purpose of Deep Meditate is to help restore an ancient balance through meditation and sleep. The simple app can help you grow your emotional well-being through deep meditation. You will learn mindfulness techniques, find ways to become calm, cultivate gratitude, and experience deep relaxation.

The app is divided into 3 parts to help you take care of your mind:

- Meditate: To cultivate lasting peace of mind
- Music: To escape from the everyday grind
- Sleep: To get rest & preserve one's sanity

Each of these sections is there to help you. The purpose of this app is to help you sleep better, experience deeper relaxation, and enjoy life a bit more. Simply open the app, select your meditation theme and press play. Simply sit back, relax, and breathe in the tranquility.

And don‚Äôt worry if you have never meditated before. Each meditation is a guided meditation, one that will talk you through each and every step. There are meditations of shorter duration for beginners, as well as longer duration sessions for seasoned meditators looking for a challenge.

Guided Meditations
There are 10 distinct meditation suites:

- Breathing Meditations
- Mindfulness Relaxation
- Muscle Relaxation
- Traditional Meditation
- Mindfulness Meditation
- 10 Minute Meditation
- Meditation for Beginners
- Workplace Meditation
- Visualization Meditation
- Stress & Anxiety Meditation

Calming Music & Nature Sounds
Put some headphones on, and disappear into a world of environments, or take a quick nap induced by ambient melodies and extremely relaxing music. Our rich catalog of relaxing melodies will help you calm your mind and get rid of any stress. We have over 250 different music compositions and relaxing nature sounds including:

- Crackling Fire
- Waves On A Rocky Beach
- Gently Lapping Water
- Rainforest
- Lazy Crickets
... and more than 250 such tracks!

Music tracks and soundscapes that combine natural sounds and instrumental melodies to form the perfect atmosphere for solo meditation, sleep, or work.

Sleep

- Sleep Hypnosis Meditation: We've worked with industry-leading hypnosis experts, people whose job it is to help you snooze, to bring top-of-the-class sleep meditations. These meditations are tried and tested to help users get a deep, restful sleep. Simply press play, and you'll be asleep in no time!

- Sleep Stories: Who says bedtime stories can only be enjoyed by kids? Listen to over 50 sleep stories and wind-downs written especially for adults, designed to help you get that much-needed zZz. With one new sleep story releasing every weekend, you've always got something to look forward to.

Meditation Timers
There are two timer types included in Deep Meditate for your unguided sessions.

- Meditation Timer: Meditating in solitude can be an enlightening experience. But practice makes perfect. A timer helps keep track of time so you don't have to think about it. All timers can be customized by you to have a starting bell, background music, and an ending bell. In the end, the time you meditated for will be added to your progress statistic.

-Open Ended Timer: Meditate for as long as you wish while the app keeps time. A subtle gong marks the beginning of a session. You may also choose to have the gong sound at intervals, to keep your mind present, and in-the-moment.

recentChanges: In this app update we've added bug fixes and some small improvements to help the app perform better on more devices.
comments: Frustrating. At first I was impressed with the 30 day meditation course. Was slightly annoyed the payment screen shows every time I open the app but as there's plenty of free content it was ok. I wondered if I might even pay for the premium version once I'd done all the free stuff. Then today I checked in for day 8, saw the message saying they had today's meditation ready for me and then discovered it was locked. This made me feel duped and now I don't want to give them my money. Sad. üòë

Was really good for free meditations although the sleep meditations could be a little longer and had nice reminders but unfortunately thinking about uninstalling as they now want you to sign in and agree to their terms. Lots of stuff is locked. How about an option not to sign up? What a disappointment-people need easier access to this type of app, not more difficult! I had been considering a purchase but don't think I'll be doing that now as there are other easier to access apps out there.

This app has changed my life. I took up meditation around 4 months ago, but only really started using daily 34 days ago( it keeps track for you). It also tells you how many minutes you've put in, and rewards you with badges for completing milestones. There are lots of courses to complete also a 30 day beginners introduction of short (around 10 mins) meditations to help you start the correct way. This really helps with my bad moods. Thanks Deep Meditate.üôè
It's a fabulous app. But they have slowly started to lock 90% of the meditations unless you pay for premium. I highly dislike that.

A lovely app to have! Has a lot of meditations for any emotion that you are going through. I overthink a lot and this app reminds me to live in the present either through meditation or the words of encouragement they notify you with. Highly recommend!

title: Shhh...Sleep in Seconds
description:
Insomnia? Busy mind? Can‚Äôt sleep? Us too. That‚Äôs why we created Shhh - the app that helps you get to sleep faster, when you need it most. 

Sometimes you wake up at 3AM because Jeff needs that quarterly report tomorrow. Maybe you have a newborn and your lunch break is your only chance for a power nap. You took the red-eye to Phoenix, but the kid in 3C is using your seat back as a punching bag.

Life is full of challenges. Falling asleep shouldn‚Äôt be one of them. 

We could tell you we spent many years and hundreds of thousands of dollars researching audio frequencies, sound engineering, and healing (which is true). But who cares? The important thing is we made an app that lets you fall asleep easier, faster, and better than any other method. Even alcohol (we tested this)!

If you‚Äôre tired, we can help you fall asleep in seconds. Just download the free Shhh app, plug in your headphones, and tell the world to Shhh.

summary:
Want to Sleep?
Plug in your headphones and choose your Sleep Mode.
recentChanges: Minor enhancements.
comments: Good white noise app. Benn using it for months and still don't know the difference between the 3 modes though! Seems to shut off if you keep using you phone for a while after turning on the noise. Don't know if that's a bug in mine or if it's designed like that. It's prefer it didn't though as often I want to keep doing stuff on my phone with the noise on to calm my baby down. Other than that - great little app.

I don't really get it. There are 3 options: Night Sleep, Power Nap, Flight Sleep. When you start any of them, you hear the ocean. If you open the options, there are several other types of sounds (lake, rain, Tibetan bowls, etc.)‚Äîbut choosing any of them doesn't change anything. You still just hear the ocean. An I missing something? And does it actually require headphones, or is that just a suggestion? (Who wants to wear headphones all night? How can that be comfortable?)

Surprised at how effective this is. Main effect is white noise moving from left to right and back - so simplistic, it's almost silly. Other effects are automatically layered over time and change over time. Seems to work every time I need it. Only complaints are that it does not shot off when earbuds are unplugged and that there is no management available in the notifications.

I find this works well for what I require, there is no one talking therefore no requirement to either get used to the voice. As I always say you have to find a voice that does it for you otherwise it won't do it for you, but I've found that this is superior Unfortunately atm it does stop for no reason before the timer runs out after about 20 minutes

Love this app. It's simple and that's what makes it so appealing especially when you have to use it just before bed. I use the app mostly when I can't get to sleep easily due to stress. Works like a charm! Would definitely recommend it for it's simplicity and effectiveness.

title: PrimeNap: Free Sleep Tracker
description:
Improve your sleep quality with PrimeNap, the free Sleep Tracker and Smart Alarm App.

PrimeNap also features a screen dimmer, sleep statistics, snore detection, sleep sounds and a dream journal.

Features:
  * Free Sleep monitor / Sleep tracker
  * Data-export
  * Sleep debt analysis
  * Smart alarm / sleep cycle alarm clock
  * Gradual volume increase
  * Snore detection
  * Easy snooze using multitouch, add 5 minutes per finger
  * Screen dimmer
  * Red filter
  * Dream journal
  * Sleep stats for user-specified daily activities
  * Sleep sounds


Benefits of using a sleep tracker and sleep cycle alarm clock / smart alarm
With modern day work schedules, our sleep patterns have become widely irregular and oftentimes much shorter than they should be. PrimeNap's Sleep Tracker can help you analyze your sleeping patterns and correct them if necessary. Using PrimeNap's smart alarm functionality, you can avoid being pulled out of deep sleep by a well-meaning time-based alarm clock, and instead wake up gently after sleep cycle completion and thereby simulate a natural awakening.


How it works: Movement during sleep is known to roughly correlate with the actual sleep stages obtained by polysomniography. This sleep movement is registered by the phone and translated into fairly accurate sleep cycle information.

Recommended use: Use this sleep app with proper hardware. If convenient, switch on airplane/flight mode to minimize any emissions. Reboot or close other apps that might cause the phone to heat up during the night.


Frequently Asked Questions:
* How do you interpret the resulting graph?
- The graph is separated into two sections. The top section shows relative movement over time. Low measured movement will be a valley in the graph, high movement will be a peak in the graph.
The bottom section uses the movement information to calculate a rough estimate of your sleep cycles (numbered on top) and even individual sleep phases during each sleep cycle (Awake, Dreaming (REM), Light Sleep (Non-REM 1,N2), Deep Sleep (N3). The app uses the actual measurement (e.g. long stretches of low movement are likely to be deep sleep), averages (mainly in case of REM) and basic knowledge about sleep cycles (duration approx. 90 minutes) to create a reasonable best-fit hypnogram graph. This is why it will still show sleep cycles if the phone is placed on a desk. The app assumes that the user is actually sleeping.

* How is this going to help improve sleep?
- For most people best sleep is achieved through regular sleeping patterns (similar bedtime) averaging about 8 hours of sleep every day. The app is meant to assist people in finding out their exact sleeping patterns in order to make informed changes. The sleeping times are thus most important, the information shown in the graphs is mainly used by the smart alarm function.

* How do you add your own nap sessions if you forget to track them?
- On the third tab (Nap History) there is a button in the bottom right corner labeled "+1".

* How do you delete nap sessions?
- Click and Hold the nap that you want to delete. Select the corresponding item from the menu that will appear.

* How do you resume a nap session?
- Simply click the sleep button again to start a new nap. The app will automatically know that there have been previous sleep cycles and will continue there. Both sleep sessions will appear in the sleep pattern overview.

* What does the button "Phone off = Sleep" do?
- This is an option for people who turn their phone off during the night. If you turn your phone off completely, the app will count this as going to bed. Turning it back on in the morning is counted as waking up.

* What is "Wake Battery"
- This is a way of displaying the current sleep debt as a battery icon in the status bar. This needs adjustment and always sleep if tired.

With modern day work schedules, our sleep patterns have become widely irregular and oftentimes much shorter than they should be. PrimeNap's Sleep Tracker can help you analyze your sleeping patterns and correct them if necessary. Using PrimeNap's smart alarm functionality, you can avoid being pulled out of deep sleep by a well-meaning time-based alarm clock, and instead wake up gently after sleep cycle completion and thereby simulate a natural awakening.


How it works: Movement during sleep is known to roughly correlate with the actual sleep stages obtained by polysomniography. This sleep movement is registered by the phone and translated into fairly accurate sleep cycle information.

Recommended use: Use this sleep app with proper hardware. If convenient, switch on airplane/flight mode to minimize any emissions. Reboot or close other apps that might cause the phone to heat up during the night.


Frequently Asked Questions:
* How do you interpret the resulting graph?
- The graph is separated into two sections. The top section shows relative movement over time. Low measured movement will be a valley in the graph, high movement will be a peak in the graph.
The bottom section uses the movement information to calculate a rough estimate of your sleep cycles (numbered on top) and even individual sleep phases during each sleep cycle (Awake, Dreaming (REM), Light Sleep (Non-REM 1,N2), Deep Sleep (N3). The app uses the actual measurement (e.g. long stretches of low movement are likely to be deep sleep), averages (mainly in case of REM) and basic knowledge about sleep cycles (duration approx. 90 minutes) to create a reasonable best-fit hypnogram graph. This is why it will still show sleep cycles if the phone is placed on a desk. The app assumes that the user is actually sleeping.

* How is this going to help improve sleep?
- For most people best sleep is achieved through regular sleeping patterns (similar bedtime) averaging about 8 hours of sleep every day. The app is meant to assist people in finding out their exact sleeping patterns in order to make informed changes. The sleeping times are thus most important, the information shown in the graphs is mainly used by the smart alarm function.

* How do you add your own nap sessions if you forget to track them?
- On the third tab (Nap History) there is a button in the bottom right corner labeled "+1".

* How do you delete nap sessions?
- Click and Hold the nap that you want to delete. Select the corresponding item from the menu that will appear.

* How do you resume a nap session?
- Simply click the sleep button again to start a new nap. The app will automatically know that there have been previous sleep cycles and will continue there. Both sleep sessions will appear in the sleep pattern overview.

* What does the button "Phone off = Sleep" do?
- This is an option for people who turn their phone off during the night. If you turn your phone off completely, the app will count this as going to bed. Turning it back on in the morning is counted as waking up.

* What is "Wake Battery"
- This is a way of displaying the current sleep debt as a battery icon in the status bar. This needs adjustment and always sleep if tired.
summary: Sleep Tracker & Smart Alarm ‚Äì Free Sleep Tracker App
comments: I like the look of the interface much better than sleep as android, but the auto track feature does not seem to work. Then I can't manually add or edit a sleep entry if it's missing/incorrect? There is nothing in the instructions for this. I wish sleep apps would focus on just the tracking and do away with the alarms and noises so the app is less cluttered. I also wish it could ignore that I have a podcast or YouTube playing for 15 mins as I go to sleep.

I set an alarm for 7am and it went off this morning and I couldn't turn it off.. I had to actually restart my phone because no matter what I did the alarm wouldn't shutup. I pulled the app back up to try and look at my sleep hours.. I couldn't figure out how to see a detailed analysis. It just said I slept for x amount of hours. I got frustrated and uninstalled it. When designing an app someone will be using immediately upon waking up, it needs to be straightforward. This is not.
Not a good sleep tracker. Recorded zero sound and I dont think the data is correct in the slightest.

a little complicated looking interface but seems promising. I would like it to also prompt me to start recording around my bedtime. Edit: acting wonky since the Android 10 update, stops itself from tracking but doesn't record my sleep hours.

This is a good app for tracking sleep and has many useful features. I like knowing how much of each type of sleep I've gotten esch night. However, some features such as the wake battery are unexplained and it just seems to set to a number and buzz every so often as it counts down. I would really like an explanation of this feature. This app could further be improved if it showed what time you fell asleep too.

title: Twilight üåÖ Blue light filter for better sleep
description:
Are you having trouble falling asleep? Are your kids hyperactive when playing with the tablet before bed time?
Are you using your smart phone or tablet in the late evening? Twilight may be a solution for you!

Recent research suggests that exposure to blue light before sleep may distort your natural (circadian) rhythm and cause inability to fall asleep.

The cause is the photoreceptor in your eyes, called Melanopsin. This receptor is sensitive to a narrow band of blue light in the 460-480nm range which may suppress Melatonin production - a hormone responsible for your healthy sleep-wake cycles.

In experimental scientific studies it has been shown an average person reading on a tablet or smart phone for a couple of hours before bed time may find their sleep delayed by about an hour. See references below..

The Twilight app makes your device screen adapt to the time of the day. It filters the flux of blue light emitted by your phone or tablet after sunset and protects your eyes with a soft and pleasant red filter. The filter intensity is smoothly adjusted to the sun cycle based on your local sunset and sunrise times.


Documentation
http://twilight.urbandroid.org/doc/

Get more from Twilight
1) Bed reading: Twilight is more pleasant on the eyes for night reading. Especially as it is able to lower the screen backlight far below the ability of the backligt controls on your screen

2) AMOLED screens: We have tested Twilight on an AMOLED screen for 5 years without any sign of depletion or over-burning. If properly configured Twilight causes less light emission (by enabling dimming) with more equal light distribution (dark areas of the screen such as the status bar get tinted). This may in fact increase your AMOLED screen life time.

Basics on circadian rhythm and the role of melatonin
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Melatonin
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Melanopsin
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Circadian_rhythms
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Circadian_rhythm_disorder

Permissions
- location - to find out your current sunset/surise times
- running apps - to stop Twilight in selected apps
- write settings - to set back-light
- network - access smartlight (Philips HUE) to shield you household light from blue

Automation (Tasker or other)
https://sites.google.com/site/twilight4android/automation

Related scientific research

Amplitude Reduction and Phase Shifts of Melatonin, Cortisol and Other Circadian Rhythms after a Gradual Advance of Sleep and Light Exposure in Humans Derk-Jan Dijk, & Co 2012

Exposure to Room Light before Bedtime Suppresses Melatonin Onset and Shortens Melatonin Duration in Humans Joshua J. Gooley, Kyle Chamberlain, Kurt A. Smith & Co, 2011

Effect of Light on Human Circadian Physiology Jeanne F. Duffy, Charles A. Czeisler 2009

Efficacy of a single sequence of intermittent bright light pulses for delaying circadian phase in humans Claude Gronfier, Kenneth P. Wright, & Co 2009

Intrinsic period and light intensity determine the phase relationship between melatonin and sleep in humans Kenneth P. Wright, Claude Gronfier & Co 2009

The Impact of Sleep Timing and Bright Light Exposure on Attentional Impairment during Night Work Nayantara Santhi & Co 2008

Short-Wavelength Light Sensitivity of Circadian, Pupillary, and Visual Awareness in Humans Lacking an Outer Retina Farhan H. Zaidi & Co, 2007

High sensitivity of the human circadian melatonin rhythm to resetting by short wavelength light. Lockley SW & Co. 2003

Sensitivity of the human circadian pacemaker to nocturnal light: Jamie M Zeitzer, Derk-Jan Dijk & Co 2000
