recentChanges: - App-specific profiles - you can set different filer in each app e.g. make your book reader really dark or get rid of the eye squeezing white pages in your browser
comments: I love this app. I get massive migraines and become very sensitive to light, but my phone is the only device I can keep using as long as this app is on. It allows me to play my games or read my online books to try to relax when in the midst of a migraine. Definitely the first thing I install on a new phone! Thank you so much for creating this!

The first time I installed the app, I didn't understand how to manage the settings and I rushed and uninstall it. It's after some months I took out my time to carefully go through it and realized that it is one of the best screen filtering apps. I salute the developers of this app and wish you more wisdom to create more better apps for the world.

Wonderful app. Easy to use. Great for those of us who get up for 30 min in middle of night before going back to sleep. Sure beats staring at ceiling for hours. The relaxing red dust storm tone is peaceful when you inevitably check your phone. Also great for going to bed as you set dimmer and brighter times. Also great for whatever went beep in the night on your phone that you don't get hit with the searchlight that iluminates your skull till your ears glow.

This actually helped me go to sleep ! Im shook! My problem is...first off theres settings that im totally not comftable with nor understand. Also the whole time i was using it.. I was getting warnings of battery being used way to much & it was! Also it was using my data! To much of it! Im gonna try a different one. üòî

I've used this app for over 2 years. I really like it for using my phone in the evening, and I have a small child who's often up in the night and so it's great to have the settings for nighttime use when I'm up with her. Very customisable. Highly recommend.

title: Tide - Sleep Sounds, Focus Timer, Relax Meditate
description:
Integrating sleep, meditation, relax , and focus into an app, Tide is an app aiming at physical and mental care. Inspired by traveling, the nature, and meditation, we have been providing massive audios including natural soundscapes and mindfulness practices. To help you relieve stress, stay focused, relax with mindfulness, and better sleep at nights, Tide allows you to get away from the fast-paced life, and enter into peaceful and calm moments.

#Suitable for#
- Anyone who suffers from sleep problems.
- Procrastinators who have difficulties in staying focused.
- Creatives who are frequently disturbed by a noisy environment.
- Stressful people who have been in anxiety and exhaustion for a long time.
- Meditators who strive for peace in both body and mind.

#Features#
1. Focus Timer: Flow in inspiration
- High-efficient work mode.
- Immersive mode. Get rid of the digital obsession.
- Customize timer. Set timer for different scenes.
- Support to add apps into whitelist.

2. Sleep and Nap: Fall asleep with the sounds of nature.
- Sleep and Nap mode. Nap in the daytime, and sleep tightly at night.
- Light wake-up alarms. Wake up easily and naturally.
- Sleep analysis. Know all about your sleep.

3. Relax Breathing Guide: Learn to breathe calmly and steadily
- Balanced breathing. Improve your mood, and relieve stress.
- 4-7-8 breathing. Relax your mind and body. Quickly fall asleep.

#Selections#
1. Nature Sounds: Be calm and mindful with nature
- Well-selected sounds of nature. Bring you to various natural scenes.
- Music fusion mode. Mix your favorite music with natural sounds.
- Sound scenes are included but not limited to rain, ocean, thunder.

2. Relax Meditation: Put a pause button for your brain
- Merge mindfulness practice into daily life. Take a brain exercise anytime anywhere.
- Immersive meditation space. Bring you calmness and peace from content to interface.
- Basic meditation is included but not limited to Breathing, Body Scan.
- Single meditation is included but not limited to Fast Asleep, Study Pressure.

3. Daily Inspiring Quotes: Minimalist and calm trips mind and body
- Well-selected daily quotes. Greet to everyone who mindfully lives the life.
- Daily quotes calendar. Support to check the previous quotes and pictures.
- Greetings flowing in the time await you in Tide.

#More#
1. Tide Diary: Remember each calm and peaceful moment
- Visible data report. Record your beautiful moments in Tide.
- Fine-designed sharing card remembers each peaceful experience.

2. Minimalist Design: Pursuit of less is more
- Minimalist interface designing.
- Emotional visual effects.
- Customized typesetting for different typefaces.

3. Special for Android
- Support to control Tide on the lock screen.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

#SUBSCRIPTION# 
Tide provides localized subscription plans, please check in the app for details.

Related Terms
- Terms of Service: https://tide.moreless.io/terms/en/tos.html
- Privacy Policy: https://tide.moreless.io/terms/en/privacy.html

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Your voices have always been making us better!

Feedback: talk@moreless.io
Join us: hr@moreless.io

Find us
Facebook @tideapp
Instagram @tide_app

title: Sleeptracker
description:
** THIS IS NOT A STANDALONE APP.  THIS APP WILL NOT FUNCTION WITHOUT HARDWARE. This is the companion app for Beautyrest¬Æ Sleeptracker¬Æ Monitors and Tomorrow¬Æ Sleeptracker¬Æ Monitors. ONE OF THESE DEVICES IS REQUIRED TO USE THIS APP. **

POWERED BY SLEEPTRACKER¬Æ AI: BETTER SLEEP
Learn about your sleep - and improve your sleep - with nothing to wear or charge!

This is the companion app for the Beautyrest¬Æ Sleeptracker¬Æ Monitor and the Tomorrow¬Æ Sleeptracker¬Æ Monitor which make your bed a smart bed. The Sleeptracker¬Æ system is the first cloud-based, non-invasive IoT sleep optimization solution powered by artificial intelligence (AI) and integrated into the smart home.

The app provides detailed daily sleep graphs and sleep metrics derived from accurately and continuously monitoring the sleeper‚Äôs respiration rate, heart rate, and movements throughout the night. Easy-to-understand sleep graphs visually distinguish between periods when you were in REM sleep, light sleep, deep sleep, or awake. The AI Sleep Coach delivers personalized tips and insights to help you improve your sleep every night.

AI SLEEP COACH
The AI Sleep Coach, powered by the Sleeptracker¬Æ Artificial Intelligence Engine, provides effective, easy-to-implement, personal sleep tips based on a comprehensive analysis of individual sleep patterns.

RESPIRATION AND HEART RATE MONITORING
The Sleeptracker¬Æ system monitors both respiration and heart rate accurately through the night for deeper sleep analysis, with your data displayed as easy to read charts in the app.

SLEEP CYCLE ALARM
Optionally select white noise that gently fades away after you've fallen asleep, then set a sleep cycle alarm that will help you Wake Up at the Optimal Time‚Ñ¢ in your sleep cycle so you wake up refreshed and more energized.

AUTOMATIC SLEEP MONITORING
If you choose to record your sleep automatically, there‚Äôs nothing to do and nothing to wear. Optionally receive a notification in the morning when your sleep results are available and a daily email with your sleep summary and AI Coach insights.

GOOGLE FIT
Share your Sleeptracker¬Æ sleep data to the Google Fit app.

The Sleeptracker¬Æ system reports the following sleep-related statistics each night:
- REM sleep, light sleep, deep sleep, awake time
- Time at which you fell asleep and woke up
- Number of times awoken during the night
- Continuous respiration rate
- Continuous heart rate
- Sleep score (scale of 0-100)
- Sleep efficiency (time spent in bed vs. total time asleep)
- Time it took you to fall asleep

This is also the companion app for Sleeptracker¬Æ smart beds by Simmons¬Æ and Serta¬Æ including Beautyrest¬Æ SmartMotion‚Ñ¢ and Serta¬Æ SleepGPS‚Ñ¢ adjustable bases.

Sleeptracker¬Æ Premium Advanced Subscription Available:
1-year subscription - $29.99 (automatically renewed until canceled)
1-month Free Trial

A subscription to Sleeptracker¬Æ Premium Advanced gives you unlimited cloud-based sleep data storage, personalized sleep coaching, and advanced sleep analysis reports.

Subscription automatic-renewal feature:
Your subscription will be charged to your Play Store account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off. You can manage your subscription or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your Play Store Account Settings after purchase. Current subscriptions may not be canceled during the active subscription period. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars.

Terms of Use:
https://www.fullpower.com/home/terms-of-use

Privacy Policy:
https://www.fullpower.com/home/privacy-policy

Optimizations

comments: It's fun to see our sleep score each day, and helpful to have the app tell me what time I went to bed and what time I got up. I also like seeing the quality of my sleep. Sometimes it gets my times confused with my husband's bedtime and wake time, though

I have always been such a restless sleeper, and wake up so many times a night. But since I've been using the SleepTracker Monitor (over 2 years now), I've been able to see how much Light sleep, REM, Deep Sleep, and how much time awake on any given night. This helped immensely, because I was able to think about what I did differently the day before I sleep poorly - and adjust my lifestyle so I could get a good nights sleep. I don't have to wear anything, just keep it under my mattress, and it so amazingly accurate. By the way, their Customer Service is also outstanding, and so responsive.

If you want help that leads you to more restful and healthier sleep, then this is what you need. Period. The app is no nonsense and the support is spot on every time. Just do it. Revised 9/17/20 The more I use my device and software interactively the better I sleep. If you seek a good result it is essential to work with the results. If your tracker or app is faulty SLEEPTRACKER SUPPORT will get it going without question. Have a good sleep!

We got the Sleep Tracker Monitor free with our purchase of a Beautyrest mattress. After positioning the sensors as directed and setting up my profile in the app, nada. Apparently I don't exist according to the Sleep Tracker. The app itself seems fine - it's the actual tracker monitor that doesn't seem to register my existence in the bed, only my husband. Glad I didn't waste money on it.

Is impressively accurate for a device that is under a 20 inches mattress. I wanted to improve my rest and decided to give a shot for the Sleeptracker that came with my new mattress and adjustable bed. I was surprised, very good. Good way to keep accountability for good sleep habits. Enjoy!

title: Rain Rain Sleep Sounds
description:
Trouble sleeping? Rain Rain¬Æ Sleep Sounds helps you fall asleep fast! Let dozens of high-quality endless sounds lull you to sleep in no time. Heavy rain, light rain, rain on a tin roof - not to mention a huge variety of non-rain sounds, too, like ocean waves, crackling fireplace, cat purring, Shih Tzu Snoring, washing machine, clothes dryer... even a ticking clock! Includes any sound for sleeping that you can think of, and some that you can't. Millions of people have found the sleep they have been looking for with Rain Rain and you can too. 

‚Ä¢ Highest quality sounds available
‚Ä¢ Combine sounds to create elaborate mixes
‚Ä¢ Easily save your favorite sounds & mixes 
‚Ä¢ Play all night, or use the Fade-out Timer to turn off the sounds after a duration of your choosing
‚Ä¢ Set the Bedtime Reminder for gentle encouragement when it's time to wind down for bed

Rain Rain includes 35 totally free sounds, and 60+ additional Premium Sounds, available with a subscription to Rain Rain Premium. The Mixer, Favorites, Sleep Timer, Bedtime Reminder, and any sound without the "Premium" icon are all available forever without a subscription. You can also preview any Premium Sound without subscribing. Plus, Rain Rain Premium has a one-week free trial once you subscribe. 

Install Rain Rain today and sleep better tonight!

recentChanges:
Rain Rain 4 is here!
- Audio playback is much more stable and won't turn off until you turn it off
- Rain Rain now shows up in the Notification center while playing so you can easily turn it off from outside the app

help@rainrainapp.com
comments: I absolutely love this app. I have used it a few years now and it helps with my anxiety and sleep issues. Within minutes of being on, I am passed out and finally can get some restful sleep. Its great that you can create your own mix of favorite sounds. Since creating the premium version, I do feel some of the regular options a little limited. But for free, I feel like you get a lot of choices, esp with mixes, and a great product.

Excellent. The iOS version admittedly has more features, but this is still great. The ONE thing I wish you could bring from iOS is the ability to induvidually control the volume of each sound as opposed to having it all connected to the phone's volume. Sometimes the rain noises overpower the music I am trying to listen to :( But seriously, its all great.

This app has gone downhill, it used to be good now it's just terrible. After the timer runs out, you can't restart it no matter what you do. Llately it just shuts off after 10 minutes, when it's set for 2 hours. The sounds are more lifelike than other apps, but this thing is so buggy it's not worth it. If you wake up in the middle of the night, and the timer has run out, good luck getting it to work again. No matter how many times I close the app or turn off my phone, it won't come back on.

This app has failed to fulfill it's primary goal and purpose. What good is a app designed for those who need and want sleep? If they are left frustrated each time they use the app. The number of reoccurring ads is enough by itself, but the ones that block the functionality of the app are definitely the worst. The app does not work smoothly and when you encounter a full page ad more likely than not you will need to start the process all over again and again. The ultimate lnsult is the price!!

Updating my review. Love the great variety of sounds and sound quality. The price for a premium subscription is too much. I respect the developer needs to make money but perhaps a once of reasonable price would be ok. Sorry cannot justify a price subscription though.

description:
Relax your body & mind with the beautiful high quality rain sounds. We have carefully selected different rain types that are perfect for relaxation or sleeping. You will enjoy this app whether you like thunderstorm, gentle rain or calming beach. You can even customize the sounds as you like!

Thanks for updating to the latest version of Rain Sounds! As always, we are grateful for your continued interest and support.

This update includes:

Sit-back, relax, and enjoy the latest Rain Sounds! Questions, issues or feedback? Drop us a line at hello.relaxio+rain.sounds@gmail.com and we‚Äôd be happy to help.
comments: This used to be a great app. Now, not so much. The ad saturation has gotten ridiculous and occasionally the ad engine causes it to randomly stop working. This morning when attempting to launch the app, it played a 30s unskippable ad that was _extremely_ loud and I had to frantically kill the volume. Thanks for pissing off my wife, one of few things I don't need help with. After this, I could not get it to properly launch without restarting it. I'm not going to pay $32/year for the "pro" version.

This is EASILY the best rain sounds app in the Play Store in my opinion. There is a good variety of rain types and the sound quality (in terms of audio and REALISM) is spot on. I really like "Calm beach", "Rain on window" and "Thunder storm" in particular... they just sound so real (especially wearing headphones). I don't know why others are complaining about Ads. Turn off data to negate that problem and the app still works flawlessly (so don't just 1 star bomb this app for that little reason).

This app was fantastic until the loud 30 second ads were implemented. When you're struggling to sleep and open the app to extend your sleep timer or choose another rain sound, you're going to wake up anyone else in the room first with a surprise high volume ad. Very disappointing.

I really appreciate the ability to add, and adjust music, nature, and animal sounds in volume! Every rain sound does come with preset animal or nature sounds (ex: birds w/frogs, seagulls, songbirds, campfire, wind, waves) for the most realistic setting. Which you can removed if you desire to layer the sounds that relax you best. It's always worked great for me to sleep!üëçüëç
I have used this app for the last year as a sleep aid during a stressful time in my life. It is absolutely wonderful! Such a peaceful and relaxing choice of customizable rain sounds. Just amazing!!!

title: Zen: Relax, Meditate & Sleep
description:
If you want to live a happier, healthier and more balanced emotional life, Zen is the perfect app for you. On Google's list of 'Best apps of 2016', Zen offers a diverse and ever-growing amount of content and features, such as: 

¬∑ Weekly new Guided Meditations for relaxation, deep sleep, mood improvement, anxiety relief, stress reduction, focus at work and much more.  

¬∑ Audios and videos for relaxation and meditation. 

¬∑ Deep sleep music and morning music for positive energy.

¬∑ Binaural beats therapy with frequencies for better sex, chakra healing, endorphin release, intelligence boost, mood elevation, among many others. 

¬∑ ASMR audios for mental massage, relaxation and deep sleep.  

¬∑ A unique mood monitoring feature allowing our users to keep track of their emotional status.

¬∑ Reflections and inspirational quotes, proverbs and motivation messages.

ALL CONTENT AND FEATURES ARE AVAILABLE IN ENGLISH, SPANISH AND PORTUGUESE.

comments: Love this app! It has a lot of options as to what you want to be guided on. I really like the 7 day and 21 day challenges to keep me focused on one thing for a longer period of time. They also have meditations that are different lengths so there is something for everyone. Also I love waking up to the positive daily quotes.

This app doesn't even give you to try anything for free you need to first get the paid subscription before even testing it out. Developers of this app should first give atleast something to try and test for free and then they can get to the paid subscription part. Totally wasted my time guys don't try out this app
Only few meditations available and also lacks a very important feature: control of the voice volume over the background. I see this feature like a very basic one for any meditation app.
Great meditations! My son and I use it every morning. He's 7 with ADD and it does wonders!
Amazing app, the best for variety. So many options to choose from.

title: Sleep Orbit: Relaxing 3D Sounds, White Noise & Fan
description:
Choose from over 100 unique relaxing sounds in various categories including ocean waves, rain, animals, water, nature, haircuts, whispering, music instruments, and more. Each sound is professionally recorded in high-quality to create the perfect combination of ASMR sounds.

Mix and match as many sleep sounds together as you like. Sit back and relax as the sounds orbit around your head randomly or you can take control as you like.

Key Features:
‚Ä¢ High-quality professionally recorded audio and voice actors used
‚Ä¢ Over 100 different sounds
‚Ä¢ 17 unique sounds categories
‚Ä¢ Usable offline
‚Ä¢ Intuitive binaural controls that let you listen to each sound from any direction
‚Ä¢ Add as many sounds together to create a layered mix
‚Ä¢ Create different mixes that automatically save changes
‚Ä¢ Shutdown timer that will fade out the sounds after a set time and then turn off to save battery
‚Ä¢ Many different themes including dynamic themes of scenic views
‚Ä¢ Import your own audio

How to Use:
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ The sounds will start orbiting around your head and change directions randomly. With your headphones on you will be able to listen to where the sounds come from. If the sound is left or right of the head on the screen that is where you will hear it coming from. You will also be able to hear if the sound is in front or below you.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ If you would like you can disable the random orbits in the options and then they will continue in the direction they are currently going. You can swipe in the desired direction to change it.



‚Ä¢   White noise and tapping noises can help drown out the outside world helping you fall to sleep faster. New pink noise and brown noises have been added also.

‚Ä¢   Whispered positive affirmations will improve confidence and help stress relief and anxiety relief.

‚Ä¢   Induce lucid dreaming with repeated whispered reality checks including, "mind awake, body asleep".

‚Ä¢   Ambient sounds and relaxing music can create the perfect sleeping ambience.

‚Ä¢  With the use of white noise and other relaxing sleep sounds, tinnitus can be relieved.

‚Ä¢   Meditation music and relaxing melodies can help calm the nerves and is great as yoga music or for healing reiki.

‚Ä¢   Relaxing with nature sounds is a form of noise sound therapy.

‚Ä¢   Improving the quality of sleep is the number one increase to health. Sleep for at least 8 hours.

‚Ä¢   Experience ASMR with the use of true binaural audio ambiance including ASMR whisper. This is a true ASMR audio experience that puts the power in your own hands and creates tingles.

‚Ä¢   Focus in on peace and solitude with whispering guided relaxation from many different categories that will help stress reduction.

‚Ä¢   Soothing binaural audio helps creates a new ASMR sleep aid experience each time

‚Ä¢   This app can give the same experience as listening to a baby lullaby to gently take your newborn to rest

‚Ä¢   Fan noises for sleeping can be very useful, especially the oscillating fan or the other fan nose from air conditioner, the app includes these in different strength variations.

‚Ä¢   You can get a haircut as if you are in a virtual barber shop

‚Ä¢   Background category includes many varieties of White Noise and Fan Noise

‚Ä¢   Binaural Beats: these are special frequencies that are slightly different and you play one into each ear. This is a form of brainwave entrapment. When combined together they can help promote meditation and be a sleep aide by altering your brain waves. For best results, you want to set the binaural beats volume to be barely noticeable and they work great layered with other sounds. Isochronic tones are also available which produce similar results even though they don't require headphones.

Feedback and discussion community https://plus.google.com/communities/109160592537469160840
EULA: http://sleeporbit.net/EULA.html

comments: I downloaded the app long ago and it was amazing , but nowadays i redownloaded it , but it's not working , and the titles format and names are appearing e.g : to add sounds ( listpage.add ) , the main page name (mixespage.first) and so on , it was a great app and i hope to use it again , thanks a lot plz help a.s.a.p

So far so good. But is the fee $4.99 Forever (for real??)--& the ads stop?? Quite annoying if I'm asleep. Ugh! And why wont it play on both ear buds?? Hope it can work for me.... long time insomniac. I like the timer as well. Easy to operate...and can save sounds for different needs. Dig That!! üòä Nice App so far! Trisha~
The contents of the app are wonderful, but it crashes *constantly*. I have to restart it very often, once every five minutes or so. If not for that, this would've been a solid 5/5.

I love the app it's really customizable and helps me calm down. Definitely give it a try if you're looking for something to help you slow down and/or fall asleep. My only criticism is a small one, I find it a bit annoying how slippery the sleep timer select menu is. It takes more effort and precision than you'd think necessary to set your timer at 20 minutes for example because it often will just glide right over to 30. Maybe that's just a problem on my phone. Anyways, this app is great!

Exceeded My Expectations! Really impressive, very clear and understandable design. Even without paying, there are a lot of sounds to choose from and the detail you can put into your mixes is phenomenal! My favourite feature is that you can lock your phone and the sounds still play which allows me to save battery unlike on Yo*Tube haha. I hope that in the future you include a feature that allows the user to upload audio files they already have on their device and use them like the other sounds.

title: SnoreLab : Record Your Snoring
description:
- Monitoring over 1 million nights of snoring per month
- Measures how loud your snoring is and tracks it over time
- The worldwide No.1 app for snorers on iOS and Android

The most popular and innovative app of its kind, SnoreLab records, measures and tracks your snoring and helps you to discover effective ways to reduce it. 

SnoreLab has monitored more than 50 million nights of sleep and has helped millions of people to better understand or even eliminate their snoring problem.

The app is very easy to use: simply set SnoreLab running next to your bed whilst you sleep. In the morning you will discover your Snore Score, exactly when and how loudly you snored, and listen to some highlights!

SnoreLab lets you log and track lifestyle factors and any snoring remedies so you can see how they impact your snoring.

SnoreLab is attracting endorsements from doctors, dentists and users alike. The app can be useful in medical consultations when investigating sleep disorders such as sleep apnea.

Are you a room shaker or a snorter? A buzz saw or a whistler? Or do you just purr like a kitten? Discover the truth with SnoreLab! What's your Snore Score?

FEATURES: 
‚ñ∑ Advanced snore detection algorithms 
‚ñ∑ Records sound samples of your snoring 
‚ñ∑ Measures snoring intensity (Snore Score)
‚ñ∑ Compares snoring across nights
‚ñ∑ Tests the effectiveness of any snoring remedies that you use
‚ñ∑ Measures the impact of factors such as drinking alcohol on your snoring 
‚ñ∑ Records sleep statistics 
‚ñ∑ Optional full-night recording mode
‚ñ∑ Email sound files 
‚ñ∑ Provides information about snoring remedies 
‚ñ∑ Easy to use, no calibration needed

comments: The app works at what it's supposed to do. Be careful if you have an OLED display, it will n o t let your screen turn off on its own if you leave the app running. I woke up after 10hrs to find that my screen had been on the entire time. Should really fix that...
Almost useless unless you want to pay the subscription fee. You can't see more than 3 nights' worth of data, and after 10 nights, you can only use it every other night.

The app needs to include music designed to relax you not just sound effects. Variation to the sound effects also needs to occur to offer your customers variety. If that was added to the app it would have 5 stars.

I paid for this app and it worked perfectly, then the COVID came and I had to drop all unnecessary payments. Tried this again last night, it made me watch an ad to be able to start a session, then i woke up this morning and it shows me the whole recorded night but it only lets me listen to me waking up. If i want to listen to the actual sleep from earlier in the night I have to buy the app. So if you want to test this before you buy it, you can't. Not worth the monthly payment anyway.

When I first got the app it recorded everything alright, but now when I place my phone in the same location and position it no longer picks up snoring noises, but will pick up noises of me rolling over in bed extremely loudly

title: White Noise & Deep Sleep Sounds - Fan & Baby Sleep
description:
Say goodbye to sleepless nights and fussy babies. White Noise and Deep Sleep Sounds will lull you or your child to sleep with calming and relaxing sounds. Download the app today and sleep like a baby tonight!

White Noise and Deep Sleep Sounds helps ADULTS sleep by:
 -  Blocking out unwanted noises
 -  Forming a sleep association that cues you to fall asleep
 -  Helping you feel calm, relaxed and soothed.

White Noise and Deep Sleep Sounds helps BABIES sleep by:
 -   Providing ‚Äúwhooshy‚Äù noises that simulate the environment of the womb
 -   Forming a sleep association that cues your baby to fall asleep
 -   Engaging your baby‚Äôs calming reflex allowing baby to sleep longer
 -   Blocking outside noises that may wake your baby
 -   Creating a familiar routine that will help baby feel safe even in new surroundings.

White Noise and Deep Sleep Sounds help you STUDY and FOCUS by:
 -  Improving your focus and boosting your creativity by preventing outside distractions while forming a cocoon of concentration.
 -  Create a pleasant and zen like environment for meditation.

Try the ‚Äúmagic‚Äù app that has people saying goodbye to that third cup of coffee and hello to sweet dreams! With over 25 soothing sounds "White Noise and Deep Sleep Sounds" is better than an actual sound machine. Our sounds are professionally recorded to add the perfect background noise or ambience to your bedroom or nursery. Don't bother lugging an actual sound machine when all you need is your phone or tablet.

comments: Awesome! This app has put me to sleep many times, with a wide variety of choice! Even better, even though there is a premium version, it doesn't shove it in front of your face every two seconds, and I can even have it playing in the background or when my phone's screen is dormant. This is a totally great app, and I highly recommend it!

I have enjoyed this app. I have tried many of the free sleep apps. This one offers plenty of free options with less ads then others. I also cannot detect any repetition or glitches which is super important--I'll lose focus in my reading or wake up. I use the sounds for both sleeping and reading focus.

I simply can not function without white noise. I've used a fan in my room for decades. There were years where I used 2 fans for the extra white noise. Without white noise I am unable to do the simplest things like using a tablet to write reviews on apps, watch television, to walk across the room, even to breathe. Forget about sex! This app is the panacea to all of humanity's problems and even to problems I didn't know I had. This app brought me back to life and solved centuries of problems.

A must app to have. Since using my sleep has improved massively. Also a great noise blocker for those who may need it. I love this app and have it going all night with minimal impact to my devices battery life. If you struggle to get sleep, you must try this.

Used it for over a year. I use the "air cabin" noise because it sounds the most natural to block out other background noise. Your brain gets used to it quick. Ive used it to block out the sound of my housemates and its massively improved my sleep.

comments: This app is great and very useful but there are some problems with it. 1) You can't download the tracks ane save them offline so I can't use it at night when I'd rather turn off the data or wifi when I'm sleeping. 2) After the first track plays, the second one autoplays. There should be an option to stop the app when the track you picked is done playing. There shoul also be a timer so you can decide when the music shoukd stop. Please please fix this soon. Ty.

By far the best of its kind that I've found. NOT JUST FOR SLEEP! Has options for MORNING music, nature sounds, Asian instrumental music, etc. It also has a section dedicated to mindfulness and meditation. If you choose, it will play in the background while you're using other apps! Minimal ads that you can instantly "X" out of. NO ads during hour(s) long music sessions. Offline mode would be nice üòä. Please name the app the same on Google Play as it appears on the screen icon and inside the app.

So far so good. I used this app to fall back asleep two different times last night and it worked perfectly. I set it to play through the list of relaxation songs which takes about 20ish minutes. It was still playing when I fell asleep but when I woke up in the middle of the night it was off. Like I said; I did this twice. I haven't played with the other features yet but if they also work as described I say this app is a real winner!

It sooo calming that you could do it when your : relaxing, sleeping, basically any were I think but I like to do it when I'm sleeping and no ads at all not even one . I üòç it I give it a 100 persinte and I'd rate it five. Sooooo fun I don't care I üòç it! lol

I love this app! So many different types of music and sounds to listen to. I use them either too help me get to sleep or just to relax and chill out. I especially enjoy listening to the Italian music, most of which I grew up with. The only downside to it, is that there isn't a timer so that it can switch off automatically after you've fallen asleep.

comments: This is a great sound generation app, lots of in built options, you can play multiple sounds at once, save sets of sounds to presets, set individual volumes for sounds, etc. If the devs are reading this, a suggestion for a new feature would be a configurable timer after which the sounds stop playing, sometimes I like to fall asleep to sounds and don't necessarily need them to play all night

This app is truly a gem, probably my all time favorite. It's great for aiding sleep and meditation. Only problem is a couple of the effects that I love stopped working a few months ago (second of the singing bowls and windchimes). Hopefully they'll resolve this but besides that this is the elite of free apps.

A tool to alleviate symptoms of depression. Listening to these sounds not only help me sleep, they help me focus throughout the day. Part meditative and part white noise, using the differnt sounds either individually or in combination is delightful. A fantastic app that has helped me through anxious moments and evened iut my energy to be more focused.

So I finally pegged down the problem. If you quit the app whole a sound is playing, it will play endlessly until you force quit the app, which in turn messes up the sounds when you go back in. It all seems to stem from sounds not stopping after closing (not switching) the app.

Love this App.... its free and perfect. Puts us right to sleep and so relaxing. The thunderstorm sounds actually helped my Dog with his fear of thunder and storms. He snores right through a real storm now as well as when I play the app before bed.

title: Aura: Meditations, Sleep & Mindfulness
description:
Aura is the world's most loved mindfulness app, with thousands of meditations to relieve stress, anxiety, improve sleep, relax and more - personalized just for you.

Featured on: Forbes, The Oprah Magazine, The New York Times, Women‚Äôs & Men‚Äôs Health, and more!

Aura is the ultimate & personalized meditation and mindfulness app. With Aura, you have unlimited access to meditations (guided and unguided), life coaching, and stories from top coaches and therapists around the world.

Here are a few reasons why our community of 5 million loves Aura!

Access a massive soundtrack library
We‚Äôre proud of having one of the world‚Äôs largest & most diverse libraries of meditation content.

Enjoy thousands of meditations, stories and life coaching from top mindfulness and life coaches around the world. We feature diverse perspectives, voices, and teachings so you find the best fit for you.

Only 3 minutes a day
With Aura, it‚Äôs easy to create a daily, simple habit of self-care. Relax, become more mindful and reap the benefits in just 3 minutes a day. We‚Äôll send you meditation reminders to help you create a new, healthy habit - if you want us to!

Improve your sleep
Aura features meditations for sleep, as well as sleep stories, music and sounds to help with insomnia.

Proven to reduce stress and anxiety
 A perfect wellness coach for beginners who want to learn how to meditate, especially for stress and anxiety relief

Personalized meditations
When you use the app and rate your experience, Aura will learn more about you to provide more relevant, personalized suggestions for next time. Aura has the world's most advanced personalization engine powered by the latest research in machine learning.

Meditation for every situation
Aura has a huge collection of meditations, divided into categories such as sleep, anxiety, happiness, parenting, morning and more!
We have meditations and coaching lessons for everybody, no matter your goals.

Meditation & mindfulness for beginners
Aura has plenty of content for you, whether you‚Äôre experienced or brand new looking for an app to help you learn how to meditate.

Gratitude journal
Self-reflection and gratitude has profound benefits on your wellbeing and overall outlook on life. Try writing down some things you‚Äôre grateful for each day in the journal!

Track & improve your mood
Become more aware of your mood and emotions with our mood tracker. Learn about your mood patterns and visually see yourself improve over time.

Nature & relaxation sounds
Whether you need to take a moment to relax during the day, or you want some nature sounds to help you sleep ‚Äì listen to thunder, rain, forest sounds and more.

Unguided meditations
We have a library of meditation music, hypnosis and unguided meditations complete with handy timer!

Try 7-days completely free! 
Aura is free for everybody ‚Äì you get a free 3 minute session every 2 hours, every day. A premium subscription is available for users who want unlimited access to Aura‚Äôs content.

Transform your daily wellbeing, emotional health, and sleep with Aura today. Become your calm, grounded, resilient self with the world's best mindfulness meditations and stories.

We're here to support you at hello@aurahealth.io.

Become more aware of your mood and emotions with our mood tracker. Learn about your mood patterns and visually see yourself improve over time.

Nature & relaxation sounds
Whether you need to take a moment to relax during the day, or you want some nature sounds to help you sleep ‚Äì listen to thunder, rain, forest sounds and more.

Unguided meditations
We have a library of meditation music, hypnosis and unguided meditations complete with handy timer!

Try 7-days completely free!
Aura is free for everybody ‚Äì you get a free 3 minute session every 2 hours, every day. A premium subscription is available for users who want unlimited access to Aura‚Äôs content.

Transform your daily wellbeing, emotional health, and sleep with Aura today. Become your calm, grounded, resilient self with the world's best mindfulness meditations and stories.

We're here to support you at hello@aurahealth.io.
summary: 1000s of Meditations from world's best coaches. Relax, sleep & reduce anxiety!
developerAddress:
2 Embarcadero Center, Fl 8
San Francisco, CA 94111
recentChanges: Aura, completely redesigned, faster, and more reliable! Update now to try the next-generation Aura for Android.
comments: I love this app i downloaded it during the start of lockdown and im hooked 6 months down the line! I meditate daily and have meditations for just about everything. Its so easy to use. As someone whos never meditated before now they have all different kinds of meditations...anyone can do It!! Its improving my sleep habits and great for anxiety and changing the way I look at Things!! Thank you Aura!!

Very easy to use, would recommend for beginners. Gives excellent recommendations based on your needs and feelings. Absolutely enjoy the meditations. Oh and a plus it's there's no pressure to buy anything extra.

Literally just started using this app. I'm really enjoying it and feeling the benefits from the content already. This is very well thought out. It's the next best thing to working directly with a great meditation teacher or life coach.

I really like it, it's a quick pick me up, as well, just by going on it, every time I feel I'm struggling with my emotions, I distract myself even before I decide what to listen to. I think it's really good app.

This is a great app. It's exactly what I needed. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is that, to truly enjoy the app, you have to pay $76.99/year CAD. For some it might be worth it, for others not so much. This app is the best pay to use meditation app I've found so far. Well worth it if you are able to afford it. Its free version, however, is very limited compared to its paid version.

title: Sleep Time - Cycle Alarm Timer
description:
It is recommended to wake up at the end of a sleep cycle. Sleep Time helps you to calculate when to wake up or fall asleep to sleep efficiently and wake up feeling great.

Features:

- Simple material design build for speed and efficiency
- Calculate when to wake up if you go to sleep now or at a certain time
- Calculate when to sleep if you want to wake up at a time
- Notifications for when to wake up or go to sleep
- Factor in time to fall asleep in calculations

If you have any feedback or bug report, please contact me using Feedback tab in the app drawer.

summary: Sleep Efficiently
recentChanges:
- Fix sleep notifications not working on some devices
- Removed ads
- Added donation option
comments: Kind of helped to improve my sleep and I sometimes feel fit when I wake up but I got one problem: even though there is a 30 min gap, if I go to sleep at the wrong time I can't wake up at all. So I need to calculate first to make sure that my REM phase will be in that 30 mins. Would be nice if you could add a feature where you also tell me when to go to sleep. Or if I could tell the app to wake me up in a larger gap (for example 90 min) so that it wakes me up at my REM phase. Thank you

Since using this app, I have definitely noticed a difference in my sleep. I wake up feeling energized, refreshed, and less cloudy in the mornings. I love how it adds the amount of time it takes for me to go to sleep within the sleep cycle calculation. This app also sets an alarm directly to the default alarm app on my phone at the press of a button. There are no ads and it has a simple, easy to follow format. This app was definitely worth the download! Loved it!

It does what it's supposed to. No ads at all. Everything is customizable and looks clean. Alarm itself is automatically added/handled in your phone's default clock app which I like. Thanks to the dev. for making this free app have a premium feel. Highly recommended, can't hurt to try it out.
Incredibly useful, easy to understand and allows you to make a wake up alarm from the app itself

I cannot thank you enouph. I have imsomnia and when I manage to sleep i find it really hard to actually get up on my alarm, as my body wants more sleep. So when I found your app, I can hae my chromebook open ready to blast a song, so when I have to turn my alarm that wakes me up off, I have to get my laptop now; thus making me get out of bed! I had some problems with bad interfact though, add more laptop support and you have my Double cosign!

title: Sleep Aid Fan - White Noise Fan Background Sounds
description:
Do you need fan noise to fall asleep? Do you want better sleep to help manage your busy life? How about having more energy for your family? 

Bring fan noise with you wherever you go for better sleep with this FREE app! 

Fan white noise helps you fall asleep faster, relieve stress, get higher quality sleep and wake up with more energy. Rest and relax with this soft and peaceful audio. 

Sleep Aid Fan offers:
- 3 different high quality soothing fan noises 
- Adjustable volume and built in timer
- No background noise, just constant, smooth fan sounds
- Easy and simple to use sleep aid for when you are tired
- Ambient sound that runs in the background
- Helps alleviate insomnia and restlessness

Great for sleeping, relaxing, taking a nap, focusing, calming your mind, meditation, studying, blocking out background noise and providing soothing sound for your baby. 

When it‚Äôs bed time, get a better night‚Äòs sleep. Download now for FREE!

***Please note that the app only plays white noise and does not blow actual air ;)

recentChanges:
Introducing Sleep Aid Fan PRO!
- New PRO upgrade includes 5 new fan sounds, no ads and it remembers the last noise you used!
- Bug fixes, including fixing issues with the sound stopping during the night

comments: I was pleased with the volume. Other apps just aren't loud enough on my stylo 2. One of the best apps to block out sounds but could use alternative sounds also. One problem happens after app is off. It turns itself on for no apparent reason. Three times in one morning. I was in a meeting when this occurred. Very embarrassing. Any important places i go to - i will erase app and reinstall when needed until it gets fixed.

I use it when I am away from home for white noise when I sleep.It works great. It is so much easier then taking a fan when away from home. I also use it when I am staying at hunting camp. I throw in some ear buds and I have the white noise I need and I don't have to hear my buddies snore. I am not sure what they do about my snoring though..üòÜ

This is a good app for using as a noise generator. I use it when sleeping in hotels. However, the most recent time I have used it (Oct 2020) there is a problem where you can't close the app. And even if you set the volume to off it will still randomly start generating noise. Therefore I have had to start uninstalling the app in the morning and reinstalling it before I go to bed. Which of I used it more often would lead me to finding another app.

THE BEST. Customizable white noise fan noise. Does not turn off randomly (make sure you add the app to your system settings to "disable battery optimization" and "apps to never put to sleep"). In Sleep Aid Fan I set a time limit to have it turn off before my alarm clock ‚è∞. Great app thank you!

I used to like this app a lot, but suddenly the white noise abruptly stops about 2 seconds before my alarm starts going off and its very jarring. Then, when you turn the alarm off and unlock the screen, the white noise starts again. Please put it back to the way it was where it played through the alarm and you turn it off after.

title: Insight Timer - Meditation, Sleep, Music
description:
* Apps of the Year Winner - TIME magazine and Womens Health *
* More time is spent meditating on Insight Timer than all other meditation apps *
* Happiest App in the World - Tristan Harris *

The number 1 free meditation app. Guided meditations and talks led by the world's top meditation and mindfulness experts, neuroscientists, psychologists and teachers from Stanford, Harvard, the University of Oxford and more. Music tracks from world-renowned artists. Join millions learning to meditate on Insight Timer to help calm the mind, reduce anxiety, manage stress, sleep deeply and improve happiness.

With 100+ new free guided meditations added daily, more meditation is practiced on Insight Timer than anywhere else. Great for both beginners and experienced practitioners.

FREE FEATURES:
* 75,000+  guided meditations
* Select by time for short meditations when on the go, helping you to build a simple daily habit
* Thousands of music tracks and ambient sounds to calm the mind, focus, sleep better and relax
* The world's most popular meditation Timer
* Follow your favourite teachers
* Thousands of discussion groups and community features
* Stats and milestones for tracking your progress

Browse popular topics including:
* Sleep deeply 
* Dealing with Anxiety and Reducing Stress
* Getting through Recovery and Addictions
* Self-love and Compassion
* Focus and Concentration
* Leadership 
* Better Relationships
* Loving-Kindness
* And much more..

Pages dedicated to:
* Sleep  - Free music tracks and stories to help you get a better night's sleep
* Music - Music tracks to help you disconnect and drift away
* Kids - Mindfulness for kids
* Beginners - Sleep, Anxiety, Work, Relationships, Self - Esteem and Stress
* Talks - Talks, Interviews and ideas

Join 8000+ leading meditation teachers, musicians and sleep experts.

Practice the following meditation types:
* Secular Mindfulness
* Mindful Sleep
* Buddhist Mindfulness
* Zen
* Insight Meditation
* Vipassana
* MBSR
* Walking Meditation
* Breathing Meditation
* Kundalini Yoga
* Metta
* Advaita Vedanta
* And many more..

Join community groups for:
* Beginners Meditation
* Sleep Meditation
* Poetry
* Atheism
* Christianity
* Hinduism
* Transcendental Meditation
* And many more..

PAID FEATURE - INSIGHT PREMIUM MEDITATION

We have one optional in-app subscription.

* Courses - Handpicked courses to help you sleep better, feel happier and less stressed
* Listen offline (Listen to meditations music and sleep tracks offline)
* Advanced Player (Repeat mode, Fast forward and Rewind, Pick-up where you left off)
* Sleep mode - Once the track is finished and you‚Äôre asleep we‚Äôll lock your device
* High Quality audio

Let us help
Support: https://help.insighttimer.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Questions: please send an email help@insight.co (not .com).
Privacy Policy: https://insighttimer.com/privacypolicy
T&Cs: https://insighttimer.com/terms

comments: although the free version has plenty of options it is extremely difficult to find them. it makes it seem almost as if you have to pay for it as soon as you open the app. I almost just straight up deleted it instead of trying it out or exploring it. The only reason why I explored it further was because my therapist reassured me it was free. and I do indeed enjoy it just would like it to be more user-friendly

Every update hides the free features more and pushes you even further to purchase the yearly subscription. I love using this app but I get more and more frustrated at the difficulty of using it. The new UI is clunky and annoying, and even though it's my favorite meditation app, I recommend it less with every update. This is especially problematic for emergencies like panic attacks.

New update messed it all up. Loved it before, now not much I have been subscribed for about 8 months and using it daily several times...now new update messed it all up. Of course they updated it and made me adapt...darn...lol I love this app. Back to 6 stars. ADDED. I've noticed if I leave it running all day when not using it...it eats my battery, so remember to turn it off after use.

Correction 10/2020: I still love the app and still use it, but last update caused me so much frustration. My most used filters are gone: "most listened" and "only misic".Please please return these . This is my most important app! I use it every day for almost 4 years and it's only getting better and better! Absolutely essential for both those, who are just starting the meditation practice and those, who already have one. This app contains an amazing variety of all possible meditation practices.

pLEASe update the keyboard in your app. I cannot use predictive or emojis since your last update. Not happyüò† I have been using this app now for about 2 months. I was told about it from my yoga instructor and I love how much free content and huge selection there is. I do wish you could search emotions using your own words, not their preselected words. But this app has so much variety and it's free!! ‚ù§Ô∏è Last update in October 28, has messed up sending messages "thank you for mediating with me"

summary: Feel better in 5 minutes
recentChanges:
- Improved app performance
- Bug fixes
comments: Love this app. I could be better at using it every day. But, even just using when I feel it's needed always helps calm my mind. If you are into meditation and bettering your mind and calming your body, it helps me do that. I like the Cory guy the best, he does a 31 day starting course. Helps with the foundations a bit. He just seems like a really happy and genuine person. Actually all the instructors do. Only downfall would be, they let you listen to one or two free sets of some courses then you need to pay to unlock the rest. Which I understand the point is to make money. There are plenty of free course. I have used over 6000 minutes of free courses.highly recommend.

I really like the meditations, but what really annoys me is that sometimes some meditations appear in my 'continue listening' section when I haven't even played them and there's no way to clear them from that section. I would really appreciate it if you fixed this issue. Thank you. Edit: it's the second time the app has deleted 'my playlist' (my saved meditations). It's so annoying. Please consider fixing these issues.

I've only just started yesterday. But I've used meditations occasionally in the past. The variety of options for what you're looking for is amazing, and the tutorial like Playlist is fantastic for learning the habits you need for all your meditations. I already feel 10x more relaxed and focused. I tried a sleep meditation last night that made me able to fall asleep in 5-10 minutes after instead of the usual 30+ minutes it usually takes me to fall asleep.

I have tried several meditation apps and I like this one the best thanks to the variety of "teachers" who all have different areas of expertise. On the downside, I have always been happy to pay for apps when they are worth the money but I think the price for the yearly subscription is too high compared to other similar apps.

the main page takes forever to load (if it loads at all) and the app keeps crashin almost all the time, and then gets stuck in a cycle where I can't re open it bc it crashes again sessions keep crashing/going back to main page in the middle of listening to a meditation, or don't even load from the beginning. Instead of working on bugs they just add more. Wouldn't recommend. Updated 2020, still no changes

title: Children's Bedtime Meditations for Sleep & Calm
description:
This superb high quality children's meditation app by Diviniti Publishing features a number of children's bedtime meditation stories by best selling children's audio authors Nic & Sam, Christiane Kerr, Glenn Harrold, Christiane Kerr, Lynda Hudson, Dr Elizabeth Scott, Heather Bestel and Jan Yoxall. 

The app includes 6 completely free children's bedtime meditations, plus many more kids mindfulness meditations available as in-app purchases. 

The app has meditations and mindfulness tracks for children of all ages and covers a range of themes to help your kids to sleep soundly at night. The topics include sleep, bedtime, mindfulness, general confidence, anxiety, stress, self esteem and more. The meditations can help kids with feeling of confidence and motivation at school, with peer pressure and fitting in with friends and to generally feel happier and more positive. The variety of styles and themes in this kids app make it the must have children's meditation app for all situations. We will be adding more high quality tracks covering specific themes often.

The recordings are always very professionally produced and they typically work by guiding children into a natural state of relaxation through a number of carefully scripted story meditations. Each meditation story has an underlay of dreamy and gentle music combined with a calming voice make them engaging and deeply relaxing. These recordings will help children to relax and enhance feelings of contentment and also help with general relaxation, or even (in the case of Christiane's tracks), as a teaching resource.

Children‚Äôs Bedtime Sleep Meditations Features:
‚Ä¢ 6 kids meditations to download and listen to completely free.
‚Ä¢ High quality professional recording techniques.
‚Ä¢ Calm reassuring voices safely guiding your kids into a completely relaxed state of mind & body. 
‚Ä¢ Soothing background sounds for children.
‚Ä¢ In-app purchases featuring many children's bedtime sleep meditations for boys and girls of all ages.
‚Ä¢ Children's Breathe Feature - prompting your kids to relax through their breath.

comments: My daughter and I both love this app for when we are struggling to get to sleep or are wakeful in the night. My daughter is 9 now but we have been using these meditations since she was a toddler. It's not just for kids either - as a shift worker my sleep patterns are all over the place, but a gentle familiar story with its soothing music can get me off to sleep when I need to.

I love his app, before i got this, i couldnt get to sleep at all. But now i have it im aslepp within minuites. This app is perfect for people who struggle to sleep at night. Its amazing. 10/10. One thing i would add. Though. Is that you could rewind the video while its paused. Otherwise, its a great app!

Used this with my daughter when she has some anxiety at bedtime (she is 8) and it helped alot! Thank you. Simple imaginative ideas like putting worries in a balloon and letting them float away along with muscle relaxation worked for her. We appreciate the effort that has gone into this app and it has helped. Thanks üôÇ

This app has several free bedtime relaxation/meditation recordings to choose from. Since it takes longer than a few minutes for my 7-year-old to sleep, we use the 15-minute one. He's asleep in 12 min - even me - if I listen! Earlier, I played bedtime story apps. My son would listen to a few of them (lasting at times 60+ minutes). Bedtime stories are great to listen to, but not to relax the mind. They keep a child up as s/he listens to the end and another begins.

Have I used it enough? Not Yet! But loving my first 2 sessions, with the kids. My kids love it. I highly recommend to any family that love to read to their kids. Life get so busy we often forget to unwind in that golden moment before bedtime. This App is great reminder to unwind xx

It is an incredibly app I love it . Also included are kids activities and stories in addition to brain training so many resources for guidance to a better day in many ways. I really enjoyed it besides my brother playing on the next room In short, it's been very useful. Thanks!

title: Sleeprate: Improve your sleep
description:
‚òÜImprove your sleep‚òÜ
How did you sleep last night?

Struggling with sleep is the new normal. Like you, almost half of the population can improve their well being by improving their sleep.

This first of its kind, complete mobile solution, contains professional grade features that will help you gain knowledge and control over that unconscious third of life

From nightly analysis, that includes sleep stages and snoring analysis, to a full sleep assessment summary, through a step by step personalized sleep improvement program rooted in CBTi,  Sleeprate is a one stop shop for improving your life through better sleep.

Sleeprate, Making a Difference in the World
====================
* In Jan 2019, Philips launched its partnership with Sleeprate to provide the "SmartSleep Better sleep program. Coming Soon. Learn more here: https://www.usa.philips.com/c-e/smartsleep.html#insomnia

* Awarded the "National Alliance of Healthcare Purchaser Coalitions‚Äô" by Aetna's MindCheck in 2017. Sleeprate is proud to have a part in showing the powerful impact of improving life through improved sleep.

Sleeprate Programs
==============
Is it important to sleep 8 hours? Why do I wake up feeling tired? 
We‚Äôre all different and so are our sleep needs! Sleeprate has a personalized solution for your individual sleep goal:

Free User Experience:
This is more than a sleep tracker, it allows you insight into your night. Understand the structure and quality of your sleep. Put to bed the argument on your partner snoring, with the snoring detection feature. When used with a compatible device see how your recollection aligns your actual sleep analysis.

Sleep Monitoring:
This is the plan for those who want to improve their daily performance by getting insights into their sleep. Unlock more features: * Sleep cycles ‚Äì sleep stages analysis. * Unlock sleep patterns over time. * Export your nightly data. * Up to 12 events of snoring and environmental noise detection. 
Pair with a compatible device (see below) to receive full sleep stages analysis, stress, recovery indexes and more. 
*Offered as a 1-year subscription.

Sleep Assessment:
Do you need to get more sleep? Find out from the comfort of your own bedroom! Track your sleep for 7 days, then receive an in-depth sleep report presented in an easy-to-understand format. It will include a detailed description of your sleep, identifying and explaining any issues that may be negatively affecting the quality or duration of your sleep.
*Includes a 1-year subscription for Sleep Monitoring.

Sleep Improvement Program:
Fall asleep faster, sleep through the night, and wake up refreshed, in short - reclaim your sleep.
This all-inclusive program begins with a Sleep Assessment. Knowledge is power, Sleeprate will help you uncover your exact sleep difficulties. Then, week by week the program will customize a behavioral goal aimed to retrain your sleep habits and take control of your nights. Rooted in the principles of CBTi, with content licensed from Stanford University, our sleep experts have created a program, that with your commitment, can lead you to sleeping better within 3 to 12 weeks.
*Includes a 1-year subscription for Sleep Monitoring.

Compatible Bluetooth Tracking Devices 
=============================
For the most accurate sleep measurement results, we recommend you use Sleeprate with a compatible heart rate or movement tracking device. 
Compatible tracking devices-
To receive sleep wake cycles:
‚Ä¢ Fitbit Wrist Band
‚Ä¢ Garmin Wearables
To receive a full heart rate analysis including stress and full sleep staging:
‚Ä¢ Polar H10
‚Ä¢ Polar H7
‚Ä¢ Suunto Smart Sensor
‚Ä¢ CardioSport HRM
‚Ä¢ Wahoo TICKR (except TICKR X)
‚Ä¢ Under Armour HRM
=============================

* Our users are our most valuable asset. If you have any feedback or questions, our support team is at your service. support@sleeprate.com

Start your journey to better sleep ‚Äì DOWNLOAD TODAY!

comments: My health insurance provider asked if I wanted to try this app.  I agreed as I never really thought about how I slept.  The app is easy to use.   The user interface is simple and repetitive.   I didn't use the alarm or diary.  I used the night tracker and recorder.  I was surprised with the results.  I was surprised that i) I snored sometimes but not constantly.  (I already had feedback on that from you know who).  and 2) I spoke sometimes at night. That was weird, really weird.  Overall, i was happy to learn my average sleep times, wake up times, etc.  The data helped me manage my down and up times to make sure I was indeed getting a good 7 to 8 hours of sleep per night.  And they something happened. I had to have deviated palette surgery along with some sinuplasty.  I had a massive infection too.  The causes are beyond this review.  However, was was interesting was to measure the results after the surgery.  WOW.  My snoring went down maybe 90%. I couldn't believe it.  My sleep was much more sound.  The surgery worked.  But I could only prove it worked by studying the results over time from this app.  It is a year later after the surgery and I still use the app.

Cool idea. I was interested because it allows me to connect my garmin. However, after waking it asks me to input how long it took to fall asleep, how long I woke during the night, and how the quality of sleep was. Why even connect to my garmin if I have to enter the information that it should be giving. Seems like a waste of time that I could make a diary of myself.

Highly recomend!!!!!!! I updated my rating due to your response. Your absolutely right that is important. This seams to be the most comprehensive sleep app I have found for the galaxy gear!!!!! Thank you for all the information Old review Great idea and seems to track well. Gave it 4 stars because I wish they had a free trial of their upgraded plan. I don't want to invest the money and it not be what I want. Also I wish it had an auto detect option like the Samsung health, so if I forget to start it, it still records anyways.

This app will change your sleep habits and make you more productive and less tired throughout your day. The tools and videos are easy to follow and the challenges get your sleep habits where they need to be. just follow the instructions for tracking your sleep and you will get a report that lets you know how your sleep is improving. you can also link the app to your fitness tracker for more tracking of habits and a more in depth report.

This app isn't remotely accurate. It presents a supposed analysis of your sleep every night, telling you how much time you spent in light sleep, deep sleep and REM. These numbers it indicates are unfounded and incorrect. I had a largely sleepless night, and got out of bed several times, yet the app indicated a perfectly calm night with lots of deep sleep and almost no time spent awake. Don't get to see my HR throughout the night, which was the primary reason I even tried the app.

title: Sleep Timer (Turn music off)
description:
Sleep Timer lets you fall asleep to your favorite music. You simply start your music, and then set the countdown timer. At the end of the countdown, Sleep Timer softly fades your music out and stops it. Allowing you to get your precious sleep and stops your battery from draining.

Listen to music while falling asleep
Sleep Timer softly lowers the volume and then turns your music off. It works just like a Sleep Timer on the stereo or TV.

Use your favorite music player or even YouTube!
Works with Google Play Music, TuneIn Radio, Spotify, YouTube and many many more. To verify whether it works with your favorite player, just download the app and try it out - it is free. 

Select how long you want the music to play
Our intuitive and beautiful user interface allows you to effortlessly set the duration of the timer and start it.

Create presets for your frequently used timers
With our presets, you can switch between standard timers with just one tap

Prevent your battery from draining
At the end of the timer, the music is stopped* to prevent your phone from playing music all night and draining the battery.

*For some apps, pausing the music does not work. In that case the phone volume will set to mute as a last resort. In this case, the music will continue playing.

Shake to extend timer
Sometimes falling asleep is not that easy. Our shake to extend allows you to shake the phone to extend the duration of the timer, without you having to unlock your phone.

Free version
The free version contains ads

Premium version (Available via in-app)
Ad-free
Beautiful Widget for your homescreen 

Please try it with your favorite player before buying.

Permissions
This application may request some permissions to work, such as:
- android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Using custom notification sounds for Shake Extend notification.
- android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN : This app uses the Device Administrator permission. This is required for the the "Turn screen off" feature. Will only be requested upon enabling the feature and will be removed as soon as the feature is disabled. If you want to uninstall while having the feature selected, open this application, click on [Menu] -> [Settings] -> [Uninstall].

You are welcome to join our beta forum, if you are interested in trying the newest Sleep Timer features before they are officially released. https://plus.google.com/communities/103722691842623837120

Developed by Patrick Boos - http://pboos.ch
Designed by Nordic Usability - http://nordicusability.com
descriptionHTML:
Sleep Timer lets you fall asleep to your favorite music. You simply start your music, and then set the countdown timer. At the end of the countdown, Sleep Timer softly fades your music out and stops it. Allowing you to get your precious sleep and stops your battery from draining.

Listen to music while falling asleep
Sleep Timer softly lowers the volume and then turns your music off. It works just like a Sleep Timer on the stereo or TV.

Use your favorite music player or even YouTube!
Works with Google Play Music, TuneIn Radio, Spotify, YouTube and many many more. To verify whether it works with your favorite player, just download the app and try it out - it is free.

Select how long you want the music to play
Our intuitive and beautiful user interface allows you to effortlessly set the duration of the timer and start it.

Create presets for your frequently used timers
With our presets, you can switch between standard timers with just one tap

Prevent your battery from draining
At the end of the timer, the music is stopped* to prevent your phone from playing music all night and draining the battery.

*For some apps, pausing the music does not work. In that case the phone volume will set to mute as a last resort. In this case, the music will continue playing.

Shake to extend timer
Sometimes falling asleep is not that easy. Our shake to extend allows you to shake the phone to extend the duration of the timer, without you having to unlock your phone.

Free version
The free version contains ads

Premium version (Available via in-app)
Ad-free
Beautiful Widget for your homescreen

Please try it with your favorite player before buying.

Permissions
This application may request some permissions to work, such as:
- android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Using custom notification sounds for Shake Extend notification.
- android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN : This app uses the Device Administrator permission. This is required for the the "Turn screen off" feature. Will only be requested upon enabling the feature and will be removed as soon as the feature is disabled. If you want to uninstall while having the feature selected, open this application, click on [Menu] -> [Settings] -> [Uninstall].

You are welcome to join our beta forum, if you are interested in trying the newest Sleep Timer features before they are officially released. https://plus.google.com/communities/103722691842623837120

Developed by Patrick Boos - http://pboos.ch
Designed by Nordic Usability - http://nordicusability.com

comments: I use this app a lot when I'm trying to sleep and i dont want my phone's battery to completely drain. it gives you about an hour, and when the timer is about to run out it slowly lowers the volume on your phone so that the music slowly fades out. it also has ads, but they're not really obstructive. i'd recommend this app if this isnwhat you're looking for!

It's pretty amazing until now, I've no reason to rate it below 5 stars,Best thing about this app is when the timer ends,the song doesn't stop suddenly,It actually descends the volume and then stops the song, Hope it'll work same way forever and will never show ads

This thing is great! I didn't feel like making a Tasker profile to do this so I gave this app a shot and wow it is fantastic! Not only does it control YouTube and YouTube Music but it also fade out volume before pausing the media. But it doesn't affect the volume settings at all so when you press play it is back to normal! That is such a cool feature! Anyway I recommend this it definitely does what it says it will do and it is an excellent sleep timer for your phone!

I've had this app for over a year now and it's helped me out so much by turning my phone off after I fell asleep cuz if I didn't my phone would be going all night and that would screw up my battery this app has definitely been a five-star to me.

Does what it says on the tin...without exception! You set the timer, choose your audio - music or, say podcast - then drift off to sleep. At the end of the time... it gently reduces the volume & shuts down. Saves the phone battery. Doesn't wake you up again. I use it almost daily

title: Baby Sleep üçº White noise lullabies for newborns
description:
This app is intended for babies and their parents. It helps babies to fall asleep instantly. Uses classic white noise sounds (lullabies) proven to be effective by generations of parents! They resemble the natural sounds of the womb and thus create a calming environment for the babies they are used to. 

Why is my baby crying?

Your baby is fed, has a clean nappy, no issues with colic, you were playing with your baby but still it is crying? The baby is probably too tired, but at the same time unable to fall asleep by itself. This is a common situation of newborns and a situation when Baby Sleep can help the most.

Sleep Baby helps your baby to fall asleep using classic monotonous low frequency sounds proven to be effective by generations of parents: 
Such sounds include: 
‚Ä¢ Shower
‚Ä¢ Washing machine
‚Ä¢ Car
‚Ä¢ Hairdryer
‚Ä¢ Vacuum cleaner
‚Ä¢ Shush
‚Ä¢ Fan
‚Ä¢ Train
‚Ä¢ Musicbox
‚Ä¢ Heartbeats
‚Ä¢ Sea and stream...

From practical experience, we have learned that such sounds are more effective as a lullaby than tones, music or sing.

Your babies will soon get used to it and when getting older even demand it and choose their own lullabies. The app becomes an integral part of the babies and their parent every day sleep routine.

Even for older babies Baby Sleep helps to increase the overall noise level in the room, so that sudden urban sounds like traffic would not disturb your baby from sleeping.

Baby Sleep is easy to use so that even your babies can start the lullaby. They just choose one of the available sounds. Each lullaby has a color and a big image do that babies can find their favorite lullabies. A timer will automatically stop the lullaby when times run out. All sounds are available offline so you do not need the internet.

We do highly recommend not putting the phone closer to the baby than necessary and turning on airplane mode as well as muting alerts during the entire use of this app.

comments: Best thing we have ever bought for our baby! He's now 8 months and we still use this in utero mode through the night. It helps sooth him by droning out any background traffic and neighbour noise. Very easy to use and a very fair purchase price. Well done developers.

Seems, off the bat, to have helped my 5 week old son stay asleep longer and deeper. He also fell asleep quicker. He enjoys the ventilator. Would love to not have to push play every 30 minutes, but I can't pay for apps at this point.
The utero sound works every time! Very easy to use.
Best app, using now with our second baby after success with the first a few years ago. Simply the shush affect is magic.
Just started this with my wee boy 5months old I no I should have done b4 but hey.. seems good so far hes out like a light so hopefully after a few goes I'll transition him to upstairs for naps x

title: Dreaming Fox - nightlight, sleep music, meditation
description:
Music:
A collection of nature sounds, lullaby music and meditation sounds will ease your bad mood and will help to fall asleep.
The large variety of sleep sounds are picked to be used for babies and adults.
Try out what works best for you and your loved ones.
For babies usually homogeneous sounds work well but there are also sounds which are suitable as lullabies which are also suitable for toddlers which can't fall as well. 
For you, just use the sounds which make you feel calm and comfortable.
Try the sleep music at start.

Privacy Policy:
https://sites.google.com/view/dreaming-fox-privacy-policy

Ambient Light:
Dreaming Fox uses your phones screen to illuminate the room with soft natural colors.
Use them as alternative to bright room lights.
Use the warm colors if you feel cold and the blue colors to calm down.
Try to reduce the light as early as possible, to avoid insomnia.
With less light, your body will produce more melatonin, which will help to fall asleep.
To lower the light, the this ambient light app also includes a light dimmer.

Timer:
A timer will slowly dim the light and the music while you fall asleep, otherwise the sleep sounds will continue and help you to sleep again if you wake up at night. 

Flashlight/Torch:
Before you go to bed, keep bright lights off to calm your brain down. 
But if you don't find the way to bed, Dreaming Fox contains a flashlight (led light) to lead you way. :)

Blue Light Filter/ Screen Filter
Protect your eyes with 3 different blue light filters which will relieve eye strain.
The warm colors reduce sleeplessness and headaches if the phones is used at night or in low light conditions. 
Use the filters an lower the light early as possible, to give your body time to prepare for the night and calm down.


Privacy Policy:
https://sites.google.com/view/dreaming-fox-privacy-policy

title: Meditation & Relaxation Music: Calm Sleep Sounds
description:
Calm Meditation Sounds to Improve your life. 
Take a break in your day to relax and breathe. Discover how meditation and relaxation music can help you find inner peace and improve your life.

Peaceful & Natural Sounds for Meditation  
Best calm music and soothing nature sounds to allow you to create your very own zen studio for mindfulness meditation, relaxation and sleep. Thanks to our meditation timer & reminder, you can time your session and ensure that the music stops on its own when you fall asleep.

Mix and create. 
Discover over 70 different sounds, as well as 6 different brain waves to help you reach meditation, mindfulness and relaxation states. Practice your breathing exercises while listening to relaxation music. 

Enjoy Great Features.

I like this app so far. It lets you mix different relaxing sounds to create you perfect meditating sounds and then you can save those to use over and over. I also liked that when you use it on the timer, it fades out instead of just an abrupt stop. title: Sleep Calculator
description:
Good day starts with good morning!  Go to bed at the right time and wake up in between your natural 90-minute sleep cycles to feel rested and refreshed.  A good night's sleep consists of 5-6 complete sleep cycles.

‚ó¶ Select when you want to wake up
‚ó¶ Calculate your best time to go to sleep
‚ó¶ Calculate the best time to wake up

It takes an average human about 15 minutes to fall asleep.  If you wake up at one of the calculated times, you'll rise in between 90-minute sleep cycles.

Sleep Calculator helps you decide when to go to bed so that you can wake at a specific time ensuring a good night‚Äôs rest, or what time you should wake up if you want to go to bed right now.

If you want to determine your real sleep cycles - our Sleep Tracker functionality allows you to track and analyze your sleep and, if done correctly, will show you your sleep progress ‚Äì when you were in light, deep or REM (dream) sleep phase and the breakdown of your sleep cycles.  Snoring/noise detection can be enabled as well.

Our brand new Smart Alarm will wake you up easy in the lightest sleep phase, making sure you wake up easy and rested.

Bedtime notifications can also be set up so that you do not miss a proper time to go to sleep.
