I've only used it 1night b4 Hurricane Laura hit, but it seemed to detect when i was in a deep sleep, I'll update again in now that my lights r bk on and I can get bk to normal....Update: It shows ur sleep deprivation, it shows if u take OTC sleep aids if that helps ur sleeping which it does w me depending on when I take it. If u have animals, obviously they cant sleep w u cause their moving counts as urs so it shows that ur light sleeping...

There are two things seriously wrong with this app. 1, If I happen to wake up, I have to stop it from recording in order to view the data. When I turn it back on, it starts recording from scratch, and ignores the amount of sleep I've had already. 2, Since I work shifts and often switch between day and night at a moment's notice. I need an app that records the amount of sleep I've had over a ROLLING 24 HOUR period. I want to see instantly how many hours sleep I've had in the previous 24 hours.

Very impressive. Three little requests: 1. Add nature sounds (nightingale, robins, wind, streams etc) to the alarm sound options. 2. Allow the alarm to very gently fade in over 5 minutes. 3. Allow the alarm to snooze and gently fade in again at an appropriate smart time.

comments: Been sleeping with a high powered fan on to drown out noise from house & kids but have been getting severe sinus headaches from the fan blowing all night, tried this & it's great. Idk how quickly I fell asleep, but i turned it on & set a timer for 1 hour & woke up 7 hours later. I like that you can preview the other sounds before deciding to purchase premium & it said I could watch a video to use one of the premium sounds tonight, but i just wanted the fan sound. Seems like a great app

üíåHonestly 5‚òÜ, it is what it is! Absolutely love that I can turn off data and it still works. No adds which bumps this up to the top of my best whitenoise apps/list of all time. And you know with such a great app like this I'd definitely purchase some instore stuff just because ya'll deserve it!! Stay golden! Please don't make me come edit my review ü§™ Fkn love you guys!!!

Background noise? I seriously love this app, puts me right to sleep. But a few nights now I've woken up and heard a beeping or whistling far in the background. I thought it was just me, maybe I was just hearing things that aren't there, until my husband said he heard it too! I hadn't even told him about it. Now I'm creeped out by it and need to find a new app.üòî

Oct 2020: This has been a Godsend. With COVID and everyone living on top of each other, noises go unnoticed with this great app. I pop in my earbuds and I can focus for hours at a time, completely uninterrupted. March 2019: Reliable. Works well. Perfect white noise to help you sleep or just drown out noises.

I've really enjoyed this app for a few years. In July I decided to purchase the premium so I could listen to the rain and occasionally the spa-like music. I love the rain sound! Update: My previous issues were fixed and the company was incredibly helpful! I'm enjoying listening to the rain again right now ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Insomnia - Breathe & Fall Asleep Under 60 Seconds
description:
Experiencing sleeplessness or insomnia? Feeling restless and cannot fall asleep? You are not alone. Many adults have trouble sleeping and are looking for sleep help. 

If you need help sleeping, you are in the right place. This breathing meditation app guides you through four cycles of the popular 4 7 8 deep breathing exercise to help you fall asleep faster. 

According to Dr. Andrew Weil, who popularized this 4 7 8 breathing technique, this rhythmic breathing pattern is "a natural tranquilizer for the nervous system". Many have fallen asleep with this 4 7 8 breathing technique within 60 seconds. 

FEATURES:

- Breathe in and breathe out with relaxing audio cues
- Choose your favorite sleep sound/sleep music (e.g. Campfire, River Sounds, etc.)
- Set daily bedtime reminders
- Easy volume control for your sleep sound/sleep music
- Vibration cue

Sleepless and restless? Close your eyes and breathe with the 4 7 8 breathing technique. Soon you will be in a deep sleep. Get the breathing meditation app now and fall asleep fast.

summary: Use the FAMOUS 4 7 8 breathing technique to relieve your sleeplessness üò¥
recentChanges: Faster loading + Bug Fixes
comments: This app angers me. It is clinically wrong. Real sleep breathing patterns involve long breaks between breaths, while your lungs are fully relaxed. This app tells you hold your breath for too long, so you're gasping for breath... But no, there's no catching your breath, you're supposed to hold it again. This leaves me feeling panic, which stimulates the adrenals, which yields the complete opposite of the desired sleepy result. Bad technique, bad science!

I am a firm believer of getting a good night sleep for you to function the next day. Getting a good sleep is also very important for your physical and mental well being in general. This application is a great investment to do just that. I use this app on a daily basis and I never fail to get my beauty sleep which keeps me up and alive the next day. Highly recommend if you want to get rid of that unhealthy habit of bad sleep quality! Good job app maker!

It is a easy and simple app to follow for both busy and elderly people. It not only helps in sleep but also long run lung function for better immunity against any virus. It also can help during any important or stressful interviews or examination or appointments.

Good effort but a long way to go. Most imp thing to fix right now is whenever the app is minimised it stops. If screen is locked it stops. When trying to sleep you can't have phone's light shining on your eyes.
Very good üëç A little simple, but high quality... It will be good if it is supplemented with more music for sleep, relaxation, etc. Insomnia app is great üëå

title: Medito: Free Meditation, Sleep & Mindfulness ‚òÄÔ∏è
description:
100% Free Meditation App that will improve your üòáMental wellbeing with the help of üßòGuided Meditations, Breathing Exercises, Mindfulness Practices, üé∂Relaxing Sounds, and more.

With our app‚Äôs holistic approach, you can find guided and non-guided meditations from  Medito Foundation and various other organizations such as UCLA, Dhamma talks, and Audio Dharma, all of which are based on ancient as well as recent meditation techniques.
Just spend a few minutes of the day on this app using the various features and discover the life-changing benefits, positivity, and transformative effects of meditation in your life.

The app is made with the aim to guide you towards a happier & healthier life with the help of various features present in it. This app from  Medito Foundation will help everyone on their journey to practice gratitude, manage anxiety and stress, relax and find positivity.

‚ú®About Medito Foundation:
Medito Foundation is a non-profit organization that believes - ‚ÄúMeditation can positively transform lives and no one should have to pay for it‚Äù. This foundation is dedicated to its purpose of helping people cope better with depression, stress, anxiety, and any other negative state of mind. Practicing meditation and mindfulness is known to help reduce anxiety & stress, enhance cognition, attention & memory, help you sleep better, improve mental health, focus, and general well-being. 

‚ú®Prime Features:

üìçBeginner and Intermediate Courses
üî∏Beginner Course
The Beginner Course is carefully crafted for someone who has little or no meditation experience. Each session is designed to teach you the basics of mindfulness & meditation. These sessions include Mindfulness, Vipassana, Non-judgement, Mindful living, Science of meditation, Negative emotions, etc.


üîπIntermediate Course
These guided meditations are designed for anyone who has already learned the basics of mindfulness meditation and is interested in developing their practice further. The course will introduce concepts & philosophies that will help deepen the meditation practice. This course includes sessions on Spontaneity of thoughts, Consciousness, Anxiety & Stress management, Minimal living, Ego dissolution, etc.

üìçDaily Meditation
A different meditation session each day to help develop a greater sense of awareness in the present moment with options to choose from various session lengths, background music, etc.

üìçSleep Meditation, Sleep Sounds & Sleep Stories
Good sleep is a cornerstone of wellbeing which helps to maintain the physical & mental health and these guided sleep meditations which include Mindful breathing, Visualization, Body Scan, Sleep Stories as well as Mantra for sleep meditation will definitely ease you into a peaceful & restful sleep by calming down your mind and unifying your thoughts.

üìçMeditation for Stress & Anxiety Management
The sessions which include labeling thoughts, dealing with stressful situations, negative emotions, etc are designed to help you manage stress & anxiety. Mindfulness meditation can help in dealing with negative emotions by transforming the way we actually experience them which ultimately diminishes their power over us.

üìçMeditation for Work Life Management
Meditation & mindfulness can have a transformative effect on all aspects of our lives. These sessions are specifically designed to help lead a happier and healthier work life. It covers topics such as managing conflict, improving productivity and confidence, staying focused & motivated while finding the perfect work-life balance.

Medito also includes a variety of other meditation content like - Breathing exercises, Meditation timer, Gratitude, Mindful Routines, Relaxing music, etc.

If you have any questions, please send an email hi@meditofoundation.org, or via twitter @meditoHQ.

Medito Foundation
meditofoundation.org

developer: Medito for Mindfulness, Meditation and Sleep
recentChanges:
Improved functionality for screen readers.
Fixed the after-session screen.
Updated some minor styles on the stats page.
Some other minor UI improvements.
comments: I love this app. It is the best one I have found, so far, which is really free. Other apps make this claim, but then block access to certain material unless a payment is made. As a fairly novice meditation practitioner, I found this app invaluable because there is a beginner's course and intermediate course. Following on from these courses there are a variety of packs for different situations. From daily meditations to managing stress or anxiety, for better sleep, for walking, e.t.c.

Wow, this app is 100% quality. There is content for every situation and it is free. For those of you who are tired by commercialization of meditation apps - this is an app for you. I like that there is a simple customizable timer. Although I don't understand what offline / online mode means in the context of it. Seems like the meditation track is streamed anyway. Developers, could you clarify what that feature does?

Hands down the best app I've ever had for meditation. I've used so many other apps but this one is the only app I've actually stuck to using. The interface is so seamless and so easy to use. And it's 100 percent free. No sneaky purchases or special meditation packs. That sort of transparency is much appreciated and I honestly wouldn't mind donating or paying. I don't know how to support you guys other than this, if there is literally any other way to help, let me know!

After trying several meditation apps (Simple Habit, Headspace, Atom, etc), I like Medito the most because it's simple, user-friendly, and beginner-friendly. All sessions are free and the selection is well curated, which I love because what frustrated me with other apps is that too many options can be overwhelming and having series wherein some episodes are free while others are paid can stunt one's growth. Their "Getting Started" collection is useful particularly for a newbie like me, as many of the other apps do not offer in-depth tutorials on what to expect and how to practice correctly. As a cherry on top, I like the options for background sound, especially Spring Field. The audio is balanced well with the voice, so it's not too loud nor soft, and it plays seamlessly. It seems like a small thing, but it's something that had bugged me and turned me off from other apps. If I had to nitpick - it would be wonderful if you can expand your collections under Sleep Meditation and Mantra Affirmations as they currently only have a handful each.

This is my first meditation app and I find it very well made. You can pick what kind of meditation you need as the sessions are divided into sections. The voices are very calming. I've been meditating for about 4 months now and I can see some improvement in managing my stress and being a nicer person in general. Thank you guys and keep up your work!

Enjoy listening to the meditation sounds you finding inner peace, anti stress and even to fall asleep with ambient music. With music for mindfulness meditation, people focus more, sleep better. Brain Waves Sounds affects stress, anxiety, falling asleep, focus, depression, happiness, self motivation, creativity, anger, pregnancy and much more for our users.

Delta wave is a high amplitude brain wave with a frequency of oscillation between 0‚Äì4 hertz. Delta waves, like other brain waves, are recorded with an electroencephalogram (EEG) and are usually associated with the deep stage 3 of NREM sleep, also known as slow-wave sleep (SWS), and aid in characterizing the depth of sleep.

title: Deep Sleep
description:
Deep Sleep uses binaural beats and solfeggio frequencies tracks to help you fall into a deep sleep quickly. All you have to do is switch on the app and press the play button, the app will select a song randomly for you from the existing list of songs and you, then have to select the timer for the time till which you want to play the song - that's it.
Ideally - use it everyday at night for a deep sleep and based on the selected timer, the song will stop playing.

title: Sleep Talk Recorder
description:
Over 6,000,000 downloads.
Over 150,000 shared clips to Sleep Talk Top List.

#1 Top Paid app in United Kingdom, Sweden, Germany, Norway, Denmark, New Zealand, Finland, Netherlands, Ireland, Chile, Brazil, Russia, Italy, Spain, Malta, Mexico, France, Colombia, Cyprus and Argentina on iPhone.

Did you say something in your sleep last night? A lot of people did. 50% of kids between the ages of 3 and 10 carry on whole conversations during the night. As we grow older the figure goes down to about 5%. Some people talk occasionally, some every night. 

Afraid of revealing secrets? Afraid of missing brilliant Da Vinci ideas you dream about? Or are you just looking for rock solid evidence that your partner snores? 

Sleep Talk Recorder monitors your sleep, but it's not just an ongoing recording. An advanced filtering function qualifies sounds and triggers Sleep Talk Recorder technology in a millisecond. 

In Sleep Talk Recorder you get it all. A sleek interface with individual settings for sensitivity and filtering. A history that saves your recordings and sorts them on a timeline, night by night, for easy navigation. You can also add your funniest clips to your favorites and post them to our top-list website, Facebook and Twitter for great laughs!

title: BetterMe: Meditation & Sleep
description:
Meditation for people who can‚Äôt meditate!
Take just a few minutes out of each day to bring yourself to a state of calm and wellness and balance your life using a combination of guided meditations and mindfulness techniques. The techniques are a simple, practical relaxation method for anyone.

You will learn to manage the stress in your life and improve your overall health using a tool you always carry with you: your breathing. The deep breathing exercises we present in our app stem from the Pranayama approach. Pranayama is a Sanskrit word referring to regulating your breathing for health benefits. It is an ancient Indian practice which is broken into 3 phases of breath manipulation. The phases are inhalation, retention, and exhalation.

A 2014 study in the ‚ÄòJournal of Diagnostic Research‚Äô showed a connection between both slow and fast pranayama and reduced stress and improved overall cognition including attention, retention, and speed tasks combining vision and physical action, like video games.

With our app, you will have the opportunity to set goals for yourself like reducing your stress and anxiety, sleeping better, and improving your concentration. You will work to meet these goals by personalizing your program based on your mood and using the daily mindfulness meditations provided.

If you‚Äôre looking for ways to be in better control or your stress and anxiety and have a more positive outlook, our app will help you. Maybe you‚Äôve tried other mindfulness apps with no success. It‚Äôs time to try BetterMe. Our app is a simple and manageable solution to beginning the journey to managing your stress and changing your outlook, and all you need to do is engage in our 3-minute meditations.

Rather than try to force yourself to focus for long periods of time, which is difficult, especially if you‚Äôre new to meditation, BetterMe provides short but effective science-backed meditations, which are personalized on a daily basis to increase your happiness. You have the choice to engage in guided meditations according to your mood or allow yourself to be freer and enjoy the fun, unguided meditations using sounds from nature.

Let BetterMe accompany you on your journey to managing your stress and anxiety.

Why You Should Choose BetterMe: with just 5 minutes each day, you will improve your quality of life by relieving stress and improving focus.

‚Ä¢    Improved clarity and focus throughout your day.

‚Ä¢    Better sleep leads to less stress and anxiety.

descriptionHTML:
Meditation for people who can‚Äôt meditate!
Take just a few minutes out of each day to bring yourself to a state of calm and wellness and balance your life using a combination of guided meditations and mindfulness techniques. The techniques are a simple, practical relaxation method for anyone.

You will learn to manage the stress in your life and improve your overall health using a tool you always carry with you: your breathing. The deep breathing exercises we present in our app stem from the Pranayama approach. Pranayama is a Sanskrit word referring to regulating your breathing for health benefits. It is an ancient Indian practice which is broken into 3 phases of breath manipulation. The phases are inhalation, retention, and exhalation.

A 2014 study in the ‚ÄòJournal of Diagnostic Research‚Äô showed a connection between both slow and fast pranayama and reduced stress and improved overall cognition including attention, retention, and speed tasks combining vision and physical action, like video games.

With our app, you will have the opportunity to set goals for yourself like reducing your stress and anxiety, sleeping better, and improving your concentration. You will work to meet these goals by personalizing your program based on your mood and using the daily mindfulness meditations provided.

If you‚Äôre looking for ways to be in better control or your stress and anxiety and have a more positive outlook, our app will help you. Maybe you‚Äôve tried other mindfulness apps with no success. It‚Äôs time to try BetterMe. Our app is a simple and manageable solution to beginning the journey to managing your stress and changing your outlook, and all you need to do is engage in our 3-minute meditations.

Rather than try to force yourself to focus for long periods of time, which is difficult, especially if you‚Äôre new to meditation, BetterMe provides short but effective science-backed meditations, which are personalized on a daily basis to increase your happiness. You have the choice to engage in guided meditations according to your mood or allow yourself to be freer and enjoy the fun, unguided meditations using sounds from nature.

Let BetterMe accompany you on your journey to managing your stress and anxiety.

Why You Should Choose BetterMe: with just 5 minutes each day, you will improve your quality of life by relieving stress and improving focus.

Benefits of BetterMe: Meditation

‚Ä¢ Improved clarity and focus throughout your day.
‚Ä¢ Stress and anxiety reduction helps you stay calm and relaxed.
‚Ä¢ Better sleep leads to less stress and anxiety.
‚Ä¢ Broader perspective and deeper self-awareness.
‚Ä¢ Improve leadership skills.
‚Ä¢ Deeper and more natural breathing.
‚Ä¢ Enhance mindfulness in all situations.
‚Ä¢ Winding down at the end of the day becomes easier.
‚Ä¢ Develop your listening skills.
‚Ä¢ Face obstacles in a calm and clear manner.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy improved relationships.
‚Ä¢ Feel happier, calmer, and more relaxed overall.

comments: I started and got very aggravated immediately. The guided meditations are extremely rushed. SLOW DOWN that is the point. There are better meditation apps available. Don't waste your money on this one. Disappointed üòû

There's just not a lot of variety when it comes to the content. I expected way more when you sign up for a subscription. Also, for what you DO get, the meditation are average at best...... Money wasted üòï

Love meditating! This app really helps me focus on the meditation as it guides you through the process for each one. I do however, think that the prices are very costly and I am on low income budget. As traditional medications either do not work, have too many interactions with other medications, and having extreme adverse reactions to medication, I do use meditation and other integrative therapies. Also, I would like to see muscle relaxation meditations.
Wish there was ZERO STAR option. Terrible business. Created a "plan" for me and once I paid to get said plan, the plan needed me to buy EXTRAS to access "plan"!!! SCAM. SHAM. SHAME ON YOU!!
Very calming, and I enjoy the fact that it's timed and they walk you through the whole meditation!

title: Relaxing Music: Sleep Sounds
description:
Relaxing music is ideal for fatigue, stress, insomnia and sore nerves. It works great when you study, sleep, meditate, read, yoga and stay in the spa. It also works for children and babies. Listening to relaxing melodies reduces stress, improves concentration and relieves tinnitus.

Download the application and make your day free from stress and tension. Listen to relaxing music and melodious sounds, relax your mind and soul. A large collection of relaxing sounds and melodies will help you to calm down and rest.

Create your own sound compositions, add and mix relaxation music with the sounds of nature such as: birds singing, cicadas' sounds, sounds of rain, wind noise, night sounds and many more.

With this application on your phone you can enjoy relaxing music and soothing melodies wherever you are and whenever you want. Playing soothing music when you sleep at night is the best way to have a restful sleep and an effective rest.

Put on the headphones, close your eyes and feel like in the spa.

Advantages of the application:
‚óè Built-in timer,
‚óè High quality sound,
‚óè Ability to work in the background,
‚óè Auto-play mode,
‚óè Ease of use,
‚óè Off-line operation, no data connection needed,
‚óè No in-app fees (totally free app).

Music to sleep:
Listening to the melodious sounds you will fall asleep easier, waking up more rested and started your day in a better mood.

Music to Concentration:
Relaxing music isolates you from the noise and ambient noise which makes it easier to concentrate and increase the level of focus.

Music for meditation:
Soothing sounds will let you calm down and achieve inner peace. The time to relax will be even more enjoyable.

Leveling tinnitus:
Many people suffer from tinnitus that can be eliminated by listening to relaxing music.

Sleep better and wake up rested.
Try it ... is really free.

title: FREE Guided Meditation: Sleep & Mindfulness app
description:
This Guided Meditation for sleep and Relaxation app gives you more than 40 meditation tracks to help you relax, calm and sleep deeply with angel voice and English accent;

1. Relaxation Meditation
2. Sleep Meditation
3. Stress Relief
4. Motivation
5. Quit Smoking
6. Guided Imagery

What is guided meditation?

If we were to use a metaphor to describe it, we could say that guided meditation is like the two small wheels that are attached to the bicycle of children who learn to ride. They use it to make their first pedal strokes without falling, but the goal is, sooner or later, to get rid of it.
Indeed, guided mediation is mainly aimed at beginners. By offering step-by-step support in the first experiences of meditation, it serves to support those who do not know how to go about it or who are just afraid of doing wrong.
Here, instead of two small wheels, it is a voice that accompanies us in our first steps. And all we have to do is follow it.
Guided meditation sessions can take place both in groups, with a guide, and on their own, using an app or video. In all cases, a voice will guide you throughout the session. With an often calm and slow intonation that will call for relaxation, it will help you reach the right state of concentration and relaxation to let you go into meditation.
To explain it better, we can use a second metaphor: guided meditation works like a GPS. It shows you the path to follow to avoid that, at each intersection, you don't wonder where to go.
The voice will explain to you how to proceed at each step so that you always know what to do without having to think about it yourself. The goal is to help you go through an entire meditation session without giving your mind the opportunity to frolic all over the place and to ask yourself all the time whether you are doing things right or whether you should you do it differently.
Like the two small wheels and the GPS, guided meditation is especially useful during your first sessions. Indeed, after a number of them, not only will you know the path to take, but you will also need no help whatsoever to move forward. By that time, the guided meditation will have reached its goal and you will then be able to meditate alone ... unless you prefer to go a long way with it!

Why use guided meditation?

First, it makes meditation accessible to all. Firstly because no prior knowledge is required to start guided meditation, but also because, by taking us by the hand, it allows us to discover a world that may seem intimidating at first.
By accompanying us and showing us the path to follow from the start, guided meditation thus breaks down the many barriers that we can erect in front of us at the time of learning meditation, such as the fear of s '' put it alone and make mistakes, lack of motivation or not knowing where to start or having trouble learning on our own.
It thus helps us to take the first step towards meditation. But more importantly, it also helps us do it right. Step by step, it teaches us the main concepts of meditation so that we can make them ours. It helps us find the right posture, the right breath and the right approach, and teaches us what to focus on during a session. Nothing is left out, so you can be sure you are learning without making a mistake.
Finally, guided meditation is responsible for answering, implicitly or explicitly, all the questions that often mistreat our concentration during our first sessions, such as ‚Äúam I doing well?‚Äù, ‚ÄúWhen will I finally get to make a vacuum? ‚Äù,‚Äú why does this seem not to work for me? ‚Äùor‚Äú should I think of something else? ‚Äù. As a result, you can focus on the essentials instead of letting your mind fill with many questions that, without guided meditation, could go unanswered.

title: Relax Night - Nature sounds: sleep & meditation
description:
Relax with the best sounds of the night. Fall asleep faster and sleep better!

Ideal for relaxing, sleeping, meditation, concentration, or if you have problems with tinnitus (ear ringing).

The app plays different sounds of the night, the sounds played in this way are also known as white noise.
White noise has beneficial effects on the body and mind because, covering the noise of the external environment, promotes relaxation and concentration.

You can set the timer and put your app in background or turn off the screen. At the end of the time, the sound fades gently and the application closes by itself. So you do not have to worry about closing the app if you fall asleep.

Do you have trouble going to sleep? This app helps you sleep by blocking distractions. Now you can asleep faster and sleep better!
You can say goodbye to your insomnia! Improve your life!

Use it after a stressful day to regain your inner peace. Go into your oasis of calm.


*** Application features ***

- 15+ perfectly looped sounds
- timer system that slowly fades audio out
- auto-pause sounds on incoming call
- volume controls
- quick menu
- usage in the background and with other apps
- no streaming is required for playback (no data connection required)
- pause and play sounds


*** List of sounds ***

- Brahms' Lullaby and crickets
- Frogs in the pond
- Peaceful night
- Night in the woods
- Rain and crickets
- Silent Night and crickets
- Boat in the lake
- Summer night
- Crickets around the lake
- Campfire on the beach
- Dawn in the field
- Night in tent
- Calm ocean at night
- Night in the field


*** Usage notes ***

For a better experience, I recommend you the use of headphones or earphones to listen the relaxing sounds.
You can use the app in background and with other apps.


*** Notes on permissions ***

- Device ID & call information (read phone status and identity)
Used to stop sound on incoming call and to play again at the end of call.

- In-app purchases
Used in the purchase of the premium version.

- Prevent phone from sleeping
Used to keep alive the app when you turn off the screen or while using other apps.

- Full network access and view network connections
Used to verify the purchases and show ads.

title: Gear Add-on ‚åö for Sleep as Android
description: Add-on for Sleep As Android for sleep tracking with Samsung Galaxy Gear watches. You also need to have Gear companion app installed on your watch.
descriptionHTML: Add-on for Sleep As Android for sleep tracking with Samsung Galaxy Gear watches. You also need to have Gear companion app installed on your watch.
summary: Add-on for Sleep As Android for sleep tracking with Samsung Galaxy Gear watches
recentChanges: More logging
comments: Why doesn't it start when sleep is started? It used to work, but stopped after some update months ago. I have to go to Google Play store, find the thing and open it each time before I sleep, otherwise it won't connect with the watch or at least very rarely. Update: it's the 'Auto start' permission that was missing, not the battery saver configuration - just as I described above. Update 2: nope, still broken and does not start or report error. BTW the play|pause buttons on the watch never worked

Was working very well, only connecting when I started tracking. Recently however it connects to my Samsung Watch 3 throughout the day, giving me the notification "connected to your Samsung Watch, tap to cancel". When tapping to cancel it will only go away temporarily after a huge delay, coming right back in a couple of minutes.

Starts randomly throughout the day, draining my battery. Ill burn through my fully charged battery in a matter of 5 or so hours if I don't catch it and turn it off. The only fix I've found is by putting it in the "always sleeping" list but then it doesn't work at all. Frustrating.

Integrates seamlessly. I've used this since my gear S2 and now I have the Active 2. No problems, no issues with battery drain. Minus a star because Samsung Health tends to recognize more accurately actual awake moments, but this app combination records sound and I like that.
Love it. They recently addressed the battery drain issue through an update so now it operates flawlessly with meaningless battery loss. Great app!

title: Thunderstorm sounds and rain sound for sleep
description:
Authentic thunder sounds. Different thunderstorm sounds (nature sounds) help you and your children fall asleep faster. Find yourself in the middle of a thunderstorm, exercise control over thunders and lightnings, make your rainy soundscape just with a simple touch, set a sleep timer and let the rain wash your soul.

Our free application contains the following sounds:

- Rain & Thunderstorm Sounds   Relaxing Storm Ambience.
- Raindrops sounds.
- Thunder and lightning storm sounds.
- Rain Sound and Rainforest Animals Sound - Relaxing Sleep.
- Real storm sound for good sleep..
- Asmr rain sounds.
- Meditation music rain.
- Rain sounds relaxing sleep.
- Thunderstorm with No Loops 'Sleep Sounds'.
- Asmr white noise.


Close your eyes, put on the headphones and choose one of the natural sounds and relax or sleep better.

Our app has the following features:

- Work offline. You don‚Äôt need internet connection.
- Absolutely free.
- You could remove ads for extra money.
- High quality nature sounds.
- Amazing HD background pictures.
- Control playback from the lock screen or notifications menu.
- This has a sleep timer. Only set the timer for 30 minutes and you always asleep before the timer goes off.
- Play sounds in background.
- Mute on incoming calls.
- Free for download mp3 files.
- Individual volume control
- It‚Äôs very relaxing!

This app is for those who:

- Suffering from terrible insomnia.
- Want sleep better.
- Doing yoga exercises and meditation.
- Learn to breath correctly.
- Have Tinnitus
- Want to get rid of stress and anxiety.
- Improve concentration.

Thunderstorm sounds is the use of sounds to improve health or functional outcomes. Rain therapy is a creative arts therapy, consisting of a process in which a music therapist uses melodies and all of its facets‚Äîphysical, emotional, mental, social, aesthetic, and spiritual‚Äîto help clients improve their physical and mental health.

While our rain noise provides a lot of rain, and just a touch of thunder rumble in the lower register, our thunder noise generator is the opposite: a lot of thunder, and just the right amount of rain to fill in the higher frequencies. The rain on Distant Thunder is slightly more dynamic too, offering subtle variations over time, which is how rain should sound below thunderclouds.

Whether you love sounds of the rain or nature sounds, with this app you will sleep like a baby.

Studies have shown that a full night's sleep can significantly reduce all cause mortality. Don‚Äôt sacrifice your health and well being. Download Sleep Fan tonight and wake up refreshed in the morning.

Sleep fan is simple and easy to use.

No signup, no hassle.

Listen within seconds.

Choose from 4 different sounds.

Set a timer for your fan.

Sleep Fan is a perfect and simple tool that will reliably aid in the ease of falling asleep. Join the millions of satisfied users that proudly use Sleep Fan every night.
summary: Sleep Fan helps you to sleep smoothly.

336 Bon Air Center
No. 358
Greenbrae, CA
94904
recentChanges:
Other bug fixes

Bug fixes to address the sound stopping on some devices. Thanks for the very helpful feedback on this issue.

Added In-App purchases with additional fans sounds and other natural sounds.

comments: Going to sleep away from home is always a consern for me. Most of the times I toss and turn but after using this app. I've been able to sleep throughout the night. This app has helped me many times when I travel. I love this app because there are diffrent ranges of fan noises and speeds. You can also set a timmer to the sound. I found one that I specifically can sleep to. So now I'm not concerned when I travel.

Simple app to make fan sounds, great to get to sleep with. Unfortunately it shuts off randomly, sometimes before i fall asleep and through out night. I set timer for certain time, but when it gets shut off randomly i have to restart my timer. Very frustrating please fix. Also, animation shows fan spinning...why? Its not a real fan, its just to listen to for sleep, that is a waste of app memory. Just worry about sounds and shut off animation. Lastly, i recently noticed it shows ads related to my google searches. Pretty weird fan application knows my search history!!!!

Amazing, I have been using this app for years and it has never failed me. I recommend 10/10. No ads, just what you're looking for. The fan sounds are great, it is the perfect tool to use to help with sleep.

When I had an iPhone, this app worked really well. However, now I have an android and the fan stops after an hour or so, which wakes me up. To be fair, I do not know how much time has passed by the time I am alert enough to realize that the reason I am awake is because the fan is no longer playing, but you can see the point. I use the app for white noise and when it shuts off, I wake up. This is helpful if it turns off when it should but it doesn't seem to work that way on an android device.

I've used this app for a long time and it helps me get to sleep even with my tinnitus, but the recent change to the time style makes it more annoying to reset when it shuts off. I wake up throughout the night and liked the old style of a click the arrow for an increase of one hour at a time, not the scroll wheel. Also can I please get a version without ads, I'm willing to give you $0.99 for an ad free version and would like that a lot. It's a good app for what it does and will continue using it.

title: Sleep School for Insomnia
description:
The Sleep School are global experts in chronic insomnia and have spent over 15 years helping thousands of clients to sleep well once again.

The Sleep School App delivers their 100% non-drug based approach via their highly effective proprietary tools and techniques - ensuring you can learn how to sleep well, every night.

It has been created to help insomniacs . . .

- Learn how to retrain their brains how to sleep well again, naturally

- Create a new robust sleeping pattern

- Understand all they need to know about how their insomnia started, what keeps it fuelled and how to stop it


The Sleep School App contains the following functionality:

Insomnia Survey - To help you understand the severity of your insomnia and where to focus your attention within the app so that you can recover quickly and effectively.

75+ guided films - Dr. Guy Meadows will teach you how you can overcome your insomnia

5 x Sleep School Tools - Including 6 series of guided audio tracks to listen to help you fall to sleep more quickly

Interactive quiz - to teach you everything you need to know about your insomnia and sleep

About our Subscriptions:
The Sleep School for Insomnia app contains in-app purchases allowing you to subscribe to specific content within the app. 

- Our auto-renewable subscriptions allow access to all educational content and sleep tools within this app during your selected subscription period
- Subscriptions auto-renew monthly or annually
- Payments will be charged to Google Play account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscriptions will automatically renews unless auto-renewal/ you cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
- Your Google Play account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- You can manage your subscription and switch off auto-renewal after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription

Terms of Use:
https://thesleepschool.org/website_legals/terms

Privacy policy: 
https://thesleepschool.org/website_legals/privacy

comments: This with audiobook have helped me immensely! Couldn't be grateful enough :)

This app was great . Up until i realised the free content soon ends and you are told you have to subscribe . Most people cant really afford these prices i know i can't . So im afraid im uninstalling . Recently discovered an online sleep training course called sleep station. Although the program is ¬£295 (yes very pricey) it is free with a GP / NHS referral . So im gonna go for that. I understand the developers of this app need to make money but i think its overpriced.

The instructional videos are very good. However, I can't listen to any of the audio tools (the mindfulness sessions) which are probably the most important part. I raised it with the developer over a week ago but it hasn't been fixed yet.

Good app but no offline ability! So can't listen on the tube or plane or away from mobile signal. Which are usually exactly the places where I have the time to listen. Please provide an option to download all the content for use offline.
Subscribed to this on the phone, yet it doesn't give me access to the web app. It's a good program, yet its frustrating considering some of the programs dont work on the phone.

title: Sleep Tracker - Analyze Sleep Habits and Quality
description:
SleepTracker
Track your Sleep Patterns and Sleep quality with this easy to use sleep log and analysis app. If you suffer from insomnia, sleep apnea, or other sleep related disorders, keeping a detailed log of your Circadian Rhythm and the factors that may affect it can give you many insights into the things that are reducing your quality of sleep and overall well-being.

Features
- Log the bed time and wake-up time, sleep quality, and ease of falling asleep, of your regular sleep sessions.
- Track other factors that may affect your sleep habits or cause insomnia such as Caffeine, Alcohol, Exercise, Computer screens and meals.
- Leave custom notes on each Sleep Log.
- Free basic sleep log analysis.


- Premium Medication Tracking to give you insights into whether medication is affecting your sleep patterns.
- Premium Visual Analysis with detailed breakdowns of bedtime, sleep quality and duration by day of week, and comprehensive sleep history.

Why track your Sleep Patterns and Sleep Quality?
Sleep is a vital component of every person's overall health and well-being. Research has found that poor sleep quality can have negative effects on concentration, productivity and cognition. Whereas adequate amounts of sleep can reduce the risks of heart disease, reduce inflammation, as well as improve your immune system and athletic performance.

For those suffering from insomnia, poor sleep quality, or other sleep disorders, it is important to take an active approach of logging and analyzing the factors that may affect these in order to attempt to mitigate them and live a healthier more well-rested life!

Disclaimer
The material provided in this app is not meant to replace or substitute the recommendations or advice of your physician or health care provider. The information contained in this app should not be used for diagnosing or treating a health problem or disease. If you believe you have a medical condition or problem contact your health care provider.

description:
4.4, August 9, 2020 
 
Experience SleepIQ¬Æ technology.‚ÄØ 
Only Available with Sleep Number¬Æ beds.‚ÄØ 
 
OVERVIEW‚ÄØ 
Effortlessly control your bed to individualize your sleep experience and get your best sleep. See the amazing effects your Sleep Number¬Æ bed is having on your sleep quality, and overall health and wellness, through your SleepIQ¬Æ app. SleepIQ¬Æ uses intelligent biometrics to provide a daily score based upon your personal goals and sleep patterns.

recentChanges:
- New heart rate variability biometric tracking for 360 smart beds ‚Äì HRV tracking provides sleepers an understanding of how their nighttime recovery impacts their activity level and energy each day.

- Participate in sleep research studies. Research by Sleep Number¬Æ and in collaboration with Mayo Clinic is intended to advance the science of sleep and health by making new discoveries to improve sleep quality.

- Bug fixes and other improvements
comments: Useful and great as a tool generally speaking. I would however change 2 things about it: 1. If you get up in the middle of the night, it should show how long it takes to fall asleep instead of having that be "restless" time. 2. There should be a nap setting. It assumes every time you're in bed is for your full goal (I think it automatically sets to 8 hours) so a 20 minute nap gives you a sleep score of 10 and messes up your average. Makes it less accurate and reliable.

The app is informative over time, but improvements could be made. Two things I would like to see are related to favorites and sleep tracking. Regarding the favorites, I'd love to have 2 favs since raising/lowering the bed is otherwise multiple presses which is an annoyance. As for the tracking, I have pets that like to sleep on my side of the bed during the day.... Imagine my surprise the first few times I saw sleep tracking during the day while I was at work. I wished I were still in bed!

The app works very well. The bed looses wifi quite often. The bed tells you how you slept. But you can't control your sleep. So im not sure it helps a lot. Many times i have woken up groggy and it says good things. I have also woken up rested and it says i didn't sleep well. Still haven't figured out what the HRV means. Doesn't seem to mean much. I do love my bed though.

This is a very cool tool to use. It took a couple of days for the bed to get to know me, but, as time goes on - it seems to be a bit more accurate. the one thing i didn't like was when it counted a nap as my actual sleep time; I could edit that out if i wanted to so it didnt' mess with my averages. All in all...i think this accurately reflects how i am sleeping each night

I like the suggestions offered and have adopted a few successfully. I like to read in bed because the adjustable bed is awesome for reading, but it lowers my score. I know reading in bed is not the best sleep hygiene, but it works for me. I'd like to be able to adjust for it. The new hrv is interesting and I am paying attention to it. My Galaxy watch records a different amount of restful sleep than SleepIQ, and so did my Fitbit. I also would like a nap setting.

title: White Noise Baby Sleep Sounds
description:
White Noise Baby Sleep Sounds free app helps your baby (and you!) to fall asleep using classic monotonous sounds ("white noise") proven to be effective by generations of parents.

Simply select the desired sound or create your own mix using these HD sounds:

‚úî Pure white noise 
‚úî Pure pink noise 
‚úî Pure brown noise 
‚úî Pure blue noise 
‚úî Rain 
‚úî Rain on puddle
‚úî Rain on leaves
‚úî Heavy rain
‚úî Thunderstorm
‚úî Ocean
‚úî Sea
‚úî Lake
‚úî Creek
‚úî Forest river
‚úî Mountain river 
‚úî Waterfall
‚úî Wind
‚úî Fan 
‚úî Air conditioner
‚úî Vacuum cleaner 
‚úî Hair dryer 
‚úî Washing machine 
‚úî Boiling kettle
‚úî Shower 
‚úî Fireplace 
‚úî Airplane
‚úî Train 
‚úî Car 
‚úî Cat purring
‚úî In the womb 
‚úî Mother (Shush)
‚úî Heartbeat 

From practical experience, we have learned that such white noise sounds are more effective as a lullaby for baby sleep than music, tones or sing.
Babies love white noise. Background white noise is calming for baby and resembles the kind of sounds that he would hear in the womb. 

This app can also be used as a sound machine (white noise machine) by adults suffering with insomnia or sleep disorders.
The masking effect of white noise is also great for relaxation, concentration and study.

App features:

‚úî 36 white noise sounds
‚úî 4 baby lullabies
‚úî Infinite playback
‚úî Timer with soft fade out
‚úî Mixer with support for adjusting the volume of each sound in the mix
‚úî Background audio support
‚úî No full-screen ads
‚úî Offline working
‚úî Lightweight and easy to use

We do highly recommend not putting the phone closer to the baby than necessary.

recentChanges: The ability to turn off battery optimization for our app from the app settings. (Available for Android 6 and above). This will prevent our app from closing or shutting off unexpectedly.
comments: Very easy to work with. You have multiple sounds and different types for each sound category, like different rainstorm sounds. Helps me sleep and I can turn off my phone and the noise still goes. Definitely recommend for ppl who need a portable white noise machine! The reason why I took 1 star off is because after a while of using it, the sound would randomly stop working in the night and I would have to back into the app to start the noise again. Other then that i love this app!

Very nice app, my little son and I loved it, thanks alot :) I have a little playback timer problem though, the timer doesn't work anymore. I set the time for 30 minutes but the noise keeps on and on all night that forces me to wake up in order to turn it off. Noise used to fade out beautifully in the past but after the last update this problem appeared. I tried re-installing the app and I tried the battery optimizations thing both Watson and off, All in vane ;(. Please help

Tried quite a few apps and this was our favourite. Fine tune your own custom white noise is a great feature. Simple and easy to use. Biggest feature request...Just wish I could pay to turn off ads. You can customise the background colour. Would be nice to be able to customise the icon colour also. Overall does a simple job well.

The best low frequency sounds. Other apps sound higher pitched , this is the closest to a real fan ive found Edit: Still love the app, but it would be awesome if there could be a setting for volume to be independently controlled from media. If I have this running and want to watch a short video, I have to turn it off, as the app sound level is the same as the video's since they're both on the "media" sound level. can't make one louder without making both louder.

Love that I can have this on airplane mode and on for as short or as long as I like. Love the variety of sounds, each of my children found a different sound soothing so great there is variety. This worked a treat when we were out and about in a pram, kept them asleep longer than without it. Love love love. Only downfall is not being able to use your phone for calls during its use but to me that's quite minor.

title: Koala Sleep: Meditation and Mindfulness
description:
Relaxing stories, meditations, sounds & music for bedtime and beyond
Join the millions of parents who use Koala to quickly settle their kids into a peacefuls. 

- 96% of parents surveyed agree that Koala helps get their kids to sleep quicker than usual.
- 94% said using the app makes bedtime less stressful.*Koala

Make bedtime a dream:
- Remove anxiety and stress from the bedtime routine
- Reduce the time it takes for your kids to relax and fall asleep when it‚Äôs time for lights out
- Reclaim precious time in your evening

Koala helps kids of all ages to sleep soundly 

Kids love the adorable characters from the world of Koala including:
- SleepyPaws the Snoozy Koala and his eucalyptus-fueled imagination

Why Koala Stories work:
- Koala Stories are gentle rhyming journeys with dreamy lullaby-style choruses
- Musical transitions are specifically designed to be mesmerizing
- As each story progresses the gentle narration becomes increasingly sleepy and ambient sounds diminish
- Musical loops continue for several minutes once each story ends, before gently fading to avoid sudden silence
- Featuring ambient white noise, from vacuuming and distant lawnmowers to washing machines and lapping waves

Teach your kids the basics of mindfulness with guided meditations designed to help kids relax, reduce anxiety and manage negative thoughts.

Features to support a stress-free bedtime:
- Content released every month to ensure there is always something new for kids to enjoy at bedtime
- Audio-only. No need for screens in the bedroom
- Learn deep breathing to help worries drift away
- Loop and replay functions ensure sleepy content plays throughout the night if needed
- Explore curated playlists to discover recommended content

Join the millions of parents who use Koala to quickly settle their kids into a peacefuls.

Teach your kids the basics of mindfulness with guided meditations designed to help kids relax, reduce anxiety and manage negative thoughts.

Features to support a stress-free bedtime:
- Content released every month to ensure there is always something new for kids to enjoy at bedtime

comments: Not free and not reasonably priced at all! It said you sign up for the 3 day trial period, but the it is $89.99 a week! This looks like a complete knock off Moshi Sleep.

I LOVE this app everything about it is AMAZING I use to go to best around 3 am but with this app i go to bed around 9 or 10 every night I rlly need this app so I can get into a routine before school so this app is AMAZING!!!

This app is great and I use it every day for sleeping and gaining control over my mood and emotions. I especially love the sleepcasts! However, I think a nice bonus feature would be to save our favorite programs so they are more easily accessible (meditations, sleepcasts, etc) so we can see them in one spot instead of having to tap through the menu. I tend to go to the same ones which are my favorites. Thank you for the awesome app and discount for students!

Literally the best white noise app I could have ever found! Helps put me to sleep and my nieces when fighting there sleep or when there overwhelmed, this goes a long way to help soothe them! I honestly could not be with out this app, it is guaranteed to be phone, iPad and any other technology I‚Äôm around. It is a must or I can not sleep!!!

I have trouble shutting my mind off at night. This app is great! Helps me sleep swiftly. You can customize the background noise and put a timer on it. It comes with some preset options, too. And it also has some relaxation recordings and bedtime stories. I can‚Äôt say if the stories on here are interesting as I fall asleep quickly when I play them. ???

title: SleepCycle - Sleep Calculator
description:
Tired of waking up exhausted? Can't get yourself out of bed at a reasonable hour in the morning? You don't have to set up multiple alarms anymore!

Each and every night, your brain transitions through different stages of sleep.

Each stage has different effects on your body - from physical restoration during deep sleep, to memory consolidation during dreams.

All together, these stages add up to about 90 minutes, making up one complete sleep cycle.

SleepCycle calculates the best hours and helps you wake up between your sleep cycles.

SleepCycle can calculate when to wake up, when to go to sleep and when to wake up if you sleep now. You can also set up an alarm with SleepCycle.

Set a sleep cycle alarm that will help you Wake Up at the best possible time in your sleep cycle so that you wake up refreshed.

Great app, the only thing I find inconvenient is that I can't switch 24h format and I am forced to use 12h formatüòï
with samsung phones you can't get out of the choicing thing without undoing the set time

title: SleepCloud üí≠ Backup for Sleep as Android
description:
SleepCloud is free to play when you are fine to sync once per week. Full access is a yearly subscription with ~$4 (or an equivalent in your local currency) yearly. This helps us cover out monthly costs with running the service online. Many thanks for considering your purchasing the full access.

NEW Connect with SleepCloud and help us anonymously in our research projects to find out more about the mystery of sleep.

Connections with 3rd party service, such as Zenobase, FitnessSyncer, Fluxtream or Nudge. Correlate your sleep with data from other sources: e.g. Fitbit, RunKeeper, Strava, Foursquare, Last.fm...

This is an add-on for Sleep as Android to allow backup of sleep graphs to cloud services: SleepCloud, Dropbox and Google Drive. This add-on does not work without Sleep as Android being installed.

SleepCloud is a new cloud service specifically designed for sleep data and for Sleep as Android. It features:
- 2 way synchronization of sleep data between your devices
- full backup of sleep graphs
- sleep data in your browser
- graph list, heatmaps, statistics online
- comparison of sleep habits around the world by country

-Automatic upload of new sleep graphs after tracking
-menu-backup-Download/Upload to Cloud
-Synchronization between multiple devices
-Automatic backup to SD card
-New installation of Sleep as Android can be quickly loaded with your sleep graphs from the Cloud

comments: Would be nice if there would be an option to upload on a private server like Nextcloud. So you don't have to trust anyone with your data. The app works like described though, but I deleted my data on the server because my data is used against my will.
I think there should be unlimited backups in the cloud, buying the app and having to buy so many separate services is unfair, Lullabies is the only one that I do understood getting paid.
"Download failed. Try reconnecting to Google Drive". Over and over and ...
Great app, but I get error on trying to upload to Google drive, it connects but does not upload..
Can't connect to Google Drive or Dropbox. Edit: After reinstalling the app, it works perfectly!

title: Zleep - 3D Nature Sounds,Relaxing Music For Sleep
description:
Are you looking for an App for better Sleep?

        Zleep brings you a great collection of studio-quality sound, That helps you to relax, sleep better, and balanced metabolism. Enjoy the soothing sounds of rain, birds, waterfalls, thunderstorms, and magnificent musical instruments. Set your sleep timer and drift peacefully off to sleep. The app is highly customizable for a personalized experience. Remix the great collection of sounds and Create your unique ambiances.  Experience the dramatic lightning effects by using the camera flash.

         Check out the sound collection.
----------------------------------------------------------------

*  Beach
Experience the magnificent sound of the beach. Ocean waves break onto 
the beach, kids playing in the background, Sea birds singing, true beach 
ambiance for sleep.


*  Deep Ocean
Let us deep-dive into the ocean, experience the unknown miracles through sound. Sounds of ocean bubbles, underwater diving, ship, and jet ski.


*  Flute
Calm and quiet Romantic flute. That will help you to reboot your mind.


*  Forest
The peaceful ambiance of a deep forest during the day. Birds chirping, 
tweeting, passing wind, and mosquito flying around. Stay close to nature and relax.


*  Guitar
Enjoy the relaxing sound of an acoustic guitar.


*  Japanese Temple
The gentle sound of a Japanese temple with birdsong, Wind Chimes, Monk Chanting, and Drums. Ideal for meditation or relaxation.


*  Old Fan
Enjoy your favorite childhood nostalgia with old fan sound.


*  Old Train
Take a break from your boring daily routine and go for a train journey. Enjoy the train sound and relax.


*  Piano
Relaxing piano music for stress relief and meditation.


*  Rain Forest
Enjoy the mesmerizing experience of the amazon rainforest. Singing birds, rain sounds, and cricket sounds.


*  Rainy Night
Rainy night ambiance for sleeping. Listen to the sounds of traffic while the rain pattered against your window, distant thunder, and whispering frogs. Experience the true thunder using the camera flash.


*  Rainy Walk
Walking with an umbrella during a light thunderstorm in the evening.


*  Star Ship
Enjoy better sleep with galaxy sounds captured by NASA and other space exploration projects.


*  Tropical Island
Relax with the soothing sounds of a tropical island. Sea birds singing, Sea washing against the surface, and strong wind ambiance.


*  Waterfall
Lying at the base of a waterfall and listen to water stream, bird, and romantic piano.

*  Winter Storm
Winter storm sound (snowstorm) with snowdrift and blizzard ambiance for sleeping and relaxation.

comments: After a less then great experience with an ad popping up as soon as I tried the app, the devs responded within hours to say they adjusted it. I reinstalled the app and was able to test it and I ended up buying one of the sound packs. The app lets you adjust secondary sounds so they occur at different intervals. Few apps let you do that so it is a nice feature. The app has a nice UI. I am looking forward to seeing how the app develops.

Excellent sound quality, very easy to use and efficient for me. Having used soft music to go to sleep for years now, I was looking for something different. I tried several sleep tracking apps, but if they were good for going to sleep, the tracking part I don't need turned to be a battery sucking experience - and an expensive one. Zleep is my best choice so far and the diversity of the "sound universes" is a joy to explore. Keep up the great work üòé

Relaxing sounds. It's great for studying or programming when you need white noise to block out office noise and other distractions. I like that I can customize each scene and turn off any sounds I don't especially like. Try it with headphones!
Amazingly simple app Very quick response from the developer when I highlighted flute music was removed in recent update. Now my baby can sleep peacefully. Thanks, keep up the amazing work.
Loved this application. Had a great experience with it. This application have sounds which will provide you a comfortable sleep.üëçüëç

title: Sleep Easily Guided Meditation for Relaxation
description:
Sleep Easily Guided Meditation was written and read by Shazzie Love. As an acclaimed author of five books, the creator of several life transformation programmes and an international speaker and workshop facilitator, her quest is always the same: to help you on your journey back to the centre of your own heart. 

Relax into her soothing words and let go fully into a deeply relaxing sleep. During this twenty six minute recording, you‚Äôll be gently guided every step of the way to relax your whole body and mind. You can also set a wake-up alarm through the built-in alarm clock before launching the session.

Throughout this beautiful recording, you‚Äôll be held by the music and sounds created by Ali Calderwood. Ali is an accomplished musician and healer who also produces the exquisite music of Anima. 

Ali‚Äôs uniquely crafted music soundscapes within this guided meditation contains specifically designed combinations of healing frequencies which will have a deep, therapeutic effect on you. You will experience state of the art production techniques such as whispering echoed background vocals which pan from left to right across the stereo range.

This unique effect will help you relax deeper into the meditative sleep . You will also hear some 60 BPM digital sound effects as well as powerful subliminal suggestions that compound the therapeutic effect. 

This meditation will leave you refreshed, renewed and resonating so much more from your heart and a place of stillness. From there, you‚Äôll be able to attract towards you everything your heart desires, without your head getting in the way.

Do NOT listen while driving or operating machinery.
If you suffer with serious depression or epilepsy please consult your doctor before listening to this App.


This App Includes:

- Sleep Easily Guided Meditation (Running Time: 26:46)
- Set wake-up time (built-in Alarm Clock)
- How To Use This App
- About Shazzie & Ali eBook
- Diviniti Publishing Home
- Share This App

Developed by Arkenea Technologies (www.arkenea.com) for Diviniti Publishing Ltd.

comments: I have been using the free version of this app. I have found this to be such a positive experience. I'm sleeping better and I fall asleep faster each time I use it. Soon I'll be falling asleep the minute I turn it on! I would purchase additional work by the creator but none seemed a good fit. I think I have what i need for now. Update, its been over a year now and this is still worked into my nightly routine. I find it soothing, pleasant and most importantly restful‚ô•Ô∏è.

Very relaxing and puts me to sleep nearly every time! Favorite out of all styles (eg nature sounds, lullabies, etc), and I have tried dozens!. If it had a timer to go along with the loop feature, it would get five stars. That being said, it is infrequently that I need to listen more than once since it is amazingly effective. Shazzie truly does understand the flow in which various body parts will relax; and her voice is so calming; but the background music is just a bit low. Huge fan!

Relaxing, even after years of listening. I used to go through so many meditation tracks as I would get sick of hearing the same voice, but I purchased the sleep easy and the love your body meditation, and 6 years on, I'm still loving it (at least 4 nights/week). Shazzi's voice is so comforting and the music is deeply touching.
Shaz's sleep meditation is the complete package. The body scan, affirmations and calming music are a near perfect combination. I'd like a new release or few other meditations for 5 stars.

I have been using this app for almost a year now and ot relaxes me every time even after a hard dau at work or stages of sadness. I suffer with depression and can honestly give it a five star rating. Recomended. Keep up the good work

title: Mindwell : Mood & Sleep Lab
description:
Sometimes meditation can fall flat; making our mind wander causing us to miss the benefits of daily practice.

By combining custom (Isochronic) tones, and custom (Solfeggio) frequencies, Mindwell synchronizes with your brainwaves to bring added benefit to your meditation.

We've created a series of these highly customized waves to help you achieve a variety of mental states such as alertness, calmness, sleep, and emotional balance.  We even have waves to support specific moods and goals.

Features:
* Mindwell‚Äôs patent-pending MoodShift to take you to a better place
* Personalized Daily Meditation program created just for you
* Sleep Lab with everything you need for a great night‚Äôs sleep
* Over 350 meditations and guides with ancient Isochronic tones and Solfeggio Frequencies
* Playlist creation to create and share personalized meditation programs
* Sleep stories to relax and soothe any time of the day
* Affirmations to create healthy, happy thoughts
* Stats to track meditation minutes and progression towards mindful and mood goals

Mindwell's meditations last anywhere from 60 seconds to 30 minutes; making it so everyone has time for a quick refresh.

Unlike other meditation apps, Mindwell's meditation topics are for both powering down AND charging up.  Some of our topics include:

* Sleeping Better
* Going Full Thrust
* Improving Relationships
* Turning on Positive Thinking
* Supercharging your Career
* Understanding and Quitting Destructive Behavior
* Meeting Life's Challenges
* Positive Mindset Workouts
* Stopping Anxiety and Worry
* Coping with Fear
* Powering up for College
* Coping with Grief
* Embracing one's self
...and many more!

Additionally, we have a sleep library including beloved classic stories from novels such as The Secret Garden, Siddhartha, Three Men in a Boat and Tom Sawyer.  

If you're into something a little different, Mindwell also includes a series of ASMR tracks which were created to tingle your spine while lulling you into a sense calm.

Get the newest generation of Mindfulness apps today! ‚Äì Download Mindwell now.


Subscription Pricing and Terms:
Mindwell offers an annual subscription for $49.99/year.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on your country of residence.

comments: A wonderful piece of work that inspires the mind and guide it. I have had mental blockades in the past that it helped. When my mental health started to decline those roadblocks became mountains that seemed too large for just an app to overcome. But I found my peace when resorting to Mindwell when trying to figure myself out. The application itself does wonders. Even when there's the occasional bug or issue, if you think of the issue presented as an obstacle rather than a bug you may learn more.

Offers like approximately 30-50 things you'd like to work on like meditation, health, mental health, sleeping habits, eating, etc..... BUT YOU CAN ONLY CHOOSE ONE then 3 subsets in that choice. Like, for $60 a year, I'd expect to be able to choose 1-max offered. Not just one. Maybe the paid let's you choose 1-max but if not, you just lost $60 to get one choice out of a ton. Not cool at all.

Better than 90% similar apps, has isochronic techniques to actually improve moods. Made me to rate it too fast in the app - at first day - even back button didn't work. There is 7 day trial, but has some info about cancelling - difficult to be sure it would work. So we probably need to built new amazing habit of keeping our debit card mostly empty to give it a try.

There are many useful features on Mindwell like : Playlist creation to create and share personalized meditation programs, Stats to track meditation minutes and progression towards mindful and mood goals,... I have tried some of them and they are extremely useful!
There are many good things to list about Mindwell : the user-friendly interface, its useful features , outstanding performances,... Nothing to complain at all!

title: Baby Sleep - White Noise
description:
Babies love white noise. They have spent 9 months in the quite loud womb so they are used to "noise". Background white noise is actually calming for your baby and resembles the kind of sounds that he would hear in the womb.

The app contains great selection of soothing white noise and lullabies. It has a simple timer that saves your battery. In addition to that it contains calming "shh-shhhh" sounds recorded by parents. The app does not require internet connection so you can use wherever you are.

Why to use white noise apps?

‚òÖ White noise reduces stress in babies
‚òÖ White noise helps babies to sleep
‚òÖ White noise helps babies to cry less
‚òÖ White noise will help YOU to sleep better

The app contains following sounds:

‚òÖ Rain ‚òÖ Forest ‚òÖ Ocean ‚òÖ Wind ‚òÖ River ‚òÖ Night ‚òÖ Fire ‚òÖ Heart ‚òÖ Car ‚òÖ Train ‚òÖ Plane ‚òÖ Washing machine ‚òÖ Vacuum cleaner ‚òÖ Clock ‚òÖ Fan ‚òÖ Radio ‚òÖ Hair dryer ‚òÖ Shower ‚òÖ White Noise ‚òÖ Brown Noise ‚òÖ Pink Noise ‚òÖ 4 gentle lullabies

Enjoy the app!

comments: Exactly what I need! A lightweight, simple app with a variety of sleep and soothing sounds. We use it all night and every nap time for my son. We co-sleep part the night so I put it on in both our rooms, and I'm sleeping much better myself now that I'm not being woken up as much by random noises. I think I'll sleep with white noise on for myself indefinitely! It's great.

No good with ads. Often the noise stops by itself or starts pausing. Currently the brown noise goes on for 2 minutes then goes off. Trying to re-install to see if that helps matters. Used to be brilliant but now pop up ads come up which startle baby or stop sounds. Quite annoying as app itself is good

The ads are too loud in the free version! The reason we use this app is to calm down the baby. But suddenly ads pop up and wake up the baby completely. We understand it is a free version and ads are necessary but they could be at least without sound.

Adds pop up when you need to turn on/off the music. The baby loves sleeping with this music but after he falls asleep adds with sound wakes him up. You have to wait a lot of seconds before using the app. You can"t switch it off by closing all apps because it runs in the background. The price is very high for switching off the apps. Too bad. It was my favorite before this. Now I have to uninstall it and find another one.

I've used this app with both my kids and its been great. But the recent introduction of ads with sound is completely ridiculous! I'm trying to get my baby to sleep and change the white noise type and get a ridiculous loud ad that wakes her up! It completely defeats the object of an app to help with sleep. I'm uninstalling and will use another.

comments: Absolutely beautiful music for relaxing or sleep... I really like the songs on here! I also like that the music repeats and loops indefinitely but you could also set a timer.. However I am upset that some songs can't play unless you connect to the internet.. I wish the developer add all the songs or give an option to download them for offline play.
Relaxing lovely music, great that it has a timer and turns itself off. Great app.
Nice variety of relaxing music to help you sleep. The timer feature gives you control over the duration of the music.
Really good selections. Hard to chose a favorite. Easy to relax with this sounds!
Really like what music that I can play. Listen at night when I sleep. Very relaxing. I hope they get a larger music line up. What they have is great for sleeping.

title: Nature Sounds
description:
Join thousands of happy users and enjoy the sounds of the nature for FREE. We have carefully picked sounds of the nature that are great for relaxation or sleeping. All of the sounds are customizable. You can for example add a bit more birds singing or sounds of the cracking fire if you like.

The sounds are realistic and in high quality so you can actually feel like you are walking in the forest or lying on the beach. Soothing sounds of nature can help you relax and sleep better.

comments: Very relaxing, is played everyday. I use this for my son to fall asleep and with the timer it's great. After 10/15 mins, he's normally fast asleep. Sometimes I play it for myself to go asleep too or just have some peace, time to do mindfulness. I love all the different options and sounds available, it's beautiful. üíú The adds can be very annoying and if you hit the back button on your phone, it just stops the app. Other than that, I'm so glad I downloaded it.

I sleep SOOOO much better if I listen to Nature Sounds. I set the timer for 2-4 hours. My favorite is the campfire with piano and wolf or chimes!!! I am also SOOOO happy I can play this app without being connected to the internet. Bonus!! üíñüòªüíñ

Lovely choices of soothing nature sounds to choose from.You can also add other nature sounds or music to make a layered effect. A timer is also available so that the app doesn't run longer than you want! EXCELLENT! ü§©

It was very good app for relaxation nr it was the best ......bt now this time I'm facing a lot of issue with sound cracking......if I add another sound then it's not clear ......the sounds are so amazing bt due to this i am facing a lot of issue ...... Without this i just love this app....please fix this......... supporting team .........nr reply me first ..........
Truly love this app. You can start off with just rain or fire or something else basic. Add in music or night/day creature sounds or all of it! So very versitile, and fits any and every mood so far!

summary: Relaxing bedtime tales to help you fall into a deep and natural sleep
recentChanges: Fix application stop error
comments: I began using this app instead of the one I was using (which was just different rain and thunderstorms). I am really enjoying this one! I have had a glitch here and there, don't mind the ads as they only play in the beginning.. I know they're coming so I turn my phone down until I have the story ready... the stories are great, so many of them to choose from, will more be added? I haven't made it through one entire story yet! Lol sleeping very well, thanks for keeping it free to use!

While I love the concept and there are a few very talented story tellers, EVERY time I've used this app, it stops after about 10 minutes. Just as I start to relax, boom, it just stops. And no, it's not the end--it stops in the middle of the story. My search goes on for a nice sleep app.

This is what I was looking for, the app where they finish the story. I find them very calming, most of the voices are pleasant and it's nice to combine a little relaxation as they do at the beginning. Thankyou for this calming app full of wonder.

Love this app. I don't usually make it more than 3-5 mins & I'm out. I was looking for free sleep stories or a free app because I won't pay a monthly or yearly fee for Calm or Headspace. This app folks the bill & it has SO MANY stories & sounds! Thank you!!

This app is exactly what I was looking for ,its all FREE! all the stories and music are FREE! the stories are amazing ,the voices are very calm and soothing.i definitely recommend this app for everyone...all the stories are appropriate and soothing for kids and adults...if you are reading this definitely consider this app..

title: Eight Sleep
description:
The Eight Sleep app requires an Eight Sleep Pod or Smart Bed. Some features are not available with certain products. Learn more and get yours at https://www.eightsleep.com

Eight Sleep products give you everything you need to get sleep fit. From dynamic temperature regulation and advanced biometric tracking to sleep coaching and smart home integrations, Eight Sleep products are equipped with the most advanced technology to optimize your rest. 

DYNAMIC TEMPERATURE
Control the full range of temperature, from 55 to 110 degrees Fahrenheit on either side of the bed to enjoy a cooler environment for deeper, longer and uninterrupted sleep. Powered by machine learning and biofeedback, the smart temperature mode automatically adjusts the temperature of your bed throughout the night for optimal sleep.

ADVANCED BIOMETRIC TRACKING
Seamlessly monitor over a dozen physiological and environmental data points such as: time slept, time to fall asleep, time of wake up, respiratory rate, heart rate, heart rate variability, temperature in bed, sleep breaks, light sleep, deep sleep and REM sleep.

SLEEP COACHING
Eight Sleep‚Äôs AI-engine calculates your sleep fitness score and sleep patterns, provides recommended Pod settings and allows you to compare with your friends and peers.

SMART HOME INTEGRATIONS
Integrates with any other Wi-Fi-enabled devices such as Alexa, Google Home, Philips Hue lights or your Wemo coffee maker, etc.

To use the Eight Sleep app, you‚Äôll need Android 4.2 or later. Learn more about Eight Sleep at https://www.eightsleep.com

Have questions? We‚Äôre here to help. Email us at support@eightsleep.com.
