comments: For such a high tech, expensive and niche device -- this application is lacking way too many simple, basic functionalities. How is it that google home integration hasn't been done already? Alexa was done years ago! Also, my warming functionality didn't end with the timer once and I woke up in the middle of the night over heating. I contacted costumer support and all I got was yes, it was a bug. We fixed it -- try again. This happened for 3 nights in a row! Also, why is the default timer 20 hours? Is anyone in bed for 20 hours? Like I mentioned -- is lacking so many basic features.
Functionality has decreased. More errors than ever before. Glitches out. Very disappointed as it used to work seamlessly.
What you ACTUALLY just did, is literally DESTROY the connection and pairing...now, after a year of flawless operation, my bed won't pair to the app and nothing is working. Great job!

This app has me on the brink of returning the entire mattress and smart grid. Since the update we have only had two consecutive nights of the temperature being correct. We specifically changed our internet router to a compatible mesh network solely for the purpose of making this bed work. Since the app and wifi are the only means of controlling the hub/temperature, something that was a terrible error on the design team, more often than not you end up with an expensive 'dumb' bed. Fix the app!

Having issues sharing data. My fiancee has an iPhone and I have an Android and there seems to be an issue with how she can enable her data to be viewed by me. She can see mine but there is no option for her to make hers available even after following the instructions. Any help would be appreciated. Other than that, everything works great.

title: Rise ‚Äî Sleep Better
description:
Become a better sleeper using 100 years of sleep science. Teams in the NFL, MLB, NBA, MLS, SEC, ACC, BIG10, BIG12, PAC12, Fortune 500 trust Rise to help their people become better sleepers.

FROM THE RISE COMMUNITY:

*****
Chase M.
"Rise helped me understand how vital sleep truly is. In only a few weeks, I found myself more focused, energetic, and productive at work."

***
Becky G.

"I could see where sleep debt was causing issues, temper short, not comprehending things, moving slowly.‚Ä® I had an epiphany... I'm getting 45min more sleep on average than I was before Rise."

****
Katie B.

"I never thought too much about the impact of sleep on my mood. Using Rise I saw a very fast improvement in my sleep which impacted my relationship with my kiddos."

FEEL BETTER
There's one thing that matters most to get the benefits of sleep. Surprisingly, it's not sleep stories, meditations, a new mattress, getting 8 hours of sleep, following sleep hygiene or your sleep score.

The most important thing is called Sleep Debt. It's not a score we made up. It's one of the most important findings in the last century of sleep science. It's important because when your sleep debt is low your daily quality of life is better and you live longer. When that number is high, the opposite happens.

Rise teaches you what Sleep Debt is, how it works and how much you have. You'll finally understand why some days you feel great and others not so much. You'll know the days when you want to prioritize sleep and the real impact of staying up later.

GUIDANCE JUST FOR YOU
Everyone has different sleep challenges. Maybe your mind is active at night or you might be staying up late scrolling or watching Netflix.

Based on your input and the latest sleep science, we'll recommend habits that help you finally feel better.

Sleep Challenges we can help with include:
- Getting to bed on time
- Difficulty Falling asleep
- Waking up during the night
- Feeling groggy in the morning & during the day

OPTIMIZE YOUR DAY
Every one of us has a clock in our brain. It tells every cell when to be alert and active and when to be recovering. We all have unique times during the day when we feel and perform our best. We also have individual times when we should be sleeping and waking up. We use advanced algorithms to let you know when your peaks are and the best times to be sleeping.

AUTOMATICALLY TRACK SLEEP
Using data already stored on your iPhone we automatically track how much sleep you get. No buttons to push, nothing to wear, or charge. We integrate with Apple Health, Fitbit, Oura, Garmin, Sleep Cycle, and other sleep trackers to put the data you already have to use. Rise integrates with Google Fit for step and activity data related to your sleep.


OTHER FEATURES
- Configure habit notifications through SMS.
- Keep track of your sleep quality.

WHY WE STARTED RISE
We started Rise because we‚Äôre in the midst of an insufficient sleep epidemic (CDC, 2014) that is getting worse since we started tracking in 1985. The current epidemic is leading to higher mortality rates (Cappuccio, 2010) and we‚Äôre performing worse in nearly all aspects of life (RAND, 2016).

Today, most of us think of sleep as a luxury. Rise is creating a world where healthy sleep is standard.


Terms of Service available at: bit.ly/rise-sleep-app-tos

comments: Concept good, app is not working properly. It took some weird sleep times off of my phone so I adjusted those the best I could remember. Then it started recording times off of phone movement, counting it as sleeping for 2 hours. In the morning, between 6:40 and 8:40 when I'm getting ready to go to work. And although you can report the inaccurate time but can't delete it so it counts towards your sleep depth. Uninstalled.

This app is amazing .I've been using for such a short time and i already love it .This app has already helped me address my sleep issues head on and i am working on it. I already see a change because of this app .This app is easy to use and user friendly. Great layout of the app .A great all for all ages i highly recommend this app.

This is a great app . If you want to get into a good place mentally then your sleep game needs to get in shape and this is the best possible starting point you can take . This is much different then any of the other apps I've tried as this offers a solution to your sleep issues .

Just really needs work. Times wouldn't take, brain dump says error and then have to wait until main page reloads. **Could** be a great app but atm it's frustrating to only access half of the features they show. Frustration isn't ideal for better rest hahaha

Glitchy AF. Literally would not accept the times I tried to tell it that I went to bed or woke up. It decided it would only accept certain times. Better be an upgrade faster or I will ditch this waste of time.

title: Doze - Sleep Sounds & Stories
description:
Upgrade your sleep experience with ultra-relaxing sounds and stories that are designed to give you incredible sleep.


BENEFITS
‚Ä¢ Fall asleep quickly
‚Ä¢ Stay asleep throughout the night
‚Ä¢ Wakeup refreshed
‚Ä¢ Reduce chronic pain
‚Ä¢ Re-energize yourself
‚Ä¢ Relieve Stress
‚Ä¢ Lower Anxiety

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Soothing Psycho-Acoustic Music; designed based on clinically validated principles to ease your body into a deep state of relaxation.
‚Ä¢ Nature Sounds and White Noise; including rain, ocean, thunder, train, fan and much more
‚Ä¢ Sleepy Stories; doze off quickly with ultra-relaxing stories
‚Ä¢ Sleep Meditations; embedded with a variety of proven techniques that help you clear your mind
‚Ä¢ Sleep Journeys; tranquilly explore new places and experiences using peaceful guided imagery
‚Ä¢ Dreamy Myths; fall asleep to ancient myths.
‚Ä¢ Nap Meditations; allow yourself to quickly re-energize during the day
‚Ä¢ Hypnosis; transform your depth and quality of sleep by re-programming your subconscious mind
‚Ä¢ A variety of incredible narrators to choose from
‚Ä¢ Sleep Timer; set Doze to automatically stop after a period of time.
‚Ä¢ Volume Mixer; control the voice and music volumes separately to get your perfect balance between the two.
‚Ä¢ Offline Compatible; download your favorite content to listen later in airplane mode.
‚Ä¢ Narration Looping
‚Ä¢ Narration Speed; speed up or slow down the narrator's voice
‚Ä¢ Random Modes; don't like choosing? Automatically chose a random from your favorites or a particular content category.
‚Ä¢ Privacy Focused; no ads, no marketing emails, no logins or passwords, no accounts, no crazy permissions. In the age of information intrusion, Doze is specifically designed to leave you alone.


WHO WE ARE
For years we‚Äôve been pushing the boundaries of "functional music" with Pzizz, our app that helps people beat their insomnia and get great sleep.

We write pretty extensively about the Science behind Pzizz on our blog (blog.pzizz.com), and spend an enormous amount of time turning research into reality.

Our formula has proven pretty successful for Pzizz, and influences a new streamlined sleep experience that we've built with Doze.

‚Ä¢ Re-energize yourself
‚Ä¢ Relieve Stress
‚Ä¢ Lower Anxiety

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Soothing Psycho-Acoustic Music; designed based on clinically validated principles to ease your body into a deep state of relaxation.
‚Ä¢ Nature Sounds and White Noise; including rain, ocean, thunder, train, fan and much more
‚Ä¢ Sleepy Stories; doze off quickly with ultra-relaxing stories
‚Ä¢ Sleep Meditations; embedded with a variety of proven techniques that help you clear your mind
‚Ä¢ Sleep Journeys; tranquilly explore new places and experiences using peaceful guided imagery
‚Ä¢ Dreamy Myths; fall asleep to ancient myths.
‚Ä¢ Nap Meditations; allow yourself to quickly re-energize during the day
‚Ä¢ Hypnosis; transform your depth and quality of sleep by re-programming your subconscious mind
‚Ä¢ A variety of incredible narrators to choose from
‚Ä¢ Sleep Timer; set Doze to automatically stop after a period of time.
‚Ä¢ Volume Mixer; control the voice and music volumes separately to get your perfect balance between the two.
‚Ä¢ Offline Compatible; download your favorite content to listen later in airplane mode.
‚Ä¢ Narration Looping
‚Ä¢ Narration Speed; speed up or slow down the narrator's voice
‚Ä¢ Random Modes; don't like choosing? Automatically chose a random from your favorites or a particular content category.
‚Ä¢ Privacy Focused; no ads, no marketing emails, no logins or passwords, no accounts, no crazy permissions. In the age of information intrusion, Doze is specifically designed to leave you alone.


WHO WE ARE
For years we‚Äôve been pushing the boundaries of "functional music" with Pzizz, our app that helps people beat their insomnia and get great sleep.

We write pretty extensively about the Science behind Pzizz on our blog (blog.pzizz.com), and spend an enormous amount of time turning research into reality.

Our formula has proven pretty successful for Pzizz, and influences a new streamlined sleep experience that we've built with Doze.

title: Rain Sounds - Sleep Ambiance
description:
If you are anything like us, you probably work hard and, when it is time to relax, you appreciate a healthy level of tranquility. Whether you are trying to wind down after a busy day, perform some daily yoga, create ambiance for your relaxation and meditation or simply catch some sleep, you are very much able to while listening to the soothing sound of rain.
Prepare yourself for a truly unique experience! Find yourself in the middle of a thunderstorm, exercise control over thunders and lightnings, make your rainy soundscape just with a simple touch, set a sleep timer and let the rain wash your soul.

If you need a bit of tranquility in your life, this is the app for you. Come and grab it for free!

UNIQUE (or SPECIAL) FEATURES:
- Authentic high quality rain sounds professionally mastered for relaxation and meditation
- Adjustable rainfall, thunder and lightning intensities
- Soothing white noise that helps block distracting sounds in your environment
- Realistic illumination effects, suitable to create visual lightning simulation in darker environments
- Timer system, so you can drift off to sleep without the sounds playing all night long
- Background play, while using other apps

WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK!
If you like our app, we encourage you to take a minute to rate it and write a positive review. Thank you!

comments: Rain helps me sleep it always has. A couple hours probably seems like awhile for running time. But when the rain stops I wake up and have to turn it back on, just wish it was non stop :) It's a really good app. I've used it on and off for i think 5 years. Love it

I love this app and have had it for years. The only problem I've had is that the sounds gets real quiet and then real loud. And it's not the loud that bothers me. It's how quiet it gets. It wakes me up sometimes and I wish there was a way to turn that off. But other than that, wonderful.

This is a great app. It has very realistic sounds and great sound options. My only complaint is that the app shuts off before the timer ends and sometimes the sound gets staticky. But overall it's a great app.
Absolutely love the app. I like being able to adjust the specific volumes. Now I just need a way to cast this to my Google home.
Excellent. Very realistic sounds and I Really like how you can regulate the intensity of all the storm elements. You can even have flashes of lightening. Superb.

Trouble to fall asleep? Insomnia? Snoring partner? Want to relieve stress and anxiety?

Sounds for sleep and rest will help get rid of insomnia, begin to fall asleep like a baby, finally relax or concentrate and do meditation.

Try and be amazed at how easy it is to fall asleep with soothing sounds for sleeping. Choose and combine your own sounds mixes to relieve stress or increase concentration. Set a timer and do not worry about the battery of the phone, the timer will smoothly drown out sounds.

High quality sounds. Good range. Good UI. Good customization ¬£10??? You kidding? Drop the price and I will raise my score. Might even buy it.
Wonderful selection of calming sounds. Ability to customize is a major plus. Never slept better.
I absolutely love it! Helps alot on a restless night or during an anxiety.

title: Brain Waves for Sleep üí§: Alpha Waves, Delta Waves
description:
Brain Waves app you can easily listen pure waves that will stimulate your concentration, meditation or relaxation.

They are emitted on an amplitude range between 8 and 15 Hz: these kind of waves are associated with a state of deep relaxation and stress release. Alpha waves are strictly connected with relaxed mental states, so increase in alpha wave activity is a desirable outcome for some types of biofeedback training.

Alpha waves are one type of brain waves predominantly originate from the occipital lobe during wakeful relaxation with closed eyes.

Relaxing Music for Deep Sleep with Delta Waves, Calm Background for Sleeping, Meditation , Yoga.

A delta wave is a high amplitude brain wave with a frequency of oscillation between 0‚Äì4 hertz. Delta waves, like other brain waves, are recorded with an electroencephalogram (EEG) and are usually associated with the deep stage 3 of NREM sleep, also known as slow-wave sleep (SWS), and aid in characterizing the depth of sleep.

title: Sleep Baby Sleep
description:
Sleep Baby Sleep is a FREE app to help your baby fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer. Simple one-click design to select and start a white noise that will gently lull your precious one to sleep. Made especially for busy parents by a busy parent.

Sleep Baby Sleep includes six white noises:

- Fan
- Hairdryer
- Vacuum cleaner
- Heartbeat
- Running Water
- Womb Sounds

You can Start and Stop the white noise or use a Timer feature for a preset period of time.

Sweet Dreams!

title: Polyphasic Sleep
description:
The most valuable resource in the modern world is time, a third of which we spend on sleeping. However, you can increase your awake time up to 22 hours by sleeping more than once a day at regular intervals. This kind of sleep is called polyphasic sleep. 

This app allows you to choose from different polyphasic sleep schedules. After that it will remind you when it's time to go to sleep, and, of course, will wake you up on time. 

Sleep schedules you can choose from:
Biphasic ‚Äî 5-7 hours during the night and 20 minutes during the day (3 variants)
Segmented  (2 variants)
Dual-Core Sleep (4 variants)
Triphasic (2 variants)
Everyman ‚Äî 1.5-3.5 hours during the night and 20 minutes during the day for 3 times (3 variants)
Dymaxion ‚Äî 30 minutes for 4 times a day (2 variants)
Uberman ‚Äî 20 minutes for 6 times a day
Tesla ‚Äî 20 minutes for 4 time a day

just downloaded, clean and no bs.. you have to pay for it and its only $.99 (lots of negitive comments were that's it forces you to pay). if your going to be a badass you may just have to spend a lil money. This app is under grade, I like it a lot. It is simple and easy to use. It would be nice if it have more alarm options.

title: Sleep Away
description:
Sleep Away is a sleep management application that provides two main functions:

Manage your sleep. By letting Sleep Away calculate your sleep cycles, you can either set your alarm to wake up feeling well rested if you go to sleep now, or set a reminder to go to bed at a calculated time, so you wake up when you need to. Sleep Away also lets you set an alarm for a quick power nap. 

Listen to white noise. Sleep Away contains a few sounds that you can listen to while you fall asleep. Those currently are: Heater, Rain and Campfire. No need to worry about turning the sound off - the application contains a timer that will automatically shut off the sound after it counts down. You can let your phone sleep and just relax.
descriptionHTML:
Sleep Away is a sleep management application that provides two main functions:

Manage your sleep. By letting Sleep Away calculate your sleep cycles, you can either set your alarm to wake up feeling well rested if you go to sleep now, or set a reminder to go to bed at a calculated time, so you wake up when you need to. Sleep Away also lets you set an alarm for a quick power nap.

Listen to white noise. Sleep Away contains a few sounds that you can listen to while you fall asleep. Those currently are: Heater, Rain and Campfire. No need to worry about turning the sound off - the application contains a timer that will automatically shut off the sound after it counts down. You can let your phone sleep and just relax.
summary: Manage your sleep & listen to white noise sounds and wake up refreshed.

comments: Update: develope quickly responded to the review so i gave one more star. :) It looks like a really good app and it's very minimalist which i love...but i cant seem to set an alarm! The app keeps crashing. Could it be my older phone model causing it? (Android 4.4.4 Samsung galaxy mega)

Exceptional but... My experience using this app was and still is quite good but I would recommend the developers add an I want to sleep at feature. Then I can pre plan my schedule. Thanks for listening. Overall you should download the app.
I mostly use this app for the sleep sounds and to approximately calculate when I should wake up. It does its job. If you'd add more sounds it would be awesome!

I havint used this app yet properly but i was reading through some of the replies to the reviews and it made me chuckle! Your so upfront and i love it! Will give your app a try and come back. Your honesty really made me wanna try this app am really hoping it works for me!

the app is great, at least the alarm-setting aspect of it, but the white noise playing thing is quite the opposite. The tracks are looped and while that works perfectly fine with the fan noise, the fire and the rain have a very easy to recognize pattern to them, which doesn't help you fall asleep but in fact does the opposite because my mind finds the pattern and keeps following it as if im listening to some king of limbs style music.

title: Deep Sleep with Andrew Johnson
description:
Start your journey to a better sleep here. If you‚Äôre having trouble sleeping, whether through stress or anxiety, this app will help you relax for a better sleep experience.

This guided and gentle meditation is designed to lower stress and take away anxiety, so that you fall into a restful sleep, meaning you wake up the next day feeling energised, refreshed and ready to take on the day.

Ultra-relaxing, this app is designed to help with insomnia and sleep anxiety. Listen in bed for a state of deep calm ‚Äì use this sleep meditation to relax, switch your mind off and stay asleep all night.

Destress, improve your mindset, sleep better, grow your confidence and be healthier with guided meditations, mindfulness sessions and positive messages ‚Äì and much more.

Mindfulness expert, coach and therapist Andrew Johnson has been helping people deal with life‚Äôs challenges with guided relaxations, meditations, self-care tools and breathing exercises for many years. 

His best-selling range of mindfulness apps have a variety of content to help you, whether you are looking for ways to reduce stress and anxiety, lose weight, improve your health & confidence, learn relaxation techniques, etc.

Key features:

  ‚Ä¢ Short meditations you can do anywhere: at work, commuting, at home, walking.

  ‚Ä¢Inspirational sessions to help you tackle life‚Äôs challenges, to be calm and find clarity.

  ‚Ä¢Mindfulness stories and talks to help you build better, healthy habits.

  ‚Ä¢Meditations to help you feel inspired and find motivated to eat well, workout and stay 
   healthy both in body and mind.

  ‚Ä¢Relaxation techniques and tools to help you sleep better every night, to wake feeling 
   energised and refreshed.

  ‚Ä¢Breathing exercises and calming meditations for anxiety, panic attacks and stress relief.

  ‚Ä¢Meditation sessions to stop anxiety in its tracks and release stress.

How do I get more?

Start your day mindfully, keep feeling positive and be inspired throughout the day with a range of guided meditations to help during tough or stressful moments. Boost your energy with a Power Nap, stay focussed to Beat Procrastination, and then drift off using a Deep Sleep meditation for a restful night.

Think of Andrew as your personal mindfulness coach, always there to help when you need him most.

Search for Andrew Johnson to unlock more daily mindfulness and guided meditation sessions.

comments: Edit: The 11:26 is the intro, it keeps going after that ends, according to your settings. This app is the first thing I install on a new phone, I've loved it for years now. It has helped me cope with unmanaged insomnia, chronic pain, and severe migraines. I often just rewind the initial relaxation intro if I don't fall asleep the first time. He has a lovely soothing voice, with a pleasant Scots accent, and the guidance is just what I need to calm my racing ADHD brain during times of distress.

Have had this app for years, we refer to it as "the Scotsman". When I want to get to sleep fast, when I'm having trouble getting to sleep or wake up and can't back to sleep. "Let's use the Scotsman?" Love it.

I've had this app for years now, and have loved it and recommend to many, but recent update has changed a lot. At first I thought it was just the look of the app and that's fine with me, but I actually think there is a now less content, it's only about 7mins long, and though you can put on repeat, previously it was far longer and no need to repeat

I LOVED this and many of Andrew's apps. But the new update changed one thing that I do not like. If the session is repeated... There's a new part where his voice is louder and woke me up every time it played... Before I wanted it to wake me. I love the new look of the app but can I have the old version back????? Please????

I have used this app for years. After the last update, I can only listen to 11 minutes and 26 seconds. It will not allow me to listen to anymore. I would like this fixed or a refund on my purchase. Thanks

title: Relax Forest - Nature sounds: sleep & meditation
description:
Relax with the best sounds of the forest. Fall asleep faster and sleep better!

Ideal for relaxing, sleeping, meditation, concentration, or if you have problems with tinnitus (ear ringing).

The app plays different sounds of the forest, the sounds played in this way are also known as white noise.
White noise has beneficial effects on the body and mind because, covering the noise of the external environment, promotes relaxation and concentration.

You can set the timer and put your app in background or turn off the screen. At the end of the time, the sound fades gently and the application closes by itself. So you do not have to worry about closing the app if you fall asleep.

Do you have trouble going to sleep? This app helps you sleep by blocking distractions. Now you can asleep faster and sleep better!
You can say goodbye to your insomnia! Improve your life!

Use it after a stressful day to regain your inner peace. Go into your oasis of calm.


*** Application features ***

- 29 perfectly looped sounds
- timer system that slowly fades audio out
- auto-pause sounds on incoming call
- volume controls
- quick menu
- usage in the background and with other apps
- no streaming is required for playback (no data connection required)
- pause and play sounds


*** List of sounds ***

- Chirping in the woods
- Brook in autumn
- Brook in the forest
- Lodge on the pond
- Creek in the forest
- Woods at sunset
- Shack near the stream
- Waterfall in the forest
- Nightingale singing
- Wild jungle
- Lodge in the rainforest
- Brook at sunset
- Chirping after rain
- Forest on the island
- Sleeping in the pine forest
- Essence of the wild
- Tropical palm grove
- Magic of the forest
- Woodpeckers at sunrise
- Exploring the jungle
- Night in the wood
- Mysterious forest
- Dawn in the Amazon
- Tropical storm
- Urban forest
- Downpour in the woods
- Mountain lake
- The quiet after the storm
- The enchanted source


*** Usage notes ***

For a better experience, I recommend you the use of headphones or earphones to listen the relaxing sounds.
You can use the app in background and with other apps.

comments: Lots of different sounds to choose from. Only occasional adverts which can be turned of after a few seconds. I like that you can alter the music and chosen nature sound separately; one can be louder than the other. I use this app most nights to fall asleep. Works every time.

It totally relaxes me and I end up falling asleep even if I'm not trying to go to sleep I will fall asleep wherever I am sitting or even if I'm over at a friend's house or my family's house if this music comes on it's game over for me because I'm bound to fall asleep anyways that's how relaxing it is at least for me anyway
Does exactly what I want. Background sounds for sleeping with a timer and multiple sounds. Ads are aminor inconvenience.
Love it the sounds are great it has a calming effect.
Chirping sounds really well collected with good background wood photography.

title: Sleep Analyzer
description:
Sleep Analyzer ‚Äì Smart alarm as well as monitor your sleeping movements. Never lose your sleep movements records. Track your movements during the night time and wake up better each morning during light sleep.

How many hours did you deep sleep at last nights? Obviously this matters, Sleep Analyzer is perfect application and will compute your full sleep tracking records. One of the best sleep movement tracking android application, Sleep Analyzer turns your android phone to an intelligent, sleep tracking device.

Sleep Analyzer is not the only sleep application that includes: motion and sound graphs, sleep  log, statistics trend graphs, sleep movement history. Since you move differently in bed at sleep time, it will track which state you are in and record your movement data.

How Sleep Analyzer Works: 

To use Sleep Analyzer, just turn on the application on your android phone when you go to bed and set alarm timer. Throughout the night time, Sleep Analyzer will record your sleep movements as you sleep position and analyze your movements.

Next morning, you‚Äôll see a sleep movement chart that shows you how much time you spent in deep sleep, little sleep, and almost awake sleep. 

Advanced Features:
  
Alarm rings even in silent mode.
Light saving facility available.
Advanced, reliable and eyes healthy graphics resolution.
Providing last Weekly alarm report and full history in graphs.
No glasses required for read tracking data.
You can set your sleep timer to increment or decrements the time range.
Advanced statistics and charts that help to understand your sleep cycle. 
Share sleep tracking record on social media also.
Track your sleep duration, sleep level efficiency with the one tap of a button.

Enjoy Free Sleep Analyzer and share your Feedback and suggestion with us, we need more supports! View more about Sleep Analyzer updates at https://www.facebook.com/SleepAnalyzer

Have any queries and suggestion regarding this android application then kindly contact to biz@a1brains.net

Your suggestions and opinions are valuable for us. Thanks...

Best asmr app and it doesn't upset my wife, since there's no women involved. Lmao

This app is my savior! This app deserves so much more attention and downloads. I just recently found this after looking to replace another ASMR app on my phone. I love the mixing options and volume control. I also love that you can set a play timer, and it tells you what time the recording will stop. This will help me sleep!

I love that you can pick different sounds, mix them together. And I love the volume, it wasn't to bad, it was, perfect! But.. Don't download if you don't like, nature sounds or ASMR. My only complain is there isn't that many options.

title: Colors: Anti-Stress, Relax, Sleep
description:
Do you need help on a stressful day? Are you overwhelmed? Do you have trouble sleeping? Colors helps you eliminate stress, relax or fall asleep easily, quickly and safely with a new way of improving emotions through color and the senses.

Experience the almost magical experience of immersing yourself in color light while listening to the sound of color with the sonocromatic compositions by Neil Harbisson.

Colors is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free.

Neil Harbisson @neilharbisson is the first cyborg in the world officially accepted by a government. The antenna implanted in his skull allows him to have a new sense: the ability to hear colors. Neil Harbisson has achromatism, a visual condition as a result of which he sees the world in grayscale.

Silvia Llad√≥s L√≥pez @silvia_colors, had a physical health problem that led her to investigate how exposure to color light can help us improve our emotional state and well-being.

Together they have developed Colors, an app that uses game, color psychology and stimulation through light and the sound of color, to find out the emotional state and eliminate stress, relax or fall asleep easily, quickly and safely .
The app has the support and advice of experts in the field of health.

Colors for Children:
(+4) used together with an adult. Ideal to help parents discover the emotional state of their children and help them every day to improve their emotions and fall asleep easily.

HOW IT WORKS:

1. You can use the app everywhere and anytime (works in airplane mode)

2. Unlimited access to free content without ads:

¬∑ Play to find your color
Drag, add, paint and remove colors for a few seconds to relax your mind, and decide, without thinking, what color you like most at this time. The color you choose will express how you feel.

¬∑ Discover the meaning of your color and how it can help you.

¬∑ Immerse yourself in color light using your mobile or tablet.
Do sessions anywhere, anytime! Wake up refreshed and happier with the wake-up option!

¬∑ Check your progress
Access the "Me" screen (silhouette icon) to see all your previous sessions, favorite colors, and check your progress.

Use it also in massage sessions, during a short nap, and even to make your child fall asleep faster!

3. Listen to the sound of color with the ‚ÄúSonochromatic Waves‚Äù by Neil Harbisson.

Live the almost magical experience of immersing yourself in color light while listening to the sound of color in all its amplitude.

Activate, through a subscription, the sonochromatic wave compositions Neil Harbisson has created for each color range that you can listen to while performing the light sessions.

A total of six sonochromatic waves that will let you experience an almost magical and unreal experience!

When setting up your session or scheduling your alarm clock, access the option ‚ÄúWaves‚Äù.


Colaborate with us:
Part of the benefits of the subscription are used to conduct scientific studies to investigate the benefits of exposure to color through light and sound stimulation.
Some content is only available through a subscription . If you choose to subscribe, the payment will be charged to your Google account at the time of subscription confirmation.

Put color to your life! Feel refreshed and happier

Tell us how you lived this experience! hello@colorstheapp.info

Copyright ¬© ColorsTheApp
"Sonochromatic Waves": Copyright ¬© Neil Harbisson

title: Deep Sleep Hypnosis & Relax Meditation
description:
Adults need between 7 and 9 hours of sleep each night. In healthy adults, about 13 to 23 percent of your sleep is deep sleep.

During deep sleep, a variety of functions take place in the mind and body:
üí≠- Memories are consolidated
‚ù§Ô∏è- Learning and emotions process
üí™- Physical recovery occurs
üç¨- Blood sugar levels and metabolism balance out
üíâ- The immune system is energized
üß†- The brain detoxifies

Without deep sleep, these functions cannot take place and the very harmful symptoms of sleep deprivation, insufficient sleep or sleeplessness kick in. A chronic sleep-restricted state adversely affects the brain and cognitive function. 

Learn how to sleep well. Hypnosis for sleep as Sleeping aid to fall asleep into a deep sleep in seconds and sleep well helps as an insomnia relief at bedtime or to get a power nap. Learn to get deep relaxation and clear your mind and falling back to sleep like a baby in the middle of the night. It will help you disarming nightmares and rest better with a good dream so you will wake up early easily without a clock alarm besides of to Reduce Anxiety.

Guided meditation for sleep Relaxation can get Delta Waves Relaxation. Sleep deeply is very useful as Stress Relief, Anxiety Relief and get Instant Calm. You also can practice Sleep Meditation with Deep Sleep Music and Calming Sleep Music to Anxiety Reduction and have good dreams.

Fight against insomnia with deep sleep hypnosis and guided sleep meditation to Fall Asleep Fast. Dont get nervous at bedtime because using Hypnotherapy to hypnotize yourself using relaxing hypnotic music for sleeping aid and with deep sleep meditation hypnosis with sleep sounds you will get Mind Body Spirit Cleansing while you are sleeping and dreaming.

title: Do Not Sleep
description:
Do Not Sleep will keep the screen of the device on, as long as its service is running.

If the app fails to prevent your sleep to fall asleep, the app can selected to use an alternative method, which changes the display timeout. The methods can be toggled via the app's menu.

Successfully tested on devices of the following brands, without alternative method:
- OnePlus
- Xiaomi
- Huawei

The use of this app will cause a high battery drain... Use with caution!

A simple, yet effective app!

title: Sleep Debt Tracker - Automatic
description:
This beautiful little app detects when you sleep without pressing a button! 

It motivates you to get enough sleep, helps you understand your sleep debt and automatically calculates your bedtime for you. 

You can even turn on highly obnoxious notifications to stop you watching videos until the wee hours of the morning.

This is perfect for students, shift workers, pilots, train drivers, truck drivers and the like. It's also great for casual users to see how much sleep you get without touching a button, much less buying an expensive fitness tracker!

PRO FEATURES (Unlock in app):
üî∏ No ads
üî∏ One of the coolest alarm widgets available with completely customizable colors!

SLEEP DEBT TRACKER FEATURES:
‚óΩ Automatic sleep detection. You don't need to press a button when you think you might go to sleep. 
‚óΩ Battery usage less than 1% per day
‚óΩ You can automatically turn on Do Not Disturb while you're sleeping so your chat groups don't keep buzzing you awake
‚óΩ Integrates with your phone alarm, and with most 3rd party alarm apps
‚óΩ Uses motion, light and phone screen detection to estimate when you are sleeping or awake
‚óΩ No radiation and no special phone placement necessary. It works in flight mode or even if you turn your phone off!

title: Sleep Cycle  - Sleep Calculator Alarm Clock
description:
Does your phone alarm wake you up angry, make you mad for the whole day, and sometimes not even go off? Our sleep calculator will help you fall asleep and wake up in the most natural way and help you get your day started full of energy and with a smile on your face.

Waking up in the middle of a sleep cycle can leave you groggy and ruin your whole day. Our app helps you find the perfect moment to wake up or fall asleep in order to maximize your sleep and keep you fresh all day. A normal sleep cycle lasts 90 minutes and, using that as a foundation, our app calculates the exact moment when you‚Äôre brain and body are ready to awaken.

Our app uses natural sounds to slowly bring you out of your sleep cycle and make sure you are wide awake. Once you have selected the sound of your choice, the sound will be played slowly and steadily, increasing in volume, for one minute.
There are eight natural sounds you can choose from:

- Bird Song
- Birds in the forest
- Ambient loop
- Gentle piano
- Seaside Sounds
- Garden
- Rapid river  
- Kenyan Savannah Grassland 

The app allows you to choose:
- when to wake up
- when to go to sleep
- when to wake up if you sleep now

You can also set up alarm with the app and browse all "Sleep Time" alarms inside our app.
This app is perfect for modern people who often don't get enough sleep. This app allows you to maximize the amount and quality of sleep you get and make sure you are never late (or groggy) to a class or meeting again!

Features:
- calculates when to wake up and when to sleep to feel great
- calculates when to wake up if you are already asleep now
- add an alarm by clicking on a time
- light and Dark themes
- choose from 8 natural sounds
- browse all "Sleep Time" alarms inside the app

title: Oura
description:
Measuring signals from your body using a ring, Oura delivers personal insights to empower your everyday.
 

ADVANCED SLEEP MONITORING
See your sleep stages ‚Äî REM, deep, light ‚Äî and discover your ideal bedtime.
 
SIMPLE, PERSONAL INSIGHTS
Three daily scores ‚Äî Sleep, Activity, and Readiness ‚Äî give you a clear understanding of the state of your body with actionable guidance on how to stay balanced.
 
DAILY READINESS SCORE
Find your balance between strain and recovery. Learn how your sleep, activity, and lifestyle choices affect your health each day
 
LONG-TERM TRENDS
View your daily, weekly, and monthly trends, and discover how your choices and environment affect your body.
 
RESTING HEART RATE & HRV
Get a clear picture of your recovery by following changes and trends in your nighttime resting heart rate and heart rate variability.

NIGHTTIME BODY TEMPERATURE
Understand your health and your body‚Äôs rhythms by tracking daily and monthly body temperature variations.
 
DYNAMIC ACTIVITY PROGRESS
Reach dynamic activity goals based on your readiness. Measure your daily activities, calories and steps, and monitor your inactive time. 
 
TAKE A MOMENT
Check in with your body using Oura's Moment feature. Get resting heart rate and HRV insights immediately after a guided meditation or breathing session. 
 
TRACK HABITS WITH TAGS
Customize your experience by adding tags ‚Äî like "caffeine" or "alcohol" ‚Äî and discover how your choices affect your sleep and recovery.
 
CONNECT WITH GOOGLE FIT
Import workouts from your favorite fitness apps, and share your sleep and activity details, and mindful moments with Google Fit.
 
OURA ON THE WEB
Get a more detailed view of your data with Oura's web experience. Create advanced charts and download your data for a deeper analysis.
 
Don‚Äôt have an Oura ring yet? Start your journey at http://ouraring.com.

View compatible devices: https://support.ouraring.com/hc/en-us/articles/360025578613-Compatible-Devices
 
Need help? Visit http://support.ouraring.com to browse FAQs, troubleshooting tips, or to contact our team.

summary: Improve your sleep and transform your health with Oura.
recentChanges:
Introducing Rest Mode
- If you feel a bit under the weather or you need to slow down, the new Rest Mode helps you concentrate on recovery.
- In Rest Mode, your activity goals and metrics are paused, and your daily insights remind you to take it easy.
- You can switch to Rest Mode whenever needed in the app main menu. You may also see a contextual Rest Mode suggestion if your body temperature is elevated, which can be a sign of strain.
comments: Works okay, but I keep messing out my score because I keep forgetting to add my workout instantly and when I try to do so before going to bed, a few hours later, I cannot do it because midnight has passed and the app doesn't let me add workouts for the previous day. I find this very frustrating, and I see no reason to why, since I haven't slept yet.

After using the ring for a full 6 months, I've found it more helpful than smartwatches with sleep tracking that I've used in the past, specifically for tracking trends in when I go to bed and when what I do before bed. This has lead to a significant increase in the quantity and quality of my sleep. Hoping this is just a start. Thanks, Oura.

UPDATE: 3.4.0 has fixed the Android sync issue The most recent app version will not sync at all. When I purchased the ring back in July, syncing was fast and worked every time. Oura has a knowledge base article about this problem but apparently it's not a high priority. To top it off, you can't control syncing, it happens every time you open the app.

Sleep is the most important thing to my wellness as I age. Sleep impacts all aspects of my body, mind, emotions and cognitive performance. I have a stressful job and Oura gives me measurable sleep data that I use to precisely manage my energy, and time better through proper sleep. I'm so grateful for Oura.

Good, but could be better. Lots of information is withheld from being shared to any other apps (ie steps are not sent to Google Fit). Also, information which can be exported to other apps are only done so upon opening the non-Oura app, and only for that day's information. Otherwise, the sleep tracking, heart rate data, and other data obtained is quite informative and useful. For such a small device, it packs a punch!

title: Baby Sleep Sounds
description:
Try baby sleep sounds, if your child has trouble falling asleep..

Continuous, monotonous and loud sounds help your baby to fall asleep. Sound of a hair dryer, washing machine, sound of a train, musicbox (lullaby), white noise, will help your baby fall asleep. These sounds are more effective than music or lullabies, so many parents choosing the simple and effective way of calming their children.

Monotonous, soothing sounds to sleep children, such as white noise are calming for babies because they resemble natural sounds that a babies hear in their mother‚Äôs womb.

When a child has colic or is overstimulated and cannot sleep, try our app, and you'll find that lulling your baby to sleep can be quick and pleasant.

Using baby sleep sounds is very simple: just put the phone at a suitable distance from the child, choose a sound and set the timer that turns off the application after a specified time. After a short time the child should calm down, stop crying and fall asleep.

The application does not require an internet connection.

Application contains a variety of sounds (from reminiscent of white noise to the sounds of nature):
‚óè hair dryer ‚óè washing machine ‚óè vacuum cleaner ‚óè car motor ‚óè nature sounds ‚óè train ‚óè subway ‚óè washer-dryer ‚óè windshield wipers ‚óè mountain stream ‚óè dripping water ‚óè music box (lullaby) ‚óè shower ‚óè white noise ‚óè musicbox ‚óè heartbeat ‚óè purring of a cat and many more.

White noise soothes, calms, reduces stress and will also help you fall asleep.

Caution: do not place your phone or tablet too close to the baby‚Äôs ear.

Amazing! I was skeptical initially, but after trying out several of the sounds (I used the train), we noticed our 5-month colicky baby go to sleep immediately! My husband is downloading the app as well to use whenever we need it!

title: Huckleberry: Baby & Child Tracker, Sleep Experts
description:
Get the parenting guidance you want from our pediatric experts and track your child‚Äôs day-to-day to learn their natural habits. 
 
Huckleberry is a baby sleep, pumping, feeding and growth tracker all in one! 
 
Built from the ground up by parents for parents of young children. Huckleberry understands that each family is unique and a one size fits all approach does not work.

Whether you‚Äôre building up good sleep habits for your newborn, transitioning your infant into a crib, dealing with a sleep regression for your toddler or simply want to know the best time to put your child down for a nap, Huckleberry has you covered. Using AI and an all-star team of baby sleep experts, personalized analysis and guidance can be accessible to more people around the world. Get all of the expertise and personalized step-by-step guidance of a traditional sleep consultant with the convenience of an app.


WHY PARENTS LOVE HUCKLEBERRY‚Ä¶

‚Ä¢ Access to guidance from pediatric sleep experts at the palm of your hands

‚Ä¢ Sleep analysis and detailed, personalized sleep plans for your baby at a fraction of the cost of traditional baby sleep consultants

‚Ä¢ SweetSpot‚ìá: The world‚Äôs first real-time predictive algorithm that lets you know when your child will be tired ‚Äì but not over tired; it‚Äôs sanity-saving, tantrum-reducing and adapts as your child grows

‚Ä¢ Helps manage your child‚Äôs schedule effectively -- no more overtired or hungry babies

‚Ä¢ Single tap logging makes it easy to use ‚Äì even if you only have one hand available

‚Ä¢ Daily charts, stats and summary to monitor your child and baby daily habits

‚Ä¢ Supports profiles for multiple children and synchronizes across devices

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄòNight mode‚Äô option

‚Ä¢ Tracking categories can be turned on and off


HUCKLEBERRY BABY TRACKER

‚Ä¢ Sleep Tracker & Analysis:
- SweetSpot‚ìá: AI predictions of the next optimal time to sleep

‚Ä¢ Feeding, Pumping & Nursing:
- Simple, yet detailed feeding and pumping tracker for breastfeeding, bottle, or solids
- Set reminders when it‚Äôs time to feed your baby
- Makes nursing more convenient with the breastfeeding & pumping timer

‚Ä¢ Nappy: 
Nappy changing tracker makes it easy to log and track your baby‚Äôs output

‚Ä¢ Medication: 
Set reminders for when to give your child their medication

‚Ä¢ Growth Tracker: 
Baby growth tracker makes it easy to keep track of your little one throughout their development milestones

‚Ä¢ Track Temperature 


HUCKLEBERRY PREMIUM - PERSONALIZED SOLUTIONS FROM BABY SLEEP EXPERTS
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive analysis by our team of pediatric baby sleep experts and proprietary algorithms
‚Ä¢ Tailored sleep schedule(s) taking into account your child‚Äôs sleep needs and time constraints
‚Ä¢ Step-by-step guidance to tackle current sleep issues, written by one of our pediatric sleep experts. We won‚Äôt tell you to ‚Äújust cry it out‚Äù or ‚Äúlay your child down drowsy but awake.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ Continued assessment & guidance through nap transitions, sleep disruptions and developmental leaps through 0-5 years of age.
‚Ä¢ Ongoing recommendations based on your child‚Äôs changing needs

Huckleberry offers a simple $14.99 per month auto-renewing membership. It covers one child‚Äôs assessment per month, and may be cancelled anytime.
**This price is for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence

Payment will be charged at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless cancelled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period with the same term (monthly or annual) and same price. Subscriptions may be cancelled in the Settings -> Huckleberry Premium Subscription page in the app.

Terms of Use: https://www.huckleberrycare.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://www.huckleberrycare.com/privacy-policy

recentChanges: - Upgraded to new libraries and a few bug fixes.
comments: Truly an amazing app! It's mine and my husbands lifeline to always knowing what's going on with our son without having to play the guessing game! It's been especially helpful with us having to both work from home and not be able to afford a nanny or trust daycare (he's so young). We use the free version and are impressed I can only imagine what the paid version is like. If I have other kids, better believe this is my go to!! Lol

Brilliant app, especially for first time parents like us. It helped us learn our daughter's patterns and daily routine and, as a result, spot when she wasn't feeding as usual and did in fact have an infection, which we were able to seek help and treat promptly as a result. Would recommend it to anyone!

This app has been a Godsend!! The sweet spot is right on. I no longer have an overtired baby who won't go down for naps. Wish I knew about this sooner. I've been telling all new mom's to get this as well!

LOVE this app! The sweet spot for wake windows for my baby are spot on, and I really like how I can record everything from how long he sleeps, to how long he eats, and even record his diaper output. It's so helpful to have all of his sleep recorded in the app because I would never be able to remember it accurately myself. The app is very easy to navigate and I also like the helpful tips for each new month. I recommend this app to every new mom I know!

I love this tracking app! But as a mom to a newborn and busy 2 years old, I do find it time consuming to enter the app and switch to list view every time I want to check when the last feeding/pumping session/nap time etc, was. It would be nice to have a widget, or some type of "at a glance" option that could stay on my main screen that I could refer back to for when I forget what time I did something last. And being in that sleep deprived newborn stage, I forget a lot these days!

From tropical forest rain to white noise, choose from 160+ sound packs and unleash your creativity. Create the perfect soundscape for anyone of your moods. Relax, focus, meditate or sleep become the master of your audio environment. title: Sleep Timer for Spotify and Music
description:
Now you can stop all music and video players at desired time easily with Sleep Timer for Spotify and Music.

It is compatible with every music and video players at your phone, so you can use it with ease.

Accurate and Reliable
With Sleep Timer for Spotify and Music, you can set the timer then go to sleep without worrying your music or video will be playing all the night.

Simple and Beautiful UI
Simple yet colorful animation to accompany your sleep.

Various actions to choose when you are asleep
With Sleep Timer for Spotify and Music, you can go back to Home Screen, turn off the phone, turn off Wifi, turn off Bluetooth, and activate Silent Mode (DND)

Option to extend the timer
The timer is running out but you are not asleep yet? With Sleep Timer for Spotify and Music, you can extend the timer right from the notification.

Disclaimer
Sleep Timer for Spotify and Music is a third party application to help the user to stop music players, video players and Spotify easily with some extra options. Every music player is belong to their respective owners.

It worked perfectly and I will definitely be using it every night from now on!

title: Bliss sounds: Relax, sleep & meditate
description:
Do you have stress or trouble sleeping at night? Bliss sounds can help you relax, fall asleep and wake up full of energy. All you need to do is choose your favorite melody, lay back and relax.

Bliss sounds come with a large variety of sounds and melodies that will satisfy anyone. Do you want to relax, get rid of stress, meditate or sleep? Bliss sounds can help with carefully designed mixes, melodies and sounds. From nature sounds, to animal sounds, wind and rain sounds, ASMR and noises, baby sounds and melodies, solfeggio, binaural and guided meditations, Bliss has everything you need.

FEATURES
- Easy to use - simply click and listen to sounds and melodies
- A specially designed sound engine that creates highly realistic soundscapes
- 80+ handcrafted mixes and melodies
- 180+ carefully selected and processed sounds
- Create your own melodies using the available sounds and share them with your friends
- Mark your favorite mixes for fast access
- Use a sleep timer to fall asleep to your favorite melodies
- Use a timer to perform your yoga meditation for a specific amount of time
- Set an alarm for your favorite melody and wake up to your favorite nature melodies

Sound mixes
Our sound mixes use a combination of regular sounds, background music and melodies, solfeggio and binaural frequencies, guided meditations and ASMR and are carefully designed to slowly guide the listener into a state of deep relaxation, meditation or sleep. Mixes are divided into the following categories:

- Relax - Relaxing sounds to help you get rid of stress and anxiety
- Sleep - Sounds that help you relax and fall asleep
- Meditate - Sounds for yoga, meditation, focus and concentration
- Brainwave - Mixes that combine different sounds with with binaural and solfeggio frequencies

Sounds
Our large variety of sounds and melodies are divided into the following categories:

- Ambience sounds: city sounds, forest and countryside, room and people sounds, noise
- Animal sounds: birds, crickets and more
- Baby sounds: baby talk, baby laughs and baby tunes and melodies
- Music: music and melodies to play as background with other sounds
- Nature sounds: fire, wind, rain, thunder
- Water sounds: rain, water streams, water drops, sea and ocean waves (great for meditation)
- ASMR: ticking clocks, white noise, pink noise, household devices and more (great for focus and meditation)
- Binaural and solfeggio frequencies: frequencies that stimulate the brain for relaxation, sleep, deep sleep, focus, meditation, dreaming, lucid dreaming, healing, body repair and more

Guided meditations
Created by highly trained professionals, our guided meditations can help you with:

- Breathing relaxation
- Deep relaxation
- Power nap (sleep)
- Deep sleep
- Lucid dreaming

Download the app now and begin the ultimate relaxation experience!

HELP & SUPPORT

- Do you need help with the app? 
- Do you have suggestions on how we can improve it? 
- Do you need new sounds and mixes? 

Email us at support@machapp.net and let us know - we are always happy to hear from you!

title: Sleep Timer üò¥ - Turn music off, turn screen off
description:
Sleep timer turns off your music, videos, and your favorite app when you sleep. Let Sleep timer focus on your phone so you can focus on your sleep. Sleep timer is perfect for adults having trouble falling asleep, sleep timer is perfect to help put your baby to sleep, sleep timer is your perfect tool to help your get more sleep!

Do you want to play music, watch videos, or listen to audio podcasts while you or your baby falls asleep without having to worry about draining the battery? Sleep Timer helps control music presets so you can snooze to relaxing sounds and automatically turn everything off once you're sleeping! It's fast, friendly, easy to use, and great for soothing lullabies! Sleep timer let you fall asleep to your favorite music every night!

Sleep Timer lets you play music, sleep songs, and other relaxing sounds as you drift off to sleep. You can leave your phone or tablet alone knowing that the app will automatically turn the screen off and stop the music after a period of time, allowing you to take a nap without worrying that you'll wake up to a dead battery.

To use sleep timer all you have to do is start listening to music or white noise on your favorite app (Spotify, Youtube) as you fall asleep. Set a timer on the app before you put your phone down, and when the countdown runs out, sleep timer will automatically stop the music or even turn off your phone! It doesn't matter if you're playing white noise videos or listening to a podcast music, the app will take care of your phone to save you battery.

Sleep Timer features:
‚Ä¢ Supports your favorite video, music and audio apps, including Spotify, YouTube, and more.
‚Ä¢ Shake Extend ‚Äì shake your phone to extend the timer in case you're not asleep yet. You don't even have to unlock the phone or open your eyes!
‚Ä¢ Fade Out ‚Äì Sleep Timer automatically lowers the volume at a gentle rate before turning the music off.
‚Ä¢ Customize Sleep Timer - including fade out duration, shake extend options, and more. Plus, turn off Bluetooth or Wi-Fi when you fall asleep.

Still not sure sleep timer is perfect to help you sleep? Do you turn off your music or sleep app right before you sleep? Do you think this worry makes it harder to fall asleep? Let Sleep timer handle your music app, video app, baby app so you can focus on your sleep.

Sleep Timer is a smart and easy to use app that makes controlling your music a breeze. Let it turn off your screen, silence your music, and more, all while you fall asleep to your favorite music and videos. Download today and sleep better right away!

comments: I haven't gotten too deep into all the different things this can do but as far as I'm aware it does it's job! I'm always asleep by the time my timer runs out but in the morning the app I had set is closed! The interface is fairly straightforward and I have no problem setting it to close one app a night. It keeps my previously set timers so if I want to watch YouTube one night and Netflix the next it's super easy to switch between!
Timer turns off app AND power, so battery is saved! This is one of very few apps that can do this. Just what I was looking for. Thank you

Works well, how about adding a 'change to flight mode' after timer ends.
There is no option for me to uninstall this app. The uninstall word is not highlighted in my app info page.

title: Moonly meditation: calm music, relax breath, sleep
description:
You have heard about meditation for a long time, or perhaps even read books on meditation, but so far theoretical knowledge has not turned into practice. This app is for you, for those who want to embark on a new path and calm your mind.

To master meditation, you do not need to enroll in full-time courses. You can start doing it yourself at home. This is very convenient. You can perform meditation at any time of the day. Free app for anxiety for both beginners and advanced practitioners. You can use it to raise awareness of yourself and your environment. As well as a way to reduce stress and improve concentration.

In our application you will find for yourself:
Meditations for every day, morning and evening, before bed: for better sleep, a course of concentration and visualization, audio affirmations free for every day, practice of meditation with voice and music, kalimba, anti-stress practices, breathe, mantras, sleep sounds and stories, vipassana, shavasana, Tibetan singing bowls, insight timer, Buddhist music, the practice of meditation for stress, for headaches, for alcohol and smoking, for love, for money, for women, for health, breathwrk, all god mantra, weight loss hypnosis, a course of 7 chakras healing, sattva. Also in our application you can find various sleep sounds of nature that will help to establish sleep, relieve insomnia and anxiety, and help you relax. Various affirmations aimed at forgiving, success, relaxation, attracting a man, money, happiness and success, calm stories for sleep. Heal yourself.

Guided meditation is an extremely powerful tool for manifesting your dreams. Our application acts as a mental mentor who will direct you in the right direction and help you achieve harmonization and awareness, master the techniques of concentration and awareness.

Get your dose of daily Zen and calm:
- Calming sounds of water (sound of rain on glass, waves of the ocean, sounds of the river, surf, fountain, murmur of a spring)
- City sounds (office sounds, highway, road, subway, train)
- Nature sounds for sleeping (sounds of a forest, stream, waterfall, birds, sounds of a storm, sleep sounds of mountains, sounds of the jungle, sounds of a grove)
- Animal sounds (singing of whales, cicadas, purring of a cat)
- Calming sounds for meditation (mantras, mantra om, stories for sleep and immersion, white noise, Tibetan bowls, 7 chakra course, all god mantra, vipassana, savasana, anxiety meditation, for headaches, relaxation techniques, for love, for money, for women, for health, weight loss hypnosis, kalimba, antistress, visualization)
- Audio affirmations reminder for every day (for attracting success, for health, business, affirmations for happiness and for peace of mind, to overcome loneliness, to make a decision, before going to bed, to normalize sleep, etc.)


The main objectives of the courses and practices are as follows:
1. Understanding yourself. - Thoughts will become more organized.
2. Finding peace. - All actions are formed by thoughts.
3. Awareness. - Learn to become more aware of yourself, your mind, body, 
4. Breathing relaxation exercises
5. Mindfullness. - Practice of letting go of thoughts

Additional functions:
- Save your favorite sound compositions created from the provided collection of Calming sounds to listen to them later, leave notes in the form of reflections. Mark your current mood and mood after taking the relaxation techniques course.
- Motivational quotes from great people and mentors
- Insight timer - convenient time for you.
- Night theme, allows you to darken the screen, for easy use of the application in low light, to reduce eye strain.

People also use the practice of 7 days guided meditation to develop other beneficial habits and feelings, such as a positive mood and outlook, self-discipline, mindfullness, calmness, healthy sleep. Heal yourself and you will become clear and calm. Successful practice to you, dear meditators!
descriptionHTML:
You have heard about meditation for a long time, or perhaps even read books on meditation, but so far theoretical knowledge has not turned into practice. This app is for you, for those who want to embark on a new path and calm your mind.

To master meditation, you do not need to enroll in full-time courses. You can start doing it yourself at home. This is very convenient. You can perform meditation at any time of the day. Free app for anxiety for both beginners and advanced practitioners. You can use it to raise awareness of yourself and your environment. As well as a way to reduce stress and improve concentration.

In our application you will find for yourself:
Meditations for every day, morning and evening, before bed: for better sleep, a course of concentration and visualization, audio affirmations free for every day, practice of meditation with voice and music, kalimba, anti-stress practices, breathe, mantras, sleep sounds and stories, vipassana, shavasana, Tibetan singing bowls, insight timer, Buddhist music, the practice of meditation for stress, for headaches, for alcohol and smoking, for love, for money, for women, for health, breathwrk, all god mantra, weight loss hypnosis, a course of 7 chakras healing, sattva. Also in our application you can find various sleep sounds of nature that will help to establish sleep, relieve insomnia and anxiety, and help you relax. Various affirmations aimed at forgiving, success, relaxation, attracting a man, money, happiness and success, calm stories for sleep. Heal yourself.

Guided meditation is an extremely powerful tool for manifesting your dreams. Our application acts as a mental mentor who will direct you in the right direction and help you achieve harmonization and awareness, master the techniques of concentration and awareness.

Get your dose of daily Zen and calm:
- Calming sounds of water (sound of rain on glass, waves of the ocean, sounds of the river, surf, fountain, murmur of a spring)
- City sounds (office sounds, highway, road, subway, train)
- Nature sounds for sleeping (sounds of a forest, stream, waterfall, birds, sounds of a storm, sleep sounds of mountains, sounds of the jungle, sounds of a grove)
- Animal sounds (singing of whales, cicadas, purring of a cat)
- Calming sounds for meditation (mantras, mantra om, stories for sleep and immersion, white noise, Tibetan bowls, 7 chakra course, all god mantra, vipassana, savasana, anxiety meditation, for headaches, relaxation techniques, for love, for money, for women, for health, weight loss hypnosis, kalimba, antistress, visualization)
- Audio affirmations reminder for every day (for attracting success, for health, business, affirmations for happiness and for peace of mind, to overcome loneliness, to make a decision, before going to bed, to normalize sleep, etc.)


The main objectives of the courses and practices are as follows:
1. Understanding yourself. - Thoughts will become more organized.
2. Finding peace. - All actions are formed by thoughts.
3. Awareness. - Learn to become more aware of yourself, your mind, body,
4. Breathing relaxation exercises
5. Mindfullness. - Practice of letting go of thoughts

Additional functions:
- Save your favorite sound compositions created from the provided collection of Calming sounds to listen to them later, leave notes in the form of reflections. Mark your current mood and mood after taking the relaxation techniques course.
- Motivational quotes from great people and mentors
- Insight timer - convenient time for you.
- Night theme, allows you to darken the screen, for easy use of the application in low light, to reduce eye strain.

People also use the practice of 7 days guided meditation to develop other beneficial habits and feelings, such as a positive mood and outlook, self-discipline, mindfullness, calmness, healthy sleep. Heal yourself and you will become clear and calm. Successful practice to you, dear meditators!

comments: I've started trying to meditate regularly numerous times. This app has done the trick for me and I have definitely felt calmer, happier and more relaxed.
Such a neat app worth supporting. It's so helpful and I love being able to combine sounds and save them. Hopefully more binaural!

title: Soothing sleep sounds
description:
You‚Äôve probably had trouble falling or staying asleep at some time in your life. Cramming for exams, stressing about work, and over-indulging in late night TV can leave your mind and body too stimulated to rest.

This app will give you the tools you need to find your way back to the serenity of a good night‚Äôs sleep. Nature sounds, self-hypnosis, and other techniques will help guide you to your quiet place, where you can shed the day and welcome sleep with open arms and a soft pillow.

Our free Lullaby  application contain following sounds:

Whether you need to reduce the stress in your life, learn better breathing habits, or track your sleep patterns to learn what helps.

recentChanges: This update brings small improvements and bug fixes. Thank you for your positive feedback and reviews. Have a nice day!
comments: Awesome and plenty of different sounds!
App randomly shuts off.

I use this app as part of my routine to fall asleep due to a serious sleep disorder that includes insomnia. Tonight, I am unable to set the timer I always use so the app isn't running all night after I fall asleep, making it so I don't hear my alarm in the morning. Part of my serious sleep disorder requires an alarm to wake me to prevent me from sleeping for days. Essentially, I have hard time getting to sleep, but once I do, I will stay asleep. I can't pay for the timer, switch it back to free.

I've used it for years and loved it. Until I believe the last update. The app has been popping up into notifications every hour or so and sometimes even play it's music at random.. Also the timer that has been put under "premium"? Whut, why? It was amazing, but now it's all about the money.. Also I can only sleep at the #5 track, but when that one is finished playing it will go to #6 automatically and I'll be wide awake again.. Why can't we put the song on single repeat or so? Way waay better!!

I have been happily using this app for a few years now on a nightly basis. Music is very relaxing and just what I need to fall asleep. I just updated it today and find that I need to upgrade to the premium account to keep using the timer. Very disappointed. Will be uninstalling and finding a new app to use.

title: Sleep Diary
description:
This sleep diary is a part of a video-based self-help series for insomnia. Please see the links provided to access the videos. Here, you will find detailed instructions on how to use the sleep diary effectively to better your sleep. The program itself is based on cognitive behavioral therapy, which is an evidence-based method for treating insomnia. 

This app stores information locally on your phone.
This means that the information you put in will be erased if you delete the app.
It also means that only the operator of the app will have access to user information"

For more information visit:
getstartedwithselfhelp.com (English)
psykologiskveiledning.com (Norwegian)

recentChanges: Minor Icon and text adjustments.
comments: I have been using your app already for 6.5 weeks now and I want to make a backup of all my data. How can I do this now? Or do you plan to add a backup/restore option? I tried to wrote an email to you, but it seems like the address listed here is no longer served

A good app to log your sleep times (manually) and get useful stats like sleep efficiency. Sleep efficiency stat actually made me realize that I can convert some of the time I spent in bed not sleeping can be converted to actual sleep. Issues: 1. Tracks only 8 weeks of data before one has to reset the data. I don't see any option to extend the same time series, which is disappointing as I was looking for long-term sleep tracking. 2. Though it asks for the sleep times during the day, it doesn't incorporate that in any kind of stats. It doesn't even show the average of daytime sleeping. Hoping to see the improvements in future. Thanks!

I thought this would be perfect to log my sleep habits. It's very simple and easy. However, there is no settings to adjust the clock to not be military times, it asks how long you woke up for during the night time but you have to list an exact pm/am time, instead of just 5 minutes or 10 minutes which makes your total sleep time incorrect. It's not accurate.

What's the point of a sleep journal that doesn't understand that people can get into bed BEFORE midnight, and go to sleep AFTER midnight? Every one of these apps have this same stupid problem. So here I am logging info for my doctor on paper. So dumb.
The app is simple and easy! Great! Though, I wish there would be an option to log a completely sleepless night.

comments: It would be nice if you will add "dogs barking" option

Impressed. I'm prone to pain, which makes resting difficult; yet, I'm sleepy all the time. This app has worked to relax me during the times when I've most struggled to take care of my body's demand for sleep. The mixing feature is lovely because it lets you create your own little world full of sounds at varying volumes. I've tried things similar to this app and never had much/any impact in relaxation. Recommend it as worth a try to others with chronic pain and anxiety.

Lots of different sounds. Many restful (though some are not). A timer can be set, so you save power or just want a nap. Great for drowning out the neighbor's party and if you set it on infinite, it will cover the sounds of the other neighbor's illegal rooster (rooster don't wake people up, people do, right?). The only fault I have found is the strange UI, which has text below the buttons that do not apply to the button.

I have a hard time staying asleep at night. This app has helped me out greatly!!! When I wake up at night I just got my app and it plays different relaxing sounds that put me right back to sleep!!!! You are so greatly Welcome!!!!!!!

So far, so good. Really like the train. New sounds haven't been tried yet. The ability to combine sounds is really nice. Still waiting for rain on a metal roof. That's the most relaxing sound that I know of. Great developer not only added my requested sound, but added some other really good ones, as well. Wish I could give it more stars. Thanks.

title: Sleep Timer (Music & Screen Off)
description:
Sleep Timer can stop your music after a set amount of time and can also turn your screen off.


It works just like a Sleep Timer on TV
Sleep Timer softly lowers the volume and then turns your music off (not all players are yet supportet). If you have watched a stream Sleep Timer can also turn your screen off. This functions prevent your battery from draining.

Simple design and easy to use
Select how long you want the music or stream to play, press Start and Sleep Timer will appear in the notificationbar. You can extend the length or cancel the timer directly from the notification message. (If you have more then one notification, swipe the Sleep Timer notification down to see the buttons.)

Free version
The free version contains ads.

Unlocked version via in-app purchase
Ad-free.

How to uninstall (IMPORTANT):
Sleep Timer uses the device administration function to turn off your screen. It needs to be deactivated before uninstall.
Just go to the App-Settings > disable the "Turn off screen" option > uninstall or go to Phone-Settings > Location & Security > Select device administrators > uncheck Sleep Timer > uninstall.
Permissions explained:
‚Ä¢ Google Play billing service: Unlocked version.
‚Ä¢ Internet / network access: Required for Google Play access and bug reports.
‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi connections / Bluetooth: Allows Sleep Timer to turn off Wi-Fi/Bluetooth once your music has been stopped.

title: Relaxing Music: Calm Sleep Sounds
description:

title: Sleep Restore
description:
Uniquely designed for sufferers of stress-related insomnia, this app harnesses the power of bilateral stimulation (bls) and soothing words and music,  to turn off tension and worry and restore normal sleep functioning. Bilateral stimulation is a treatment element of EMDR therapy, a psychological treatment method which harnesses your brains ability to process sensory information to de-activate the physical and mental distress which inhibits sleep. The resulting normalization of brain activity creates the conditions for sleep to happen, naturally and effortlessly. If you suffer from insomnia related to PTSD, medical problems or just general stress and anxiety this app is for you. This app works best with a good internet connection and a set of headphones.

Key Features
 
- 6 sessions of guided meditations, music, natural sounds and bls,
- + 10 = 16 sessions, over 5 hours listening (premium version only)
- Different sessions for ‚Äògetting to sleep‚Äô and ‚Äògetting back to sleep‚Äô
- Different sessions for overcoming worry and tension, the 2 main causes of insomnia
- Individualized recommendations based on sleep assessment questionnaire results
- Ability to create individualized playlist
- Ability to loop sessions indefinitely
Plus
- 6 x unique sleep hacks for stressed people (premium version only)
- Assessment Questionnaire indicates whether you might be suffering from a more serious sleep disorder
