recentChanges: Bls promo screen
comments: I found this app really effective, do the questionnaire and get a recommended playlist and/or make your own. I use it during the day for 20 minutes at a time to help stop me overthinking that later leads to anxiety or difficulty relaxing, and also at night to get to sleep. A friend back home who had struggled with sleep for years also uses this now and said is the best she's ever used by far. Definitely recommend giving this a go.
Worked brilliantly until I paid for the full version now it keeps shutting down, can not listen to any of it for more than 5 minutes, waste of money. Shame because the app itself is really good
Couldnt get threw the first 2 mins it kept shutting off. It it would of stayed on i bet it would be great
This is a great app. It definitely helps with sleep. I like the fact there is a free version as well as a paid. Anything that Mark puts out is good. Highly recommend.
very relaxing. A tad difficult to learn to navigate, but not impossible

title: Sleep Fast - fall asleep quickly
description:
Calm down quickly from your busy day
Synchronize your breathing with the rhythm of a circle which is changing its size. This will clear your mind from thoughts and worries which you gathered during the day.

Slow down your breath
The circle will slow down over time. This will reduce your heart rate to get you relaxed quickly.

Get tired quickly
The breathing rhythm of the circle has a long exhale phase which reduces the amount of carbon dioxide in your blood. This will make you tired quickly.

Let the app lull you to sleep
When your eyes get tired you can close them and listen to the guitar tones. They indicate the breathing rhythm to continue. Your brain waves and muscle activities will start to slow down. Soon you will enter a deep sleep phase.

Features: 
‚úì Fast sleep: The circle is a natural sleep aid which combines techniques from yoga and meditation to get you to the rem sleep cycle quickly.
‚úì Synchronize your breath: Measure your current respiratory rate and use it for the starting rate.
‚úì Fading out light: The fade out effect will get you faster to the next sleep cycle.
‚úì Fading out sound: The guitar tones will clear your mind. (ASMR)
‚úì True Sunset: The sun changes its colors from yellow to red like a real sunset.
‚úì Sleep Timer: A set timer of 30 minutes will turn off light and sound.
‚úì Smart brightness control: Tap anywhere on the screen to increase brightness temporary to adjust settings.
‚úì Articles: Read articles how to improve your sleep and wake up.

Prevent sleep disorders
Gentle sleep sounds and gentle light may help with sleep disorders caused by stress, jet lag, depression, migraine, headache, motivation, tinnitus, insomnia, burn-out, autism, PTSD, anxiety disorder, ADHD, mental disorder. Please note that the app is not a medical product and sleep disorders should always be clarified by a doctor. But it may relieve you from sleeping pills.

title: Sleep Log Free: The CBT-I sleep diary for insomnia
description:
The pocket sleep therapist using CBT-I methods for chronic or occasional insomniacs.

Note: This is the free, ad-supported version of Sleep Log. For an ad-free experience and additional features, please purchase Sleep Log Pro

We suffered from insomnia for decades, with all the usual symptoms that result from rarely or never getting a good night‚Äôs sleep: constant fatigue, fuzzy memory, mood swings, diminished cognitive capacity, symptoms of depression, weight gain.

But our approach for dealing with these persistent sleep issues was haphazard at best. It wasn‚Äôt until we finally decided to take a systematic approach to tackling our sleep problem based on the principles of CBT-I, cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia, that we finally solved the sleep puzzle.

Our quality of life has improved enormously since then. Sleep is no longer a hit-or-miss proposition. Going to bed at night is no longer coupled with the stress of wondering ‚Äúwill I or won‚Äôt I‚Ä¶?‚Äù We now have the tools, methods and strategies we need to consistently get a good night‚Äôs sleep almost every night. 

And on those nights when sleep remains problematic, we no longer suffer stress and anxiety connected to insomnia‚Äìinstead, we‚Äôre confident that our brain will apply its own internal methods to ensure we make up for the sleep deficit during the following nights, as long as we continue to track our sleep and potential correlations.

Sleep Log is built around the concept of sleep efficiency. Sleep efficiency is defined as the length of time asleep divided by the total time spent in bed. Successful approaches to sleep therapy are generally based on gradually improving one‚Äôs sleep efficiency and thereby training the brain that bed is associated with sleep. 

But we go much further, helping track moods and activities experienced during the day that can have a positive or negative effect on that night‚Äôs sleep. Sleep Log currently helps track 14 factors grouped by moods, activities and chemicals‚Äìsuch as anxiety, exercise, and caffeine intake‚Äìon a daily basis, then correlates those factors with your sleep patterns. Here‚Äôs what we help you track, all factors that can positively or negatively affect your night‚Äôs rest:

‚Ä¢ Happiness
‚Ä¢ Excitement
‚Ä¢ Stress
‚Ä¢ Anxiety
‚Ä¢ Daylight
‚Ä¢ Exercise
‚Ä¢ Meditation
‚Ä¢ Work intensity
‚Ä¢ Screen use
‚Ä¢ Tobacco use
‚Ä¢ Alcohol consumption
‚Ä¢ Sugar consumption
‚Ä¢ Caffeine intake
‚Ä¢ Sleep medication

What Sleep Log Free doesn‚Äôt do

Sleep Log is a sleep and behavioral diary, logging, analysis and visualization tool, not a traditional sleep tracker. We don‚Äôt use automatic methods to track the duration or quality of your sleep at night. In our opinion, app-based methods for tracking sleep are generally unreliable and usually require keeping your device very close to, or even on or in, the bed, which itself can disturb your sleep rhythms.

Intense focus on tracking and visualization of your nightly sleep cycles can also lead to a unhealthy condition called ‚Äúorthosomnia‚Äù, an obsession with getting a perfect night‚Äôs sleep, which will have precisely the opposite effect than intended. 

Your sleep cycles will vary naturally depending on your sleep needs any given night. You‚Äôre the best judge of how well you slept and how rested you feel. That‚Äôs why we use your own subjective estimates of these vital factors, rather than trying to tell you how you should feel based on a chart.

Free version

This is the free version of Sleep Log. For an ad-free experience and additional features, get our pro version, Sleep Log Pro. And sleep well!

We want to hear from you! Send your questions, comments and suggestions to thesleeplogapp@gmail.com.

summary: By insomniacs. For insomniacs. A CBT-I app for behavioral treatment of insomnia.
developerAddress: Deer Mountain LLC, 76 Swaller Hill Rd., West Cornwall, CT 06796
recentChanges:
Now featuring nap tracking!

Do you often sleep during the day? Now you can track your naps along with your nightly sleep data; set goals for your nap frequency and duration; and see what effect any naps you might take during the day may have on the duration and quality of your sleep at night.
comments: Good basic log info, but actually entering/recording it and referencing your prior entries has a lot of problems - time entry rolls on its own after you select, pre-filled answers to questions seen to be random each day, and I had an entry come up for a future day and can't for the life of me figure out what happened. I'm pretty tech savvy and was frustrated with not being able to figure out what date is what with my entries...

Great concept but some things to imporve : The possibility to save our log on Google or on the cloud, to save progress when changing phone, etc. Convert the log into a Excel file and the inverse, for the same reasons. Improve the "hour selection" (it rolls down or up sometimes) Possibility to have an average of the month and not total.

Finding it hard to believe insomniacs developed this app and didn't give an option for same day sleep. I downloaded this app to track my sleeping patterns because I suspect I may have DSPD, and I want to have something to show my doctor for a referral. I always fall asleep past midnight and wake up late in the day; like yesterday, I didn't get to sleep until 5:30 am and woke up at 10:40 am. I tried putting this in the app, and I couldn't make it work. Seems like a useful app, but can't use it.

Not a bad app, seems to have good features. Unfortunately, I couldn't use any of them because it doesn't allow you to log that you fell asleep past midnight. It says I slept for 20 hours when I slept less than 7. I work a late shift so I'm never home by midnight. If this one thing is fixed I'd love to use this app, but until then it won't work at all for me

i had alcohol one night out of 8 and now it says my alcohol is lower then average. no alcohol is my average its not lower then! i also had one set i saw on the charts looked off, i went back and it said id been awake for 240 minutes through the night. i fixed it but the charts still dont update that information and looks off. the biggest issue is the time scrolls for sleep and wake up, it doesnt snap too well it rolls making it frustrating to pick the time. fix these things and its a 5 star.

title: Sleep Timer
description:
Meet Sleep Timer!
Sleep Timer lets you configure a timer for turning off any media that is currently playing on your phone. You can also sleep WiFi, Bluetooth, and even the Screen!

Note:
This app uses the Device Administrator permission. If you wish for the screen to turn off with the timer, this must be activated in the app's settings. Some devices may require you to disable device administrator for uninstalling the app. This can be done from the Android Settings at any time.

Works with ALL media players 
Works with Spotify, Youtube or any other media player that you love. Simply start the music from your favorite music app, and set the timer. 

Sleep Bluetooth & WiFi
Want to deactivate Bluetooth and/ or WiFi after a set amount of time? Simply visit the settings menu to configure your timer! The app will help you conserve your battery. 


Turns off your Screen
Falling asleep while watching videos has never been easier on your battery. Sleep Timer can also turn off your screen when the timer runs out? Visit the Settings menu to activate this functionality, and doze off as you watch your favorite videos :)

Control it from the Notification Center
Want to listen a little bit longer? With Sleep Timer you can easily extend your timer directly from the Notification Center. Want to disable the timer alltogether? You can do this aswell, without the hassle of opening the app. You can also shake to extend the timer, and set the amount of minutes to extend yourself!

Experiencing Issues or Want something changed?
Contact me, either through mail, or by leaving feedback on the app. I will strive to make sure the app meets your needs! All you need to do is let me know.
Contact us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/AndroidSleepTimer/


I hope you enjoy it!


Uses:
https://github.com/lopspower/CircularProgressBar under Apache License Version 2.0
https://github.com/varunest/SparkButton under Apache License Version 2.0
https://github.com/ShawnLin013/NumberPicker under MIT License
https://github.com/tbouron/ShakeDetector under Apache License Version 2.0

summary: Sleep Timer for WiFi, Bluetooth and music from any source. (Spotify, etc...)
recentChanges:
- Sleep Timer is now smaller and faster!
- Fixed compatibility issues
- Stability improvements
- Fixed a bug where the timer would not start if "Lock Screen" was selected as the only Action.
comments: I love this app. Super easy to use, has great functions like being able to extend the time limit through the notification bar instead of needing to go back into the app, and has many customisation aspects. I have genuinely used this app nearly every night for years and when I bought my new phone this is the first app I reinstalled. So many similar apps make everything needlessly complicated. This one is simple, and it does simple so well. Love it.

üî•üî•üî•This app is essential for anyone who likes to listen to something on Bluetooth earphones/buds while going to sleep! üî•üî•üî• It lets me set a timer to automatically turn my Bluetooth off, which then saves the battery on my earphones, meaning less charging! I've been using it for for a couple of weeks now and it works great. 5 stars well deserved üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü Thanks to the developer/s üëç

Anyone with elevated security needs would do very well to take a look at this app. Hackers are trending towards alternative radio bandwidths to case your networks and jack your info, so obviously a solution that'll maintain information integrity via your bluetooth, NFC, data,and wifi connections-not just data alone-seems a given. Security solutions in this arena are surprisingly rare, and even more rarely effective. This app seems an impressive start in that direction.
it doesn't do what it's supposed to do. already checked battery optimization, and the rest of the settings. timer counts down to zero, but the wifi is still on. Uninstalled.

Works as needed to turn my phone Bluetooth off over night so my wireless earphones disconnect and therefore don't use up all their battery and need constant charging. Would be nice if I could set it up to repeat everyday rather than need to manually load the app each evening, but it does the job.

title: Endel: Focus, Relax, and Sleep soundscapes
description:
Endel creates personalized soundscapes to give your mind and body what it needs to achieve total immersion in any task. 

‚Ä¢ Relax Mode ‚Äî relaxing sounds calm your mind to create feelings of comfort and safety 
‚Ä¢ Focus Mode ‚Äî boosts your productivity by helping you concentrate better and stay focused all day
‚Ä¢ Sleep Mode ‚Äî soothes you into a deep sleep with soft, gentle sleep sounds
‚Ä¢ On-the-Go Mode ‚Äî adapts to your personal tempo when you‚Äôre out and about (and great for dynamic meditation)

Endel‚Äôs soothing soundscapes are algorithm-powered in real time, conforming to your immediate conditions like location, time zone, weather, and heart rate. Completely aligned to the Circadian rhythms, these personalized sound environments are made up of noise, beats, and melodies. They‚Äôre perfect for

‚Äì stress relief 
‚Äì productivity boost
‚Äì deep focused work (try our timer)
‚Äì daily relaxation
‚Äì good vibes and positive thinking
‚Äì calmer sleep

Listen to the soundscapes, relax your mind and focus on things that really matter. 

Use at home, work, or on-the-go to relax, concentrate, breathe, calm down and minimize distractions and anxiety. Try it next time instead of ASMR, white and pink noise generators, or nature relaxation music and rain sounds for sleep. All modes are available offline.

Endel is the right tool for those suffering from stress and insomnia. –°alming night sounds will guide your mind into a deep sleep. 

Learn how to practice and enjoy soothing relaxation fully. Breathe deeply on a daily basis and try to make it a habit. Having a relaxed mind is not a temporary relief but a new way of happier living. Help yourself with anxiety relief during the day, relax and sleep well at night.

ENDEL SUBSCRIPTION

Endel comes with a 7-day free trial. After the free trial period ends you will need to subscribe.

You can subscribe to Endel, choosing from the following plans:

‚Äì 1 month

‚Äì 12 months

‚Äì Lifetime

The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Payment will be charged to your Google Play Store account at confirmation of purchase.

Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings on Google Play app after purchase.

No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Wear OS

A companion watch app is meant to enhance your Endel experience on an Android mobile. When two apps are launched together, the watch app lets you control Endel playback, switch between soundscapes, but, most importantly, it may give you the next-level sound personalization ‚Äî if your watch features a heart rate monitor, its data is streamed to Endel in real-time. So that you'd feel how the soundscape intensity syncs with your current emotional state.

For more information:

Terms of Use - https://endel.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360003558200

Privacy Policy - https://endel.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360003562619

summary: Calming & relaxing sounds for sleeping and stress relief. Stay focused all day!
recentChanges: Tap the hint on the main screen ‚Äî this graph demonstrates your current and upcoming energy levels. It will help you plan activities and rest breaks throughout the day. Below the graph, find the full list of real-time inputs that personalize a soundscape just for you.
comments: This is a great app with amazing soundscapes. My only issue is the sound quality on my LG Stylo 4. I tried this on my girlfriend's iPhone 7 prior to using it on my phone, and it sounded perfect with the same headphones. When I downloaded it on my phone, the audio quality was noticeably worse and quieter. Other apps like Spotify sound fine, it's just this app for some reason. Also, a driving mode would be neat.

Really like the simplicity of the app layout and the sounds are beautifully put together. would like to sample the personalised experience ! Any plans for compatability with Garmin watches for heart rate monitoring etc or is there a way to set this up?

it's almost perfect :) melody could be used a little more, even if it incorporated some of your favourite artists or genres to create small bursts of melody or something that helps with the rise and fall of the tracks.

Great App for experiencing offline ai-powered music for various occasions. Music is rich and dynamic, tailored to one's preferences. Listening never gets boring due to (bi-)monthly theme changes. The UI-design is fabulous! Daily listening makes you feel more calm, focused, refreshed and less stressed. You will already feel a difference in the first hour of listening. After a few days of regular usage, the effects start to last longer and are more intense. Excellent experience so far, 10/10!!

Relaxing white noise! Exactly what it says. The option of tweaking the sounds for your mood is fab. Note: I did get a certain music stuttering while using wired earphones connected through a dongke to my Oneplus Nord. Likely it is a connector issue as it was not found while listening on my OnePlus buds. Just mentioning it as I saw many reviews of similar manner here.

title: Ognomy: The Sleep Apnea App
description:
Sleep is crucial to a healthy and happy life. If you‚Äôre always snoring, having trouble sleeping, or facing tiredness at work, you could have sleep apnea. Ognomy - The Sleep Apnea App provides virtual sleep apnea diagnosis and treatment from the comfort of your own home.

Schedule a virtual sleep health consultation with a board-certified sleep medicine specialist without ever leaving the house. We will help you conduct a convenient home sleep study and any necessary equipment will be sent directly to you, contact free. File your paperwork, schedule your appointment, pay your copay, and video chat with your doctor from our HIPAA-compliant app today.

Convenient appointments on your own time:
Ognomy brings the doctor's office to you. Why go to a sleep center when you can be diagnosed with sleep apnea right in the comfort of your home? Meet with our doctors from anywhere using your smartphone. No commute - jump out of bed and be on time! No waiting rooms with out-of-date magazines, simply kick-back in your living room or on the road.

Seamless interaction:
Communicate with your provider through HIPAA compliant messaging, file sharing and effortless video visits. Be rest assured your information is in safe hands. All you need is a smartphone and an internet connection to start your sleep journey with us.

Simple interface:
Our interface is intuitive, easy to use and accessible. Simple scheduling, secure payments and expert care.

Ognomy - The Sleep Apnea App allows you to:

- Schedule a consultation - set up an appointment quickly and seamlessly
- Have access to leading sleep medicine experts - board certified, experienced providers
- Conduct your own home sleep study - instructions & equipment sent direct to you
- Track your progress - Ognomy monitors your development and reminds you of appointments
- Diagnose sleep apnea and other sleep issues - relevant and helpful diagnoses through the app
- Start your treatment - we provide plans that get results and improve your sleep
- File your paperwork - paperless, HIPAA-compliant form filing
- Pay your copay - convenient, secure payments through the app
- Video chat with your doctor - HIPAA-compliant telemedicine from anywhere

Don‚Äôt ignore the symptoms anymore. Install Ognomy, and finally Say Goodnight to Sleep Apnea.

You can start benefiting from Yoga Nidra, an authentic yogic technique rooted in tradition and proven by science. No experience necessary. Welcome!

READ THIS FIRST!
This app does not collect, store, share, or sell your data or compromise your privacy. You will never be subjected to any ads either, not even in the free mode! Your support is what keeps it running. 

But before you buy the single in-app purchase that unlocks tracks 2 and 3, please:
- Read the full description to see if it fits your needs.
- Test the app, the settings, and the free track thoroughly for your device/OS combination. Ensure that the device is running the latest OS version.
- Ensure that the device has no unresolved memory issues or large, memory-hogging apps running in the background.

ABOUT YOGA NIDRA
The Sanskrit word 'yoga' means union or perfect awareness, and 'nidra' means sleep. Under guided instructions, you enter a state of deep relaxation with awareness, creating a unique and powerful state of consciousness that has beneficial applications for daily life. You are in charge of your experience at all times.

 BENEFITS
- Relaxes the body deeply 
- Restores regular breathing
- Reduces stress and anxiety
- Reduces mild depression
- Balances emotions
- Reduces pain, dependency on drugs, and addictions
- Provides relief from insomnia and improves quality of sleep
- Improves clarity of thought and memory
- Improves focus, learning capacity, and acquisition of new skills
- Improves overall health and healing
...and others

You will get better results with regular and consistent practice. It is not, however, intended to replace qualified medical advice and/or treatment.

TRACKS
* Track 01: Gentle Relaxation (10:50) FREE!
This is a quick, safe, simple, effective practice for gentle relaxation and anytime reset. Preparation  >  Bodyscan  >  Externalisation. Safe for beginners, kids, and those with special needs. If you are a beginner; if you are experienced but short on time; if you are stressed; if you want to slip into relaxation effortlessly; if you want to get back into practice; if you want to build up to longer and deeper nidras, this is for you. You can even do this one sitting up!

* Track 02: Deep Relaxation (24:35) (In-app purchase)
This is a longer practice that takes you safely and systematically through eight stages to a state of deep relaxation. Friendly to beginners, kids, and those with special needs. If you want a thorough reset; if you want the full experience regularly; if you want to develop habitual relaxation; if you want to build up to longer and deeper nidras with full awareness, this is for you. If you want to build a practice, start with track 1 and then slowly add track 2, even at different times on the same day.

* Track 03: Deep Healing and Energising (31:28) (In-app purchase)
The longest practice, this takes you safely and systematically through eight traditional stages to a state of deep healing and energising. It visualises the seed syllables of the Sanskrit alphabet at the cakras, the psychic-energetic centres of the body ‚Äî an authentic tantric practice called mƒÅt·πõkƒÅ nyƒÅsa, the original practice from which the rotation of consciousness in contemporary nidra is derived. You may use it regularly ‚Äî after some practice with tracks 1 and 2 ‚Äî to create deep healing and energising effects, to explore the layers of the mind, and for your own spiritual work.

CONTRAINDICATIONS
- Do not use while driving or operating machinery.
- If you face challenging mental health conditions, please seek advice before using the longer tracks.

SUPPORT
For more information about yoga nidra or the app, technical issues, or bug reports, please write to me at kanya.kanchana@gmail.com.

REFUNDS
Refunds are possible only within 48 hours of purchase under normal circumstances.

recentChanges: - Updated for Android 10: No more app crashes or tracks stopping midway! Uninterrupted play even when this app is in the background and some other app/task is in the foreground, or even when the device goes into sleep/autolock mode
comments: This app is an incredible way to practice Yoga Nidra. The teacher has become really special to my wife and myself , after daily use for months. It is so humbling to be able to practice with such an experienced teacher without leaving the house, however the exercises are very, very powerful and you will travel far if you practice. Definitely pay for the longer practices, totally worth it

I've used other apps and usually they give more free tracks. This one only gave one and so I didn't think it was worth buying as an app. Also it appears there are only 3 tracks. The 10 minute session was ok, however, because there was no sankalpa, this is not authentic yoga nidra. I do not recommend this app. It needs more work done on it.

This is without a doubt, hands down the best app I have ever downloaded. Exponentially more than tai chi, Kundalini yoga, lifting weights or running marathons over the years it has brought me to a state of mind and baIance I never believed I could achieve in this lifetime. Thank you, I should have written a review years ago when I first downloaded it.

Update: this has been my experience. I don't appreciate being called a liar. I have provided feedback to you via this review. I made an in app purchase and only one track is available. Update: this just is not true. It only unlocked one track. Be aware that each in-app purchase only unlocks one additional track. They don't seem to update the tracks so this app gets repetitive. I think there are better options available in the market.
An excellent App for Yoga Nidra. Very focussed. Three options depending on ur mood and time.

title: White Noise Lite
description:
AS SEEN IN CONSUMER REPORTS! Find out why the world is sleeping better with White Noise Free. Features ambient sounds of the environment that will help you relax during the day and sleep great at night.

Do you have trouble going to sleep? Are you traveling on a plane and need a quick power nap? Does your newborn baby wake up in the middle of the night? There are numerous benefits to using White Noise:

‚Ä¢ Helps you sleep by blocking distractions
‚Ä¢ Relaxes and reduces stress
‚Ä¢ Pacifies fussy and crying babies
‚Ä¢ Increases focus while enhancing privacy
‚Ä¢ Soothes headaches and migraines
‚Ä¢ Masks tinnitus (ringing of the ears)

Even when you‚Äôre asleep, your brain is constantly scanning and listening for sounds. If it‚Äôs too quiet, unwanted noises such as faucet drips or police sirens can interrupt your sleep. White Noise generates sounds over a wide range of frequencies, masking those noise interruptions, so you can not only fall asleep, but stay asleep.

SOUND CATALOG

40 sounds are included as part of the application (no downloading required unless you want more) including all the color noises (brown, white, pink, etc), mechanical sounds like a bedroom fan or air conditioner, light to heavy rains, rushing water sounds, beach and ocean waves, and so much more. For the entire list of sounds please visit our website. No streaming is required for playback.

APPLICATION FEATURES
‚Ä¢ 40+ perfectly looped sounds with free downloads from the White Noise Market App and website at https://whitenoisemarket.com/
‚Ä¢ Full support for Android 7.0 (Nougat) Multi-Window
‚Ä¢ Background audio support so you can use other apps while listening
‚Ä¢ Record, loop, and share new sounds
‚Ä¢ Chromecast TV support for audio control and playback. (Note: Chromecast audio devices require using the Google Home app)
‚Ä¢ Create new soundscapes by mixing multiple noises with support for adjusting volume, balance, and pitch of each individual sound in the mix
‚Ä¢ Full screen digital clock with multiple colors and brightness controls makes it the perfect companion for any nightstand
‚Ä¢ Advanced alarm and timer system that slowly fades audio in and out so you awake naturally feeling more refreshed
‚Ä¢ On-screen media player and volume controls with swipe gesture support for navigating sound collection
‚Ä¢ Star favorite sounds and mixes in the sound catalog for quick access using the Favorite view
‚Ä¢ Designed to work on all Android-based phones and tablets
‚Ä¢ Advanced Settings let you prevent interruptions such as notifications, tweak buffer size for optimal playback, adjust sound volume, balance, pitch, custom alarm snooze times, and more. All the pro tools you need for better sleep.

MEDIA REVIEWS

CONSUMER REPORTS: Smartphone Apps Can Sound as Good as a White-Noise Machine

DR. OZ SHOW: 13 Miracles of 2013: "Revolutionary Sound App!"

WASHINGTON POST: Smartphone Puts Newborn to Sleep: "For the next four months, the infant slept with his father's phone in his crib and White Noise tuned to 'air conditioner.' The monotonous buzz kept the baby sleeping soundly and his parents happy."

CNET: Apps that can improve your life: ‚ÄúTrouble falling asleep at night? A little White Noise might do the trick.‚Äù

UPGRADE TO FULL VERSION

Download the full version of White Noise for improved audio, more alarms, and no ads. Just tap the Upgrade button in settings.

Note: "White Noise Lite" was previously known as "White Noise Free"

WHITE NOISE MARKET

Download free sleep sounds from the White Noise Market at the following URL:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tmsoft.whitenoise.market

recentChanges:
7.7.9 - Support library updates.

Version 7.7 brings many user requested features as well as several bug fixes.
- Media playback controls are now modern and easier to tap.
- Sleep View: New settings for display Seconds, am / pm labels, and show system status bar.
- Timers: New fade times options

comments: Great app! I use this app while studying. It helps me focus when the TV sound is loud.

this is perfect for my misophonia when i sleep! ive always had issues getting to sleep if i plug in my music to drown out my neighbour's tv at night, but this app has taken a major stress of my shoulders. it doesnt even have to be loud for it to work on me, which is extra helpful for my misophonia. my favourite is the thunderstorm and rain :)

I've used this app for years-- I'm almost completely dependent on "brown noise" to sleep. But lately it will stop in the middle of the night, which always wakes me up, and I'm not able to go back to sleep. Huge disappointment.

Ive used this app for quite a while and i love the combination sounds but am giving it up because it occasionally stops and then restarts. This will jar me out of a deep sleep and as i have sleep problems in general it often results in a sleepless night.
10/10 Would DEFINITELY recommend. This app is just awesome. It has never tried to flood me with ads and it's useful for when I sleep somewhere where I don't have access to sound.

title: Audio Sleep Stories
description:
Sleep Stories to help you fall into a deep sleep
We loved having bedtime stories read to us as children so why should that stop now that we‚Äôre all grown up? Sleep Stories are soothing tales read by well-known voices to help people unwind and fall into a deep sleep each evening.

- Meditation Made Easy

Meditate is the #1 app for meditation and mindfulness. Enjoy 100+ guided meditations to help you manage anxiety, lower stress and sleep better. Meditate is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

- Music composed to help you focus, relax, and sleep

Hundreds of hours of exclusive music tracks engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep. Music includes original compositions, nature sounds, white noise and much more.

summary: Sleep Stories to help you fall into a deep sleep
comments: Can hardly make a story play! They stole nearly all of the story's from another app called calm(calm is amazing best sleep ive ever had with it)! Stories won't play and my sound doesn't work on this app! So many bugs, using this app makes my phone go to 100% to 30 in 10 minutes. Do not download this app, Ive had the worst sleep in years. Download calm because it has all these stories that actually PLAY and more. Please fix all the bugs and get your own stories and maybe I'll redownload(unlikely)

I've been using this app for nearly a year and it never wants has failed me. It gently helps me fall asleep every night and if I wake up in the middle of the night I can hit play again and boom back to sleep I go. When I find a particular reader whose voice I particularly like I can search by that person and find more stories that they've read. This app gets too big thumbs up.

Never had a single story play. Hit play and the circle would spin and spin...nothing. The only thing that works on this app is the adds. Would have loved to hear the stories. Many looked interesting. Guess I will continue to search.
Awesome! I was asleep within mins, highly recommend. It's totally free and you get to listen and learn new things. I play this every night :)
Great meditation course for free from Jeff Warren. Ads are disruptive. Would be willing to pay to remove. Need to reinstall the app to stop it from spinning in each story.

title: Relaxing Night Nature Sounds Offline: Calm & Sleep
description:
High-quality hand-picked nature sounds gives a great experience of relaxation. You can mix various sounds to get your desired relaxing atmosphere. This app can be used for relaxing, studying, reading , sleeping.

Night Animal Sounds
In the countryside, there are some insects & animal like Owl, Crickets, Grasshopper, Fox and some more that makes a nice sound at night. If you struggle with insomnia, you‚Äôre trying to sleep in quickly, these sounds help you nod off more easily. 

Lullaby Sounds
Lullaby sound helps your baby to sleep peacefully or block out unwanted noise, and go to sleep faster. The sound will loop automatically and close after the scheduled time.

Rain Sounds
Many of us like rain sounds a lot. This app has many types of rain sound, such as Rain on Lake, Rain on Roof, Rain on Window and more, which will help you to sleep early.

Ocean Sounds
Ocean waves are a popular choice for soothing sleep sounds. For many people, the rhythmic crashing of water onto the sand and rock can be meditative. In this app there are many types of ocean sounds like Wave, Seagull, Sailboat and more. 

Forest Sounds
Suppose you lost in the forest, you are in the sound of the birds, waterfall, brooks and many more. You also get the experience of the environment of the forest at night. 

It has the easiest way to set timers and so much more.

- Favorite Items
- Perfect Timer
- Relax Sounds
- Nature Sounds
- Rain Sounds
- Ocean Sounds
- Wind & fire
- Sleep Better
- Meditation
- concentration
- Reading

recentChanges: Minor bug fix
comments: "offline" is in the title, and it truly is. I turned off wifi & data signal & it still works. The sounds are fantastically real, even for coming through a tiny cell phone speaker. No need to sign up, make an account, or purchase anything. As far as ads go, just turn off your screen. Actually & truly free.

Great soothing noise selection - but shuts off randomly. If you need it to be on all night while you sleep, this is not for you. I am a light sleeper, and work opposite schedule from my housemate. Having a continuous sound is what helps my brain relax and sleep, but having it suddenly cut off actually wakes me up from deep sleep. Love this app but can't use it. It doesn't keep doing its one job, and the sudden stops trigger anxiety. Oh well.

Nice! The sounds are quite good. I esp. like the rhythmic "Wave Crush" (you probably meant "Wave Crash" tho, right?). There are so many nature-sound apps‚Äîsome, with only ocean sounds‚Äîbut the waves are almost always constant rather than rhythmic, which is so much more relaxing. Suggestion: It feels jarring how the whole screen moves when you select a sound. How about putting the empty rows at the top and adding sounds there, so everything else doesn't have to jump around?

very calming and helps me with my anxiety, even when im not sleeping :). i really love the addition of sounds that arent entirely natural, like the gentle whir of the fan or the train. id love for an ambient chatter sound, too. the nature sounds are a bit repetitive, though, and could use more variation and spacing out. overall, cute and gets the job done.

The best app I have found to create an individualised combination of nature sounds thats just right. This app gives you lots of choices and so much control its a perfect mindfulness relaxation backdrop.

title: Sleep Timer 2019 - Turn music off
description:
Sleep Timer lets you fall asleep and it will auto turn music off after amount of time or meet battery condition. Beside, you can set to turn off: Wifi, Bluetooth, Screen.
Sleep Timer is totally Free. Hope that it is useful with you!

Major functions:
‚Ä¢ Turn music off
Sleep Timer works with all media players as Youtube, Facebook video, Spotify...
‚Ä¢ Turn Wifi & Bluetooth off
Sleep Timer helps to save your phone battery when you don't neet to use Wifi/Bluetooth
‚Ä¢ Turn screen off
Sleep Timer can turn off your screen when the timer runs out or meet battery condition

Permissions Notice
‚Ä¢ Internet: for bug reports & get new configuration.
‚Ä¢ Wifi / Bluetooth: Allows Sleep Timer to turn off Wifi/Bluetooth.
‚Ä¢ FOREGROUND_SERVICE: Allows to start foreground in a service, application needs it to show an notification from service.
‚Ä¢ Device Administrator permission: Allows Sleep Timer to turn off screen. You can disable it from the Android settings or Sleep Timer settings at any time.

Note - How to uninstall:
If Device Administrator is active, you need to be deactivated before uninstall. You can de-active as step:
	Open Sleep Timer => Settings => Remove device admin => then you can uninstall normally.
	or
	Settings => Biometrics & Security => Other security settings => Device admin apps => uncheck Sleep Timer => then you can uninstall normally.

I wish the app could cast the sound. Instead, I have to cast the whole device audio, which isn't as stable and not as easy to manage between devices. Add this feature to get üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü! Also, the interface is a little clunky. I'd like to see the length of each file without having to open and play it. And download all.

This is extremely effective for helping my kids fall asleep. We were all very excited. However, the recording kept stopping in the middle. I did some experimenting and found that if I download it, push play, and push the infinity button (in that order) it will make it through! I don't mind doing this since I am paying 4x less than similar apps. It seems like they are working on the issue.

I like the content so I finally downloaded the app and purchased the subscription. Ever since I did that my app has been glitchy and stops within the first few minutes of the recording. title: Sleep Cycle
description:
Sleep Cycle is a simple time calculator that makes it easy to manage sleep cycles, so that you wake up well-rested. The calculations are based on findings from scientific studies that show the human brain sleeps in cycles of approximately 90 minutes, with the end of each cycle being the best time to wake up well-rested.

Sleep Cycle works in three modes:

 - Fixed Wake-up: Allows you to set your desired time to wake up, and suggests the optimal times to go to sleep based on your selection.

- Fixed Bedtime: Similar to above, but instead specifying the time you're going to bed, listing the optimal times to wake up.

 - Sleep Now: When you're feeling tired and want to go to bed right away, this mode will display the best times to set your alarm clock to, based on your device's current time.

All three modes can automatically configure your Android alarm clock to the selected time.

comments: Have tried several different apps for sleep cycle. Simple, easy to use, no annoying ads that keep popping up. It's just want I needed.
it's amazing
good

I've used this app for a long time and it's always woken me up, to be honest I've only ever used the fixed wake-up time section of the app. However, I have realised that there is no way to view or delete an alarm you have set. Does anyone know how to do this? The reason I ask is I randomly woke up at 3am thinking I hadn't set an alarm, momentarily forgetting that I didn't have work that day. So I set the alarm to my usual 5:20 time, but now I can't find a way to cancel it. The only thing I think I can do it set a sleep now alarm for long after I when I want to get up, and hope it cancels out the first one?! Anyone got any suggestions?

Better rating if the spelling error of "Fuxed" was changed to "Fixed" and if menu also showed actual Sleep Cycle count next to each time.  It still has best combination of features when I compare it to several other similar apps.  Many other similar apps do not have all three modes of Fixed Sleep Time, Fixed Wake Up Time and Sleep Now.  Before you criticize this app, learn the purpose of it as explained by this Google Store page and also try other similar apps which are less feature complete.  This app has greatly helped me adjust to my ever changing work schedule as long as I am careful to always sleep in the cycles suggested and never cheat or snooze!

title: HYPNOSIS TO SLEEP
description:
Hypnosis to Sleep - Hypnosis is a complementary or alternative therapy involving deep relaxation and focused attention. During hypnosis, people are awake, but they are less aware of their surroundings and may be less responsive to stimuli, including sensations of pain. Some studies show that hypnosis can effectively manage chronic pain, reduce anxiety, and decrease worry, particularly when combined with cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and mindfulness. Some research suggests that hypnotherapy can help treat parasomnias, or unwanted actions during sleep, such as sleepwalking. It‚Äôs reasonable to assume, then, that hypnosis might offer relief to patients suffering from chronic insomnia.

The medical efficacy of mind-body therapies is an emerging area of science, so information on the medical benefits of hypnosis is limited. Studies on the effectiveness of hypnosis for insomnia show mixed results; one overview of published research on the topic showed a benefit to sleep in 58 percent of studies. Many studies on the topic have small sample sizes or inconclusive results, so experts recommend more research to determine whether hypnosis can be as effective or more effective than medication or CBT for treating sleep disorders.

Despite limited clinical evidence, many people report that hypnosis promotes a sense of calm, helps ease anxiety and worry, and aids sleep. Unlike sleep medications, hypnosis has no side effects, so it holds promise as an insomnia treatment for people who can‚Äôt or don‚Äôt want to take sleeping pills.

Install Hypnosis to Sleep app if you can't sleep.

title: Sleep Easy - Sleep Tracking for better health
description:
Sleep Easy is an easy to use sleep tracking app. Main features are - Sleep reminder notification, Auto Mode and Manual mode.

Sleep Easy is (and always will be) an Ad-Free and Offline only app.



Features:

Sleep Reminder Notification:
Get a notification daily at a preferred time reminding you to get ready for sleep. You can start (and complete) the entire sleep tracking process right from the notification without even opening the app, thus saving your precious time.

Auto Mode for sleep tracking:
Auto mode watches for your phone movement to determine whether you are awake. If Auto mode is turned on, you will have a pre-defined duration (sleep settle duration) to settle down to sleep. The default duration is 15 minutes. After this duration, if your phone is moved you are considered awake and your sleep history is logged.

Manual Mode for sleep tracking:
This is the default mode of SleepEasy (Auto mode is turned off by default). When you are ready for sleep, you can open the app and click 'Sleep Easy' button. Alternatively, if you have configured sleep reminder notification you can also click the 'Sleep Easy' action of the notification. This will start the sleep tracking process and you will be shown a notification indicating ongoing tracking. Once you are awake, you can click 'I'm Awake' in the notification (or from inside the app) to indicate that you are awake. Then, your sleep history details will be saved.

Sleep History:
You will get an easy to view sleep history with visual indicators to identify the quality of your sleep.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Feedback:
Your feedbacks are appreciated and will help in the evolution of app.
Rate the app - 
Take short survey - https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdWMjkL0vQziMNMm5Yh_WeqLatOTGi5rDTiJoY6PQuyiL0BAQ/
Email - arun@sleepeasyapp.com

title: Track Your Sleep
description:
Track Your Sleep is a specialized app to help you regulate and optimize your sleep cycle. It tracks the patterns of your sleep at night ad based on a specialized algorithms made by the sleep experts advises you on how to optimize your sleep so that you could rest to the full.  
The app uses your mobile device‚Äôs microphone and records your movements in bed when you sleep. It establishes sleep phases and basing on the statistics received determines when it is advisable to wake up and when to go to sleep. The app produces reports, so that you could check the detailed graphs of your night sleep behavior, establishes the periods of deep long-time sleep and logs how daily activities impact sleep quality.
Track Your Sleep can help you learn more about your sleep and improve your sleep!

App features include:
‚Ä¢  Detailed sleep statistics and sleep graphs
‚Ä¢  Tracks your sleep behavior
‚Ä¢  Establishes your sleep patterns 
‚Ä¢  Customizable wake-up alarm melodies 
‚Ä¢  Daily sleep insights and graph analysis

title: Biological Clock: track sleep and sync day.
description:
Your body consists of numerous biological clocks, which activate hormones production in respond to external and internal signals. 

Daylight exposure, food intake, intellectual activities, physical exercise and sleep at the right time will boost your mental and physical capabilities and achievements.
 
BioClock app will advise you through the day to achieve maximum sync with your internal clocks and will recommend sleep time based on:

- your alerting signal start time, 
- time, duration and quality of your previous sleeps,
- your sleep preferences.

The 2017 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine was awarded for discoveries of molecular mechanisms controlling the circadian rhythm and numerous studies have proven clear circadian behaviour of our internal machinery. 

Everyday, in a cyclic manner our internal bio machine start and stop cascade of very complex metabolic processes. If a person has erratic lifestyle, the bio machine has to re-adjust constantly that will lead sooner or later to many problems, starting with obesity, poor sleep quality, compromised muscles, depression and will further progress to serious chronic illnesses.

Our 24 hours are split by Nature into 3 main phases:

1. Nutrient phase - wake up, breakfast, corticosteroids rise, high alertness, good time for learning, high productivity, lunch, midday slow down, fast reaction.

2. Physical phase - muscles at their highest level, blood pressure and body temperature highest, high creativity, time for play and entertainment.

3. Recreation and fasting phase - melatonin production, relax time, sleep and recreation time, body temperature decrease.

Start or continue alignment of your lifestyle with intrinsic biological nature to be health and fit.

1. Nutrient phase - wake up, breakfast, corticosteroids rise, high alertness, good time for learning, high productivity, lunch, midday slow down, fast reaction.

2. Physical phase - muscles at their highest level, blood pressure and body temperature highest, high creativity, time for play and entertainment.

3. Recreation and fasting phase - melatonin production, relax time, sleep and recreation time, body temperature decrease.

Start or continue alignment of your lifestyle with intrinsic biological nature to be health and fit.
summary: BioClock will help you to align daily activities with internal clocks.
recentChanges: This release enables to track sleep, receive recommendation based on sleep statistics and sync internal clocks with daily activities.
comments: Great job - Awesome explanation and intro, and the concept is fantastic, this is a hidden gem...might not be polished but the best, information wise, you will find out there....Looking forward to see the ongoing development of this...This is on my keep list! Props to you dev.
I have only had this app for a few days but so far I really like it. I would recommend it.

comments: Perfect for what I needed. Has the rain sounds and sleep sounds, plus you can add in thunder, birds chirping, sounds too. You can set the timer if using to fall asleep. Only thing I don't like is it keeps playing when a phone call comes in. I have to tell the person to hang on while I try to shut it off so I can hear them. I try not to answer the phone as much as possible, so it's not a deal breaker or anything. Overall I love it.

I am really loving this sleep sounds app I find it every day to use it provides a nice variety of sleep sounds. One of my favorite features is that you can combine sounds and save to use again. My best go to is rain with a bit of crackling fireplace. Really helps too put my mind at ease. So far I'm only using the free version and I'm very thankful it offers so much.

Perfect rain sounds lets you change the volume for each sound, add or remove sounds to create the most relaxing combination, and set a timer for how long I'd like it to play Unlike other white noise thunderstorms, I don't find the thunder predictable - which honestly helps me relax. Only the occasional ad at the start of playback, and nothing intrusive during the rest of its run. I couldn't ask for anything more

It's fantastic! Especially how you can add sounds into each different setting of rain sounds, choose time duration, and the volume! It's very soothing for when you need some help easing into a nap or falling asleep.

A good sized collection of rain sounds. It has got some amazing white noises that helps me fall asleep really quickly. Had been using it for a year now and quite pleased by its performance. Ocean waves and other thuderstorm sounds are my favorite and they feel very realistic too.

title: Video Sleep Timer and Podcast
description:

This application can be used as a podcast and video sleep timer.

Simple and Reliable
Set the timer, watch any podcast or video that you want, and the sleep timer will stop your podcast and video player when you fall asleep.

Extend the timer
The timer is running out but you still want to watch or listen to the video? Extend the sleep timer directly from notification

Elegant yet colorful UI

Disclaimer
Video Sleep Timer and Podcast is a third party application to help the user to stop podcast and video players. Every podcast and video player is belong to their respective owners.

title: Somnia: ASMR Sounds, Whisper & Slime for Sleep
description:
Somnia is the #1 app for ASMR sleep . We use AI to handpick the best triggers. All sleep sounds in the expanding library are carefully crafted, without loops or annoyances to maximize tingles. Use Somnia now for free with 118+ triggers!

Enjoy
‚úî Free Daily Access
‚úî Easy personalization with our built-in AI
‚úî Handcrafted, unique and rich ASMR sounds
‚úî Realistic spatialized True 3D soundscapes
‚úî 118+ highly customizable triggers
‚úî Compose by adding, dragging and modulating sleep sounds
‚úî Let the Flow Mode wind slowly progress through compositions
‚úî Unique Wind Down Timer that naturally fades out intensities of each trigger over time 
‚úî Built-in Dim feature to save battery during your ASMR sleep

Somnia is a winner of the Danish Sound Startup Pitch Battle 2018

Triggers
Unique, non-looping 3D tingles from:
ü§´ Whispers
üçÆ Slime
üî™ Slicing & Cutting
üñåÔ∏è Brushing
üëâ Tapping
ü§è Scratching
üéÜ Cracks
‚úä Squeezing
üå≤  Ocean, Weather, Nature, Fire sounds
‚ûï Much more - Download now to check it out

WHY USE SOMNIA?

Sleep is very important to restore our energy and focus. Somnia helps you shutting out thoughts by letting you focus on progressing and developing soundscapes with ASMR content. Attention to triggers in Somnia is important to feel the tingle, for your wellbeing and can help you fall asleep faster, restoring your mental health.

Somnia uses Spatial 3D Audio for dynamic binaural audio. The 3D ASMR sounds evolve like small stories, creating a believable and immersive experience that restores your focus and helps you fall into your ASMR sleep. 

What you hear in the app won‚Äôt just be simple sounds playing. Instead, we continuously blend and mix several sound components into one stream, and we call these streams ‚ÄúAubits‚Äù.

Somnia includes a variation of aubits categorized by themes. Sleep sounds are produced by professionals in the sound field and recorded in HD to create a genuine combination of triggers that tingle.

We want you to enjoy Somnia for as long as possible. Therefore, to avoid the fatigue of hearing the same repeated sound loops over and over, we randomize and humanize the changing audio to keep the listening fresh and believable. Each aubit is layered several times, so its timbre and expression will always sound different and natural.

Use the More / Less buttons to nudge the AI to play what you like

TRY IT OUT! Somnia has a Free Daily Access as well as free 7-day trials. Download it now and try for yourself.

The Daily Free Access is a duration in which you can use Somnia for free on a daily basis. During this period you have full access to the app.  In the Subscription settings, you can see how much time you have left of your daily access. Once the daily access limit is reached, the app will pause. You may choose to subscribe to get unlimited access or wait until the next day where you again can enjoy Somnia for free for a limited duration.


Listen to compositions or build your own by adding and dragging aubits around your head in 360 degrees. Save and enjoy your favorite soundscapes at any time.

Relaxing is as important for your body as it is for your mind. So take a moment to calm down, breathe, and get in harmony with yourself. 

MORE INFO: https://www.somnia.app

Need help with the app? Contact our professional support at hello@somnia.app or get in touch:

Privacy Policy: https://somnia.app/privacy-policy/

‚¨á Download Somnia now! ‚¨á

comments: Doesn't let me listen anymore without paying, so I assume there is a trial period that starts when you install it--which I was not aware of. The price you're asking is kind of steep, actually, considering there are plenty of free white noise videos/sites available. That said, when I COULD still listen to sounds, it would often stop on it's own or start to cut in and out, and sounds often wouldn't play when I put them in. Far too buggy to spend money on, even if I had the money to spend on this.
I didn't even get to try the app. It just kept saying 00:00:00 daily access remaining and trying to sell me a subscription. Oh well back to YouTube ASMR. At least I can try a content creator out.

Too repetitive, and has a formulated feel. and I do not find the appeal in having some guy whisper about basketball. It's off-putting tbh. I read a study that said over 30% of what ASMR is all about is personal attention and I couldn't care less about sports teams and their scores. I like the ambient sounds though and I'll need to give it a little more of a chance when I feel like I need the help to relax
Great content, though I need even more, ha. I like the different take on ASMR, even if I don't use the app to sleep..yet
If you set aside a few misses of the Aubits, there's a good variety in the sounds. - Preston

title: Can't Sleep
description:
Fall asleep with ease and wake up feeling refreshed with Can‚Äôt Sleep.

Can‚Äôt Sleep was invented by Thomas Dickson, the Australian expert in music and sleep psychology. The artificially intelligent music helps you sleep by distracting you from wakeful thoughts, calming your mood and relaxing your body. By improving your sleep, you increase your motivation and productivity, reduce stress and anxiety, and decrease your risk of catching colds and flus. Simply choose your soundscape in the app, enjoy new relaxing music and you‚Äôll wake up tomorrow having forgotten falling asleep. Try it now free and sleep better tonight!

Can‚Äôt Sleep is the right choice for you because...
‚Ä¢	The app was built from research for a PhD on music and sleep psychology
‚Ä¢	Music has no side effects and becomes more effective with regular use
‚Ä¢	You can listen to Can‚Äôt Sleep anywhere, including offline
‚Ä¢	The app is very easy to use - you can listen to relaxing music at the push of a single button
‚Ä¢	You can chose between our DIY music maker or from 12 music presets

Can‚Äôt Sleep has been presented at the Australian Music Psychology Conference, TechSauce Global Summit, Bigsound, Creative3 and Collider Accelerator. It also received MIT App Inventor App of the Month for best design.

About the Founder, Thomas Dickson.
‚ÄúHi! I‚Äôm a PhD student at the University of NSW, specialising in the use of music as a sleep aid. I‚Äôve combined music psychology research, and app development skills to build a world-first sleep app that composes relaxing music. I made it genuinely customisable as I wanted people to be able to choose the style of music they love, the sounds and instruments that help them to relax, and to never be frustrated by boring repetition. I am keen to make this app the best it can be and give people real-world solutions to insomnia and daytime sleepiness problems.‚Äù

title: INTELLIBED SLEEP GENIUS
description:
This app is intended for use in partnership with Intellibed Sleep Genius Smart Base and will not work without a base to connect to.
Introducing Intellibed Sleep Genius: The world‚Äôs first adjustable smart base created for your mind as well as your body.
 Sleep Genius was developed following research helping NASA get astronauts to sleep.  A team of experts in neuroscience, music therapy and sleep wellness discovered that the inner ear, our vestibular system, which controls our balance, also activates our brain‚Äôs sleep center through movement, like riding in a car, or rocking a baby to sleep.  Sleep Genius neuroscientists have been able to replicate the same experience using stereo and sound, creating an imbalance in the inner ear that‚Äôs 100% natural.  So with Sleep Genius, your brain thinks it‚Äôs being gently rocked, and you sleep like a baby.
One, it was developed following research helping NASA get astronauts to sleep.
 Sleep Genius uses scientifically composed music and stereo sounds played from a six-speaker Bluetooth soundbar to lull your brain to sleep.
 Two, there are plenty of products that TRACK your sleep, basically telling you that you have trouble sleeping. But hello, you already know that. Intellibed Sleep Genius is the first base that actually TREATS you for optimal sleep wellness.  We don‚Äôt track, we treat.
And three, Sleep Genius treats both the mind and the body to help you sleep better. You know, adjustable bases are great for putting your body in the most comfortable sleeping position.  But Sleep Genius does the same thing for your mind, making it comfortable and ready to fall asleep.
 Now why is all this important?  Because with Sleep Genius you can fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer, and sleep better.
 The Sleep Genius base has loads of features, including reach assist, sonic massage, USB ports and a programmable remote.  But even cooler, you can make it part of your connected home, and easily control the base functions with your voice.
 You know there are a lot of adjustable base options on the market.  But Intellibed‚Äôs Sleep Genius does what none of the others can do.  It‚Äôs a more intelligent bed.
And when combined with an Intellibed mattress with revolutionary Gel Matrix technology, you have the Ultimate Mind and Body Sleep System that you will love. It‚Äôs genius.  Sleep Genius.

title: Baby Sleeping Music Free üí§
description:
Baby Sleeping Music Free
Your baby has trouble falling asleep? 
Soothe your baby and help him to sleep and relax by playing a lullaby.
Choose the music and the time and put your child to sleep, a beautiful song That will really calm your baby.

title: Sleep Disorders And Problems
description:
Sleeping Disorders: The History 
‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ
When we hear about sleeping disorders we're commonly hearing about those who sleepwalk and can't sleep which is known as insomnia, but often we wonder why sleeping disorders are becoming a prominent issue in today's society. Right now according to the website Wikipedia there are a total of 14 different disorders ranging from eye twitching to restless legs. Some of these problems are treatable and even preventable when monitored by a doctor or specialized health professional. Sleeping disorders can be extremely dangerous when they go undiagnosed. Many people who are suffering from this disorder are facing a lot of life threatening problems because having a sleeping disorder can disrupt you from living your normal everyday life.

This can overtake someone if they're spending more time worrying about their condition than getting the correct amount of sleep. The problem with many people who are dealing with a sleeping disorder is that they're not aware of it being a problem until they see it's affecting their job and everyday life. Those who suffer from this can also develop clinical depression because they feel like they're not able to do any of the things they're used to doing if they've been diagnosed with a sleep disorder.

Individuals are given a test called the Polysomnogram which is used to determine and diagnose sleep disorders so specialists and doctors can plan a treatment designed for that individual person since not all treatments are the same. According to Wikipedia they list the common treatment options for sleeping disorders are: behavioral/psychotherapeutic, medications (Rozerem, Ambien, Ambien CR and Lunesta are common prescribed sleeping pills given for those diagnosed with a sleeping disorder), and other somatic treatments that are given. Sometimes people who have disorders such as narcolepsy usually have their brain activity measured to see where they are reaching peak points of sleeping so they can be treated since narcoleptics can't really work on jobs that require them to operate machinery or other things because they have to be alert and awake to know what they're doing.


In this audiobook you read about these topics:
‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ
01 - A Sleep Disorder That Affects the Legs - Restless Sleep Syndrome

02 - An Alternative Approach for Overcoming a Sleep Disorder

03 - Children With the Sleep Disorder of Sleepwalking

04 - Fatal Familial Insomnia

05 - How to Tell If You Have a Sleep Disorder

06 - Hypersomnia (oversleeping)

07 - Illnesses That Can Cause a Sleep Disorder

08 - Insomnia - The Most Prevalent Form of Sleep Disorder

09 - Insomnia in popular culture

10 - Insomnia

and much more!


Contact us! ‚ô°
‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ
For latest updates, please like us on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/Twayesh.Projects

And also follow us on Twitter
https://twitter.com/TwayeshProjects

Or you could just email us at our E-mail
info@twayesh.com

‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ

This audiobook require android tts - text to speech.

The text-to-speech (TTS) technology may not be available in some devices. To check if your phone is able of speech synthesis: Menu -> Settings -> Voice input & output -> Text-to-speech settings.
If not installed, your device may ask you to install the TTS engine. An internet connection may be required.

title: SLEEP by Max Richter - Sleep, Meditation & Focus
description:
SLEEP is renowned composer Max Richter's love letter to our daily ritual of sleep. Written in consultation with sleep experts, SLEEP is a musical tour de force that enamored global audiences and saw more than half-billion digital streams. 

For the first time ever, exclusive new sequences of SLEEP are now introduced via a fully customizable app experience. Curated musical selections from the SLEEP album will help you sleep, meditate and focus.

‚ÄúThe way that the app allows listeners to make a unique and personal journey through the landscape of SLEEP is remarkable and conveys the spirit of the music in a completely new way.‚Äù

- Max Richter

SLEEP is free. There are no in-app purchases and all you need is a premium account on Spotify. 

FEATURES
- FALL ASLEEP: A groundbreaking composition written in consultation with sleep experts to help you sleep
- WAKE UP: Start your days gently with exclusive sounds from Max Richter that can only be found in this app
- MEDITATE: Dive into immersive music and animations to relax your mind, body and soul
- FOCUS: Blend out every day life‚Äôs noises and sharpen your focus
- YOUR OWN JOURNAL: Reflect, take notes and track your well-being
- EXPAND YOUR SPACE: Collect experience and progress to unlock further planets
- FREE FOR ALL: All features are completely free with a Spotify premium account. More streaming services are on their way to this app.

Let the music of SLEEP guide you into your best slumber, relax your mind and gently wake you up into each brand-new day.

title: Smart Sleep Timer - Turn Off Music, Screen & WIFI
description:
Smart Sleep Timer allows you to set a timer to turn off your phone, turn off music automatically on Android or any media that is playing on your phone. You can also turn off WiFi, phone screen and the Bluetooth. It's like a sleep timer for Spotify or like a sleep timer for YouTube.

Smart Sleep Timer gives you the option to turn off music at a certain time while and sleep soundly while listening to music through Spotify, Youtube or any media player.

You can also turn off screen, WiFi and Bluetooth at a certain time automatically while listening to sleep songs, and other relaxing sounds as you fall asleep. You can leave your phone or tablet alone knowing that the app will automatically turn off  the screen, turn off WIFI and stop the music after a period of time, allowing you to sleep and relax without worrying that you'll wake up to a dead battery.

Features : 

- Supports All Media Players : Works with all media players, it's like a sleep timer for Spotify or a Sleep Timer Youtube.
- Turn off Screen automatically while watching videos
- Turn off Music, WIFI & Bluetooth.
- You can set you own sleep timing.
- You can control  the time from the notification center without accessing the app
- Very easy and practical to use

By using Smart Sleep Timer you won't search on how to turn off music automatically on Android or How do I set a sleep timer on my Android? Because our app do the job for you.

Note : Smart Sleep Timer app uses the Device Administrator permission. If you want for the screen to turn off with the timer, this must be activated in the app's settings.

Disclaimer :

This Application is not related or a replacement for Spotify or any other application. It's just an app that can work with media apps mentioned above.

title: Baby Sleep Sounds
description:
Rapid sleeping of babies is a problem of many parents. Baby Sleep Sounds application will help your baby fall asleep, generating monotonous, cyclic sounds such as white noise, vacuum cleaner sound, hair dryer sound, etc. Infants love these sounds because they resemble the sounds they hearing in the womb. Therefore, this type of lullaby is most commonly used by parents to sleeping babies and toddlers.

Playing at sleep time sounds like wind noise, rain noise or the sounds of nature drowning out the surrounding sounds, allowing your baby to fall into a peaceful and deep sleep.

Sounds to sleep can be run in the background while reading books or browsing web pages. The built-in timer automatically turns off the sound after a preset time.
The application does not require an Internet connection, so you can use it anywhere and anytime without worrying about data transfer.

The application contains the following sounds:
‚úî Washing machine,
‚úî Hair dryer,
‚úî Vacuum cleaner,
‚úî Laundry dryer,
‚úî Rain,
‚úî Ocean waves,
‚úî The sound of the plane,
‚úî Heartbeat,
‚úî The noise of the car.

Application features:
‚úî High sound quality,
‚úî Infinite playback,
‚úî Works in background,
‚úî Timer with soft fade out,
‚úî Works offline,
‚úî Free app.

Sounds to sleep can be used by adults suffering from insomnia or sleep disorders as white noise or brown noise.

title: Sleep Helper Metronome Free
description:
With Sleep Helper Metronome fall asleep without thinking about it.

Sleep Helper Metronome will help you to sleep by reducing you breathing rhythm from 11 to 6 breaths per minute.

This application will guide you to focus on your breath and limits the flow of your thoughts.

You'll go from a normal breathing rhythm to a pace of six breaths per minute. This pace is close to the natural breath pace while you're sleeping.

The technique use in this app has been partly inspired by Bhastrika Pranayama yoga breathing technique. The transition from wakefulness to sleep is characterized typically by a shift from sympathetic to parasympathetic regulation. Bhastrika Pranayama had scientifically proven its efficiency in parasympathetic regulation .

Had an exhausting day ? feeling stressful ? can't sleep tonight ? insomnia night ? Sleep Metronome can help you. It will guide you using Bhastrika Pranayama breathing, helping you to activate the parasympathetic system and reach the normal state of a falling asleep person with no efforts.  

Have a sweet and relaxing night with Sleep Helper Metronome :)


You can check these links for more scientific content:
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19249921
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20673289

comments: I love this app. I listen to a lot of YouTube audio series before bed, and being able to set a timer to close the app helps me save battery and data. Would like more time, as it currently caps out at an hour, but otherwise an amazing app I use everyday!
When it works it is absolutely great! On a few occasions though, it didn't and I woke up again because it was still playing. But generally speaking, it did what it is supposed to.

I used to love this app, and I mostly still do; however, it seems to have stopped working on YouTube Music. I'm not sure when this change happened. However, YouTube Music is my main app for music, so it's a bit of a pain. This app continues to work wonderfully for all of my other apps, and I would love to raise the rating to 5 stars if and when this feature is fixed. Thanks for your hard work in making this app!
Very simple app allows you to have a sleep timer for apps that don't have one, like You Tube music, or ones that have an almost hidden one like Google music.

It really is simple to use. Just select app from drop menu, drag or type in number of minutes required and then tap the set sleep timer button. All on 1 screen. Works perfectly on my Nokia 3.1. A note on app size. This app is only 2.2 mb. Most other apps I looked at were 3.3 or even 6 or 7 mb. Happy to recommend.

Thanks to Calmly, every moment of your relaxation will take on a new meaning. No more stress and fatigue! Turn on the application, sit in your favorite place or lie down in bed, choose one of the programs that we offer in the application and ... Feel the moment that will make your senses look for peace. You will open up to a completely new experience. Rest from today will no longer be the same.

In our application you will find programs such as:
‚Ä¢ Reduce Anxiety
‚Ä¢ Reduce Stress
‚Ä¢ Increase Happiness
‚Ä¢ Better Sleep
‚Ä¢ Develop Gratitude
‚Ä¢ Build Self Esteem
‚Ä¢ Improve Performance

Each of the programs has been adapted in such a way that the experiences and sensations of relaxation bring maximum satisfaction. The music and sounds that accompany the application have been prepared in cooperation with musicians who are masters in the field of audio-therapy - thanks to which we offer a top-class product!

Calmly is not only audio-therapy, it is also carefully prepared films affecting our visual receptors, which help soothe tired eyesight. During fatigue, photophobia and dazzling by lights appear - thanks to the visual effects in the application, your eyes will immediately feel rested and relaxed, and your eyes will gain full focus and focus!

Audio-therapies that we have prepared in cooperation with musicians are:
‚Ä¢ Tranquil Touch
‚Ä¢ Touch of the Other Side
‚Ä¢ Spiritual Surrounding

Thanks to these sounds, your every day will become better and your mornings will be full of strength and vitality!

The application is equipped with a special timer that you can use during your meditation, yoga, training, rest or relaxation. The timer will end its work at the time you choose.

Do not hesitate and download our application, explore the wonderful world of relaxation, Zen, meditation and peace!

title: Sleep Tracker
description:

You can also benefit from soundscapes that improve your sleep quality and get you faster to fall asleep.

Some additional features from Sleep Tracker include: 
- Track your sleep duration, cycle and efficiency in a simple way.
- Use it offline or online, just by placing your phone close to the bed (next to your pillow).
- Understand your sleep in different phases with data from light sleep, deep sleep and time spent awake. All in one place, on the history tab.
- Customizable Smart Alarm to wake up at the ideal time, with the proper snooze, volume and wake-up window. 
- The sleep lab offers a collection of average sleeping habits, including bed time, wake-up time, sleeping duration and efficiency. This way you know how much you sleep and how efficient your are. 
- Choose from a set of soundscapes to fall asleep much faster and more relaxed.

Please ensure your register to benefit from the rich features that the application offers. Including unlimited measurements, history, configuration options and more.

Download this simple and advanced sleep tracking application, to record your sleeping habits and wake up with smart alarms and enjoy a healthier day.
