comments: Was worth 5 stars in my opinion, but noted that now it lacks some features that it used to have. These include a heart rate monitor. My samsung watch still has the application, but now does not record my heart rate at all. It also has a problem with barometric pressure, and doesn't read that any longer either. Wondering if it's the age of my watch, or just a bad update, that stopped these functions working....Please Advise...üôÇ

The app isn't the same without the weight management widget; I feel that, in my humble opinion, it is an extremely vital component that needs to be brought back in future updates. Moreover, for some reason, the latest update on my device (android) has resulted in my steps not being properly counted. Finally, I am being a bit nit-picky here, but the green colour scheme needs to go.....If you could fix those things (especially the weight management thing), that would be swell.

I used it before on my phone during the beginning of the first UK lockdown to keep me fit, and it sure did! I was more aware of what I was eating because I would record it, I recorded all the exercises I did because I wanted to do well for burning calories every day. Only thing stopping from giving 5 stars is it's not the most accurate way for measuring steps however overall if you are truthful to the app, you can monitor being healthy in a positive way and stay in "good" for calorie intake.

The calories in/out was taken away. Not a fan. Also the women's feature is powered by the app Glow...but it can't connect to the actual Glow app. I don't understand why you wouldn't just have the apps connect? I'm also disappointed with the water tracker. I wish I could just put in how many ounces instead of being confined to the one glass=8.4oz. It's just not accurate enough. If I drink a 12 oz can of sparkling water I can't put it in because im limited it 8.4 oz. Very lacking in many areas.

I agree with the other review, all of the sudden the app is not recording the steps from my Active watch and it is very inaccurate, messages and calls are also not registering Details use to be pretty accurate but something has changed. I tried all the recommended "fixes" and it still didn't work. I have discovered that updating the samsung health app through my watch app corrected the issue and now my watch and app are in sync once again.

title: Good sleep - sleep cycle, alarm, snoring
description:
Sleep is one of our major activity in our life that accounts for 1/3 in life according to data from World Bank. 

It detects snoring based on machine learning algorithm and records snoring sound only that can be listened and upload to cloud storage. Snoring in each episode detected in your sleep is classified in terms of intensity that will be shown when user tried to listen.

Also body movements are detected that will be used for smart alarm before entering next sleep cycle. Nature of sound is heard as alarm sound, not annoying alerting that makes user feel good to wake up in the morning.

If you are keep doing severe of snoring, feature of snoring alleviation will help you alleviate successive snoring which makes your partner comfortable than before.

We also estimate your sleep cycles during your sleep based on movement detection over the microphone in the phone.


FEATURES
‚ñ∑ Machine learning snore detection algorithms¬†
‚ñ∑ Records snore sounds and upload cloud storage
‚ñ∑ Estimate sleep cycles
‚ñ∑ Weekly sleep statistics¬†as well as snoring 
‚ñ∑ Snore alleviation with anti-snore
‚ñ∑ Smart morning alarm
‚ñ∑ Bedtime alarm and voice-activated function

title: Forest: Stay focused
description:
‚òÖ Google Play 2015-2016 Best App of the Year
‚òÖ 2018 Google Play Editors‚Äô Choice Top Productivity App
‚òÖ Google Play 2018 Best Social Impact App Nomination
‚òÖ 2018 Google Play Best Self-improvement app in Canada, Mexico, France, Russia, Brazil, Japan, Korea, India, and Thailand!

Can't stop scrolling? Keep off your phone with the cutest focus timer, and unleash your productivity along with 4 million satisfied paying users.

üåüWelcome to Forest, the place where procrastination does not exist!üåü

Staying focused has never been harder in this world of digital distractions. From phone calls to text messages, your attention is constantly being diverted. 

Plant a tree when you need to stay focused. If you commit to your task without getting distracted, your tree grows; if you cannot resist the temptation to use your phone, your tree dies. Over time, you will have an entire forest built from your focus and commitment. 

Free yourself from obsessive scrolling and achieve your goals!

GET MOTIVATEDüí™
‚Ä¢ Break phone addiction and form productive habits.
‚Ä¢ Earn rewards by staying focused and unlock adorable trees!
‚Ä¢ Grow your very own forest with each tree representing your efforts.
‚Ä¢ View your daily/weekly/monthly/yearly progress and learn about your own focus habits.
‚Ä¢ Concentrate on a daily routine and manage ADHD.

FOCUS LIKE A PRO ‚úçÔ∏è 
Activate Pro version and access more exciting features that will help you concentrate and procrastinate no more:

‚Ä¢ Plant real trees on Earth with our partner, Trees for the Future - We've planted over 800,000 real trees so far!üå≤
‚Ä¢ Set up a customized whitelist - 
leaving Forest and using apps added to the whitelist will not kill your tree.
‚Ä¢ Categorize your tasks with tags and see how you allocated your time.
‚Ä¢ Track your phone usage and screen time.
‚Ä¢ Compete with users around the world.
‚Ä¢ Plant with friends - If one of you fail to stay focused, you'll all get a dead tree!

Plant a tree and start building life-changing habits with Forest!

NOTICE
‚Ä¢ Forest is available for Android mobile and tablet devices, and can be accessed across all Android devices with Pro version. To download the non-Android version of Forest requires a separate purchase. However, by logging into the same account, your data can be synchronized across all platforms.
‚Ä¢ Due to budget constraint, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five. 

Permissions Explained: https://www.forestapp.cc/permissions/en/

CONNECT WITH US
Follow us on Instagram: @forest_app
Follow us on Twitter: @forestapp_cc

We also have a chrome extension. Find out more at www.forestapp.cc!

comments: I've been using this app for 2 years and almost unlocking all the trees. It was very helpful. After the new updates, it lost me as a user. Since I don't have "pro version" all the tress I had unlocked were refund and I lost all of them. The only ones I have are the free version trees. I am very upset and disappointed in changes. Not longer does this app care for their users, they only care about profits.

It's a great app as always. BUT for those who wanna update it to the latest version, DON'T DO IT. The latest system don't allow us to buy other species without paying for premium. Unlocking different type of trees is what keep motivating us to focus on the priorities. Without premium, there left only few typical trees in the store. As a student who's still financially independent like many others, I try not to spend any coins or cash on any apps no matter the price. I wish u can change it back.

Amazing app. Got me to focus during a very difficult time, and has continued to do so ever since. Well worth the cheap price for premium, but completely usable without buying. Brilliant support: Some of my data went missing at one point, and I had a friendly reply and full data restoration within 3 days. Suggestion: Being able to give a single tree multiple labels would be even better.

Simple, cool app. Nice visualization for staying on task for long projects. It's weird that the friends feature is only for premium users. I feel like giving that option to free users would encourage much more people to start using the app, considering how friends get people invested in competitions like this, but aside from that it's worth the download at least. That missing feature is the only immediate reason for giving 4 instead of 5 stars

Someone suggested the app the me and I recently started using it. I LOVE the concept and it's super nice to be able to be motivated to stay focused. However what makes me quite sad is not that I cannot buy different species of trees, it's more that without premium, we can't help to plant real trees... I wish they would allow all user the be able to plan real trees, even if we have to watch an ad for every tree, I think it would be worth it.

title: White Noise: Sleep Sounds
description:
White noise, sleep sounds and meditation music are best for relaxing, sleeping, meditation and concentration or if you have problems with tinnitus or insomnia.

You can now forget about insomnia and start sleeping better. White noise or brown noise sounds are specifically designed to overcome insomnia by taking your mind into a deep state of relaxation.

You can set the timer and put your app in background or turn off the screen. At the end of the time, the sound fades gently and the application closes by itself. So you do not have to worry about closing the white noise app if you fall asleep. White noise is an ideal application for learning, reading, concentration, meditation and rest.

For a better experience, we recommend you the use of headphones or earphones to listen the relaxing sounds.

Application features:
- 30 relaxing sounds with white noise,
- helps you sleep by blocking distracting sounds,
- timer system that slowly fades audio out,
- auto-pause sounds on incoming call,
- usage in the background and with other apps,
- no streaming is required for playback (no data connection required),
- you can make list of favorite sounds.

Natural white noise relaxing sounds:
- Cicadas sounds,
- Fireplace,
- Heavy rain,
- Sound of the night,
- Ocean waves,
- Thunderstorm,
- Snowstorm,
- Waterfall sound,
- Wind noise,
- White noise,
- Pink noise,
- Brown noise.

comments: This is the best tinnitus app I have found on Play Store. A use it with my hearing aids and has such a great selection of sounds to distract from the Tinnitus that I acquired In combat.
The ads of meditation that start talking super loud when you try to close the app is costing you 2 stars cause it wakes my spouse.

Wonderful!! As a very light sleeper, my day started between 3 and 5am when the dementing lady upstairs got up. Now I wake around 7. I love the variety of sounds on this app and the fact that you can set it for several hours. Some of the water sounds are very loud and not soothing. My favourites are the wind through the cornfield, and the sea tide at the beach. Highly recommend this app if you want a good night's sleep. Each choices has 4 options that you can vary the sound levels of.

My tinnitus drives me insane at night but this app helps so much. By far the best white noise app out there. It features a variety of noise options (from pure droning white noise to simulating rain forests or busy cafes). You can set a timer, run it in the background and the adverts are non-intrusive. I genuinely wish there was a paid option so I could support the devs
Very great app developed sir . It really helps me to focus on my studies. Plus there are very less apps which do not charge for timer.

title: Nature sounds relax & sleep
description:
You want to relax, sleep better, and increase concentration?
This app is ideal for people who are tired, stressed, with insomnia and had a hard day of work because it has natural soothing sounds of ocean waves, sound of rain, sound of animals of the forest, sound of forest, sound of flowing of water.

Close your eyes, put on the headphones and choose one of the natural sounds and relax or sleep better.

Train your concentration and relax listening to the natural sound. Choose a time and not think about anything until the sound ends. Should gradually increase the time to increase the concentration

1. Natural Sound of ocean waves.
2. Natural Sound of rain.
3. Natural Sound of animals of the forest.
4. Natural Sound of flowing of water.
5. You can choose the songs.
6. You can choose the time.
7. Great quality of the sounds.
8. Beautiful sounds.
9. Beautiful backgrounds.
10. The best relaxing sound!
11. Music for sleep.
12. Sound for babies sleep.
13. You can put a nice sound to calm your baby and sleep like an angel.
14. These nature sounds will help you relax, stay concentrated and focused.

A relaxation technique (relaxation training) is any method (include audio therapy, sleep sounds and nature sounds), process, procedure, or activity that helps a person to relax, to attain a state of increased calmness, or otherwise reduce levels of anxiety, stress.

People use nature sounds relaxation techniques for the following reasons, among others:
- General well-being. 
- Insomnia therapy.
- Stress management

description:
OFFLINE SLEEP SOUNDS APP

Beat insomnia and start sleep by listening to relaxing sounds of rain, nature, white noise & meditation music.

Huge collections of relaxing sounds that will help you to relax and fall asleep. Create custom ambience with nature sounds, rain sounds, white noise, melodies, and much more. Over 120 free sounds you can explore offline:

‚≠ê Water Sounds (Light Rain, Rain Storm, Rain On Umbrella, Rain on Window, Water Drops, Waves, Waterfall, Seaside, Brook, Creek, Stream, Fountain, Bamboo Fountain, Under Water, Air Bubble, Shower, Lake, Dam)

‚≠ê Affirmation Words (Sleep, It's Okay, You're Safe, Successful, New Day)

CREATE AMBIENCE

Create your own ambience by combine your favorite sounds into a new playable favorite mix. Just choose the sounds you like, set the volume and name your new mix, for example:
- Coffee shop ambience

Insoundnia is not limited for relaxation or sleep but also for meditation, concentration, or affirmation. It contains some affirmative words from woman voice, like:

- Tomorrow is a new day

Insoundnia does not require internet connection to download additional sleep sounds. You can use it anywhere offline. You also able to set timer that will automatically stop sounds when you sleep.

title: Sleep Well
description:
Sleep Well is an application developed in collaboration with a sleep specialist. It is a smart alarm clock that will play the role of coach by warning you when it's time to go to bed so you can have a restful sleep. The times when you need to go to bed are initially calculated based on your physical characteristics, and then they will be optimized to fit your sleep needs during a personalized program.

The personalized program corresponds to the first ten days of use of the application during which Sleep Well will compute your sleep cycles duration thanks to the quality of your sleep.

You just have to mention to the application if you wake up before that the alarm rings (via the "I'm Awake" button of the Sleep Well notification) and mention your feelings about the quality of your sleep (later in the day, another notification will ask you this information). At the end of your personalized program, sleep time proposed is adapted to your own sleep and no further information will be required. You will have on your smartphone a personal coach that mentioned you when you need go to bed in order to have a good sleep.

Know that your custom program may be restarted whenever you want using the "Settings" menu of the application. We also recommend you to restart your program when something has changed in your life (stress, holidays). Also note that the best period to launch your personalized program is after few days of vacation until the end of your holidays.

Bad mood, attention and concentration disorders are symptoms associated with a poor quality sleep. When we reduce our sleep time, serious problems such as diabetes, obesity or coronary heart disease can appear.

Recent statistics are clear, our average sleep time has been declining steadily for 30 years and the risks are not just about well-being but they indeed affect health.

Thus, Sleep Well will help you to be careful with your sleeping time and your sleep cycles to improve your way of living.

For more information please visit our website:
http://illsleepwell.com

title: asleep: Sleep Cycle alarm, Anti snore, Sleep sound
description:
Improve your sleep

asleep is a smart sleep assistant that monitors your sleep quality, helps you get rid of snoring, records night sounds, wakes you up at the most optimal time, and gives you the opportunity to choose relaxing sounds for sleep.

Sleep Monitoring:
Monitor your sleep with the monitoring feature, pre-selecting factors that affect sleep and a relaxing lullaby that will help you fall asleep.

Snore Recording:
If any sounds are detected during sleep, the app will record them, saving the time and duration of snoring. Thanks to this function, you will be able to determine what factors affect snoring during sleep.

Smart alarm clock:
When you enable the Smart alarm option, the app will track the most appropriate sleep phase to Wake you up at the most convenient moment.

Anti snoring:
You can enable the anti-snoring feature, which will play a sound or turn on vibration if the app detects that you are snoring. This function allows you to get rid of snoring, while not interfering with the sleep itself.

Diary:
Save monitoring data to monitor changes in your sleep.

Statistics:
View your sleep statistics by identifying data such as snoring frequency, snoring duration, sleep duration, and factors for good and bad sleep. Thanks to detailed statistics, you can always see how your sleep changes, and what contributes to its improvement.

Relax:
Create your own combinations of nature sounds that will help you to relax, get rid of stress, or engage in meditation. The app also has ready-made musical compositions of different styles.



It's time for a better sleep!

comments: I think it's great! Thank you for the sounds.

This app is amazing and it's free, the sounds are incredible plus u have a good selection of noises that u can mix together, yes their is a ad as soon as u turn it on but their isnt any ads while your listening for 8hrs just at the start, hey it's free they have to get paid also, so saying that, I will definitely be using this daily üíóüíóüíóüíó

Perfect for what I needed. Has the rain and water sounds, plus you can add in thunder, piano, violin, crickets, etc. You can set the timer if using to fall asleep. Only thing I don't like is it keeps playing when a phone call comes in. I have to tell the person to hang on while I try to shut it off so I can hear them. I try not to answer the phone as much as possible, so it's not a deal breaker or anything. Overall I love it.

Great app, many rain sounds to choose from to fit any personality. App does not shut off at any time during the night while I run it and the ads are typically dark and the phone is able to go to sleep without the rain noises being shut off. Furthermore, the rain sounds are of exceptional quality.

My favorite sleep app. Non stop rain sounds. Stays on too. I love all the different rain sounds. And additional sounds you can add. Perfect! I hate to sort through all the apps looking for these features. And with so many sound options. You have to find your sleep sweet spot. I'm so glad I did. I'm very happy!

title: Lullaby Add-on üéµ for Sleep as Android + Mindroid
description:
Add-on for Sleep as Android and Mindroid

NEW: 12 additional lullabies - Forest, Car, Fireworks, Baby Doppler, Heart, Vacuum, Shush, Shower, Restaurant..

Lullabies is a feature of the Sleep as Android alarm clock and sleep cycle tracker which help to fall asleep in a faster and fun way. Rather that fixed recordings our lullabies are real-time synthesized, this means each playback will never be the same as the playback before. We use various techniques to make each lullaby a unique experience. Our lullabies take you into different pleasant environments to free your mind from stress and make it relaxed for faster fall asleep.
 
This add-on Lullaby pack bring 38 new fascinating environments:

Forrest - pleasant calm walk in the forrest
Heart - listen to heart beats
In utero - feel like being back to the womb
Pink and brown noise - for fast fall asleep
Restaurant - the buzz of a full restaurant
Space ship - being a captain on a starship bridge
Slow breath - synchronize your breath with a female slow breath to get relaxed and fall asleep
Jungle - sounds like you are in the middle of the jungle with various exotic animal sounds
NASA's Saturn "Sound" - Saturn radio waves recorded by Cassini spacecraft and turned into sound
Submarine - subtle engine sound, creaking metal, sonar, steam, and deep mines
Tribal drums - native american drums with flute and eagle and wolf sounds
Lava lake - bubbling lava, gas eruptions
Norden - freezing cold winds, howling wolfs
Galloping horse - galloping and other horse noises
Baby fetal sounds - what does a baby hear in the belly
Sheep counting - sheep counting is a traditional method for falling asleep 
Girl singing - human voice lullaby - calming humming sound
Summer night - soft crickets background with a distant owl
Frogs in pond - various frog sounds in a calming frogchestra
Cat purr - a purring cat in your in you lap with occasional miaow
Temple bells - a Tibetan bowl sound in the background followed with calming little chart bells
The Om chant - a chanting chorus sings the Om chant
Wind chimes - irregular metallic and bamboo chimes with a wind background
Steam train - repetitive sound of a running historic steam train on the rails, occasional hooting and railway crossings
Music box - grandma's music box
Piano, Flute - short calming melodies
War march - soft drumming and a flute in a civil war theme
and more...

recentChanges: Targeting latest API levels
comments: The echoing effect on some of the tracks has been fixed, but now there seems to be an issue with one of my favorites, the whale sounds. It used to flow nicely, but now it seems like it has some weird sound spasming glitch. Like a whale sound will start and then be followed by about every single sound in the lullaby in rapid succession, sometimes layering over each other. Or the diver breathing sound will be abruptly cut off by other sounds. It's very disruptive to listen to compared to before.

Hit or (mostly) miss. I use this to mask tinnitus. My favorite is Car, but there are undertones and a repetitive pulsing sound that I find quite grating, almost infuriating. Once I noticed, I couldn't ignore them. So I switched to Submarine, which doesn't seem to have distracting sounds embedded. Others I somewhat like have similar distracting sounds or are to bassy. Consistent low, non-bassy sounds are what I need. I'd like to remove ones in dislike from the list altogether.

The sounds are fine but it doesn't work for my phone. It might work for other people but when I enable lullabies I don't hear anything, sometimes I can get it to work but it's very glitchy and I can hear the sonar pulsing. I am on Android version 8.1 coloros 5.2.1

Major bug in the app. Constant feedback through the microphone, even though the noise recording is disabled and should not be picking anything up through the mic. Renders the addon completely unusable.

How to sync Spotify playlists rather than favoured albums? I used to have a Spotify playlist as my lullaby. However, since about 4~6 updates ago, i can't see it but only albums were shown in the list. Why?

title: Sleep sounds free with timer.
description:
Beat insomnia and start sleep by listening to relaxing sounds of rain, nature, white noise & meditation music. Each sound is professionally recorded in high-quality to create the perfect combination of ASMR sounds.

Our free application contains the following sounds:

‚òØ Nature sounds.
‚òØ Night lullaby.
‚òØ Calm Piano Music.
‚òØ Tibetan Meditation Music.
‚òØ Music for Deep Sleep.
‚òØ Meditation Music, Sleeping Music.
‚òØ Soothing Music.
‚òØ Fall Asleep Fast.
‚òØ Music with Delta Waves.
‚òØ Flute, Gentle Birds.


Close your eyes, put on the headphones and choose one of the natural sounds and relax or sleep better.

Our meditation app has the following features:

- Work offline. You don‚Äôt need internet connection.
- Absolutely free.
- You could remove ads for extra money.
- High quality nature sounds.
- Amazing HD background pictures.
- Control playback from the lock screen or notifications menu.
- This has a sleep timer. Only set the timer for 30 minutes and you always asleep before the timer goes off.
- Play sounds in background.
- Mute on incoming calls.
- Individual volume control
- It‚Äôs very relaxing!

This relax app is for those who:

- Suffering from terrible insomnia.
- Want sleep better.
- Doing yoga exercises and meditation.
- Learn to breath correctly.
- Have Tinnitus
- Want to get rid of stress and anxiety.
- Improve concentration.


Relaxing tunes‚Äîlike classical music‚Äîmay help you wind down and fall asleep faster (but skip songs that have words, because those may actually stimulate you). Bonus: Listening to music while you sleep may improve memory and brainpower.

Of course, some people sleep best in absolute silence (there‚Äôs a reason why so many people use earplugs!). But if a quiet room isn‚Äôt helping you at night, investing in a sound machine or simply turning on a fan could be the ticket to a good night‚Äôs

title: JUKUSUI:Sleep cycle,Snore recording & Alarm clock
description:
„ÄêNew & Improved JUKUSUI APP Launches„Äë
We are excited to release our updated JUKUSUI from Ver. 4 which was added user's requests. Enjoy our new JUKUSUI app.

‚óèVisualize Snoring
The "Snoring" feature was added in Sleep Log which records all the snoring while you are sleeping by the device microphone. You can check the hours of snoring against the hours in bed (Snoring Rate), the epic and average volume of snoring, etc. With taking snoring logs you can see and check your snoring condition in various aspects.

‚óèJUKUSUI Premium
The yearly/monthly subscriptions have been available ("3,600JPY/yr." or "480JPY/mth."). By subscribing you can use all features of JUKUSUI app. Here are the subscriber's benefits:
„ÉªUnlock optional snoring log features
„ÉªNo ads
„ÉªUnlimited use of alarm and lull sounds
„ÉªUnlock display options for my data in jukusui.com

‚óèNew Monthly Report
The monthly reports is provided in a website "JUKUSUI.COM". This website is opened in the app. With new index and new snoring feature, you can analyze your sleep in various aspects.

‚óèNew Interface
Swipe to stop the log and stop the alarm.

‚óèImproved Sleep Log
The First index of Sleep Log was changed to "Sleep Efficiency". "Sleep Efficiency" shows the rate of hours of sleep against the hours in bed, and it indicates how much you slept properly. By tapping the screen of Sleep Log, you can see the new results.

For more information about new JUKUSUI, visit our official website "JUKUSUI.COM" below:
Official Website: https://jukusui.com

„Äêabout JUKUSUI APP„Äë
JUKUSUI is a multi-functional alarm clock designed to support and improve your sleep.

‚óÜLull Sounds
The healing lull sound will be played to induce peaceful sleep.

‚óÜSmart Alarm
It detects your light sleep and wakes you up. We recommend this for those who always wake up feeling tired, who turn off the alarm only to fall back to sleep or who have trouble waking up in the morning due to hypotension.

‚óÜSleep Report
Tap the "Bedtime" button to sleep, swipe to turn off the alarm and get your daily sleep log to find out your sleep (quality, sleep efficiency, and hours of sleep) and snoring (hours of snoring and volume).

‚óÜCloud Service
This is a service to keep all of your Sleep Log on the dedicated server safely. All you need to do is signing up for this service on the app. After logging in, your daily sleep logs are automatically updated to the server. You don't need to work for backing up the data. When you change your device, you can transfer the data from your old device to the new one. This is a free service.


„ÄêSubscription Service "JUKUSUI Premium"„Äë
‚óèPriceÔºö"3,600JPYÔºèyr." or "480JPYÔºèmth." (Both has 30 days free trial.)
By purchasing "JUKUSUI Premium" subscriptions, you can receive the following options:
„ÉªUnlock optional snoring log features.
„ÉªNo ads.
„ÉªUnlimited use of alarm and lull sounds.
„ÉªUnlock display options for my data in jukusui.com.
‚óèThe subscription fee will be charged to your Google ID.
‚óèOffer the free trial per Google ID.
‚óèThe subscription fee will be charged within 24 hours before the end of the free trial. To cancel it during the free trial period, please proceed with the procedure more than 24 hours before the trial ends.
‚óèThe yearly/monthly subscription fee will be charged within 24 hours before the expiration date. You can cancel the updates more than 24 hours before the expiration date.
‚óèThe subscription fee is non-refundable even if there is a time period of use when canceling your subscription.
‚óèFor cancellation of the updates, you can do it on MENU on Google Play.

„ÄêTerms of Service & Privacy Policy„Äë
Terms of Service : https://jukusui.com/en/terms
Privacy Policy : https://jukusui.com/en/privacy

„ÄêSupport„Äë
jukusui@c2inc.co.jp

title: Nox Relax üí§ Sleep Music Calm Video, Healing Photo
description:
Nox Relax is an app that helps users experience a lower stressful, less anxious, and more restful and relaxed mind thinking. Hundreds of high-quality sessions focused on soul healing and stress relief will help you release stress, comfort mind and think better. 

üí§ Improve Deep Sleep for Relieving Insomnia
Insomnia can be brutal, making both day and night hours difficult and painful. However, certain sounds and music ‚Äì including rainfall, stream and rhythmic waves ‚Äì can improve the quality of slumber for both children and adults. Nox Relax can lull you into dreamland with white noise, pink noise, and relaxing tunes. It will help you wind down and fall asleep faster and deeper, and guarantee a better night with ambient sounds music. 

üòå Keep Calm & Relax for Stress Relief
Maybe, your work and routine life make you feel overwhelmed and drain your energy. Nox Relax can help you stay calm and cool when you are extremely stressed. While watching anti-stress videos and GIF photos, you can fulfill all your desires and make your stress go away. Besides, enjoyable music from Nox Relax can give you a direct effect on the parasympathetic nervous, which helps your body relax.

üåº Remove Negative Energy from Your Mind
Negativity is toxic to your life, so you will need to clear negative energy from your system in order to allow positive energy to thrive on your journey of holistic well-being. Nox Relax offers a lot of funny videos & photos and makes your positive energy thriving. Using the Nox Relax app, you can loosen and ultimately release the grip negativity has over you. 

üßò Heal Emotional and Psychological Trauma
Music therapy can be used to help bring the body into a state of relaxation, and live music along with spoken guide relaxation gives the body a chance to enter into a state of relaxation. Music from Nox Relax can help users face their past experiences and reduce painful patterns in relationships in their lives.

üéµ Study Focus & Creativity with Inspirational Music
The right music in the background can lead to getting things done more, more quickly or simply keep us inspired. Nox Relax can help you focus on the task at hand and boost your productivity. We believe Nox Relax can be a great tool for everyone who performs better with music in the background while doing any mental work, like studying, writing, coding, doing office work, or while being creating.

Download Nox Relax today, give your mind a peaceful time and live better.

title: Sleep Sounds: Relax, Meditate & Rain Melodies
description:
You have  Insomnia?   Cannot sleep at night?  Snoring  partner? Need a  peaceful sound for meditation melodies, cannot focus on works or study? Or your baby is very hard to fall asleep?
 Sleep Sounds, Sleep Music, Relax Melodies - Sleep-Aid App (new 2021) is best sleeping music, sleeping sounds & relax melodies on Android for you! 
 You can set up the time  that will automatically stop sounds.  Sleep Sounds, Sleep Music, Relax Melodies - Sleep-Aid App (new 2021) does not need internet connection to work so you do not have to be worried about spending data. 
 With  Sleep Sounds, Sleep Music, Relax Melodies - Sleep-Aid App (new 2021), you can enjoy lots of high quality  relaxing sounds, nature sounds, relax melodies, ambiences and white noise that will give you  high-quality sleep,  relaxation and focusing.   Our Sleep & Relax (new 2021) application contains large variety of  HD High quality sounds with over 50 melodies divided into 7 difference categories that can be mixed together in order to bring the most suitable sound mix for each individual.  You can save your favorite sound mixes so you can play them easily with no times. Easily controlling the sounds from everywhere on the phone with notification panel setting.   
 **Sleep Sounds, Brainwaves, & White Noises** includes:

title: Relax Sounds (Sleep, Meditate, Focus Melodies)
description:
‚òÖ Beautiful, Simple, Easy
‚òÖ Large collection of high quality sounds
‚òÖ Built in Sleep Timer to turn sounds off nicely after a certain time
‚òÖ Store your favourite scenes
‚òÖ Customizable to your needs

Need to fall asleep better or want to relax, meditate or focus? Relax sounds can help!

Many sounds
Most likely contains all the sounds you would search for. Including rain, storm, thunder, waves, piano, lullaby, coffee shop, fan, white noise and MANY MORE.

comments: The best part is that u can add as many as u want at the same time without going pro. But I would request that you release certain sounds like subways from pro. Other than that, I am cool with this. All sounds must be downloaded after installing and does not take up so much space.

In principal, this is an excellent app. However, it's pretty buggy. Some sounds just drop out and disappear when they shouldn't. For instance, the Old Clock just plays for a bit and then stops, never coming back on again, even though I've selected Loop. I've created a scene with various sounds in it and it's very inconsistent. Sometimes the Cicadas and Clock will play for hours -- sometimes just seconds. Right now I've got Bonfire set to loop, but it's not making any noise. I switch to Crossfade and then back to Loop and it comes on and will play for a bit and then disappear with no logic to when it goes and it won't return until I de-loop and then loop again. Overall, the app is a neat idea, but I regret paying for it. I like the sound options better on this one, but have none of these problems with the Atmosphere app. Wish I would have paid for that one instead as reliability is more important than features.

Maybe the best app for sounds. I wish you could implement the ability to save sounds you type in the cearch box and add them to their categories. That would give it that 5 star quailty. Other than that, i enjoy it very much, love the scenes menu.

Very solid. There are a large selection of sounds, some really nice premium sounds you can buy, and even the option to add your own recorded sounds! Then, you can change the audio levels, direction, and much more of each set noise, then save your favorite presets. Very handy for having easy access to your own custom environments! Just don't play TOO many sounds at once, or it might become buggy.

I love it, in contrast I was hoping to hear bees, I love bees an exchange or addition city sound, city is very stressfully bees are not, but you can't please everyone right? Overall is a wonderful app.

title: Wind Noise: Relax and Sleep
description:
Wind sounds, the sound of trees and leaves are nature sounds which to help you relax and fall asleep, as well regenerate strength after a difficult and exhausting day.

If you need a moment of relaxation or have a problem with falling asleep these noise of wind sounds are a great way to wind down and rest.
With this free application you will improve your concentration.
Relaxing sounds of wind sounds can also be used as background music while learning and studying, reading, working, exercising and using other applications, eg. reading e-books.

Wind noise resembling the brown noise and rustling leaves reminiscent white noise can be successfully used for infant sleep. These natural relaxing sounds are often also used in the treatment of stress and insomnia.

‚óä The advantages of wind sounds applications:
‚óè automatic shutdown of the applications by the timer,
‚óè the application can run in the background, along with other applications,
‚óè all wind sounds in HD
‚óè mixing the wind noises with other relaxing and calming sounds, 
‚óè the ability to select your favorite wind sounds and play the sounds in slideshow mode,
‚óè application supports relaxation, rest, sleep, study and work,
‚óè eliminates problems with sleeping and concentrating,
‚óè helps get rid of stress,
‚óè you can set the wind sounds as ringtones or notifications,
‚óè acting in the background application consumes very little battery.

comments: Good. Very good. I like. As for some downloaders wanting the screen off whilst in play. All you do is press your power button just one quick press to put your screen to sleep all apps will still play on whilst screen is blacked out, annnnnnd relaaaax...

Sounds very natural and the timer is perfect! The pictures of the nature scenes are nice to look at while I'll awake and want to mentally get away versus me watching them at night when I'm trying to close my eyes and fall asleep. Highly recommend üíÜüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüò¥

I would rate this app 5 stars if there was a way to turn off the bright screen while the app is open. The wind sounds and other sounds are wonderful...very relaxing and pleasant, and a nice variety. The screen light staying on is kind of counter-productive to falling asleep, but if I can figure out how to turn it off without exiting the app, I will change my rating to 5 stars. Overall a very good app.

The improvement to add the different music/sounds over the wind was a great feature add. I had really liked the app prior but that pushed to 5 stars. I would like increased natural sound choices on a similar type app (i.e. like whale songs, creaking forrests) can you make one?

Love everything except one important thing. There is no repeat button to set so it doesn't move on to another wind sound. Updated: five stars and thank you for getting back to me in a timely fashion. Thank you for my well rested nights once again. üåü

comments: I love this app! The sounds are soothing, peaceful, relaxing, and help me get to sleep much faster. I would ask the developers for one addition. For those of us who love the sound of gentle waves lapping against the shore, but ocean sounds antagonize our anxiety... maybe a lake. Thank you and again, your app is wonderful!

Editor's Choice??? For supposing to be a relaxing app. Every time you pick a sound, you get an add at blaring volume that is so unsettling. There are ads all over the app and you have an automatic count down timer - 15 minutes before the sound ends. This app is all about stressing you into paying. There are plenty of actual 'relaxing' apps out there. Wake up editors or are you getting paid for votes?

It seems, like other meditation apps, everyone fails at its intended purpose. You put on sleep meditation, you fall asleep, once the time is up a notification awakens you to tell you your meditation session is done. Really? Then, just as you're drifting back to sleep, the phone starts vibrating and your app is asking "Please rate us". FAIL!  App deleted!

IT WOULD HAVE BEEN VERY GOOD IF THERE WOULD HAVE BEEN NO ADS!!!!!!! Don't just say that you will think about my feedback, you need to do it! Everytime I click on a music, damn same ads of vegas harasses me!!!! Hell stop this! You need to know installers are not going to like this app if ad harasses them too much. I want the reply of this feedback

I had an extremely stressed day at work and my heart started to telling me that my stress level it's out of scale. I look up online to find something to get my stress level down and I found this app which works for me. Thank you so much for making this app! üëçüòÄ

title: Relax - Meditate, Focus, Sleep
description:
Whether you are trying to focus on work, practice some mindfulness and meditation, or just get the best night of sleep of your life, Relax is for you!


In Relax - Meditate, Focus, Sleep, you choose what experience fits you best:

1) CHOOSE FROM BEST IN CLASS EXPERIENCES MADE FOR YOU

Enjoy a premium selection of high quality video and audio experiences, featuring the soothing experience of a beach, the warm feeling of a fireplace, the touch of nature of a small creek and the sleep inducing sound of rain.

2) BUILD YOUR OWN

Choose just the right combination to fit your current mood with our variety of sounds that can be combined into your own ambient sound. From rivers, rain, waterfalls and beaches to birds, owls and many other sounds to describe just the mood you need. Besides all of this, on Relax you will find binaural beats, try this amazing feature for yourself.

Special features include timer to sleep and the ability to save your favorite moods, so you don't have to create them all over again. 

If this was not already good enough, it all works offline and there will be no additional download after you install Relax.

Try it for yourself, and with any questions of feedback, do not hesitate to contact us, we built this app for you.

comments: Works great for what I need... Great design ü§å..please don't mess with something that works by being greedy

I grew up along the Amnicon River (Wisconsin USA), and spent a lot of time on the shores of Lake Superior (largest fresh water lake in the world). I've always found the sounds of the River and of the Lake are VERY CALMING. This app has the sounds that have the same calming effect. The sounds take me to a great place in my childhood. Thank You!!!

I just started using this app, it's working great so far. Helps me go to sleep & helps my young babies sleep through the night. There's lots of wave sounds to choose from & they're different. I'm going to recommend this to my grandma
Not realistic enough. You NEED to have way more low bass and slow the frequency of the waves to 6 second intervals. This is more realistic sounding!
Non-stop sounds is helpful especially when I'm conducting groups.

title: Relaxing Candles: music, sleep, meditation
description:
Relaxing Candles and relaxation music are an ideal way to fatigue, stress, insomnia and ruffled nerves. The application works great during learning, sleeping, meditating, reading, yoga and staying at the spa. Relaxation music also works on children and babies. Observation of films with calm flames of candles combined with relaxing melodies reduces stress levels, improves concentration and brings relief in tinnitus.

Download the application and free yourself from stress. Look at the soothing flames of candles, listen to relaxing music and melodious sounds, relax your mind and soul. A large collection of calming sounds and melodies as well as a view of the soothing flames of candles will help you mute and calm down yourself.

Create your own sound compositions, add and mix relaxation music with the nature sounds such as: birds singing, cicada sounds, rain sounds, wind noise, night sounds and many more.

With this application on your phone you can watch relaxing flames of candles and listen to relaxing and calming melodies wherever you are and whenever you feel like it. No internet connection is required to run the application. Playing relaxing music during sleep is the best way to calm sleep and effectively rest.

Put on the headphones, look at the soothing flames of candles and relax listening to the relaxing music and the nature sounds.

Advantages of the application:
‚óè Mood night lighting with relaxing candles,
‚óè Facilitates falling asleep in sleep and insomnia problems,
‚óè It works anti-stress,
‚óè Ideal for meditation,
‚óè Has a built-in timer,
‚óè High quality sounds and movies,
‚óè It can run in the background,
‚óè Easy operation,
‚óè Works off-line,
‚óè Free application.

Soothing flames of candles:
Lazy-moving flames of candles act calming and anti-stress.

Music for sleep:
By listening to relaxing sounds you will fall asleep faster and have a better rest, what will ensure you a good mood on the next day.

Music for concentration:
Melodic music isolates from noise and ambient noise, and facilitates concentration and increases the level of focus.

Music for meditation:
Soothing music works anti-stress. It allows you to calm down and achieve inner peace. The time of relaxation will become even more effective.

Tinnitus eliminating:
Listening to calm music allows to eliminate tinnitus.
